C++ Source Code#

This section contains the actual C++ source code files.

Core Functions#

18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.

40#include "me/MESolver.h"
41
42#ifndef _MAIN_RUN_SIMULATION_H
43#define _MAIN_RUN_SIMULATION_H
44
45void runSimulation(char *simulationFilename, int replicate, char *solverClass,
46               vector<int> cudaDevices, time_t checkpointInterval);
47void runSolver(char *simulationFilename, int replicate, lm::me::MESolver *solver,
48               vector<int> cudaDevices, time_t checkpointInterval);
49
50#endif

runSimulation.cpp#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License Copyright 2008-2013
  3 * Luthey-Schulten Group, Copyright 2012 Roberts Group, All rights reserved.
  4 * 
  5 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group University of Illinois at
  6 * Urbana-Champaign http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  7 * 
  8 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
  9 * of this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal
 10 * with the Software without restriction, including without limitation the
 11 * rights to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or
 12 * sell copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
 13 * furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:
 14 * 
 15 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
 16 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 17 * 
 18 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice,
 19 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation
 20 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 21 * 
 22 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 23 * Urbana-Champaign, the Roberts Group, Johns Hopkins University, nor the names
 24 * of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
 25 * this Software without specific prior written permission.
 26 * 
 27 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
 28 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
 29 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
 30 * CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
 31 * LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING
 32 * FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS
 33 * WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 34 *
 35 * Author(s): Mike Hallock, Tyler Earnest
 36 *
 37 ***************************************************************************
 38 *
 39 * runSimulation and runSolver provide a stripped-down environment for
 40 * executing a single replicate.  The motivation is to have a non entry point
 41 * method to call for setting up a Solver and realizing the trajectory.
 42 * Primarily, this is to provide the python interface an easy way to run a
 43 * Solver without requiring setting up the output queue or dealing with
 44 * resource allocation.  
 45 */
 46#include "config.h"
 47#if defined(MACOSX)
 48#include <sys/sysctl.h>
 49#elif defined(LINUX)
 50#include <sys/sysinfo.h>
 51#endif
 52
 53
 54#include <string>
 55#include <map>
 56#include <cstdio>
 57#include <cstring>
 58#include <ctime>
 59#if defined(MACOSX)
 60#include <sys/time.h>
 61#endif
 62#include <csignal>
 63#include <cerrno>
 64#include <unistd.h>
 65#include <sys/wait.h>
 66#include <pthread.h>
 67#include <google/protobuf/stubs/common.h>
 68#include "core/Print.h"
 69#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 70#include "core/Types.h"
 71#include "core/Math.h"
 72#ifdef OPT_CUDA
 73#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
 74#include "rdme/MGPUMpdRdmeSolver.h"
 75#include "rdme/MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver.h"
 76#include <cuda.h>
 77#endif
 78#include "io/lm_hdf5.h"
 79#include "io/SimulationFile.h"
 80#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
 81#include "ReactionModel.pb.h"
 82#include "io/SimulationParameters.h"
 83#include "core/CheckpointSignaler.h"
 84#include "core/DataOutputQueue.h"
 85#include "core/LocalDataOutputWorker.h"
 86#include "core/SignalHandler.h"
 87#include "core/ReplicateRunner.h"
 88#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
 89#include "SimulationParameters.pb.h"
 90#include "thread/Thread.h"
 91#include "thread/WorkerManager.h"
 92#include "lptf/Profile.h"
 93#include "me/MESolverFactory.h"
 94#include "me/MESolver.h"
 95#include "cme/CMESolver.h"
 96#include "rdme/RDMESolver.h"
 97#include "core/runSimulation.h"
 98
 99using std::map;
100using std::list;
101using lm::Print;
102using lm::Exception;
103using lm::main::ReplicateRunner;
104using lm::main::ResourceAllocator;
105using lm::me::MESolverFactory;
106using lm::thread::PthreadException;
107
108extern bool globalAbort;
109
110void abortHandler(int x)
111{
112	globalAbort=1;
113}
114
115void runSimulation(char *simulationFilename, int replicate, char *solverClass,
116               vector<int> cudaDevices, time_t checkpointInterval)
117{
118    lm::me::MESolverFactory solverFactory;
119    solverFactory.setSolver(solverClass);
120    lm::me::MESolver * solver = NULL;
121    solver = solverFactory.instantiate();
122
123    runSolver(simulationFilename, replicate, solver, cudaDevices,checkpointInterval);
124
125    // Free the solver we created
126    if (solver != NULL) {delete solver; solver = NULL;}
127
128}
129
130void runSolver(char *simulationFilename, int replicate, lm::me::MESolver *solver,
131               vector<int> cudaDevices, time_t checkpointInterval)
132{
133    PROF_SET_THREAD(0);
134    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_SIM_RUN);
135    double cpuCoresPerReplicate  = 1.0*cudaDevices.size();
136    double cudaDevicesPerReplicate = 1.0*cudaDevices.size();
137    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "interactive process started.");
138
139#ifdef OPT_CUDA
140    if (dynamic_cast<lm::rdme::MGPUMpdRdmeSolver*> (solver) == NULL && dynamic_cast<lm::rdme::MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver*> (solver) == NULL && cudaDevices.size() > 1) {
141        throw lm::Exception("Multiple CUDA devices specified for single GPU solver");
142    }
143#endif
144
145    signal(SIGINT, abortHandler);
146
147    // Get the number of processors. ( copied from Main.cpp )
148    int numberCpuCores = 0;
149#if defined(MACOSX)
150    uint physicalCpuCores;
151    size_t  physicalCpuCoresSize=sizeof(physicalCpuCores);
152    sysctlbyname("hw.activecpu",&physicalCpuCores,&physicalCpuCoresSize,NULL,0);
153    numberCpuCores = physicalCpuCores;
154#elif defined(LINUX)
155    #ifdef ARM
156        numberCpuCores = get_nprocs_conf();
157    #else
158        numberCpuCores = get_nprocs();
159    #endif
160#else
161    #error "Unsupported architecture."
162#endif
163
164    // Create the resource allocator, subtract one core for the data output thread.
165#ifdef OPT_CUDA
166    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Using %d processor(s) and %zd CUDA device(s) per process.", numberCpuCores, cudaDevices.size());
167    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Assigning %0.2f processor(s) and %0.2f CUDA device(s) per replicate.", cpuCoresPerReplicate, cudaDevicesPerReplicate);
168    ResourceAllocator resourceAllocator(0, numberCpuCores, cpuCoresPerReplicate, cudaDevices, cudaDevicesPerReplicate);
169#else
170    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Using %d processor(s) per process.", numberCpuCores);
171    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Assigning %0.2f processor(s) per replicate.", cpuCoresPerReplicate);
172    ResourceAllocator resourceAllocator(0, numberCpuCores, cpuCoresPerReplicate);
173#endif
174
175    ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources resources = resourceAllocator.assignReplicate(replicate);
176
177    lm::main::CheckpointSignaler * checkpointSignaler = NULL;
178    if (checkpointInterval>0) {
179        checkpointSignaler = new lm::main::CheckpointSignaler();
180        checkpointSignaler->setAffinity(0);
181        checkpointSignaler->startCheckpointing(checkpointInterval);
182        checkpointSignaler->start();
183    }
184
185
186    // Open the file.
187    lm::io::hdf5::SimulationFile * file = new lm::io::hdf5::SimulationFile(simulationFilename);
188
189    // Start the data output thread.
190    lm::main::LocalDataOutputWorker * dataOutputWorker = new lm::main::LocalDataOutputWorker(file);
191    //dataOutputWorker->setAffinity(reservedCpuCore);
192    dataOutputWorker->start();
193
194    // Set the data output handler to be the worker.
195    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::setInstance(dataOutputWorker);
196
197    // Get the simulation parameters.
198    std::map<std::string,string> simulationParameters = file->getParameters();
199
200    // Get the reaction model.
201    lm::io::ReactionModel reactionModel;
202    if (solver->needsReactionModel())
203    {
204        file->getReactionModel(&reactionModel);
205    }
206
207    // Get the diffusion model.
208    lm::io::DiffusionModel diffusionModel;
209    uint8_t * lattice=NULL, * latticeSites=NULL;
210    size_t latticeSize=0, latticeSitesSize=0;
211    if (solver->needsDiffusionModel())
212    {
213        file->getDiffusionModel(&diffusionModel);
214        latticeSize = diffusionModel.lattice_x_size()*diffusionModel.lattice_y_size()*diffusionModel.lattice_z_size()*diffusionModel.particles_per_site()*diffusionModel.bytes_per_particle();
215        lattice = new uint8_t[latticeSize];
216        latticeSitesSize = diffusionModel.lattice_x_size()*diffusionModel.lattice_y_size()*diffusionModel.lattice_z_size();
217        latticeSites = new uint8_t[latticeSitesSize];
218        file->getDiffusionModelLattice(&diffusionModel, lattice, latticeSize, latticeSites, latticeSitesSize);
219    }
220
221    // Start a new thread for the replicate.
222    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Starting replicate %d (%s).", replicate, resources.toString().c_str());
223
224    #if defined(OPT_CUDA)
225    // Set the GPU affinity.
226    if (resources.cudaDevices.size() > 0)
227            lm::CUDA::setCurrentDevice(resources.cudaDevices[0]);
228    #endif
229
230    try
231    {
232        // Run the simulation using the specified solver.
233        solver->initialize(replicate, &simulationParameters, &resources);
234        if (solver->needsReactionModel())
235        {
236            ((lm::cme::CMESolver *)solver)->setReactionModel(&reactionModel);
237        }
238        if (solver->needsDiffusionModel())
239        {
240            ((lm::rdme::RDMESolver *)solver)->setDiffusionModel(&diffusionModel, lattice, latticeSize, latticeSites, latticeSitesSize);
241        }
242        solver->generateTrajectory();
243    }
244    catch (lm::Exception e)
245    {
246        Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "Exception during execution of replicate: %s.", e.what());
247    }
248    catch (std::exception& e)
249    {
250        Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "Std exception during execution of replicate: %s.", e.what());
251    }
252    catch (...)
253    {
254        Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "Unknown exception during execution of replicate.");
255    }
256
257    if (checkpointInterval>0)
258        checkpointSignaler->stopCheckpointing();
259
260
261    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Stopping worker threads.");
262    lm::thread::WorkerManager::getInstance()->stopWorkers();
263
264    // Close the simulation file.
265    delete file;
266    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Simulation file closed.");
267
268
269    // Cleanup any resources.
270    if (checkpointInterval>0)
271        delete checkpointSignaler;
272    delete dataOutputWorker;
273    if (lattice != NULL) {delete [] lattice; lattice = NULL;}
274    if (latticeSites != NULL) {delete [] latticeSites; latticeSites = NULL;}
275
276    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Master process finished.");
277
278
279    PROF_END(PROF_SIM_RUN);
280}

Lattice Classes#

Lattice.h#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License

 16 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 17 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 18 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 19 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 20 * do so, subject to the following conditions:

 23 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.

 26 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 27 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.

 30 * Urbana-Champaign, the Roberts Group, Johns Hopkins University, nor the names
 31 * of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from

 35 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 36 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 37 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 38 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 39 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 40 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.

 44
 45#ifndef LM_RDME_LATTICE_H_
 46#define LM_RDME_LATTICE_H_
 47
 48//using namespace std; //TODO: workaround for cuda compiler bug, remove this line when fixed.
 49#include <vector>
 50#include <map>
 51#include "core/Types.h"
 52#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 53
 54// Type to store a lattice index.
 55typedef uint32_t            lattice_size_t;
 56
 57/// @struct lattice_coord_t
 58/// @brief Type to store a lattice coordinate.
 59struct lattice_coord_t {
 60    /// @brief Create a lattice coordinate
 61    /// @param x Lattice x point
 62    /// @param y Lattice y point
 63    /// @param z Lattice z point
 64    lattice_coord_t(lattice_size_t x=0, lattice_size_t y=0, lattice_size_t z=0):x(x),y(y),z(z){}
 65    lattice_size_t x;
 66    lattice_size_t y;
 67    lattice_size_t z;
 68};
 69
 70// Type to store a particle index in a site.
 71typedef uint32_t            site_size_t;
 72
 73// Type to store a lattice site type.
 74typedef uint32_t            site_t;
 75
 76// Type to store a lattice particle type.
 77typedef uint32_t            particle_t;
 78
 79/// @struct particle_loc_t
 80/// @brief Type to store a particle and position.
 81struct particle_loc_t {
 82    /// @brief Create a particle location
 83    /// @param p Particle type at the location
 84    /// @param x Lattice x point
 85    /// @param y Lattice y point
 86    /// @param z Lattice z point
 87    /// @param index Lattice index
 88    particle_loc_t(particle_t p=0, lattice_size_t x=0, lattice_size_t y=0, lattice_size_t z=0, site_size_t index=0):p(p),x(x),y(y),z(z),index(index){}
 89    particle_t p;
 90    
 91    // Location in the grid and index
 92    lattice_size_t x;
 93    lattice_size_t y;
 94    lattice_size_t z;
 95    site_size_t index;
 96};
 97
 98namespace lm {
 99namespace rdme {
100
101unsigned int getCompiledLatticeMaxOccupancy();
102
103/// @class InvalidSiteException
104/// @brief InvalidArgException for when an index into the lattice is out of bound or does not exist.
105class InvalidSiteException : public InvalidArgException
106{
107public:
108    /// @brief Create an exception based on the lattice location
109    /// @param x Lattice x point
110    /// @param y Lattice y point
111    /// @param z Lattice z Point
112    InvalidSiteException(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) : InvalidArgException("lattice site index") {}
113    /// @brief Create an exception based on the lattice index
114    /// @param index Lattice index
115    InvalidSiteException(lattice_size_t index) : InvalidArgException("lattice site index") {}
116};
117
118/// @class InvalidParticleException
119/// @brief InvalidArgException for when a particle is 
120class InvalidParticleException : public InvalidArgException
121{
122public:
123    /// @brief Create an eception based on the particle index
124    /// @param particleIndex Index of the particle
125    InvalidParticleException(site_size_t particleIndex) : InvalidArgException("particleIndex", "Invalid particle index", particleIndex) {}
126};
127
128    
129/// @class Lattice
130/// @brief Base class for lattice type objects
131class Lattice
132{
133public:
134    static void rowMajorByteSerialize(void * destBuffer, void * lattice, size_t bufferSize);
135    static void rowMajorIntSerialize(void * destBuffer, void * lattice, size_t bufferSize);
136    static void rowMajorByteSerializeSites(void * destBuffer, void * lattice, size_t bufferSize);
137
138public:
139    // Lattice limits.
140    /// @brief Get the maximum number of site types possible in the lattice
141    virtual site_t getMaxSiteType() const =0;
142    /// @brief Get the maximum number of particle types possible in the lattice
143    virtual particle_t getMaxParticle() const =0;
144    /// @brief Get the maximum number of particles that can live in a site
145    virtual site_size_t getMaxOccupancy() const =0;
146	
147public:
148    /// @brief Create a Lattice object
149    /// @param size Size of the lattice as (x,y,z)
150    /// @param spacing Physical spacing between lattice sites
151    Lattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing);
152    /// @brief Create a Lattice object
153    /// @param xSize Number of sites in x
154    /// @param ySize Number of sites in y
155    /// @param zSize Number of sites in z
156    /// @param spacing Physical spacing between lattice sites
157	Lattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing);
158    /// @brief Destroy the Lattice object
159	virtual ~Lattice();
160    
161    // Size related methods
162    /// @brief Get size of the Lattice
163	virtual lattice_coord_t getSize() const;
164    /// @brief Get x dimension of the Lattice
165	virtual lattice_size_t getXSize() const;
166    /// @brief Get y dimension of the Lattice
167	virtual lattice_size_t getYSize() const;
168    /// @brief Get z dimension of the Lattice
169	virtual lattice_size_t getZSize() const;
170    /// @brief Get total number of sites in the Lattice
171	virtual lattice_size_t getNumberSites() const;
172    /// @brief Get spacing between lattice sites
173	virtual si_dist_t getSpacing() const;
174	
175    
176    /// @brief Get the sites that are neighbor to the indicated site
177    /// @param index Index of the site for which to get neighbors
178    /// @param neighboringIndicies An array to hold the indicies of the neighbor sites
179	virtual void getNeighboringSites(lattice_size_t index, lattice_size_t * neighboringIndices)=0;
180
181    
182	// Lattice site methods.
183    /// @brief Get the site type at the specified location
184	virtual site_t getSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const = 0;
185    /// @brief Get the site type at the specified location
186	virtual site_t getSiteType(lattice_size_t index) const = 0;
187    /// @brief Set the site type at the specified location
188	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t site) = 0;
189    /// @brief Set the site type at the specified location
190	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t site) = 0;
191    /// @brief Get a list of sites near the specified site within a certain distance
192    /// @param xc X location of the center site
193    /// @param yc Y location of the center site
194    /// @param zc Z location of the center site
195    /// @param minDistance Minimum distance for halo of sites
196    /// @param maxDistance Maximum distance for halo of sites
197	std::vector<lattice_coord_t> getNearbySites(lattice_size_t xc, lattice_size_t yc, lattice_size_t zc, uint minDistance, uint maxDistance);
198
199//	Need to remove this from the base class, can't assume a datatype for particlelattice
200//        virtual void getParticleLatticeView(uint8_t **particleLattice, int *Nw, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx, int *Np) = 0;
201//        virtual void getSiteLatticeView(uint8_t **siteLattice, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx) = 0;
202
203    
204	// Particle methods.
205    /// @brief Get the number of particles in the specified lattice site
206	virtual site_size_t getOccupancy(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const = 0;
207    /// @brief Get the number of particles in the specified lattice site
208	virtual site_size_t getOccupancy(lattice_size_t index) const = 0;
209    
210    /// @brief Get the particle at the specified site with at the specified number in the particle list
211	virtual particle_t getParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_size_t particleIndex) const = 0;
212    /// @brief Get the particle at the specified site with at the specified number in the particle list
213	virtual particle_t getParticle(lattice_size_t index, site_size_t particleIndex) const = 0;
214    
215    /// @brief Add a particle to the specified site
216	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle) = 0;
217    /// @brief Add a particle to the specified site
218	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle) = 0;
219    /// @brief Remove a particle to the specified site
220    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z) = 0;
221    /// @brief Remove a particle to the specified site
222    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t index) = 0;
223    /// @brief Empty all particles from the specified site
224	virtual void removeAllParticles();
225	
226	/**
227	 * Particle searching methods.
228	 */
229
230	// Search for a particle from the start of the lattice.
231	/*virtual particle_loc_t findParticle(particle_t particle)=0;
232	virtual particle_loc_t findNextParticle(particle_loc_t previousParticle)=0;
233	
234	// Search for a particle starting from a given location.
235	virtual particle_loc_t findNearbyParticle(particle_loc_t particle)=0;
236	*/
237	
238	// Counts all of the particles on the lattice.
239    /// @brief Get the number of each particle type in the lattice
240	virtual std::map<particle_t,uint> getParticleCounts()=0;
241	
242	//Finds all of the particle of a given range of types.
243    /// @brief Get the number of the specified particles types in the lattice
244	virtual std::vector<particle_loc_t> findParticles(particle_t minParticleType, particle_t maxParticleType)=0;
245
246    /// @brief Print the lattice to the console
247	virtual void print() const;
248
249	// Methods to set the data directly.
250	virtual void setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)=0;
251	virtual void setSitesFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)=0;
252
253	virtual size_t getLatticeMemorySize() const = 0;
254
255protected:
256	lattice_coord_t size;           // Dimension of lattice as (x, y, z) 
257	lattice_size_t numberSites;     // Number of total sites (e.g. x*y*z)
258    si_dist_t spacing;              // Physical spacing of the lattice (i.e. in units of nm, um, mm, etc.)
259};
260
261
262}
263}
264
265#endif

Lattice.cpp#

  1/*

 18 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 19 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 20 * do so, subject to the following conditions:

 27 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.

 46#include <iomanip>
 47#include <vector>
 48#include <map>
 49#include <cmath>
 50#include "config.h"
 51#include "core/Types.h"
 52#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 53#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
 54
 55namespace lm {
 56namespace rdme {
 57
 58// Function to return the compiled-in value for MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY.  Used 
 59// by pyLM in order to request the appropriate density.
 60unsigned int getCompiledLatticeMaxOccupancy()
 61{
 62	return MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY;
 63}
 64
 65Lattice::Lattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing)
 66:size(size),numberSites(size.x*size.y*size.z),spacing(spacing)
 67{}
 68
 69Lattice::Lattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing)
 70:size(xSize,ySize,zSize),numberSites(size.x*size.y*size.z),spacing(spacing)
 71{
 72}
 73
 74Lattice::~Lattice() {}
 75
 76lattice_coord_t Lattice::getSize() const
 77{
 78    return size;
 79}
 80
 81lattice_size_t Lattice::getXSize() const
 82{
 83	return size.x;
 84}
 85
 86lattice_size_t Lattice::getYSize() const
 87{
 88	return size.y;
 89}
 90
 91lattice_size_t Lattice::getZSize() const
 92{
 93	return size.z;
 94}
 95
 96lattice_size_t Lattice::getNumberSites() const
 97{
 98	return numberSites;
 99}
100
101si_dist_t Lattice::getSpacing() const
102{
103	return spacing;
104}
105
106std::vector<lattice_coord_t> Lattice::getNearbySites(lattice_size_t xc, lattice_size_t yc, lattice_size_t zc, uint minDistance, uint maxDistance)
107{
108	std::vector<lattice_coord_t> sites;
109	double minDistanceSquared=(double)(minDistance*minDistance);
110	double maxDistanceSquared=(double)(maxDistance*maxDistance);
111	
112	for (lattice_size_t x = (xc>=maxDistance)?(xc-maxDistance):0; x <= ((xc<=size.x-1-maxDistance)?(xc+maxDistance):(size.x-1)); x++)
113	{
114		for (lattice_size_t y = (yc>=maxDistance)?(yc-maxDistance):0; y <= ((yc<=size.y-1-maxDistance)?(yc+maxDistance):(size.y-1)); y++)
115		{
116			for (lattice_size_t z = (zc>=maxDistance)?(zc-maxDistance):0; z <= ((zc<=size.z-1-maxDistance)?(zc+maxDistance):(size.z-1)); z++)
117			{
118				double rSquared = pow((double)x-(double)xc,2.0)+pow((double)y-(double)yc,2.0)+pow((double)z-(double)zc,2.0);
119				if (rSquared <= ((double)maxDistanceSquared) && (rSquared > minDistanceSquared || minDistance == maxDistance))
120				{
121					sites.push_back(lattice_coord_t(x,y,z));
122				}
123			}
124		}
125	}
126	
127	return sites;
128}
129
130void Lattice::removeAllParticles()
131{
132    for (lattice_size_t z=0; z<size.z; z++)
133        for (lattice_size_t y=0; y<size.y; y++)
134            for (lattice_size_t x=0; x<size.x; x++)
135                removeParticles(x,y,z);
136}
137
138void Lattice::rowMajorByteSerialize(void * bufferPtr, void * latticePtr, size_t bufferSize)
139{
140    Lattice * lattice = (Lattice *)latticePtr;
141    byte * buffer = (byte *)bufferPtr;
142    lattice_coord_t size = lattice->size;
143    if (bufferSize != size.x*size.y*size.z*lattice->getMaxOccupancy()) throw lm::InvalidArgException(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size", bufferSize, size.x*size.y*size.z*lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
144    for (lattice_size_t x=0, index=0; x<size.x; x++)
145        for (lattice_size_t y=0; y<size.y; y++)
146            for (lattice_size_t z=0; z<size.z; z++)
147                for (site_size_t p=0; p<lattice->getMaxOccupancy(); p++, index++)
148                    buffer[index] = lattice->getParticle(x,y,z,p);
149}
150
151void Lattice::rowMajorIntSerialize(void * bufferPtr, void * latticePtr, size_t bufferSize)
152{
153    Lattice * lattice = (Lattice *)latticePtr;
154    uint32_t * buffer = (uint32_t *)bufferPtr;
155    lattice_coord_t size = lattice->size;
156    if (bufferSize != size.x*size.y*size.z*lattice->getMaxOccupancy()) throw lm::InvalidArgException(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size", bufferSize, size.x*size.y*size.z*lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
157    for (lattice_size_t x=0, index=0; x<size.x; x++)
158        for (lattice_size_t y=0; y<size.y; y++)
159            for (lattice_size_t z=0; z<size.z; z++)
160                for (site_size_t p=0; p<lattice->getMaxOccupancy(); p++, index++)
161                    buffer[index] = lattice->getParticle(x,y,z,p);
162}
163
164void Lattice::rowMajorByteSerializeSites(void * bufferPtr, void * latticePtr, size_t bufferSize)
165{
166    Lattice * lattice = (Lattice *)latticePtr;
167    byte * buffer = (byte *)bufferPtr;
168    lattice_coord_t size = lattice->size;
169    if (bufferSize != size.x*size.y*size.z) throw lm::InvalidArgException(__PRETTY_FUNCTION__, "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice site data size");
170    for (lattice_size_t x=0, index=0; x<size.x; x++)
171        for (lattice_size_t y=0; y<size.y; y++)
172            for (lattice_size_t z=0; z<size.z; z++, index++)
173				buffer[index] = (byte)lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z);
174}
175
176void Lattice::print() const
177{
178    for (lattice_size_t z=0; z<size.z; z++)
179    {
180        for (lattice_size_t x=0; x<size.x; x++)
181        {
182            for (lattice_size_t y=0; y<size.y; y++)
183            {
184                printf("(%2d)",getSiteType(x,y,z));
185                for (site_size_t p=0; p<getMaxOccupancy(); p++)
186                {
187                    printf("%2d%c",getParticle(x,y,z,p),p<getMaxOccupancy()-1?',':' ');
188                }
189            }
190            printf("\n");
191        }
192        printf("---------------\n");
193    }
194}
195
196}
197}

ByteLattice.h#

 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies

 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.

 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or

 27 * permission.

 40#ifndef LM_RDME_BYTELATTICE_H_
 41#define LM_RDME_BYTELATTICE_H_
 42
 43#include <map>
 44#include "core/Types.h"
 45#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
 46
 47namespace lm {
 48namespace rdme {
 49
 50/// @class ByteLattice
 51/// @brief A Lattice that is based on packed bytes of memory, i.e. one byte per lattice site to hold particles
 52class ByteLattice : public Lattice
 53{
 54	// TODO: total hack.  Needed to access the actual data structures
 55	// Should modify CudaByteLattice to do what I need.
 56	friend class MGPUMpdRdmeSolver;
 57	friend class MPIMpdRdmeSolver;
 58	friend class MpdRdmeSolver;
 59
 60public:
 61    static void nativeSerialize(void * destBuffer, void * lattice, size_t latticeSize);
 62    static void nativeSerializeSites(void * destBuffer, void * lattice, size_t latticeSize);
 63    static void copyNativeToRowMajorByte(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, uint particlesPerSite, size_t bufferSize);
 64    static void copyRowMajorByteToNative(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, uint particlesPerSite, size_t bufferSize);
 65    static void copySitesRowMajorByteToNative(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, size_t bufferSize);
 66	static void copySitesNativeToRowMajorByte(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, size_t bufferSize);
 67
 68public:
 69    // Lattice limits.
 70    virtual site_t getMaxSiteType() const;
 71    virtual particle_t getMaxParticle() const;
 72    virtual site_size_t getMaxOccupancy() const;
 73
 74public:
 75    ByteLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
 76    ByteLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
 77	virtual ~ByteLattice();
 78	
 79	virtual void getNeighboringSites(lattice_size_t index, lattice_size_t * neighboringIndices);
 80
 81	// Lattice site methods.
 82	virtual site_t getSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const;
 83	virtual site_t getSiteType(lattice_size_t subvolume) const;
 84	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t siteType);
 85	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t subvolume, site_t site);
 86
 87    void copySites(void * destBuffer, size_t latticeSize);
 88	
 89	// Particle methods.
 90	virtual site_size_t getOccupancy(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const;
 91	virtual site_size_t getOccupancy(lattice_size_t subvolume) const;
 92	virtual particle_t getParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_size_t particleIndex) const;
 93	virtual particle_t getParticle(lattice_size_t subvolume, site_size_t particleIndex) const;
 94	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle);
 95	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t subvolume, particle_t particle);
 96	virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z);
 97    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t subvolume);
 98    virtual void removeAllParticles();
 99	
100	// Particle searching.
101    /*virtual particle_loc_t findParticle(particle_t particle);
102    virtual particle_loc_t findNextParticle(particle_loc_t previousParticle);
103    virtual particle_loc_t findNearbyParticle(particle_loc_t particle)=0;
104	*/
105
106    virtual std::map<particle_t,uint> getParticleCounts();
107    virtual std::vector<particle_loc_t> findParticles(particle_t minParticleType, particle_t maxParticleType);
108	
109    // Methods to set the data directly.
110    virtual void setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize);
111    virtual void setSitesFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize);
112    
113    virtual void getParticleLatticeView(uint8_t **particleLattice, int *Nw, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx, int *Np);
114    virtual void getSiteLatticeView(uint8_t **siteLattice, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx);
115
116	virtual size_t getLatticeMemorySize() const;
117
118protected:
119	virtual void allocateMemory();
120	virtual void deallocateMemory();
121	virtual uint32_t* getParticlesMemory();
122	virtual uint8_t* getSitesMemory();
123
124protected:
125    size_t wordsPerSite;      // Number of bytes per site
126    uint32_t * particles;   // Array of lists of particles at each site
127    uint8_t * siteTypes;    // Array of site types representing the lattice
128
129private:
130    static const uint PARTICLES_PER_WORD = 4;
131};
132
133}
134}
135
136#endif

ByteLattice.cpp#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
  3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
  4 * All rights reserved.
  5 * 
  6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
  7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
  8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  9 * 
 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 * 
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 * 
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 * 
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 * 
 29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 36 *
 37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
 38 */
 39
 40#include <map>
 41#include <vector>
 42#include <climits>
 43#include <cstring>
 44#include "config.h"
 45#include "core/Types.h"
 46#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 47#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
 48#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
 49
 50namespace lm {
 51namespace rdme {
 52
 53site_t ByteLattice::getMaxSiteType() const {return 255;}
 54particle_t ByteLattice::getMaxParticle() const {return 255;}
 55site_size_t ByteLattice::getMaxOccupancy() const {return PARTICLES_PER_WORD*wordsPerSite;}
 56
 57ByteLattice::ByteLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 58:Lattice(size,spacing),wordsPerSite(particlesPerSite/PARTICLES_PER_WORD),particles(NULL),siteTypes(NULL)
 59{
 60    // Make sure that the memory layout is compatible with our CUDA assumptions.
 61    if (sizeof(uint8_t)*CHAR_BIT != 8) throw Exception("a byte lattice can only be created on architectures with an 8-bit char type.");
 62    if (sizeof(uint32_t)*CHAR_BIT != 32) throw Exception("a byte lattice can only be created on architectures with a 32-bit int type.");
 63    if (wordsPerSite*PARTICLES_PER_WORD != particlesPerSite) throw InvalidArgException("particlesPerSite", "must be evenly divisible by the number of particles per word");
 64    allocateMemory();
 65}
 66
 67ByteLattice::ByteLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 68:Lattice(xSize,ySize,zSize,spacing),wordsPerSite(particlesPerSite/PARTICLES_PER_WORD),particles(NULL),siteTypes(NULL)
 69{
 70    if (sizeof(uint8_t)*CHAR_BIT != 8) throw Exception("a byte lattice can only be created on architectures with an 8-bit char type.");
 71    if (sizeof(uint32_t)*CHAR_BIT != 32) throw Exception("a byte lattice can only be created on architectures with a 32-bit int type.");
 72    if (wordsPerSite*PARTICLES_PER_WORD != particlesPerSite) throw InvalidArgException("particlesPerSite", "must be evenly divisible by the number of particles per word");
 73    allocateMemory();
 74}
 75
 76ByteLattice::~ByteLattice()
 77{
 78    deallocateMemory();
 79}
 80
 81void ByteLattice::getNeighboringSites(lattice_size_t index, lattice_size_t * neighboringIndices)
 82{
 83    //         y+1
 84    //         |  z+1
 85    //         | /
 86    //   x-1---i---x+1 
 87    //        /|
 88    //     z-1 |
 89    //         y-1
 90	lattice_size_t z = index/(size.x*size.y);
 91	lattice_size_t xy = index-(z*size.x*size.y);
 92	lattice_size_t y = xy/size.x;
 93	lattice_size_t x = xy-(y*size.x);
 94
 95	lattice_size_t xySize = size.x*size.y;
 96	neighboringIndices[0] = (x>0)?(index-1):(index-1+size.x);
 97	neighboringIndices[1] = (x<(size.x-1))?(index+1):(index+1-size.x);
 98	neighboringIndices[2] = (y>0)?(index-size.x):(index-size.x+xySize);
 99	neighboringIndices[3] = (y<(size.y-1))?(index+size.x):(index+size.x-xySize);
100	neighboringIndices[4] = (z>0)?(index-xySize):(index-xySize+numberSites);
101	neighboringIndices[5] = (z<(size.z-1))?(index+xySize):(index+xySize-numberSites);
102}
103
104size_t ByteLattice::getLatticeMemorySize() const
105{
106	return (size_t(numberSites)*size_t(wordsPerSite)*sizeof(uint32_t));
107}
108
109void ByteLattice::allocateMemory()
110{
111    // Allocate the data for the particles.
112    particles = new uint32_t[numberSites*wordsPerSite];
113    memset(particles, 0, getLatticeMemorySize());
114
115    // Allocate the data for the site types.
116    siteTypes = new uint8_t[numberSites];
117    memset(siteTypes, 0, numberSites*sizeof(uint8_t));
118}
119
120void ByteLattice::deallocateMemory()
121{
122    // Free any allocated memory.
123    if (particles != NULL)
124    {
125        delete[] particles;
126        particles = NULL;
127    }
128    if (siteTypes != NULL)
129    {
130        delete[] siteTypes;
131        siteTypes = NULL;
132    }
133}
134
135void ByteLattice::getSiteLatticeView(uint8_t **siteLattice, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx) {
136    *Nx = size.x;
137    *Ny = size.y;
138    *Nz = size.z;
139    *siteLattice = siteTypes;
140}
141
142void ByteLattice::getParticleLatticeView(uint8_t **particleLattice, int *Nw, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx, int *Np) {
143    *Nx = size.x;
144    *Ny = size.y;
145    *Nz = size.z;
146    *Np = PARTICLES_PER_WORD; 
147    *Nw = wordsPerSite;
148    *particleLattice = (uint8_t*) particles;
149}
150
151site_t ByteLattice::getSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const
152{
153	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
154	if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z)
155		throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
156	lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
157	
158	return (site_t)siteTypes[latticeIndex];
159}
160
161site_t ByteLattice::getSiteType(lattice_size_t index) const
162{
163	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
164	if (index >= numberSites)
165		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
166	return (site_t)siteTypes[index];
167}
168
169void ByteLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t siteType)
170{
171    // Make sure the arguments are valid.
172    if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z)
173        throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
174    lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
175
176    siteTypes[latticeIndex] = (uint8_t)siteType;
177}
178
179void ByteLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t siteType)
180{
181    // Make sure the arguments are valid.
182	if (index >= numberSites)
183		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
184    siteTypes[index] = (uint8_t)siteType;
185}
186
187site_size_t ByteLattice::getOccupancy(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z) const
188{
189    // Make sure the arguments are valid.
190    if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z)
191        throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
192    lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
193	
194	// Count the number of particles at the site.
195    site_size_t occupancy = 0;
196	for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
197	{
198        uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[latticeIndex]);
199        for (uint pi=0; pi<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; pi++, occupancy++)
200        {
201            if (byteParticles[pi] == 0) return occupancy;
202        }
203        latticeIndex += numberSites;
204	}
205	return occupancy;
206}
207
208site_size_t ByteLattice::getOccupancy(lattice_size_t index) const
209{
210    // Make sure the arguments are valid.
211	if (index >= numberSites)
212		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
213
214	// Count the number of particles at the site.
215    site_size_t occupancy = 0;
216	for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
217	{
218        uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[index]);
219        for (uint pi=0; pi<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; pi++, occupancy++)
220        {
221            if (byteParticles[pi] == 0) return occupancy;
222        }
223        index += numberSites;
224	}
225	return occupancy;
226}
227
228particle_t ByteLattice::getParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_size_t particleIndex) const
229{
230	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
231    if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z) {
232        throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
233    }
234	if (particleIndex >= getMaxOccupancy()) {
235		throw InvalidParticleException(particleIndex);
236    }
237    lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
238	
239    // Figure out which word the particle is in.
240    uint word = particleIndex/PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
241    latticeIndex += numberSites*word;
242    uint byteIndex = particleIndex%PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
243
244	// Get the value.
245    return ((uint8_t *)(&particles[latticeIndex]))[byteIndex];
246}
247
248particle_t ByteLattice::getParticle(lattice_size_t index, site_size_t particleIndex) const
249{
250	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
251	if (index >= numberSites)
252		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
253	if (particleIndex >= getMaxOccupancy())
254		throw InvalidParticleException(particleIndex);
255
256    // Figure out which word the particle is in.
257    uint word = particleIndex/PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
258    index += numberSites*word;
259    uint byteIndex = particleIndex%PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
260
261	// Get the value.
262    return ((uint8_t *)(&particles[index]))[byteIndex];
263}
264
265void ByteLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle)
266{
267	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
268    if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z)
269        throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
270    lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
271
272    // Go through the particles at the site.
273    for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
274    {
275        uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[latticeIndex]);
276        for (uint pi=0; pi<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; pi++)
277        {
278            if (byteParticles[pi] == 0)
279            {
280                byteParticles[pi] = (uint8_t)particle;
281                return;
282            }
283        }
284        latticeIndex += numberSites;
285    }
286
287    // The site must have been full.
288    throw InvalidParticleException(getMaxOccupancy());
289}
290
291void ByteLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle)
292{
293	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
294	if (index >= numberSites)
295		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
296
297    // Go through the particles at the site.
298    for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
299    {
300        uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[index]);
301        for (uint pi=0; pi<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; pi++)
302        {
303            if (byteParticles[pi] == 0)
304            {
305                byteParticles[pi] = (uint8_t)particle;
306                return;
307            }
308        }
309        index += numberSites;
310    }
311
312    // The site must have been full.
313    throw InvalidParticleException(getMaxOccupancy());
314}
315
316void ByteLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z)
317{
318	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
319    if (x >= size.x || y >= size.y || z >= size.z)
320        throw InvalidSiteException(x,y,z);
321    lattice_size_t latticeIndex = x+(y*size.x)+(z*size.x*size.y);
322	
323    // Reset all of the words for this site.
324    for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
325    {
326        particles[latticeIndex] = 0;
327        latticeIndex += numberSites;
328    }
329}
330
331void ByteLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t index)
332{
333	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
334	if (index >= numberSites)
335		throw InvalidSiteException(index);
336
337    // Reset all of the words for this site.
338    for (uint wi=0; wi<wordsPerSite; wi++)
339    {
340        particles[index] = 0;
341        index += numberSites;
342    }
343}
344
345void ByteLattice::removeAllParticles()
346{
347    memset(particles, 0, numberSites*wordsPerSite*sizeof(uint32_t));
348}
349
350void ByteLattice::nativeSerialize(void * destBuffer, void * latticePtr, size_t bufferSize)
351{
352    ByteLattice * lattice = (ByteLattice *)latticePtr;
353    if (bufferSize != lattice->getLatticeMemorySize())
354        throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size");
355    memcpy(destBuffer, lattice->particles, bufferSize);
356}
357
358void ByteLattice::nativeSerializeSites(void * destBuffer, void * latticePtr, size_t bufferSize)
359{
360    ByteLattice * lattice = (ByteLattice *)latticePtr;
361	lattice->copySites(destBuffer, bufferSize);
362}
363
364void ByteLattice::copySites(void * destBuffer, size_t bufferSize)
365{
366    if (bufferSize != size.x*size.y*size.z)
367        throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice site size");
368    memcpy(destBuffer, siteTypes, bufferSize);
369}
370
371void ByteLattice::copyNativeToRowMajorByte(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, uint particlesPerSite, size_t bufferSize)
372{
373    if (bufferSize != size_t(xSize)*size_t(ySize)*size_t(zSize)*size_t(particlesPerSite)) throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size");
374    uint wordsPerSite = particlesPerSite/PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
375    if (wordsPerSite*PARTICLES_PER_WORD != particlesPerSite) throw InvalidArgException("particlesPerSite", "must be evenly divisible by the number of particles per word");
376
377    // Cast the buffers as appropriate.
378    uint32_t * sourceParticles = (uint32_t *)sourceBuffer;
379    uint8_t * destParticles = (uint8_t *)destBuffer;
380
381
382    // Walk through the source buffer and copy the first word of particles.
383    size_t latticeIndex=0;
384    for (size_t w=0; w<wordsPerSite; w++)
385    {
386        for (size_t z=0; z<zSize; z++)
387        {
388            for (size_t y=0; y<ySize; y++)
389            {
390                for (size_t x=0; x<xSize; x++, latticeIndex++)
391                {
392                    uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&sourceParticles[latticeIndex]);
393                    size_t destIndex = x*size_t(ySize)*size_t(zSize)*size_t(particlesPerSite) + y*size_t(zSize)*size_t(particlesPerSite) + z*size_t(particlesPerSite);
394                    destParticles[destIndex+w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD] = byteParticles[0];
395                    destParticles[destIndex+w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD+1] = byteParticles[1];
396                    destParticles[destIndex+w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD+2] = byteParticles[2];
397                    destParticles[destIndex+w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD+3] = byteParticles[3];
398                }
399            }
400        }
401    }
402}
403
404void ByteLattice::copyRowMajorByteToNative(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, uint particlesPerSite, size_t bufferSize)
405{
406    if (bufferSize != size_t(xSize)*size_t(ySize)*size_t(zSize)*size_t(particlesPerSite)) throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size");
407    uint wordsPerSite = particlesPerSite/PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
408    if (wordsPerSite*PARTICLES_PER_WORD != particlesPerSite) throw InvalidArgException("particlesPerSite", "must be evenly divisible by the number of particles per word");
409
410    // Cast the buffers as appropriate.
411    uint32_t * destParticles = (uint32_t *)destBuffer;
412    uint8_t * sourceParticles = (uint8_t *)sourceBuffer;
413  
414
415    // Walk through the dest buffer and copy into it the particles one word at a time.
416    uint destIndex=0;
417    for (uint w=0; w<wordsPerSite; w++)
418    {
419        for (uint z=0; z<zSize; z++)
420        {
421            for (uint y=0; y<ySize; y++)
422            {
423                for (uint x=0; x<xSize; x++, destIndex++)
424                {
425                    uint8_t * destByteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&destParticles[destIndex]);
426                    uint sourceIndex = x*ySize*zSize*particlesPerSite + y*zSize*particlesPerSite + z*particlesPerSite + w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD;
427                    destByteParticles[0] = sourceParticles[sourceIndex];
428                    destByteParticles[1] = sourceParticles[sourceIndex+1];
429                    destByteParticles[2] = sourceParticles[sourceIndex+2];
430                    destByteParticles[3] = sourceParticles[sourceIndex+3];
431                }
432            }
433        }
434    }
435}
436
437void ByteLattice::copySitesRowMajorByteToNative(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, size_t bufferSize)
438{
439    if (bufferSize != xSize*ySize*zSize) throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size");
440
441    // Cast the buffers as appropriate.
442    uint8_t * destSites = (uint8_t *)destBuffer;
443    uint8_t * sourceSites = (uint8_t *)sourceBuffer;
444
445
446    // Walk through the dest buffer and copy into it sites.
447    uint destIndex=0;
448	for (uint z=0; z<zSize; z++)
449	{
450		for (uint y=0; y<ySize; y++)
451		{
452			for (uint x=0; x<xSize; x++, destIndex++)
453			{
454				uint sourceIndex = x*ySize*zSize + y*zSize + z;
455				destSites[destIndex] = sourceSites[sourceIndex];
456			}
457		}
458	}
459}
460
461void ByteLattice::copySitesNativeToRowMajorByte(void * destBuffer, void * sourceBuffer, lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, size_t bufferSize)
462{
463    if (bufferSize != xSize*ySize*zSize) throw lm::InvalidArgException("bufferSize", "the buffer size was not equal to the lattice data size");
464
465    // Cast the buffers as appropriate.
466    uint8_t * destSites = (uint8_t *)destBuffer;
467    uint8_t * sourceSites = (uint8_t *)sourceBuffer;
468
469
470    // Walk through the dest buffer and copy into it sites.
471    uint sourceIndex=0;
472	for (uint z=0; z<zSize; z++)
473	{
474		for (uint y=0; y<ySize; y++)
475		{
476			for (uint x=0; x<xSize; x++, sourceIndex++)
477			{
478				uint destIndex = x*ySize*zSize + y*zSize + z;
479				destSites[destIndex] = sourceSites[sourceIndex];
480			}
481		}
482	}
483}
484
485void ByteLattice::setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)
486{
487    copyRowMajorByteToNative(particles, buffer, size.x, size.y, size.z, wordsPerSite*PARTICLES_PER_WORD, bufferSize);
488}
489
490void ByteLattice::setSitesFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)
491{
492    copySitesRowMajorByteToNative(siteTypes, buffer, size.x, size.y, size.z, bufferSize);
493}
494
495std::map<particle_t,uint> ByteLattice::getParticleCounts()
496{
497    std::map<particle_t,uint> particleCountMap;
498    for (lattice_size_t index=0; index<numberSites*wordsPerSite; index++)
499    {
500        uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[index]);
501        for (uint b=0; b<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; b++)
502        {
503            // Count the particle.
504            particle_t particle = byteParticles[b];
505            if (particle > 0)
506            {
507                if (particleCountMap.count(particle) == 0)
508                    particleCountMap[particle] = 1;
509                else
510                    particleCountMap[particle]++;
511            }
512            // Otherwise, if the particle position is empty, move to the next site.
513            else if (particle == 0)
514            {
515                break;
516            }
517        }
518    }
519    return particleCountMap;
520}
521
522std::vector<particle_loc_t> ByteLattice::findParticles(particle_t minParticleType, particle_t maxParticleType)
523{
524    std::vector<particle_loc_t> ret;
525
526
527    // Walk through the lattice.
528    uint index=0;
529    for (uint w=0; w<wordsPerSite; w++)
530    {
531        for (uint z=0; z<size.z; z++)
532        {
533            for (uint y=0; y<size.y; y++)
534            {
535                for (uint x=0; x<size.x; x++, index++)
536                {
537                    uint8_t * byteParticles = (uint8_t *)(&particles[index]);
538                    for (uint b=0; b<PARTICLES_PER_WORD; b++)
539                    {
540                        if (byteParticles[b] >= minParticleType && byteParticles[b] <= maxParticleType)
541                            ret.push_back(particle_loc_t(byteParticles[b], x, y, z, w*PARTICLES_PER_WORD+b));
542                    }
543                }
544            }
545        }
546    }
547    return ret;
548}
549
550uint32_t *ByteLattice::getParticlesMemory()
551{
552	return particles;
553}
554
555uint8_t *ByteLattice::getSitesMemory()
556{
557	return siteTypes;
558}
559
560/*

562{
563	if (x == NULL || y == NULL || z == NULL || particleIndex == NULL)
564		throw InvalidArgException("location pointer was NULL");
565
566	lattice_size_t xySize = xSize*ySize;
567	lattice_size_t numberSites = getNumberSites();
568	for (lattice_size_t latticeIndex = 0; latticeIndex<numberSites; latticeIndex++)
569		for (uint i=0, shift=0; i<maxParticlesPerSite; i++, shift+=bitsPerParticle)
570		{
571			// See if this is the particle we are looking for.
572			lattice_particle_t particle = (lattice[latticeIndex]&(particleMask<<shift))>>shift;
573			if (particle == particleToFind)
574			{
575				*x = latticeIndex%xSize;
576				*y = (latticeIndex/xSize)%ySize;
577				*z = latticeIndex/xySize;
578				*particleIndex = i;
579				return true;
580			}
581			
582			// Otherwise, if the partiucle position is empty, move to the next site.
583			else if (particle == 0)
584			{
585				break;
586			}
587		}
588	return false;
589}
590
591
592bool ByteLattice::findNextParticle(lattice_particle_t particleToFind, lattice_size_t* x, lattice_size_t* y, lattice_size_t* z, uint* particleIndex)
593{
594	if (x == NULL || y == NULL || z == NULL || particleIndex == NULL)
595		throw InvalidArgException("location pointer was NULL");
596
597	lattice_size_t xySize = xSize*ySize;
598	lattice_size_t numberSites = getNumberSites();
599	uint firstParticleToCheck = (*particleIndex)+1;
600	uint firstParticleToCheckShift = firstParticleToCheck*bitsPerParticle;
601	for (lattice_size_t latticeIndex=*x+(*y*xSize)+(*z*xSize*ySize); latticeIndex<numberSites; latticeIndex++,firstParticleToCheck=0,firstParticleToCheckShift=0)
602		for (uint i=firstParticleToCheck, shift=firstParticleToCheckShift; i<maxParticlesPerSite; i++, shift+=bitsPerParticle)
603		{
604			// See if this is the particle we are looking for.
605			lattice_particle_t particle = (lattice[latticeIndex]&(particleMask<<shift))>>shift;
606			if (particle == particleToFind)
607			{
608				*x = latticeIndex%xSize;
609				*y = (latticeIndex/xSize)%ySize;
610				*z = latticeIndex/xySize;
611				*particleIndex = i;
612				return true;
613			}
614			
615			// Otherwise, if the particle position is empty, move to the next site.
616			else if (particle == 0)
617			{
618				break;
619			}
620		}
621	return false;
622}
623
624bool ByteLattice::findNearbyParticle(lattice_particle_t particleToFind, lattice_size_t xi, lattice_size_t yi, lattice_size_t zi, lattice_size_t* xo, lattice_size_t* yo, lattice_size_t* zo, uint* particleIndex)
625{
626	// Make sure the arguments are valid.
627	if (xo == NULL || yo == NULL || zo == NULL || particleIndex == NULL)
628		throw InvalidArgException("Output location pointer was NULL.");
629	if (xi >= xSize || yi >= ySize || zi >= zSize)
630		throw InvalidSiteException(xi,yi,zi);
631	
632	// Search for the particle in ever increasing concentric boxes around the initial site.
633	for (intv d=0; d<=(intv)(xSize/2) || d<=(intv)(ySize/2) || d<=(intv)(zSize/2); d++)
634	{
635		//std::cout << "Depth: " << d << "\n";
636		
637		// Go through each z plane.
638		for (intv z=(intv)zi-d; z<=(intv)zi+d; z++)
639		{
640			// Figure out the lattice z index.
641			lattice_size_t zl = (lattice_size_t)(z<0)?(z+(intv)zSize):((z>=(intv)zSize)?(z-(intv)zSize):z);
642			
643			//std::cout << "Z: " << z << "," << zl << "\n";
644			
645			// Go through each y row.
646			for (intv y=(intv)yi-d; y<=(intv)yi+d; y++)
647			{
648				// Figure out the lattice y index.
649				lattice_size_t yl = (lattice_size_t)(y<0)?(y+(intv)ySize):((y>=(intv)ySize)?(y-(intv)ySize):y);
650				lattice_size_t latticeIndex = (yl*zSize)+(zl*xSize*ySize);
651				
652				// Go through each x column.
653				int searchFullRow = (z==((intv)zi-d)||z==((intv)zi+d)||y==((intv)yi-d)||y==((intv)yi+d));
654				for (intv x=(intv)xi-d; x<=(intv)xi+d; x+=(searchFullRow?(1):(2*d)))
655				{
656					// Figure out the lattice x index.
657					lattice_size_t xl = (lattice_size_t)(x<0)?(x+(intv)xSize):((x>=(intv)xSize)?(x-(intv)xSize):x);
658					
659					// Go through each particle at the site.
660					for (uint i=0, shift=0; i<maxParticlesPerSite; i++, shift+=bitsPerParticle)
661					{
662						// See if this is the particle we are looking for.
663						lattice_particle_t particle = (lattice[latticeIndex+xl]&(particleMask<<shift))>>shift;
664						if (particle == particleToFind)
665						{
666							*xo = xl;
667							*yo = yl;
668							*zo = zl;
669							*particleIndex = i;
670							return true;
671						}
672						
673						// Otherwise, if the particle position is empty, move to the next site.
674						else if (particle == 0)
675						{
676							break;
677						}
678					}
679				}
680			}
681		}
682	}
683	return false;
684}
685
686*/
687
688}
689}

693		for (uintv z=(d<=zi)?(zi-d):0; z<=((d<zSize-zi)?(zi+d):(zSize-1)); z++)
694		{
695			// Go through each y row.
696			for (uintv y=(d<=yi)?(yi-d):0; y<=((d<ySize-yi)?(yi+d):(ySize-1)); y++)
697			{
698				// Figure out the starting index of this row.
699				lattice_size_t latticeIndex = (y*zSize)+(z*xSize*ySize);
700				
701				// Go through each x column.
702				int searchFullRow = (z==(zi-d)||z==(zi+d)||y==(yi-d)||y==(yi+d));
703				for (uintv x=((d<=xi)?(xi-d):(searchFullRow?(0):(xi+d))); x<=((d<xSize-xi)?(xi+d):(xSize-1)); x+=(searchFullRow?(1):(2*d)))
704				{
705					// Go through each particle at the site.
706					for (uint i=0, shift=0; i<maxParticlesPerSite; i++, shift+=bitsPerParticle)
707					{
708						// See if this is the particle we are looking for.
709						lattice_particle_t particle = (lattice[latticeIndex+x]&(particleMask<<shift))>>shift;
710						if (particle == particleToFind)
711						{
712							*xo = x;

40#ifndef LM_RDME_CUDABYTELATTICE_H_
41#define LM_RDME_CUDABYTELATTICE_H_
42
43#include <vector>
44#include <map>
45#include "core/Exceptions.h"
46#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
47#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
48#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
49
50namespace lm {
51namespace rdme {
52
53class CudaByteLattice : public ByteLattice
54{
55public:
56    CudaByteLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
57    CudaByteLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
58	virtual ~CudaByteLattice();
59	
60    virtual void copyToGPU();
61    virtual void copyFromGPU();
62    virtual void * getGPUMemorySrc();
63    virtual void * getGPUMemoryDest();
64    virtual void swapSrcDest();
65    virtual void * getGPUMemorySiteTypes();
66	virtual size_t getParticleMemorySize() const {return cudaParticlesSize;}
67
68	// Override methods that can cause the GPU memory to become stale.
69	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t site);
70	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t site);
71	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle);
72	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle);
73    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z);
74    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t index);
75	virtual void removeAllParticles();
76
77    // Methods to set the data directly.
78    virtual void setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize);
79
80    virtual void getSiteLatticeView(uint8_t **siteLattice, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx);
81    virtual void getParticleLatticeView(uint8_t **particleLattice, int *Nw, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx, int *Np);
82	
83protected:
84    virtual void allocateCudaMemory();
85    virtual void deallocateCudaMemory();
86	
87protected:
88    uint cudaParticlesCurrent;
89    size_t cudaParticlesSize;
90    void * cudaParticles[2];
91    size_t cudaSiteTypesSize;
92    void * cudaSiteTypes;
93    bool isGPUMemorySynched;
94};
95
96}
97}
98
99#endif

CudaByteLattice.cu#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
  3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
  4 * All rights reserved.
  5 * 
  6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
  7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
  8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  9 * 
 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 * 
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 * 
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 * 
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 * 
 29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 36 *
 37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
 38 */
 39
 40#include "config.h"
 41#include "core/Types.h"
 42#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 43#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
 44#include "rdme/CudaByteLattice.h"
 45#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
 46
 47namespace lm {
 48namespace rdme {
 49
 50CudaByteLattice::CudaByteLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 51:ByteLattice(size,latticeSpacing,particlesPerSite),cudaParticlesCurrent(0),cudaParticlesSize(0),cudaSiteTypesSize(0),cudaSiteTypes(NULL),isGPUMemorySynched(false)
 52{
 53    // Initialize the pointers.
 54    cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
 55    cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
 56
 57    allocateCudaMemory();
 58}
 59
 60CudaByteLattice::CudaByteLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 61:ByteLattice(xSize,ySize,zSize,latticeSpacing,particlesPerSite),cudaParticlesCurrent(0),cudaParticlesSize(0),cudaSiteTypesSize(0),cudaSiteTypes(NULL),isGPUMemorySynched(false)
 62{
 63    // Initialize the pointers.
 64    cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
 65    cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
 66
 67    allocateCudaMemory();
 68}
 69
 70CudaByteLattice::~CudaByteLattice()
 71{
 72    deallocateCudaMemory();
 73}
 74
 75void CudaByteLattice::allocateCudaMemory()
 76{
 77    size_t free=0, total=0;
 78
 79    // Allocate memory on the CUDA device.
 80    cudaParticlesSize=numberSites*wordsPerSite*sizeof(uint32_t);
 81	try
 82	{
 83		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaParticles[0], cudaParticlesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 84		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaParticles[1], cudaParticlesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 85	}
 86	catch(CUDAException e)
 87	{
 88		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemGetInfo(&free, &total));
 89		printf("Failed to allocate %zu bytes for particle lattice, %zu available out of %zu\n", cudaParticlesSize*2U, free, total);
 90		throw e;
 91	}
 92    cudaSiteTypesSize=numberSites*sizeof(uint8_t);
 93	try
 94	{
 95		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaSiteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 96	}
 97	catch(CUDAException e)
 98	{
 99		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemGetInfo(&free, &total));
100		printf("Failed to allocate %zu bytes for site lattice, %zu available out of %zu\n", cudaSiteTypesSize, free, total);
101		throw e;
102	}
103	
104}
105
106void CudaByteLattice::deallocateCudaMemory()
107{
108    // If we have any allocated device memory, free it.
109    if (cudaParticles[0] != NULL)
110    {
111        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaParticles[0])); //TODO: track memory usage.
112        cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
113    }
114    if (cudaParticles[1] != NULL)
115    {
116        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaParticles[1])); //TODO: track memory usage.
117        cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
118    }
119    cudaParticlesSize = 0;
120    if (cudaSiteTypes != NULL)
121    {
122        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaSiteTypes)); //TODO: track memory usage.
123        cudaSiteTypes = NULL;
124        cudaSiteTypesSize = 0;
125    }
126}
127
128void CudaByteLattice::copyToGPU()
129{
130    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent], particles, cudaParticlesSize, cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
131    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(cudaSiteTypes, siteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize, cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
132    isGPUMemorySynched = true;
133}
134
135void CudaByteLattice::copyFromGPU()
136{
137	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(particles, cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent], cudaParticlesSize, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
138    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(siteTypes, cudaSiteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
139	isGPUMemorySynched = true;
140}
141
142
143void CudaByteLattice::getSiteLatticeView(uint8_t **siteLattice, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx) {
144    ByteLattice::getSiteLatticeView(siteLattice, Nz, Ny, Nx);
145    // isGPUMemorySynched = false;
146}
147
148void CudaByteLattice::getParticleLatticeView(uint8_t **particleLattice, int *Nw, int *Nz, int *Ny, int *Nx, int *Np) {
149    ByteLattice::getParticleLatticeView(particleLattice, Nw,  Nz, Ny, Nx, Np);
150    // isGPUMemorySynched = false;
151}
152
153
154void * CudaByteLattice::getGPUMemorySrc()
155{
156    return cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent];
157}
158
159void * CudaByteLattice::getGPUMemoryDest()
160{
161    return cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent==0?1:0];
162}
163
164void CudaByteLattice::swapSrcDest()
165{
166    cudaParticlesCurrent = cudaParticlesCurrent==0?1:0;
167}
168
169void * CudaByteLattice::getGPUMemorySiteTypes()
170{
171    return cudaSiteTypes;
172}
173
174void CudaByteLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t site)
175{
176    ByteLattice::setSiteType(x,y,z,site);
177    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
178}
179
180void CudaByteLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle)
181{
182    ByteLattice::addParticle(x,y,z,particle);
183	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
184}
185
186void CudaByteLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z)
187{
188    ByteLattice::removeParticles(x,y,z);
189    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
190}
191
192void CudaByteLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t site)
193{
194    ByteLattice::setSiteType(index,site);
195    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
196}
197
198void CudaByteLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle)
199{
200    ByteLattice::addParticle(index,particle);
201	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
202}
203
204void CudaByteLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t index)
205{
206    ByteLattice::removeParticles(index);
207    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
208}
209
210void CudaByteLattice::removeAllParticles()
211{
212    ByteLattice::removeAllParticles();
213	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
214}
215
216void CudaByteLattice::setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)
217{
218    ByteLattice::setFromRowMajorByteData(buffer, bufferSize);
219    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
220}
221
222}
223}

CudaIntLattice.h#

 1/*

15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:

18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.

21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation
