40#ifndef LM_RDME_CUDAINTLATTICE_H_
41#define LM_RDME_CUDAINTLATTICE_H_
42
43#include <vector>
44#include <map>
45#include "core/Exceptions.h"
46#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
47#include "rdme/IntLattice.h"
48#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
49
50namespace lm {
51namespace rdme {
52
53class CudaIntLattice : public IntLattice
54{
55public:
56    CudaIntLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
57    CudaIntLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t spacing, uint particlesPerSite);
58	virtual ~CudaIntLattice();
59	
60    virtual void copyToGPU();
61    virtual void copyFromGPU();
62    virtual void * getGPUMemorySrc();
63    virtual void * getGPUMemoryDest();
64    virtual void swapSrcDest();
65    virtual void * getGPUMemorySiteTypes();
66
67	// Override methods that can cause the GPU memory to become stale.
68	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t site);
69	virtual void setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t site);
70	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle);
71	virtual void addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle);
72    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z);
73    virtual void removeParticles(lattice_size_t index);
74	virtual void removeAllParticles();
75
76    // Methods to set the data directly.
77    virtual void setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize);
78	
79protected:
80    virtual void allocateCudaMemory();
81    virtual void deallocateCudaMemory();
82	
83protected:
84    uint cudaParticlesCurrent;
85    size_t cudaParticlesSize;
86    void * cudaParticles[2];
87    size_t cudaSiteTypesSize;
88    void * cudaSiteTypes;
89    bool isGPUMemorySynched;
90};
91
92}
93}
94
95#endif

CudaIntLattice.cu#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
  3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
  4 * All rights reserved.
  5 * 
  6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
  7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
  8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  9 * 
 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 * 
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 * 
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 * 
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 * 
 29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 36 *
 37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
 38 */
 39
 40#include "config.h"
 41#include "core/Types.h"
 42#include "core/Exceptions.h"
 43#include "rdme/CudaIntLattice.h"
 44#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
 45
 46namespace lm {
 47namespace rdme {
 48
 49CudaIntLattice::CudaIntLattice(lattice_coord_t size, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 50:IntLattice(size,latticeSpacing,particlesPerSite),cudaParticlesCurrent(0),cudaParticlesSize(0),cudaSiteTypesSize(0),cudaSiteTypes(NULL),isGPUMemorySynched(false)
 51{
 52    // Initialize the pointers.
 53    cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
 54    cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
 55
 56    // Make sure the lattice dimensions are divisible by 32.
 57    if (size.x%32 != 0 || size.y%32 != 0 || size.z%32 != 0) throw InvalidArgException("size","each dimension of a CUDA lattice must be divisible by 32");
 58    allocateCudaMemory();
 59}
 60
 61CudaIntLattice::CudaIntLattice(lattice_size_t xSize, lattice_size_t ySize, lattice_size_t zSize, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, uint particlesPerSite)
 62:IntLattice(xSize,ySize,zSize,latticeSpacing,particlesPerSite),cudaParticlesCurrent(0),cudaParticlesSize(0),cudaSiteTypesSize(0),cudaSiteTypes(NULL),isGPUMemorySynched(false)
 63{
 64    // Initialize the pointers.
 65    cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
 66    cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
 67
 68    // Make sure the lattice dimensions are divisible by 32.
 69    if (size.x%32 != 0 || size.y%32 != 0 || size.z%32 != 0) throw InvalidArgException("size","each dimension of a CUDA lattice must be divisible by 32");
 70    allocateCudaMemory();
 71}
 72
 73CudaIntLattice::~CudaIntLattice()
 74{
 75    deallocateCudaMemory();
 76}
 77
 78void CudaIntLattice::allocateCudaMemory()
 79{
 80    // Allocate memory on the CUDA device.
 81    cudaParticlesSize=numberSites*wordsPerSite*sizeof(uint32_t);
 82    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaParticles[0], cudaParticlesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 83    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaParticles[1], cudaParticlesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 84    cudaSiteTypesSize=numberSites*sizeof(uint8_t);
 85    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaSiteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 86}
 87
 88void CudaIntLattice::deallocateCudaMemory()
 89{
 90    // If we have any allocated device memory, free it.
 91    if (cudaParticles[0] != NULL)
 92    {
 93        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaParticles[0])); //TODO: track memory usage.
 94        cudaParticles[0] = NULL;
 95    }
 96    if (cudaParticles[1] != NULL)
 97    {
 98        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaParticles[1])); //TODO: track memory usage.
 99        cudaParticles[1] = NULL;
100    }
101    cudaParticlesSize = 0;
102    if (cudaSiteTypes != NULL)
103    {
104        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaFree(cudaSiteTypes)); //TODO: track memory usage.
105        cudaSiteTypes = NULL;
106        cudaSiteTypesSize = 0;
107    }
108}
109
110void CudaIntLattice::copyToGPU()
111{
112	if (!isGPUMemorySynched)
113	{
114		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent], particles, cudaParticlesSize, cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
115        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(cudaSiteTypes, siteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize, cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
116		isGPUMemorySynched = true;
117	}
118}
119
120void CudaIntLattice::copyFromGPU()
121{
122	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(particles, cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent], cudaParticlesSize, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
123    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(siteTypes, cudaSiteTypes, cudaSiteTypesSize, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
124	isGPUMemorySynched = true;
125}
126
127void * CudaIntLattice::getGPUMemorySrc()
128{
129    return cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent];
130}
131
132void * CudaIntLattice::getGPUMemoryDest()
133{
134    return cudaParticles[cudaParticlesCurrent==0?1:0];
135}
136
137void CudaIntLattice::swapSrcDest()
138{
139    cudaParticlesCurrent = cudaParticlesCurrent==0?1:0;
140}
141
142void * CudaIntLattice::getGPUMemorySiteTypes()
143{
144    return cudaSiteTypes;
145}
146
147void CudaIntLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, site_t site) 
148{
149    IntLattice::setSiteType(x,y,z,site);
150    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
151}
152
153void CudaIntLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t x, lattice_size_t y, lattice_size_t z, particle_t particle) 
154{
155    IntLattice::addParticle(x,y,z,particle);
156	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
157}
158
159void CudaIntLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t x,lattice_size_t y,lattice_size_t z) 
160{
161    IntLattice::removeParticles(x,y,z);
162    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
163}
164
165void CudaIntLattice::setSiteType(lattice_size_t index, site_t site) 
166{
167    IntLattice::setSiteType(index,site);
168    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
169}
170
171void CudaIntLattice::addParticle(lattice_size_t index, particle_t particle) 
172{
173    IntLattice::addParticle(index,particle);
174	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
175}
176
177void CudaIntLattice::removeParticles(lattice_size_t index) 
178{
179    IntLattice::removeParticles(index);
180    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
181}
182
183void CudaIntLattice::removeAllParticles()
184{
185    IntLattice::removeAllParticles();
186	isGPUMemorySynched = false;
187}
188
189void CudaIntLattice::setFromRowMajorByteData(void * buffer, size_t bufferSize)
190{
191    IntLattice::setFromRowMajorByteData(buffer, bufferSize);
192    isGPUMemorySynched = false;
193}
194
195}
196}

Solver Classes#

MESolver.h#

 1/*
 2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
 3 * Copyright 2011-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
 4 * All rights reserved.
 5 * 
 6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
 7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
 8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
 9 * 
10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
16 * 
17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
19 * 
20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
23 * 
24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
27 * permission.
28 * 
29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
36 *
37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
38 */
39
40#ifndef LM_ME_MESOLVER_H
41#define LM_ME_MESOLVER_H
42
43#include <map>
44#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
45
46using std::map;
47using lm::main::ResourceAllocator;
48
49namespace lm {
50
51namespace io {
52class ReactionModel;
53}
54namespace me {
55
56/// @class MESolver
57/// @brief An abstract base class for all Master Equation solvers, this is essentially a representation of "the simulation instance"
58class MESolver
59{
60
61public:
62    /// @brief Create the MESolver
63    MESolver();
64    virtual ~MESolver();
65    
66    /// @brief Initialize the simulation
67    /// @param replicate Replicate number out of total replicates
68    /// @param parameters A map of all the parameters for the simulation
69    /// @param A list of resources assigned to the simulation
70    virtual void initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resources)=0;
71    
72    /// @brief Tells whether the solver needs a reaction model
73    virtual bool needsReactionModel()=0;
74    /// @brief Tells whether the solver needs a reaction model
75    virtual bool needsDiffusionModel()=0;
76    /// @brief Actually run the simulation
77    virtual void generateTrajectory()=0;
78};
79
80}
81}
82
83#endif

MESolver.cpp#

 45#ifndef LM_RDME_MPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 46#define LM_RDME_MPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 47
 48#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
 49#include "rdme/RDMESolver.h"
 50#include "rdme/CudaByteLattice.h"
 51
 52#define OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC 0
 53#define OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED 1
 54
 55using lm::rdme::RDMESolver;
 56using lm::rdme::Lattice;
 57
 58namespace lm {
 59
 60namespace io {
 61    class Lattice;
 62    class SpeciesCounts;
 63}
 64
 65namespace rdme {
 66
 67class MpdRdmeSolver: public RDMESolver
 68{
 69    using CMESolver::hookSimulation;
 70    using CMESolver::onBeginTrajectory;
 71    using CMESolver::onEndTrajectory;
 72    using RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel;
 73
 74public:
 75    MpdRdmeSolver();
 76    virtual ~MpdRdmeSolver();
 77
 78    virtual void initialize(unsigned int replicate,
 79                            map<string, string>* parameters,
 80                            ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources* resources);
 81
 82    virtual bool needsReactionModel()  {return true;}
 83    virtual bool needsDiffusionModel() {return true;}
 84
 85    virtual void buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA,
 86                            const uint numberReactionsA,
 87                            const uint* initialSpeciesCountsA,
 88                            const uint* reactionTypeA,
 89                            const double* kA,
 90                            const int* SA,
 91                            const uint* DA,
 92                            const uint kCols = 1);
 93
 94    virtual void buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA,
 95                                     const double* DFA,
 96                                     const uint* RLA,
 97                                     lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 98                                     lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 99                                     lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
100                                     site_size_t particlesPerSite,
101                                     const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
102                                     si_dist_t latticeSpacing,
103                                     const uint8_t* latticeData,
104                                     const uint8_t* latticeSitesData,
105                                     bool rowMajorData = true);
106
107    virtual void generateTrajectory();
108    virtual void setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate);
109
110protected:
111    uint32_t seed;
112    double tau;
113    bool reactionModelModified;
114
115    void*        cudaOverflowList;
116    cudaStream_t cudaStream;
117
118    uint32_t overflowTimesteps;
119    uint32_t overflowListUses;
120    int      overflow_handling;
121
122    float* model_reactionRates;
123    size_t zeroOrderSize, firstOrderSize, secondOrderSize;
124    float *zeroOrder, *firstOrder, *secondOrder;
125
126#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
127	uint8_t* RLG; // Device global memory pointer for RL matrix
128	int8_t* SG;	  // Device global memory pointer for S matrix
129#endif
130
131#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
132	float* TG;
133#endif
134
135#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
136    float*        reactionRatesG;
137    unsigned int* reactionOrdersG;
138    unsigned int* reactionSitesG;
139
140    unsigned int* D1G;
141    unsigned int* D2G;
142#endif
143
144    float* propZeroOrder;
145	float* propFirstOrder;
146	float* propSecondOrder;
147
148    virtual int onBeginTrajectory(CudaByteLattice* lattice);
149	virtual int onEndTrajectory(CudaByteLattice* lattice);
150	virtual int onWriteLattice(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice);
151
152    virtual void allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
153                                 lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
154                                 lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
155                                 site_size_t particlesPerSite,
156                                 const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
157                                 si_dist_t latticeSpacing);
158
159    virtual void writeLatticeData(double time,
160                                  CudaByteLattice* lattice,
161                                  lm::io::Lattice* latticeDataSet);
162	virtual void writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice);
163
164    virtual void recordSpeciesCounts(double time,
165                                     CudaByteLattice* lattice,
166                                     lm::io::SpeciesCounts* speciesCountsDataSet);
167    virtual void writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts* speciesCountsDataSet);
168
169    virtual int hookSimulation(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice);
170    virtual void hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice);
171
172    virtual void runTimestep(CudaByteLattice* lattice, uint32_t timestep);
173    virtual uint64_t getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep);
174
175    virtual void computePropensities();
176    virtual void copyModelsToDevice();
177
178#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
179    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
180                                            const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
181                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
182                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
183                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
184
185    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
186                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
187                                            const unsigned int blockYSize,
188                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
189                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
190                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
191
192    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
193                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
194                                            const unsigned int blockZSize,
195                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
196                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
197                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
198
199    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
200                                                   const unsigned int blockXSize,
201                                                   const unsigned int blockYSize,
202                                                   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
203                                                   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
204                                                   const unsigned int latticeZSize);
205#else
206    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
207                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
208                                            const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
209                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
210                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
211                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
212
213    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
214                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
215                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
216                                            const unsigned int blockYSize,
217                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
218                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
219                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
220
221    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
222                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
223                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
224                                            const unsigned int blockZSize,
225                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
226                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
227                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
228
229    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
230                                                   dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
231                                                   const unsigned int blockXSize,
232                                                   const unsigned int blockYSize,
233                                                   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
234                                                   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
235                                                   const unsigned int latticeZSize);
236#endif
237
238};
239
240
241namespace mpdrdme_dev {

243#ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
244    #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
245        __global__ void precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
246                                                const uint8_t* inSites,
247                                                unsigned int* outLattice,
248                                                const unsigned long long timestepHash,
249                                                unsigned int* siteOverflowList,

251                                                const __restrict__ uint8_t* RLG,
252                                                const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG,
253                                                const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG,
254                                                const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G,

260    #else

270                                                const float* __restrict__ qp2);
271    #endif
272#endif
273
274#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH

276                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
277                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
278                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
279                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
280
281    __global__ void mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
282                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
283                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
284                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
285                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
286
287    __global__ void mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
288                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
289                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
290                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
291                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
292
293    #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
294        #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
295            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
296                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
297                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
298                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
299                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
300                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
301                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG,
302                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG,
303                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG,
304                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G,
305                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G,
306                                            const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
307        #else
308            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
309                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
310                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
311                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
312                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
313                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
314                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
315        #endif
316    #else
317        __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
318                                        const uint8_t* inSites,
319                                        unsigned int* outLattice,
320                                        const unsigned long long timestepHash,
321                                        unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
322    #endif
323#else
324    __global__ void mpd_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
325                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
326                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
327                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,
328                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
329                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
330
331    __global__ void mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
332                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
333                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
334                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,
335                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
336                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
337
338    __global__ void mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
339                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
340                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
341                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,
342                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
343                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
344
345    #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
346        #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
347            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
348                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
349                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
350                                            const unsigned int gridXSize,
351                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
352                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
353                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
354                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG,
355                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG,
356                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG,
357                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G,
358                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G,
359                                            const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
360        #else
361            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
362                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
363                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
364                                            const unsigned int gridXSize,
365                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
366                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
367                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
368                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
369        #endif
370    #else
371        __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
372                                        const uint8_t* inSites,
373                                        unsigned int* outLattice,
374                                        const unsigned int gridXSize,
375                                        const unsigned long long timestepHash,
376                                        unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
377    #endif
378#endif
379
380__global__ void correct_overflows(unsigned int* inLattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
381__global__ void correct_overflowsEV(unsigned int* inLattice, const float* evData, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
382__global__ void sanity_check(const unsigned int* L1, const unsigned int* L2);
383
384}

MpdRdmeSolver.cu#

   1/*
   2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
   3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
   4 * Copyright 2012 Roberts Group,
   5 * All rights reserved.
   6 * 
   7 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
   8 *               University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
   9 *               http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  10 * 
  11 * Developed by: Roberts Group
  12 *               Johns Hopkins University
  13 *               http://biophysics.jhu.edu/roberts/
  14 *
  15 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
  16 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
  17 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
  18 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
  19 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
  20 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
  21 * 
  22 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
  23 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
  24 * 
  25 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
  26 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
  27 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
  28 * 
  29 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
  30 * Urbana-Champaign, the Roberts Group, Johns Hopkins University, nor the names
  31 * of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
  32 * this Software without specific prior written permission.
  33 * 
  34 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
  35 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
  36 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
  37 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
  38 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
  39 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
  40 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
  41 *
  42 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts, Zane Thornburg
  43 */
  44
  45#include <map>
  46#include <string>
  47#include <cstdlib>
  48#include "config.h"
  49#if defined(MACOSX)
  50#include <mach/mach_time.h>
  51#elif defined(LINUX)
  52#include <time.h>
  53#endif
  54#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
  55#include "cuda/ldg.h"
  56#include "core/Math.h"
  57#include "core/Print.h"
  58#include "cme/CMESolver.h"
  59#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
  60#include "Lattice.pb.h"
  61#include "SpeciesCounts.pb.h"
  62#include "core/DataOutputQueue.h"
  63#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
  64#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
  65#include "rdme/CudaByteLattice.h"
  66#include "rdme/MpdRdmeSolver.h"
  67#include "rng/RandomGenerator.h"
  68#include "lptf/Profile.h"
  69#include <sstream>
  70#include "core/Timer.h"
  71#include "io/ArbitraryH5.h"
  72
  73#define MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE    (MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY / 4) // 4 
  74#define MPD_APRON_SIZE        1
  75
  76#include "cuda/constant.cuh"
  77
  78namespace lm {
  79namespace rdme {
  80namespace mpdrdme_dev {
  81#include "rdme/dev/xor_random_dev.cu"
  82#include "rdme/dev/lattice_sim_1d_dev.cu"
  83#include "rdme/dev/byte_diffusion_1d_dev.cu"
  84#include "rdme/dev/byte_reaction_dev.cu"
  85}}}
  86
  87extern bool globalAbort;
  88
  89using std::map;
  90using lm::io::DiffusionModel;
  91using lm::rdme::Lattice;
  92using lm::rng::RandomGenerator;
  93
  94namespace lm {
  95namespace rdme {
  96
  97MpdRdmeSolver::MpdRdmeSolver()
  98:RDMESolver(lm::rng::RandomGenerator::NONE),
  99 seed(0), tau(0.0),
 100 cudaOverflowList(NULL), cudaStream(0),
 101 overflowTimesteps(0), overflowListUses(0),
 102 model_reactionRates(NULL),
 103 zeroOrder(NULL), firstOrder(NULL), secondOrder(NULL)
 104{
 105}
 106
 107void MpdRdmeSolver::initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resources)
 108{
 109	RDMESolver::initialize(replicate, parameters, resources);
 110
 111    // Figure out the random seed.
 112    uint32_t seedTop=(unsigned int)atoi((*parameters)["seed"].c_str());
 113    if (seedTop == 0)
 114    {
 115        #if defined(MACOSX)
 116        seedTop = (uint32_t)mach_absolute_time();
 117        #elif defined(LINUX)
 118        struct timespec seed_timespec;
 119        if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &seed_timespec) != 0) throw lm::Exception("Error getting time to use for random seed.");
 120        seedTop = seed_timespec.tv_nsec;
 121        #endif
 122    }
 123    seed = (seedTop<<16)|(replicate&0x0000FFFF);
 124    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "MPDRDME: Rng seed: top word %u, bottom word %u", (seed>>16)*0xffff, seed&0xFFFF);
 125
 126	string &s = (*parameters)["rdme.mpd.overflowhandler"];
 127	if(s == "classic")
 128	{
 129		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 130		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to classic");
 131	}
 132	else if(s == "relaxed")
 133	{
 134		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED;
 135		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to relaxed");
 136	}
 137	else if(s == "")
 138	{
 139		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 140		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to default (classic)");
 141	}
 142	else
 143	{
 144		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 145		Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "Unknown overflow handler requested: '%s'", s.c_str());
 146	}
 147
 148	
 149	#ifdef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
 150	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaHostAlloc(&cudaOverflowList,
 151		MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE,
 152		cudaHostAllocPortable|cudaHostAllocMapped));
 153	memset(cudaOverflowList, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
 154	#else
 155    // Allocate memory on the device for the exception list.
 156    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaOverflowList, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 157    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemset(cudaOverflowList, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
 158	#endif
 159
 160    // Create a stream for synchronizing the events.
 161    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamCreate(&cudaStream));
 162}
 163
 164MpdRdmeSolver::~MpdRdmeSolver()
 165{
 166    // Free any device memory.
 167    if (cudaOverflowList != NULL)
 168    {
 169	#ifdef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
 170        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK_NOTHROW(cudaFreeHost(cudaOverflowList)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 171	#else
 172        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK_NOTHROW(cudaFree(cudaOverflowList)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 173	#endif
 174        cudaOverflowList = NULL;
 175    }
 176
 177    // If we have created a stream, destroy it.
 178    if (cudaStream != 0)
 179    {
 180        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK_NOTHROW(cudaStreamDestroy(cudaStream));
 181        cudaStream = NULL;
 182    }
 183
 184    // Free allocated memory in MpdRdmeSolver
 185    if (model_reactionRates)  {delete[] model_reactionRates;}
 186
 187    if (zeroOrder)   {delete[] zeroOrder;}
 188	if (firstOrder)  {delete[] firstOrder;}
 189	if (secondOrder) {delete[] secondOrder;}
 190}
 191
 192void MpdRdmeSolver::allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing)
 193{
 194	assert(bytes_per_particle == 1);
 195	if(particlesPerSite != MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY)
 196	{
 197		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "requested allocation for %d particles per site is not %d", particlesPerSite, MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY);
 198		throw Exception("incorrect particle density");
 199	}
 200
 201	if(latticeXSize % 32 != 0)
 202	{
 203		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "The X dimension (%d) is not divisible by %d", latticeXSize, 32);
 204		throw Exception("incorrect lattice dimensions");
 205	}
 206
 207	if(latticeYSize % TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE != 0)
 208	{
 209		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "The Y dimension (%d) is not divisible by %d", latticeYSize, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE);
 210		throw Exception("incorrect lattice dimensions");
 211	}
 212
 213	if(latticeZSize % TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE != 0)
 214	{
 215		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "The Z dimension (%d) is not divisible by %d", latticeZSize, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE);
 216		throw Exception("incorrect lattice dimensions");
 217	}
 218
 219	try
 220	{
 221		CudaByteLattice *cbl = new CudaByteLattice(latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, latticeSpacing, particlesPerSite);
 222		lattice = (Lattice *)cbl;
 223	}
 224	catch (CUDAException e)
 225	{
 226		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, e.what());
 227		throw Exception("Failed to create cuda lattice");
 228	}
 229
 230}
 231
 232void MpdRdmeSolver::buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA,
 233                               const uint numberReactionsA,
 234                               const uint* initialSpeciesCountsA,
 235                               const uint* reactionTypesA,
 236                               const double* KA,
 237                               const int* SA,
 238                               const uint* DA,
 239                               const uint kCols)
 240{
 241    CMESolver::buildModel(numberSpeciesA,
 242                          numberReactionsA,
 243                          initialSpeciesCountsA,
 244                          reactionTypesA,
 245                          KA, SA, DA, kCols);
 246
 247    // Get the time step.
 248    tau = atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 249
 250    if (tau <= 0.0)
 251    {
 252        throw InvalidArgException("timestep",
 253                                  "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 254    }
 255
 256    // Make sure we can support the reaction model.
 257    if (numberReactions > MPD_MAX_REACTION_TABLE_ENTRIES) 
 258    {
 259        throw Exception("The number of reaction table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 260    }
 261
 262#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 263    if (numberSpecies * numberReactions > MPD_MAX_S_MATRIX_ENTRIES) 
 264    {
 265        throw Exception("The number of S matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 266    }
 267#endif
 268
 269    // Setup the cuda reaction model.
 270    unsigned int* reactionOrders = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 271    unsigned int* reactionSites  = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 272    unsigned int* D1 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 273    unsigned int* D2 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 274
 275    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 276    {
 277        if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 278        {
 279            reactionOrders[i] = MPD_ZERO_ORDER_REACTION;
 280        	reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 281        	D1[i] = 0; 
 282        	D2[i] = 0;
 283        }
 284    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 285    	{
 286    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_FIRST_ORDER_REACTION;
 287    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 288    		D1[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si + 1;
 289    		D2[i] = 0;
 290    	}
 291    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 292    	{
 293    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_REACTION;
 294    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 295    		D1[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s1i + 1;
 296    		D2[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s2i + 1;
 297    	}
 298    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 299    	{
 300    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_SELF_REACTION;
 301    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 302    		D1[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si + 1;
 303    		D2[i] = 0;
 304    	}
 305    	else
 306    	{
 307    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA",
 308                                      "the reaction type was not supported by the solver",
 309                                      reactionTypes[i]);
 310    	}
 311    }
 312
 313    // Setup the cuda S matrix.
 314	// Transpose S on the device because we will want to read along the numSpecies axis
 315	// Before A1A2A3A4A5 B1B2B3B4B5 C1C2C3C4C5 ...
 316	// After A1B1C1 A2B2C2 ...
 317    int8_t* tmpS = new int8_t[numberSpecies * numberReactions];
 318
 319	for (uint rx = 0; rx < numberReactions; rx++)
 320	{
 321		for (uint p = 0; p < numberSpecies; p++)
 322		{
 323		    tmpS[(rx * numberSpecies) + p] = S[(numberReactions * p) + rx];
 324		}
 325	}
 326
 327    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int));
 328
 329#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 330    cudaMalloc(&reactionOrdersG, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 331    cudaMemcpy(reactionOrdersG, reactionOrders, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 332    cudaMalloc(&reactionSitesG, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 333    cudaMemcpy(reactionSitesG, reactionSites, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 334    cudaMalloc(&D1G, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 335    cudaMemcpy(D1G, D1, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 336    cudaMalloc(&D2G, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 337    cudaMemcpy(D2G, D2, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 338#else
 339    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionOrdersC, reactionOrders, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 340    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionSitesC,  reactionSites,  numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 341    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D1C, D1, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 342    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D2C, D2, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 343#endif
 344
 345#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 346	cudaMalloc(&SG, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 347	cudaMemcpy(SG, tmpS, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 348#else
 349    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(SC, tmpS, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 350#endif
 351
 352    // Free any temporary resources.
 353    delete[] reactionOrders;
 354    delete[] reactionSites;
 355    delete[] D1;
 356    delete[] D2;
 357    delete[] tmpS;
 358}
 359
 360void MpdRdmeSolver::buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA,
 361                                        const double* DFA,
 362                                        const uint* RLA,
 363                                        lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 364                                        lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 365                                        lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
 366                                        site_size_t particlesPerSite,
 367                                        const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
 368                                        si_dist_t latticeSpacing,
 369                                        const uint8_t* latticeData,
 370                                        const uint8_t* latticeSitesData,
 371                                        bool rowMajorData)
 372{
 373    RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel(numberSiteTypesA, DFA, RLA,
 374                                    latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize,
 375                                    particlesPerSite, bytes_per_particle,
 376                                    latticeSpacing, latticeData, latticeSitesData,
 377                                    rowMajorData);
 378
 379    // Get the time step.
 380    tau = atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 381
 382    if (tau <= 0.0)
 383    {
 384        throw InvalidArgException("timestep",
 385                                  "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 386    }
 387
 388    // Setup the cuda transition matrix.
 389    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies * numberSiteTypes * numberSiteTypes;
 390
 391#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 392    if (DFmatrixSize > MPD_MAX_TRANSITION_TABLE_ENTRIES)
 393    {
 394        throw Exception("The number of transition table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 395    }
 396#endif
 397
 398#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 399    if (numberReactions * numberSiteTypes > MPD_MAX_RL_MATRIX_ENTRIES)
 400    {
 401        throw Exception("The number of RL matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 402    }
 403#endif
 404
 405    // Calculate the probability from the diffusion coefficient and the lattice properties.
 406    /*
 407     * p0 = probability of staying at the site, q = probability of moving in plus or minus direction
 408     *
 409     * D=(1-p0)*lambda^2/2*tau
 410     * q=(1-p0)/2
 411     * D=2q*lambda^2/2*tau
 412     * q=D*tau/lambda^2
 413     */
 414    float* T = new float[DFmatrixSize];
 415
 416    for (uint i = 0; i < DFmatrixSize; i++)
 417    {
 418        float q = (float) (DF[i] * tau / pow(latticeSpacing, 2));
 419
 420        if (q > 0.50f)
 421        {
 422            throw InvalidArgException("D",
 423                                      "The specified diffusion coefficient is too high for the diffusion model.");
 424        }
 425
 426        T[i] = q;
 427    }
 428
 429    // Setup the cuda reaction location matrix.
 430    uint8_t* tmpRL = new uint8_t[numberReactions * numberSiteTypes];
 431
 432    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions * numberSiteTypes; i++)
 433    {
 434    	tmpRL[i] = RL[i];
 435    }
 436
 437#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 438	cudaMalloc(&TG, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float));
 439	cudaMemcpy(TG, T, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 440	cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, &TG, sizeof(float*));
 441#else
 442	cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, T, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float));
 443#endif
 444
 445    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSpeciesC,   &numberSpecies,   sizeof(numberSpeciesC));
 446    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSiteTypesC, &numberSiteTypes, sizeof(numberSiteTypesC));
 447
 448    const unsigned int latticeXYSize  = latticeXSize * latticeYSize;
 449    const unsigned int latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 450
 451    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXSizeC,   &latticeXSize,   sizeof(latticeXSizeC));
 452    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeYSizeC,   &latticeYSize,   sizeof(latticeYSizeC));
 453    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeZSizeC,   &latticeZSize,   sizeof(latticeZSizeC));
 454    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYSizeC,  &latticeXYSize,  sizeof(latticeXYSizeC));
 455    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(latticeXYZSizeC));
 456
 457    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeZSizeC,   &latticeZSize,   sizeof(global_latticeZSizeC));
 458    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(global_latticeXYZSizeC));
 459
 460#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 461    // RL in global memory
 462	cudaMalloc(&RLG, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 463	cudaMemcpy(RLG, tmpRL, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 464#else
 465	// RL in constant memory
 466    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(RLC, tmpRL, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 467#endif
 468
 469    delete[] tmpRL;
 470    delete[] T;
 471
 472    // Set the cuda reaction model rates now that we have the subvolume size.
 473    model_reactionRates = new float[numberReactions];
 474
 475    // Set up pre-configured propensity matrices
 476	zeroOrderSize   = numberSiteTypes;
 477	firstOrderSize  = numberSiteTypes * numberSpecies;
 478	secondOrderSize = numberSiteTypes * numberSpecies * numberSpecies;
 479
 480	zeroOrder   = new float[zeroOrderSize];
 481	firstOrder  = new float[firstOrderSize];
 482	secondOrder = new float[secondOrderSize];
 483
 484#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 485    cudaMalloc(&reactionRatesG, numberReactions * sizeof(float));
 486#endif
 487		
 488	cudaMalloc(&propZeroOrder,   zeroOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 489	cudaMalloc(&propFirstOrder,  firstOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 490	cudaMalloc(&propSecondOrder, secondOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 491
 492    computePropensities();
 493    copyModelsToDevice();
 494	reactionModelModified = false;
 495}
 496
 497void MpdRdmeSolver::generateTrajectory()
 498{
 499    // Shadow the lattice member as a cuda lattice.
 500    CudaByteLattice* lattice = ((CudaByteLattice*) this->lattice);
 501
 502   // Get the interval for writing species counts and lattices.
 503    uint32_t speciesCountsWriteInterval = atol((*parameters)["writeInterval"].c_str());
 504    uint32_t nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime = speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 505
 506	uint32_t latticeWriteInterval = atol((*parameters)["latticeWriteInterval"].c_str());
 507    uint32_t nextLatticeWriteTime = latticeWriteInterval;
 508
 509	lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 510    lm::io::SpeciesCounts speciesCountsDataSet;
 511    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 512    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_entries(0);
 513
 514    // Get the simulation time limit.
 515    double maxTime = atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str());
 516
 517    // Set the initial time.
 518	double time = 0.0;
 519	uint32_t current_timestep = 0;
 520
 521    bool     hookEnabled  = false;
 522	uint32_t hookInterval = 0;
 523    uint32_t nextHookTime = 0;
 524
 525	// Find out at what interval to hook simulations
 526    if ((*parameters)["hookInterval"] != "")
 527    {
 528		hookEnabled  = true;
 529        hookInterval = atol((*parameters)["hookInterval"].c_str());
 530        nextHookTime = hookInterval;
 531    }
 532
 533	// Find out at what interval to write status messages
 534    double printPerfInterval = 60;
 535
 536    if ((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"] != "")
 537    {
 538    	printPerfInterval = atof((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"].c_str());
 539    }
 540
 541	// Call beginning hook. Any modifications to the lattice will be
 542	// accounted for because we have not yet copied to device memory;
 543	// thus we do not need to check return value
 544	onBeginTrajectory(lattice);
 545
 546    // Synchronize the cuda memory.
 547    lattice->copyToGPU();
 548
 549    // Record the initial species counts.
 550    recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 551
 552    // Write the initial lattice.
 553    writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 554
 555    Timer timer;
 556    timer.tick();
 557
 558    double lastT     = 0;
 559    int    lastSteps = 0;
 560
 561    // Perform an initial hook check
 562    hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 563
 564    while (time < maxTime)
 565    {
 566        if (globalAbort)
 567		{
 568			printf("Global abort: terminating solver\n");
 569			break;
 570		}
 571
 572        lastT     += timer.tock();
 573        lastSteps += 1;
 574
 575        if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
 576        {
 577            double stepTime       = lastT / lastSteps;
 578            double completionTime = stepTime * (maxTime - time) / tau;
 579
 580            std::string units;
 581
 582            if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 365)
 583            {
 584                units = "weeks";
 585                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 365;
 586            }
 587            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)
 588            {
 589                units = "months";
 590                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 30;
 591            }
 592            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 7)
 593            {
 594                units = "weeks";
 595                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 7;
 596            }
 597            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24)
 598            {
 599                units = "days";
 600                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24;
 601            }
 602            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60)
 603            {
 604                units = "hours";
 605                completionTime /= 60 * 60;
 606            }
 607            else if (completionTime > 60)
 608            {
 609                units = "minutes";
 610                completionTime /= 60;
 611            }
 612            else
 613            {
 614                units = "seconds";
 615            }
 616
 617            Print::printf(Print::INFO,
 618                          "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. "
 619                          "Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
 620                          1000.0 * stepTime, time, maxTime, 100.0 * time / maxTime,
 621                          completionTime, units.c_str());
 622
 623            lastT     = 0;
 624            lastSteps = 0;
 625        }
 626
 627        timer.tick();
 628
 629        // Run the next timestep.
 630        runTimestep(lattice, current_timestep++);
 631
 632        // Update the time.
 633	    time = current_timestep * tau;
 634
 635	    if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime ||
 636            current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime ||
 637            (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime))
 638        {
 639            reactionModelModified = false;
 640
 641            // Synchronize the lattice.
 642            lattice->copyFromGPU();
 643
 644            // Check if we need to execute the hook
 645            if (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime)
 646            {
 647                hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 648                nextHookTime += hookInterval;
 649            }
 650
 651	        // See if we need to write the lattice.
 652            if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime)
 653            {
 654                writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 655                nextLatticeWriteTime += latticeWriteInterval;
 656            }
 657
 658            // See if we need to write the species counts.
 659            if (current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime)
 660            {
 661                recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 662                nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime += speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 663
 664                // See if we have accumulated enough species counts to send.
 665                if (speciesCountsDataSet.number_entries() >= TUNE_SPECIES_COUNTS_BUFFER_SIZE)
 666                {
 667                    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 668                }
 669            }
 670	    }
 671    }
 672
 673	lattice->copyFromGPU();
 674	onEndTrajectory(lattice);
 675
 676    // Write any remaining species counts.
 677    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 678}
 679
 680void MpdRdmeSolver::setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate)
 681{
 682    if (reactionTypes[rxid] ==  ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 683	{
 684		((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 685	}
 686	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 687	{
 688		((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 689	}
 690	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 691	{
 692		((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 693	}
 694	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 695	{
 696		((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 697	}
 698    else
 699    {
 700    	throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[rxid]);
 701    }
 702
 703	// Flag to trigger re-computation of rdme propensities
 704	reactionModelModified = true;
 705}
 706
 707void MpdRdmeSolver::computePropensities()
 708{
 709	unsigned int latticeXSize = lattice->getXSize();
 710	unsigned int latticeYSize = lattice->getYSize();
 711	unsigned int latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 712
 713    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 714    {
 715    	if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 716    	{
 717    	    model_reactionRates[i] = ((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau /
 718                                     (latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize);
 719    	}
 720    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 721    	{
 722    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau;
 723    	}
 724    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 725    	{
 726    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau *
 727                                     latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 728    	}
 729    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 730    	{
 731    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau *
 732                                     latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 733    	}
 734    	else
 735    	{
 736    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA",
 737                                      "the reaction type was not supported by the solver",
 738                                      reactionTypes[i]);
 739    	}
 740    }
 741
 742    float scale = latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 743
 744	for (uint site = 0; site < numberSiteTypes; site++)
 745	{
 746		uint o1 = site * numberSpecies;
 747		uint o2 = site * numberSpecies * numberSpecies;
 748
 749		zeroOrder[site] = 0.0f;
 750
 751		for (uint i = 0; i < numberSpecies; i++)
 752		{
 753			firstOrder[o1 + i] = 0.0f;
 754
 755			for (uint j = 0; j < numberSpecies; j++)
 756				secondOrder[o2 + (i * numberSpecies) + j] = 0.0f;	
 757		}
 758
 759		for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 760		{
 761			if (!RL[(i * numberSiteTypes) + site]) {continue;}
 762
 763			switch (reactionTypes[i])
 764			{
 765				case ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 766                {
 767				    ZerothOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (ZerothOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 768				    zeroOrder[site] += rx->k * tau / scale;
 769                    break;
 770                }
 771				case FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 772                {
 773				    FirstOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 774				    firstOrder[o1 + rx->si] += rx->k * tau;
 775                    break;
 776                }
 777				case SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 778                {
 779				    SecondOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 780				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s1i * numberSpecies) + rx->s2i] = rx->k * tau * scale;
 781				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s2i * numberSpecies) + rx->s1i] = rx->k * tau * scale;
 782                    break;
 783                }
 784				case SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 785                {
 786				    SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs* rx = (SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 787				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->si * numberSpecies) + rx->si] += rx->k * tau * scale * 2;
 788                }
 789			}
 790		}
 791	}
 792}
 793
 794void MpdRdmeSolver::copyModelsToDevice()
 795{
 796#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 797    cudaMemcpy(reactionRatesG, model_reactionRates, numberReactions * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 798#else
 799    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionRatesC, model_reactionRates, numberReactions * sizeof(float));
 800#endif
 801
 802	cudaMemcpy(propZeroOrder,   zeroOrder,   zeroOrderSize * sizeof(float),   cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 803	cudaMemcpy(propFirstOrder,  firstOrder,  firstOrderSize * sizeof(float),  cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 804	cudaMemcpy(propSecondOrder, secondOrder, secondOrderSize * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 805}
 806
 807int MpdRdmeSolver::hookSimulation(double time, CudaByteLattice *lattice)
 808{
 809	// Overload this function in derivative classes
 810	// Return 0 if the lattice state is unchanged
 811	// Return 1 if the lattice state has been modified, 
 812    //          and it needs to be copied back to the GPU
 813	// Return 2 if lattice sites have changed, and should
 814	//			be copied back to the GPU *and* be recorded
 815	//			in the output file
 816	return 0;
 817}
 818
 819int MpdRdmeSolver::onWriteLattice(double time, CudaByteLattice *lattice)
 820{
 821	// Overload this function in derivative classes
 822	// Return 0 if the lattice state is unchanged
 823	// Return 1 if the lattice state has been modified, 
 824    //          and it needs to be copied back to the GPU.
 825	// Return 2 if lattice sites have changed, and should
 826	//			be copied back to the GPU *and* be recorded
 827	//			in the output file
 828	return 0;
 829}
 830
 831int MpdRdmeSolver::onBeginTrajectory(CudaByteLattice *lattice)
 832{
 833	return 0;
 834}
 835
 836int MpdRdmeSolver::onEndTrajectory(CudaByteLattice *lattice)
 837{
 838	return 0;
 839}
 840
 841void MpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeData(double time,
 842                                     CudaByteLattice* lattice,
 843                                     lm::io::Lattice* latticeDataSet)
 844{
 845    // Record the lattice data.
 846    latticeDataSet->Clear();
 847    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 848    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 849    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 850    latticeDataSet->set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 851    latticeDataSet->set_time(time);
 852
 853    // Push it to the output queue.
 854    size_t payloadSize = size_t(lattice->getSize().x) *
 855                         size_t(lattice->getSize().y) *
 856                         size_t(lattice->getSize().z) *
 857                         size_t(lattice->getMaxOccupancy()) *
 858                         sizeof(uint8_t);
 859
 860    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::BYTE_LATTICE,
 861                                                          replicate,
 862                                                          latticeDataSet,
 863                                                          lattice,
 864                                                          payloadSize,
 865                                                          &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerialize);
 866}
 867
 868void MpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice)
 869{
 870	lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 871
 872    // Record the lattice data.
 873    latticeDataSet.Clear();
 874    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 875    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 876    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 877    latticeDataSet.set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 878    latticeDataSet.set_time(time);
 879
 880    // Push it to the output queue.
 881    size_t payloadSize = lattice->getSize().x *
 882                         lattice->getSize().y *
 883                         lattice->getSize().z *
 884                         sizeof(uint8_t);
 885
 886    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SITE_LATTICE,
 887                                                          replicate,
 888                                                          &latticeDataSet,
 889                                                          lattice,
 890                                                          payloadSize,
 891                                                          &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerializeSites);
 892}
 893
 894void MpdRdmeSolver::recordSpeciesCounts(double time, CudaByteLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 895{
 896    std::map<particle_t,uint> particleCounts = lattice->getParticleCounts();
 897    speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries()+1);
 898    speciesCountsDataSet->add_time(time);
 899    for (particle_t p=0; p<numberSpeciesToTrack; p++)
 900    {
 901        speciesCountsDataSet->add_species_count((particleCounts.count(p+1)>0)?particleCounts[p+1]:0);
 902    }
 903}
 904
 905void MpdRdmeSolver::writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 906{
 907    if (speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries() > 0)
 908    {
 909        // Push it to the output queue.
 910        lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SPECIES_COUNTS, replicate, speciesCountsDataSet);
 911
 912        // Reset the data set.
 913        speciesCountsDataSet->Clear();
 914        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 915        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(0);
 916    }
 917}
 918
 919void MpdRdmeSolver::hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaByteLattice* lattice)
 920{
 921    switch (hookSimulation(time, lattice))
 922    {
 923        case 0:
 924        {
 925            break;
 926        }
 927        case 1:
 928        {
 929            lattice->copyToGPU();
 930            break;
 931        }
 932        case 2:
 933        {
 934            lattice->copyToGPU();
 935            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
 936            break;
 937        }
 938        case 3:
 939        {
 940            printf("hook return value is 3, force to stop.\n");
 941            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
 942            return;
 943        }
 944        default:
 945        {
 946            throw("Unknown hook return value");
 947        }
 948    }
 949
 950    if (reactionModelModified) {computePropensities();}
 951}
 952
 953uint64_t MpdRdmeSolver::getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep)
 954{
 955    uint64_t timestepHash = (((((uint64_t)seed)<<30)+timestep)<<2)+substep;
 956    timestepHash = timestepHash * 3202034522624059733ULL + 4354685564936845319ULL;
 957    timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 20; timestepHash ^= timestepHash << 41; timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 5;
 958    timestepHash *= 7664345821815920749ULL;
 959    return timestepHash;
 960}
 961
 962void MpdRdmeSolver::runTimestep(CudaByteLattice * lattice, uint32_t timestep)
 963{
 964    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
 965
 966    if(reactionModelModified)
 967        copyModelsToDevice();
 968
 969    // Calculate some properties of the lattice.
 970    lattice_coord_t size = lattice->getSize();
 971    const unsigned int latticeXSize = size.x;
 972    const unsigned int latticeYSize = size.y;
 973    const unsigned int latticeZSize = size.z;
 974
 975    dim3 gridSize, threadBlockSize;
 976
 977    // Execute the kernel for the x direction.
 978    PROF_CUDA_START(cudaStream);
 979
 980    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 981    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 982    calculateXLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 983    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_x_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,0), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 984    #else
 985    unsigned int gridXSize;
 986    calculateXLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 987    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_x_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,0), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 988    #endif
 989    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 990    lattice->swapSrcDest();
 991
 992    // Execute the kernel for the y direction.
 993    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 994    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 995    calculateYLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 996    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_y_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,1), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 997    #else
 998    calculateYLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 999    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_y_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,1), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
1000    #endif
1001    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
1002    lattice->swapSrcDest();
1003
1004    // Execute the kernel for the z direction.
1005    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
1006    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1007    calculateZLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
1008    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_z_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,2), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
1009    #else
1010    calculateZLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
1011    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::mpd_z_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,2), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
1012    #endif
1013    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
1014    lattice->swapSrcDest();
1015
1016    if (numberReactions > 0)
1017    {
1018        // Execute the kernel for the reaction, this kernel updates the lattice in-place, so only the src pointer is passed.
1019        PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_REACTION,cudaStream);
1020        #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1021        calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
1022#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1023
1024#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1025        #ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
1026                CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG, propZeroOrder, propFirstOrder, propSecondOrder)));
1027        #else
1028                CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG)));
1029        #endif
1030#else
1031	#ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
1032		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, propZeroOrder, propFirstOrder, propSecondOrder)));
1033	#else
1034		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG)));
1035	#endif
1036#endif
1037
1038#else
1039        CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
1040#endif
1041        #else
1042        calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
1043#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1044        CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG)));
1045#else
1046        CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((mpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
1047#endif
1048        #endif
1049        PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_REACTION,cudaStream);
1050    }
1051
1052    if(overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1053	mpdrdme_dev::correct_overflows<<<dim3(1,1,1), dim3(TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS,1,1),0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int*)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList);
1054
1055    // Wait for the kernels to complete.
1056    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1057    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamSynchronize(cudaStream));
1058    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1059
1060    if(overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1061	{
1062		uint unresolved = ((unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)[0];
1063		if (unresolved > 0)
1064		{
1065            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "%d unresolved overflows", unresolved);
1066		}
1067	}
1068
1069    if(overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC)
1070    {
1071
1072    // Handle any particle overflows.
1073    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1074    
1075    overflowTimesteps++;
1076#ifndef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
1077    uint32_t overflowList[1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1078    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(overflowList, cudaOverflowList, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
1079#else
1080	uint32_t *overflowList = (uint32_t*)cudaOverflowList;
1081#endif
1082
1083    uint numberExceptions = overflowList[0];
1084    if (numberExceptions > 0)
1085    {
1086        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "%d overflows", numberExceptions);
1087
1088        // Make sure we did not exceed the overflow buffer.
1089        if (numberExceptions > TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS)
1090            throw Exception("Too many particle overflows for the available buffer", numberExceptions);
1091
1092        // Synchronize the lattice.
1093        lattice->copyFromGPU();
1094        
1095        // Go through each exception.
1096        for (uint i=0; i<numberExceptions; i++)
1097        {
1098            // Extract the index and particle type.
1099            lattice_size_t latticeIndex = overflowList[(i*2)+1];
1100            particle_t particle = overflowList[(i*2)+2];
1101            
1102            // Get the x, y, and z coordiantes.
1103            lattice_size_t x = latticeIndex%lattice->getXSize();
1104            lattice_size_t y = (latticeIndex/lattice->getXSize())%lattice->getYSize();
1105            lattice_size_t z = latticeIndex/(lattice->getXSize()*lattice->getYSize());
1106            
1107            // Put the particles back into a nearby lattice site.
1108            bool replacedParticle = false;
1109            for (uint searchRadius=0; !replacedParticle && searchRadius <= TUNE_MPD_MAX_OVERFLOW_REPLACEMENT_DIST; searchRadius++)
1110            {
1111                // Get the nearby sites.
1112                std::vector<lattice_coord_t> sites = lattice->getNearbySites(x,y,z,(searchRadius>0)?searchRadius-1:0,searchRadius);
1113                
1114                // TODO: Shuffle the sites.
1115                
1116                // Try to find one that in not fully occupied and of the same type.
1117                for (std::vector<lattice_coord_t>::iterator it=sites.begin(); it<sites.end(); it++)
1118                {
1119                    lattice_coord_t site = *it;
1120                    if (lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z) < lattice->getMaxOccupancy() && lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z) == lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z))
1121                    {
1122                        lattice->addParticle(site.x, site.y, site.z, particle);
1123                        replacedParticle = true;
1124                        Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG, "Handled overflow of particle %d at site %d,%d,%d type=%d occ=%d by placing at site %d,%d,%d type=%d newocc=%d dist=%0.2f", particle, x, y, z, lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z), lattice->getOccupancy(x,y,z), site.x, site.y, site.z, lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z), lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z), sqrt(pow((double)x-(double)site.x,2.0)+pow((double)y-(double)site.y,2.0)+pow((double)z-(double)site.z,2.0)));
1125                        break;
1126                    }
1127                }
1128            }
1129            
1130            // If we were not able to fix the exception, throw an error.
1131            if (!replacedParticle)
1132                throw Exception("Unable to find an available site to handle a particle overflow.");
1133        }
1134        
1135            
1136        // Copy the changes back to the GPU.
1137        lattice->copyToGPU();
1138            
1139        // Reset the overflow list.
1140        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemset(cudaOverflowList, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1141
