1142        // Track that we used the overflow list.
1143        overflowListUses++;
1144    }
1145    
1146    // If the overflow lsit is being used too often, print a warning.
1147    if (overflowTimesteps >= 1000)
1148    {
1149        if (overflowListUses > 10)
1150            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "%d uses of the particle overflow list in the last 1000 timesteps, performance may be degraded.", overflowListUses);
1151        overflowTimesteps = 0;
1152        overflowListUses = 0;
1153    }
1154    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1155    } // End classic overflow
1156
1157    PROF_CUDA_FINISH(cudaStream);
1158    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1159}
1160
1161#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1162/**
1163 * Gets the launch parameters for launching an x diffusion kernel.
1164 */
1165void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1166{
1167    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize,latticeXSize);
1168    unsigned int gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1169    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1170	{
1171		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1172		unsigned int tryx=32;
1173		while(tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1174		{
1175			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1176				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1177			tryx +=32;
1178		}
1179		gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1180	}
1181			
1182    (*gridSize).x = gridXSize;
1183    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1184    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1185    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1186    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1187    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1188}
1189
1190/**
1191 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1192 */
1193void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1194{
1195    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1196    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1197    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1198    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1199    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1200    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1201}
1202
1203/**
1204 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a z diffusion kernel.
1205 */
1206void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1207{
1208    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1209    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1210    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1211    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1212    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1213    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1214}
1215
1216/**
1217 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1218 */
1219void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1220{
1221    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1222    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1223    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1224    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1225    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1226    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1227}
1228
1229#else
1230/**
1231 * Gets the launch parameters for launching an x diffusion kernel.
1232 */
1233void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1234{
1235    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize,latticeXSize);
1236    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1237    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1238	{
1239		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1240		unsigned int tryx=32;
1241		while(tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1242		{
1243			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1244				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1245			tryx +=32;
1246		}
1247		gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1248	}
1249
1250    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*latticeYSize;
1251    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1252    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1253    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1254    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1255    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1256}
1257
1258/**
1259 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1260 */
1261void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1262{
1263    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1264    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize/blockYSize);
1265    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1266    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1267    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1268    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1269    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1270}
1271
1272/**
1273 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a z diffusion kernel.
1274 */
1275void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1276{
1277    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1278    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize);
1279    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1280    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1281    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1282    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1283    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1284}
1285
1286/**
1287 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a reaction diffusion kernel.
1288 */
1289void MpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1290{
1291    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1292    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize/blockYSize);
1293    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1294    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1295    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1296    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1297    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1298}
1299#endif
1300
1301
1302namespace mpdrdme_dev {
1303/**
1304 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1305 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1306 */
1307#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1308__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,1) mpd_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1309{
1310    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1311#else
1312__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,1) mpd_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1313{
1314    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1315    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1316#endif
1317
1318    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1319    unsigned int latticeXIndex = (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1320    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (by*latticeXSizeC) + latticeXIndex;
1321    unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1322
1323    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1324    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1325    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1326
1327    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
1328    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1329    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
1330
1331    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1332    copyXWindowFromLattice(bx, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1333    copyXWindowFromSites(bx, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1334    __syncthreads();
1335
1336    ////////////////////////////////////////
1337    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1338    ////////////////////////////////////////
1339
1340    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1341
1342    // Make the choices.
1343    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
1344    __syncthreads();
1345
1346    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1347    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1348    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1349
1350    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1351    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1352}
1353
1354/**
1355 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1356 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1357 */
1358#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1359__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1360{
1361    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1362#else
1363__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1364{
1365    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1366    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1367#endif
1368
1369    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1370    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1371    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1372    unsigned int windowYIndex = threadIdx.y+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1373    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowYIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1374
1375    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1376    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1377    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1378
1379    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1380    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1381    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE];
1382
1383    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1384    copyYWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1385    copyYWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1386    __syncthreads();
1387
1388    ////////////////////////////////////////
1389    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1390    ////////////////////////////////////////
1391
1392    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1393
1394    // Make the choices.
1395    makeYDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex, timestepHash);
1396    __syncthreads();
1397
1398    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1399    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1400    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1401
1402    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1403    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1404}
1405
1406/**
1407 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1408 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1409 */
1410#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1411__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,1) mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1412{
1413    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1414#else
1415__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,1) mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1416{
1417    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1418    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1419#endif
1420
1421    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1422    unsigned int latticeZIndex = (bz*blockDim.z) + threadIdx.z;
1423    unsigned int latticeIndex = (latticeZIndex*latticeXYSizeC) + (by*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1424    unsigned int windowZIndex = threadIdx.z+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1425    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowZIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1426
1427    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1428    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1429    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1430
1431    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1432    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1433    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE];
1434
1435    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1436    copyZWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1437    copyZWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1438    __syncthreads();
1439
1440    ////////////////////////////////////////
1441    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1442    ////////////////////////////////////////
1443
1444    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1445
1446    // Make the choices.
1447    makeZDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex, timestepHash);
1448    __syncthreads();
1449
1450    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1451    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1452    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1453
1454    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1455    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1456}
1457
1458/**
1459 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1460 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1461 */
1462#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1463#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1464#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1465__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG,  const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1466#else
1467__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1468#endif
1469#else
1470__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1471#endif
1472{
1473    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1474#else
1475#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1476#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1477__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1478#else
1479__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1480#endif
1481#else
1482__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1483#endif
1484{
1485    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1486    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1487#endif
1488
1489    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1490    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1491    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1492
1493    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1494    // Load the particles and site.          //
1495    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1496
1497    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1498    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1499        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1500    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1501
1502    ////////////////////////////////////////
1503    // Perform the reactions.             //
1504    ////////////////////////////////////////
1505
1506    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1507    float totalReactionPropensity = 0.0f;
1508    for (int i=0; i<numberReactionsC; i++)
1509    {
1510#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1511#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1512        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1513#else
1514        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i, RLG);
1515#endif
1516#else
1517        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i);
1518#endif
1519    }
1520
1521	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1522	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1523		return;
1524
1525    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1526    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1527    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(latticeIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1528
1529    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1530    if (reactionOccurred)
1531    {
1532        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1533#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1534#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1535        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1536#else
1537        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1538#endif
1539#else
1540        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1541#endif
1542
1543        // Construct the new site.
1544#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1545        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1546#else
1547        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1548#endif
1549
1550        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1551        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1552             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1553    }
1554}
1555
1556#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1557#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1558__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1559#else
1560__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1561#endif
1562#else
1563__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1564#endif
1565{
1566    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1567
1568    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1569    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1570    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1571
1572    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1573    // Load the particles and site.          //
1574    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1575
1576    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1577    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1578        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1579    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1580
1581    ////////////////////////////////////////
1582    // Perform the reactions.             //
1583    ////////////////////////////////////////
1584
1585    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1586    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
1587    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
1588	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
1589	{
1590		uint8_t p1=((uint8_t*)particles)[i];
1591		if(p1 > 0)
1592		{
1593			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
1594			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
1595			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
1596			{
1597				uint8_t p2=((uint8_t*)particles)[j];
1598				if(p2 > 0)
1599				{
1600					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
1601					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
1602				}
1603			}
1604		}
1605	}
1606
1607
1608	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1609	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1610		return;
1611
1612    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1613    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1614    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(latticeIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1615
1616    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1617    if (reactionOccurred)
1618    {
1619        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1620#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1621#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1622        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1623#else
1624        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1625#endif
1626#else
1627        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1628#endif
1629
1630        // Construct the new site.
1631#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1632        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1633#else
1634        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1635#endif
1636
1637        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1638        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1639             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1640    }
1641}
1642
1643__global__ void correct_overflows(unsigned int* lattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1644{
1645	// Remember: #define MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE       1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS*sizeof(uint32_t)
1646	// Requirement: one block with TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS threads
1647	
1648	const unsigned int i = threadIdx.x;
1649	const unsigned int total = siteOverflowList[0];
1650
1651	__shared__ unsigned int indexes[TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1652	__shared__ unsigned int maxround;
1653
1654	// Do I have an overflow to look at?
1655	if(i >= total)
1656		return;
1657
1658	// Abort if overflows have overflown
1659	if(threadIdx.x == 0) assert(total < TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS);
1660
1661	// load our index
1662	lattice_size_t latticeIndex = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+1];
1663	particle_t particle = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+2];
1664
1665	indexes[i] = latticeIndex;
1666
1667	// zero out list
1668	maxround=0;
1669	__syncthreads();
1670	siteOverflowList[0]=0;
1671
1672	// Discover which round I should go in.  To prevent situations where two threads
1673	// will try and add a particle to the same site at the same time, and thus
1674	// negating the others, each thread determines what round it is allowed to make
1675	// edits in, by determining how many previous overflows are occuring at the 
1676	// same index.
1677	int round=0;
1678	for(int j=0; j < i; j++)
1679	{
1680		if(indexes[j] == latticeIndex)
1681			round++;
1682	}
1683	atomicMax(&maxround, round);
1684	__syncthreads();
1685
1686	for(int r=0; r <= maxround; r++)
1687	{
1688		if(round == r)
1689		{
1690			unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1691			for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1692				particles[w] = lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1693			
1694			uint8_t *p=(uint8_t*)particles;
1695			int ok=0;
1696			for(int pi=0; pi<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; pi++)
1697			{
1698				if(p[pi] == 0)
1699				{
1700					p[pi]=particle;
1701					ok=1;
1702					//printf("(round %d) Corrected overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
1703					break;
1704				}
1705			}
1706
1707			if(ok)
1708			{
1709				// Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1710				for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1711				     lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1712			}
1713			else
1714			{
1715				int exceptionIndex = atomicAdd(siteOverflowList, 1);
1716				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+1]=latticeIndex;
1717				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+2]=particle;
1718				//printf("(round %d) Failed to correct overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
1719			}
1720		}
1721		__syncthreads();
1722	}
1723
1724	//if(i  == 0)
1725		//printf("in: %d overflows, out: %d\n", total, siteOverflowList[0]);
1726
1727}
1728
1729
1730	// Sanity test kernel to compare kernel outputs
1731	__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) sanity_check(const unsigned int* L1, const unsigned int* L2)
1732	{
1733		// Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1734		unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1735		unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1736		unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1737
1738		///////////////////////////////////////////
1739		// Load the particles and site.          //
1740		///////////////////////////////////////////
1741
1742		unsigned int particles1;
1743		unsigned int particles2;
1744		for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1745		{
1746			particles1 = L1[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1747			particles2 = L2[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1748
1749			if(particles1 != particles2)
1750			{
1751				printf("**\n ********* Sanity failure block(%d,%d,%d) thread(%d,%d,%d) w=%d L1=%8X L2=%8X\n**\n",
1752					bx,by,bz,
1753					threadIdx.x, threadIdx.y, threadIdx.z,
1754					w, particles1, particles2);
1755			}
1756		}
1757	}
1758
1759}
1760
1761}
1762}

IntMpdRdmeSolver.h#

 45#ifndef LM_RDME_INTMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 46#define LM_RDME_INTMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 47
 48#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
 49#include "rdme/RDMESolver.h"
 50#include "rdme/CudaIntLattice.h"
 51
 52using lm::rdme::RDMESolver;
 53using lm::rdme::Lattice;
 54
 55namespace lm {
 56
 57namespace io {
 58    class Lattice;
 59    class SpeciesCounts;
 60}
 61
 62namespace rdme {
 63
 64class IntMpdRdmeSolver: public RDMESolver
 65{
 66    using CMESolver::hookSimulation;
 67    using RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel;
 68
 69public:
 70    IntMpdRdmeSolver();
 71    virtual ~IntMpdRdmeSolver();
 72
 73    virtual void initialize(unsigned int replicate,
 74                            map<string, string>* parameters,
 75                            ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources* resources);
 76
 77    virtual bool needsReactionModel()  {return true;}
 78    virtual bool needsDiffusionModel() {return true;}
 79
 80    virtual void buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA,
 81                            const uint numberReactionsA,
 82                            const uint* initialSpeciesCountsA,
 83                            const uint* reactionTypeA,
 84                            const double* kA,
 85                            const int* SA,
 86                            const uint* DA,
 87                            const uint kCols = 1);
 88
 89    virtual void buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA,
 90                                     const double* DFA,
 91                                     const uint* RLA,
 92                                     lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 93                                     lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 94                                     lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
 95                                     site_size_t particlesPerSite,
 96                                     const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
 97                                     si_dist_t latticeSpacing,
 98                                     const uint8_t* latticeData,
 99                                     const uint8_t* latticeSitesData,
100                                     bool rowMajorData = true);
101
102    virtual void generateTrajectory();
103    virtual void setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate);
104
105protected:
106    uint32_t seed;
107    double tau;
108    bool reactionModelModified;
109
110    void*        cudaOverflowList;
111    cudaStream_t cudaStream;
112
113    uint32_t overflowTimesteps;
114    uint32_t overflowListUses;
115
116    float* model_reactionRates;
117    size_t zeroOrderSize, firstOrderSize, secondOrderSize;
118    float *zeroOrder, *firstOrder, *secondOrder;
119
120#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
121    uint8_t* RLG; // Device global memory pointer for RL matrix
122	int8_t* SG;   // Device global memory pointer for S matrix
123#endif
124
125#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
126	float* TG;
127#endif
128
129#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
130    float*        reactionRatesG;
131    unsigned int* reactionOrdersG;
132    unsigned int* reactionSitesG;
133
134    unsigned int* D1G;
135    unsigned int* D2G;
136#endif
137
138	float* propZeroOrder;
139	float* propFirstOrder;
140	float* propSecondOrder;
141
142    virtual void allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
143                                 lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
144                                 lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
145                                 site_size_t particlesPerSite,
146                                 const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
147                                 si_dist_t latticeSpacing);
148
149    virtual void writeLatticeData(double time,
150                                  CudaIntLattice* lattice,
151                                  lm::io::Lattice* latticeDataSet);
152	virtual void writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaIntLattice* lattice);
153
154    virtual void recordSpeciesCounts(double time,
155                                     CudaIntLattice* lattice,
156                                     lm::io::SpeciesCounts* speciesCountsDataSet);
157    virtual void writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts* speciesCountsDataSet);
158
159    virtual int hookSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice* lattice);
160    virtual void hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice* lattice);
161
162    virtual void runTimestep(CudaIntLattice* lattice, uint32_t timestep);
163    virtual uint64_t getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep);
164
165    virtual void setLatticeData(const uint8_t* latticeData);
166    virtual void computePropensities();
167    virtual void copyModelsToDevice();
168
169#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
170    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
171                                            const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
172                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
173                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
174                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
175
176    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
177                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
178                                            const unsigned int blockYSize,
179                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
180                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
181                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
182
183    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
184                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
185                                            const unsigned int blockZSize,
186                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
187                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
188                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
189
190    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
191                                                   const unsigned int blockXSize,
192                                                   const unsigned int blockYSize,
193                                                   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
194                                                   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
195                                                   const unsigned int latticeZSize);
196#else
197    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
198                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
199                                            const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
200                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
201                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
202                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
203
204    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
205                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
206                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
207                                            const unsigned int blockYSize,
208                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
209                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
210                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
211
212    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
213                                            dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
214                                            const unsigned int blockXSize,
215                                            const unsigned int blockZSize,
216                                            const unsigned int latticeXSize,
217                                            const unsigned int latticeYSize,
218                                            const unsigned int latticeZSize);
219
220    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(unsigned int* gridXSize,
221                                                   dim3* gridSize, dim3* threadBlockSize,
222                                                   const unsigned int blockXSize,
223                                                   const unsigned int blockYSize,
224                                                   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
225                                                   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
226                                                   const unsigned int latticeZSize);
227#endif
228};

280                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
281                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);

283    #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
284        #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
285            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
286                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
287                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
288                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
289                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,

294                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G,
295                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G,
296                                            const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
297        #else
298            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
299                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
300                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
301                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
302                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
303                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
304                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
305        #endif
306    #else
307        __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
308                                        const uint8_t* inSites,
309                                        unsigned int* outLattice,
310                                        const unsigned long long timestepHash,
311                                        unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
312    #endif
313#else

315                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
316                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
317                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,

319                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);

321    __global__ void mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
322                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
323                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
324                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,
325                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
326                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
327
328    __global__ void mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
329                                 const uint8_t* inSites,
330                                 unsigned int* outLattice,
331                                 const unsigned int gridXSize,
332                                 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
333                                 unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
334
335    #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
336        #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
337            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
338                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
339                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
340                                            const unsigned int gridXSize,
341                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
342                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
343                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
344                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG,
345                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG,
346                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG,
347                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G,
348                                            const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G,
349                                            const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
350        #else
351            __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
352                                            const uint8_t* inSites,
353                                            unsigned int* outLattice,
354                                            const unsigned int gridXSize,
355                                            const unsigned long long timestepHash,
356                                            unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
357                                            const int8_t* __restrict__ SG,
358                                            const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
359        #endif
360    #else
361        __global__ void reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice,
362                                        const uint8_t* inSites,
363                                        unsigned int* outLattice,
364                                        const unsigned int gridXSize,
365                                        const unsigned long long timestepHash,
366                                        unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
367    #endif
368#endif
