IntMpdRdmeSolver.cu#

   1/*
   2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
   3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
   4 * Copyright 2012 Roberts Group,
   5 * All rights reserved.
   6 * 
   7 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
   8 *               University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
   9 *               http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  10 * 
  11 * Developed by: Roberts Group
  12 *               Johns Hopkins University
  13 *               http://biophysics.jhu.edu/roberts/
  14 *
  15 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
  16 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
  17 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
  18 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
  19 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
  20 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
  21 * 
  22 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
  23 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
  24 * 
  25 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
  26 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
  27 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
  28 * 
  29 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
  30 * Urbana-Champaign, the Roberts Group, Johns Hopkins University, nor the names
  31 * of its contributors may be used to endorse or promote products derived from
  32 * this Software without specific prior written permission.
  33 * 
  34 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
  35 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
  36 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
  37 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
  38 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
  39 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
  40 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
  41 *
  42 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts, Zane Thornburg
  43 */
  44
  45#include <map>
  46#include <string>
  47#include <cstdlib>
  48#include "config.h"
  49#if defined(MACOSX)
  50#include <mach/mach_time.h>
  51#elif defined(LINUX)
  52#include <time.h>
  53#endif
  54#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
  55#include "core/Math.h"
  56#include "core/Print.h"
  57#include "cme/CMESolver.h"
  58#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
  59#include "Lattice.pb.h"
  60#include "SpeciesCounts.pb.h"
  61#include "core/DataOutputQueue.h"
  62#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
  63#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
  64#include "rdme/IntLattice.h"
  65#include "rdme/CudaIntLattice.h"
  66#include "rdme/IntMpdRdmeSolver.h"
  67#include "rng/RandomGenerator.h"
  68#include "lptf/Profile.h"
  69#include "core/Timer.h"
  70
  71#define MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE    MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY // 16 
  72#define MPD_APRON_SIZE        1
  73
  74#include "cuda/constant.cuh"
  75
  76namespace lm {
  77namespace rdme {
  78namespace intmpdrdme_dev {
  79#include "rdme/dev/xor_random_dev.cu"
  80#include "rdme/dev/lattice_sim_1d_dev.cu"
  81#include "rdme/dev/word_diffusion_1d_dev.cu"
  82#include "rdme/dev/word_reaction_dev.cu"
  83}}}
  84
  85extern bool globalAbort;
  86
  87using std::map;
  88using lm::io::DiffusionModel;
  89using lm::rdme::Lattice;
  90using lm::rng::RandomGenerator;
  91
  92namespace lm {
  93namespace rdme {
  94
  95IntMpdRdmeSolver::IntMpdRdmeSolver()
  96:RDMESolver(lm::rng::RandomGenerator::NONE),
  97 seed(0), tau(0.0),
  98 cudaOverflowList(NULL), cudaStream(0),
  99 overflowTimesteps(0), overflowListUses(0),
 100 model_reactionRates(NULL),
 101 zeroOrder(NULL), firstOrder(NULL), secondOrder(NULL)
 102{
 103}
 104
 105void IntMpdRdmeSolver::initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resources)
 106{
 107	RDMESolver::initialize(replicate, parameters, resources);
 108
 109    // Figure out the random seed.
 110    uint32_t seedTop=(unsigned int)atoi((*parameters)["seed"].c_str());
 111    if (seedTop == 0)
 112    {
 113        #if defined(MACOSX)
 114        seedTop = (uint32_t)mach_absolute_time();
 115        #elif defined(LINUX)
 116        struct timespec seed_timespec;
 117        if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &seed_timespec) != 0) throw lm::Exception("Error getting time to use for random seed.");
 118        seedTop = seed_timespec.tv_nsec;
 119        #endif
 120    }
 121    seed = (seedTop<<16)|(replicate&0x0000FFFF);
 122
 123    // Allocate memory on the device for the exception list.
 124    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&cudaOverflowList, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 125    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemset(cudaOverflowList, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
 126
 127    // Create a stream for synchronizing the events.
 128    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamCreate(&cudaStream));
 129}
 130
 131IntMpdRdmeSolver::~IntMpdRdmeSolver()
 132{
 133    // Free any device memory.
 134    if (cudaOverflowList != NULL)
 135    {
 136        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK_NOTHROW(cudaFree(cudaOverflowList)); //TODO: track memory usage.
 137        cudaOverflowList = NULL;
 138    }
 139
 140    // If we have created a stream, destroy it.
 141    if (cudaStream != 0)
 142    {
 143        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK_NOTHROW(cudaStreamDestroy(cudaStream));
 144        cudaStream = NULL;
 145    }
 146
 147    // Free allocated memory in IntMpdRdmeSolver
 148    if (model_reactionRates)  {delete [] model_reactionRates;}
 149
 150    if (zeroOrder)   {delete [] zeroOrder;}
 151	if (firstOrder)  {delete [] firstOrder;}
 152	if (secondOrder) {delete [] secondOrder;}
 153}
 154
 155void IntMpdRdmeSolver::allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing)
 156{
 157	if(bytes_per_particle != 4)
 158	{
 159		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "IntMpdRdmeSolver works only with lattices of 4 bytes per particle, not %d", bytes_per_particle);
 160		throw Exception("incorrect lattice data type");
 161	}
 162
 163	if(particlesPerSite != MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY)
 164	{
 165		Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "requested allocation for %d particles per site is not %d", particlesPerSite, MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY);
 166		throw Exception("incorrect particle density");
 167	}
 168
 169    lattice = (Lattice *)new CudaIntLattice(latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, latticeSpacing, particlesPerSite);
 170}
 171
 172void IntMpdRdmeSolver::buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA,
 173                                  const uint numberReactionsA,
 174                                  const uint* initialSpeciesCountsA,
 175                                  const uint* reactionTypesA,
 176                                  const double* KA,
 177                                  const int* SA,
 178                                  const uint* DA,
 179                                  const uint kCols)
 180{
 181    CMESolver::buildModel(numberSpeciesA,
 182                          numberReactionsA,
 183                          initialSpeciesCountsA,
 184                          reactionTypesA,
 185                          KA, SA, DA, kCols);
 186
 187    // Get the time step.
 188    tau = atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 189
 190    if (tau <= 0.0)
 191    {
 192        throw InvalidArgException("timestep",
 193                                  "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 194    }
 195
 196    // Make sure we can support the reaction model.
 197    if (numberReactions > MPD_MAX_REACTION_TABLE_ENTRIES)
 198    {
 199        throw Exception("The number of reaction table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 200    }
 201
 202#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 203    if (numberSpecies * numberReactions > MPD_MAX_S_MATRIX_ENTRIES)
 204    {
 205        throw Exception("The number of S matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 206    }
 207#endif
 208
 209    // Setup the cuda reaction model.
 210    unsigned int* reactionOrders = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 211    unsigned int* reactionSites  = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 212    unsigned int* D1 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 213    unsigned int* D2 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 214
 215    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 216    {
 217	    if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 218        {
 219    	    reactionOrders[i] = MPD_ZERO_ORDER_REACTION;
 220    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 221    		D1[i] = 0; 
 222    		D2[i] = 0;
 223	    }
 224    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 225    	{
 226    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_FIRST_ORDER_REACTION;
 227    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 228    		D1[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si + 1;
 229    		D2[i] = 0;
 230    	}
 231    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 232    	{
 233    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_REACTION;
 234    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 235    		D1[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s1i + 1;
 236    		D2[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s2i + 1;
 237    	}
 238    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 239    	{
 240    		reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_SELF_REACTION;
 241    		reactionSites[i]  = 0;
 242    		D1[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si + 1;
 243    		D2[i] = 0;
 244    	}
 245    	else
 246    	{
 247    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA",
 248                                      "the reaction type was not supported by the solver",
 249                                      reactionTypes[i]);
 250    	}
 251    }
 252
 253    // Setup the cuda S matrix.
 254	// Transpose S on the device because we will want to read along the numSpecies axis
 255	// Before A1A2A3A4A5 B1B2B3B4B5 C1C2C3C4C5 ...
 256	// After A1B1C1 A2B2C2 ...
 257    int8_t* tmpS = new int8_t[numberSpecies * numberReactions];
 258
 259	for (uint rx = 0; rx < numberReactions; rx++)
 260	{
 261		for (uint p = 0; p < numberSpecies; p++)
 262		{
 263		    tmpS[(rx * numberSpecies) + p] = S[(numberReactions * p) + rx];
 264		}
 265	}
 266
 267    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int));
 268
 269#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 270    cudaMalloc(&reactionOrdersG, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 271    cudaMemcpy(reactionOrdersG, reactionOrders, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 272    cudaMalloc(&reactionSitesG, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 273    cudaMemcpy(reactionSitesG, reactionSites, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 274    cudaMalloc(&D1G, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 275    cudaMemcpy(D1G, D1, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 276    cudaMalloc(&D2G, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 277    cudaMemcpy(D2G, D2, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 278#else
 279    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionOrdersC, reactionOrders, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 280    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionSitesC,  reactionSites,  numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 281    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D1C, D1, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 282    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D2C, D2, numberReactions * sizeof(unsigned int));
 283#endif
 284
 285#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 286    cudaMalloc(&SG, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 287	cudaMemcpy(SG, tmpS, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 288#else
 289    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(SC, tmpS, numberSpecies * numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 290#endif
 291
 292    // Free any temporary resources.
 293    delete[] reactionOrders;
 294    delete[] reactionSites;
 295    delete[] D1;
 296    delete[] D2;
 297    delete[] tmpS;
 298}
 299
 300void IntMpdRdmeSolver::buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA,
 301                                           const double* DFA,
 302                                           const uint* RLA,
 303                                           lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 304                                           lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 305                                           lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
 306                                           site_size_t particlesPerSite,
 307                                           const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
 308                                           si_dist_t latticeSpacing,
 309                                           const uint8_t* latticeData,
 310                                           const uint8_t* latticeSitesData,
 311                                           bool rowMajorData)
 312{
 313    RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel(numberSiteTypesA, DFA, RLA,
 314                                    latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize,
 315                                    particlesPerSite, bytes_per_particle,
 316                                    latticeSpacing, latticeData, latticeSitesData,
 317                                    rowMajorData);
 318
 319    // Get the time step.
 320    tau = atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 321
 322    if (tau <= 0.0)
 323    {
 324        throw InvalidArgException("timestep",
 325                                  "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 326    }
 327
 328    // Setup the cuda transition matrix.
 329    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies * numberSiteTypes * numberSiteTypes;
 330
 331#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 332    if (DFmatrixSize > MPD_MAX_TRANSITION_TABLE_ENTRIES)
 333    {
 334        throw Exception("The number of transition table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 335    }
 336#endif
 337
 338#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 339    if (numberReactions * numberSiteTypes > MPD_MAX_RL_MATRIX_ENTRIES)
 340    {
 341        throw Exception("The number of RL matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 342    }
 343#endif
 344
 345    // Calculate the probability from the diffusion coefficient and the lattice properties.
 346    /*
 347     * p0 = probability of staying at the site, q = probability of moving in plus or minus direction
 348     *
 349     * D=(1-p0)*lambda^2/2*tau
 350     * q=(1-p0)/2
 351     * D=2q*lambda^2/2*tau
 352     * q=D*tau/lambda^2
 353     */
 354    float* T = new float[DFmatrixSize];
 355
 356    for (uint i = 0; i < DFmatrixSize; i++)
 357    {
 358        float q = (float) (DF[i] * tau / pow(latticeSpacing, 2));
 359
 360        if (q > 0.50f)
 361        {
 362            throw InvalidArgException("D",
 363                                      "The specified diffusion coefficient is too high for the diffusion model.");
 364        }
 365
 366        T[i] = q;
 367    }
 368
 369    // Setup the cuda reaction location matrix.
 370    uint8_t* tmpRL = new uint8_t[numberReactions * numberSiteTypes];
 371
 372    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions * numberSiteTypes; i++)
 373    {
 374    	tmpRL[i] = RL[i];
 375    }
 376
 377#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 378	cudaMalloc(&TG, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float));
 379	cudaMemcpy(TG, T, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 380    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, &TG, sizeof(float*));
 381#else
 382    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, T, DFmatrixSize * sizeof(float));
 383#endif
 384
 385    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSpeciesC,   &numberSpecies,   sizeof(numberSpeciesC));
 386    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSiteTypesC, &numberSiteTypes, sizeof(numberSiteTypesC));
 387
 388    const unsigned int latticeXYSize  = latticeXSize * latticeYSize;
 389    const unsigned int latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 390
 391    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXSizeC,   &latticeXSize,   sizeof(latticeXSizeC));
 392    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeYSizeC,   &latticeYSize,   sizeof(latticeYSizeC));
 393    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeZSizeC,   &latticeZSize,   sizeof(latticeZSizeC));
 394    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYSizeC,  &latticeXYSize,  sizeof(latticeXYSizeC));
 395    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(latticeXYZSizeC));
 396
 397    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeZSizeC,   &latticeZSize,   sizeof(global_latticeZSizeC));
 398    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(global_latticeXYZSizeC));
 399
 400#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 401	// RL in global memory
 402	cudaMalloc(&RLG, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 403	cudaMemcpy(RLG, tmpRL, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 404#else
 405	// RL in constant memory
 406    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(RLC, tmpRL, numberReactions * numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 407#endif
 408
 409    delete[] tmpRL;
 410    delete[] T;
 411
 412    // Set the cuda reaction model rates now that we have the subvolume size.
 413    model_reactionRates = new float[numberReactions];
 414
 415    // Set up pre-configured propensity matrices
 416	zeroOrderSize   = numberSiteTypes;
 417	firstOrderSize  = numberSiteTypes * numberSpecies;
 418	secondOrderSize = numberSiteTypes * numberSpecies * numberSpecies;
 419
 420	zeroOrder   = new float[zeroOrderSize];
 421	firstOrder  = new float[firstOrderSize];
 422	secondOrder = new float[secondOrderSize];
 423
 424#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 425    cudaMalloc(&reactionRatesG, numberReactions * sizeof(float));
 426#endif
 427		
 428	cudaMalloc(&propZeroOrder,   zeroOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 429	cudaMalloc(&propFirstOrder,  firstOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 430	cudaMalloc(&propSecondOrder, secondOrderSize * sizeof(float));
 431
 432    computePropensities();
 433    copyModelsToDevice();
 434	reactionModelModified = false;
 435}
 436
 437void IntMpdRdmeSolver::setLatticeData(const uint8_t* latticeData)
 438{
 439	lattice_coord_t s = lattice->getSize();
 440	site_size_t p = lattice->getMaxOccupancy();
 441
 442	// reinterpret the input as a 32-bit array
 443	uint32_t *data = (uint32_t*)latticeData;
 444
 445	// Set the lattice data.
 446	for (uint i=0, index=0; i<s.x; i++)
 447	{
 448		for (uint j=0; j<s.y; j++)
 449		{
 450			for (uint k=0; k<s.z; k++)
 451			{
 452				for (uint l=0; l<p; l++, index++)
 453				{
 454					if (data[index] != 0)
 455					{
 456						if (data[index] > numberSpecies) throw InvalidArgException("latticeData", "an invalid species was found",data[index]);
 457						lattice->addParticle(i,j,k,data[index]);
 458					}
 459				}
 460			}
 461		}
 462	}
 463}
 464
 465void IntMpdRdmeSolver::setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate)
 466{
 467    if (reactionTypes[rxid] ==  ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 468	{
 469		((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 470	}
 471	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 472	{
 473		((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 474	}
 475	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 476	{
 477		((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 478	}
 479	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 480	{
 481		((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 482	}
 483    else
 484    {
 485    	throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[rxid]);
 486    }
 487
 488	// Flag to trigger re-computation of rdme propensities
 489	reactionModelModified = true;
 490}
 491
 492void IntMpdRdmeSolver::computePropensities()
 493{
 494	unsigned int latticeXSize = lattice->getXSize();
 495	unsigned int latticeYSize = lattice->getYSize();
 496	unsigned int latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 497    
 498    for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 499    {
 500    	if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 501    	{
 502    	    model_reactionRates[i] = ((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau /
 503                                     (latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize);
 504    	}
 505    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 506    	{
 507    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau;
 508    	}
 509    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 510    	{
 511    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau *
 512                                     latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 513    	}
 514    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 515    	{
 516    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k * tau *
 517                                     latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 518    	}
 519    	else
 520    	{
 521    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA",
 522                                      "the reaction type was not supported by the solver",
 523                                      reactionTypes[i]);
 524    	}
 525    }
 526
 527    float scale = latticeXSize * latticeYSize * latticeZSize;
 528
 529	for (uint site = 0; site < numberSiteTypes; site++)
 530	{
 531		uint o1 = site * numberSpecies;
 532		uint o2 = site * numberSpecies * numberSpecies;
 533
 534		zeroOrder[site] = 0.0f;
 535
 536		for (uint i = 0; i < numberSpecies; i++)
 537		{
 538			firstOrder[o1 + i] = 0.0f;
 539
 540			for (uint j = 0; j < numberSpecies; j++)
 541				secondOrder[o2 + (i * numberSpecies) + j] = 0.0f;	
 542		}
 543
 544		for (uint i = 0; i < numberReactions; i++)
 545		{
 546			if (!RL[(i * numberSiteTypes) + site]) {continue;}
 547
 548			switch (reactionTypes[i])
 549			{
 550				case ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 551                {
 552				    ZerothOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (ZerothOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 553				    zeroOrder[site] += rx->k * tau / scale;
 554                    break;
 555                }
 556				case FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 557                {
 558				    FirstOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (FirstOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 559				    firstOrder[o1 + rx->si] += rx->k * tau;
 560                    break;
 561                }
 562				case SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 563                {
 564				    SecondOrderPropensityArgs* rx = (SecondOrderPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 565				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s1i * numberSpecies) + rx->s2i] = rx->k * tau * scale;
 566				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s2i * numberSpecies) + rx->s1i] = rx->k * tau * scale;
 567                    break;
 568                }
 569				case SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 570                {
 571				    SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs* rx = (SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs*) propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 572				    secondOrder[o2 + (rx->si * numberSpecies) + rx->si] += rx->k * tau * scale * 2;
 573                }
 574			}
 575		}
 576	}
 577}
 578
 579void IntMpdRdmeSolver::copyModelsToDevice()
 580{
 581#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 582    cudaMemcpy(reactionRatesG, model_reactionRates, numberReactions * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 583#else
 584    cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionRatesC, model_reactionRates, numberReactions * sizeof(float));
 585#endif
 586
 587	cudaMemcpy(propZeroOrder,   zeroOrder,   zeroOrderSize * sizeof(float),   cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 588	cudaMemcpy(propFirstOrder,  firstOrder,  firstOrderSize * sizeof(float),  cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 589	cudaMemcpy(propSecondOrder, secondOrder, secondOrderSize * sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 590}
 591
 592void IntMpdRdmeSolver::generateTrajectory()
 593{
 594    // Shadow the lattice member as a cuda lattice.
 595    CudaIntLattice* lattice = ((CudaIntLattice*) this->lattice);
 596
 597    // Get the interval for writing species counts and lattices.
 598    uint32_t speciesCountsWriteInterval = atol((*parameters)["writeInterval"].c_str());
 599    uint32_t nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime = speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 600
 601	uint32_t latticeWriteInterval = atol((*parameters)["latticeWriteInterval"].c_str());
 602    uint32_t nextLatticeWriteTime = latticeWriteInterval;
 603
 604	lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 605    lm::io::SpeciesCounts speciesCountsDataSet;
 606    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 607    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_entries(0);
 608
 609    // Get the simulation time limit.
 610    double maxTime = atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str());
 611
 612    // Set the initial time.
 613	double time = 0.0;
 614	uint32_t current_timestep = 0;
 615
 616    bool     hookEnabled  = false;
 617	uint32_t hookInterval = 0;
 618    uint32_t nextHookTime = 0;
 619
 620    // Find out at what interval to hook simulations
 621    if ((*parameters)["hookInterval"] != "")
 622    {
 623		hookEnabled  = true;
 624        hookInterval = atol((*parameters)["hookInterval"].c_str());
 625        nextHookTime = hookInterval;
 626    }
 627
 628    // Find out at what interval to write status messages
 629    double printPerfInterval = 60;
 630
 631    if ((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"] != "")
 632    {
 633    	printPerfInterval = atof((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"].c_str());
 634    }
 635
 636    // Synchronize the cuda memory.
 637    lattice->copyToGPU();
 638
 639    // Record the initial species counts.
 640    recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 641
 642    // Write the initial lattice.
 643    writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 644
 645    Timer timer;
 646    timer.tick();
 647
 648    double lastT     = 0;
 649    int    lastSteps = 0;
 650
 651    // Perform an initial hook check
 652    hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 653
 654    // Loop until we have finished the simulation
 655    while (time < maxTime)
 656    {
 657	    if (globalAbort)
 658		{
 659			printf("Global abort: terminating solver\n");
 660			break;
 661		}
 662
 663        lastT     += timer.tock();
 664        lastSteps += 1;
 665
 666        if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
 667        {
 668            double stepTime       = lastT / lastSteps;
 669            double completionTime = stepTime * (maxTime - time) / tau;
 670
 671            std::string units;
 672
 673            if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 365)
 674            {
 675                units = "weeks";
 676                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 365;
 677            }
 678            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 30)
 679            {
 680                units = "months";
 681                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 30;
 682            }
 683            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24 * 7)
 684            {
 685                units = "weeks";
 686                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24 * 7;
 687            }
 688            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60 * 24)
 689            {
 690                units = "days";
 691                completionTime /= 60 * 60 * 24;
 692            }
 693            else if (completionTime > 60 * 60)
 694            {
 695                units = "hours";
 696                completionTime /= 60 * 60;
 697            }
 698            else if (completionTime > 60)
 699            {
 700                units = "minutes";
 701                completionTime /= 60;
 702            }
 703            else
 704            {
 705                units = "seconds";
 706            }
 707
 708            Print::printf(Print::INFO,
 709                          "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. "
 710                          "Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
 711                          1000.0 * stepTime, time, maxTime, 100.0 * time / maxTime,
 712                          completionTime, units.c_str());
 713
 714            lastT     = 0;
 715            lastSteps = 0;
 716        }
 717
 718        timer.tick();
 719
 720        // Run the next timestep.
 721        runTimestep(lattice, current_timestep++);
 722
 723        // Update the time.
 724	    time = current_timestep * tau;
 725
 726        if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime ||
 727            current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime ||
 728            (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime))
 729        {
 730            reactionModelModified = false;
 731
 732            // Synchronize the lattice.
 733            lattice->copyFromGPU();
 734
 735	        // Check if we need to execute the hook
 736            if (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime)
 737            {
 738   	            hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 739                nextHookTime += hookInterval;
 740            }
 741
 742            // See if we need to write the lattice.
 743	        if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime)
 744            {
 745                writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 746                nextLatticeWriteTime += latticeWriteInterval;
 747            }
 748
 749            // See if we need to write the species counts.
 750            if (current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime)
 751            {
 752                recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 753                nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime += speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 754
 755                // See if we have accumulated enough species counts to send.
 756                if (speciesCountsDataSet.number_entries() >= TUNE_SPECIES_COUNTS_BUFFER_SIZE)
 757                {
 758                    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 759                }
 760            }
 761        }
 762    }
 763
 764    lattice->copyFromGPU();
 765
 766    // Write any remaining species counts.
 767    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 768}
 769
 770int IntMpdRdmeSolver::hookSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice *lattice)
 771{                                                       
 772    // Overload this function in derivative classes
 773	// Return 0 if the lattice state is unchanged
 774	// Return 1 if the lattice state has been modified, 
 775    //          and it needs to be copied back to the GPU
 776	// Return 2 if lattice sites have changed, and should
 777	//			be copied back to the GPU *and* be recorded
 778	//			in the output file           
 779    return 0;                                             
 780}
 781
 782void IntMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeData(double time,
 783                                        CudaIntLattice* lattice,
 784                                        lm::io::Lattice* latticeDataSet)
 785{
 786    // Record the lattice data.
 787    latticeDataSet->Clear();
 788    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 789    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 790    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 791    latticeDataSet->set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 792    latticeDataSet->set_time(time);
 793
 794    // Push it to the output queue.
 795    size_t payloadSize = lattice->getSize().x *
 796                         lattice->getSize().y *
 797                         lattice->getSize().z *
 798                         lattice->getMaxOccupancy() *
 799                         sizeof(uint32_t);
 800
 801    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::INT_LATTICE,
 802                                                          replicate,
 803                                                          latticeDataSet,
 804                                                          lattice,
 805                                                          payloadSize,
 806                                                          &lm::rdme::IntLattice::nativeSerialize);
 807}
 808
 809void IntMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaIntLattice* lattice)
 810{
 811    lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 812
 813    // Record the lattice data.
 814    latticeDataSet.Clear();
 815    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 816    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 817    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 818    latticeDataSet.set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 819    latticeDataSet.set_time(time);
 820
 821    // Push it to the output queue.
 822    size_t payloadSize = lattice->getSize().x *
 823                         lattice->getSize().y *
 824                         lattice->getSize().z *
 825                         sizeof(uint8_t);
 826
 827    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SITE_LATTICE,
 828                                                          replicate,
 829                                                          &latticeDataSet,
 830                                                          lattice,
 831                                                          payloadSize,
 832                                                          &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerializeSites);
 833}
 834
 835void IntMpdRdmeSolver::recordSpeciesCounts(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 836{
 837    std::map<particle_t,uint> particleCounts = lattice->getParticleCounts();
 838    speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries()+1);
 839    speciesCountsDataSet->add_time(time);
 840    for (particle_t p=0; p<numberSpeciesToTrack; p++)
 841    {
 842        speciesCountsDataSet->add_species_count((particleCounts.count(p+1)>0)?particleCounts[p+1]:0);
 843    }
 844}
 845
 846void IntMpdRdmeSolver::writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 847{
 848    if (speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries() > 0)
 849    {
 850        // Push it to the output queue.
 851        lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SPECIES_COUNTS, replicate, speciesCountsDataSet);
 852
 853        // Reset the data set.
 854        speciesCountsDataSet->Clear();
 855        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 856        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(0);
 857    }
 858}
 859
 860void IntMpdRdmeSolver::hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice* lattice)
 861{
 862    switch (hookSimulation(time, lattice))
 863    {
 864        case 0:
 865        {
 866            break;
 867        }
 868        case 1:
 869        {
 870            lattice->copyToGPU();
 871            break;
 872        }
 873        case 2:
 874        {
 875            lattice->copyToGPU();
 876            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
 877            break;
 878        }
 879        case 3:
 880        {
 881            printf("hook return value is 3, force to stop.\n");
 882            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
 883            return;
 884        }
 885        default:
 886        {
 887            throw("Unknown hook return value");
 888        }
 889    }
 890
 891    if (reactionModelModified) {computePropensities();}
 892}
 893
 894uint64_t IntMpdRdmeSolver::getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep)
 895{
 896    uint64_t timestepHash = (((((uint64_t)seed)<<30)+timestep)<<2)+substep;
 897    timestepHash = timestepHash * 3202034522624059733ULL + 4354685564936845319ULL;
 898    timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 20; timestepHash ^= timestepHash << 41; timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 5;
 899    timestepHash *= 7664345821815920749ULL;
 900    return timestepHash;
 901}
 902
 903void IntMpdRdmeSolver::runTimestep(CudaIntLattice * lattice, uint32_t timestep)
 904{
 905    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
 906
 907    if(reactionModelModified)
 908        copyModelsToDevice();
 909
 910    // Calculate some properties of the lattice.
 911    lattice_coord_t size = lattice->getSize();
 912    const unsigned int latticeXSize = size.x;
 913    const unsigned int latticeYSize = size.y;
 914    const unsigned int latticeZSize = size.z;
 915
 916    dim3 gridSize, threadBlockSize;
 917
 918    // Execute the kernel for the x direction.
 919    PROF_CUDA_START(cudaStream);
 920
 921    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 922    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 923    calculateXLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 924    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_x_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,0), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 925    #else
 926    unsigned int gridXSize;
 927    calculateXLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 928    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_x_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,0), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 929    #endif
 930    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 931    lattice->swapSrcDest();
 932
 933    // Execute the kernel for the y direction.
 934    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 935    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 936    calculateYLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 937    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_y_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,1), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 938    #else
 939    calculateYLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 940    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_y_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,1), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 941    #endif
 942    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 943    lattice->swapSrcDest();
 944
 945    // Execute the kernel for the z direction.
 946    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 947    #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 948    calculateZLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 949    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_z_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,2), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 950    #else
 951    calculateZLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 952    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::mpd_z_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemoryDest(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,2), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 953    #endif
 954    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
 955    lattice->swapSrcDest();
 956
 957    if (numberReactions > 0)
 958    {
 959        // Execute the kernel for the reaction, this kernel updates the lattice in-place, so only the src pointer is passed.
 960        PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_REACTION,cudaStream);
 961        #ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
 962        calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 963            #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 964            #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 965                    #ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
 966                    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG, propZeroOrder, propFirstOrder, propSecondOrder)));
 967                    #else
 968                    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG)));
 969                    #endif
 970            #else
 971                #ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
 972                CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG, propZeroOrder, propFirstOrder, propSecondOrder)));
 973                #else
 974                    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG)));
 975                #endif
 976            #endif
 977            #else
 978                    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 979            #endif
 980                    #else
 981                    calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&gridXSize, &gridSize, &threadBlockSize, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize);
 982        #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 983                CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList, SG, RLG)));
 984        #else
 985                CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((intmpdrdme_dev::reaction_kernel<<<gridSize,threadBlockSize,0,cudaStream>>>((unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), (uint8_t *)lattice->getGPUMemorySiteTypes(), (unsigned int *)lattice->getGPUMemorySrc(), gridXSize, getTimestepSeed(timestep,3), (unsigned int*)cudaOverflowList)));
 986        #endif
 987        #endif
 988        PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_REACTION,cudaStream);
 989    }
 990
 991    // Wait for the kernels to complete.
 992    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
 993    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamSynchronize(cudaStream));
 994    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
 995
 996    // Handle any particle overflows.
 997    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
 998    
 999    overflowTimesteps++;
1000    uint32_t overflowList[1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1001    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(overflowList, cudaOverflowList, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost));
1002    uint numberExceptions = overflowList[0];
1003    if (numberExceptions > 0)
1004    {
1005        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "%d overflows", numberExceptions);
1006        
1007        // Make sure we did not exceed the overflow buffer.
1008        if (numberExceptions > TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS)
1009            throw Exception("Too many particle overflows for the available buffer", numberExceptions);
1010            
1011        // Synchronize the lattice.
1012        lattice->copyFromGPU();
1013        
1014        // Go through each exception.
1015        for (uint i=0; i<numberExceptions; i++)
1016        {
1017            // Extract the index and particle type.
1018            lattice_size_t latticeIndex = overflowList[(i*2)+1];
1019            particle_t particle = overflowList[(i*2)+2];
1020            
1021            // Get the x, y, and z coordiantes.
1022            lattice_size_t x = latticeIndex%lattice->getXSize();
1023            lattice_size_t y = (latticeIndex/lattice->getXSize())%lattice->getYSize();
1024            lattice_size_t z = latticeIndex/(lattice->getXSize()*lattice->getYSize());
1025            
1026            // Put the particles back into a nearby lattice site.
1027            bool replacedParticle = false;
1028            for (uint searchRadius=0; !replacedParticle && searchRadius <= TUNE_MPD_MAX_OVERFLOW_REPLACEMENT_DIST; searchRadius++)
1029            {
1030                // Get the nearby sites.
1031                std::vector<lattice_coord_t> sites = lattice->getNearbySites(x,y,z,(searchRadius>0)?searchRadius-1:0,searchRadius);
1032                
1033                // TODO: Shuffle the sites.
1034                
1035                // Try to find one that in not fully occupied and of the same type.
1036                for (std::vector<lattice_coord_t>::iterator it=sites.begin(); it<sites.end(); it++)
1037                {
1038                    lattice_coord_t site = *it;
1039                    if (lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z) < lattice->getMaxOccupancy() && lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z) == lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z))
1040                    {
1041                        lattice->addParticle(site.x, site.y, site.z, particle);
1042                        replacedParticle = true;
1043                        Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG, "Handled overflow of particle %d at site %d,%d,%d type=%d occ=%d by placing at site %d,%d,%d type=%d newocc=%d dist=%0.2f", particle, x, y, z, lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z), lattice->getOccupancy(x,y,z), site.x, site.y, site.z, lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z), lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z), sqrt(pow((double)x-(double)site.x,2.0)+pow((double)y-(double)site.y,2.0)+pow((double)z-(double)site.z,2.0)));
1044                        break;
1045                    }
1046                }
1047            }
1048            
1049            // If we were not able to fix the exception, throw an error.
1050            if (!replacedParticle)
1051                throw Exception("Unable to find an available site to handle a particle overflow.");
1052        }
1053        
1054            
1055        // Copy the changes back to the GPU.
1056        lattice->copyToGPU();
1057            
1058        // Reset the overflow list.
1059        CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemset(cudaOverflowList, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1060        
1061        // Track that we used the overflow list.
1062        overflowListUses++;
1063    }
1064    
1065    // If the overflow lsit is being used too often, print a warning.
1066    if (overflowTimesteps >= 1000)
1067    {
1068        if (overflowListUses > 10)
1069            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "%d uses of the particle overflow list in the last 1000 timesteps, performance may be degraded.", overflowListUses);
1070        overflowTimesteps = 0;
1071        overflowListUses = 0;
1072    }
1073    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1074
1075    PROF_CUDA_FINISH(cudaStream);
1076    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1077}
1078
1079#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1080/**
1081 * Gets the launch parameters for launching an x diffusion kernel.
1082 */
1083void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1084{
1085    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize,latticeXSize);
1086    unsigned int gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1087    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1088	{
1089		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1090		unsigned int tryx=32;
1091		while(tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1092		{
1093			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1094				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1095			tryx +=32;
1096		}
1097		gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1098	}
1099			
1100    (*gridSize).x = gridXSize;
1101    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1102    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1103    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1104    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1105    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1106}
1107
1108/**
1109 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1110 */
1111void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1112{
1113    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1114    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1115    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1116    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1117    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1118    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1119}
1120
1121/**
1122 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a z diffusion kernel.
1123 */
1124void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1125{
1126    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1127    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1128    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1129    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1130    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1131    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1132}
1133
1134/**
1135 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1136 */
1137void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1138{
1139    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1140    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1141    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1142    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1143    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1144    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1145}
1146
1147#else
1148/**
1149 * Gets the launch parameters for launching an x diffusion kernel.
1150 */
1151void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1152{
1153    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize,latticeXSize);
1154    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1155    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1156	{
1157		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1158		unsigned int tryx=32;
1159		while(tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1160		{
1161			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1162				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1163			tryx +=32;
1164		}
1165		gridXSize = latticeXSize/xBlockXSize;
1166	}
1167
1168    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*latticeYSize;
1169    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1170    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1171    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1172    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1173    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1174}
1175
1176/**
1177 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a y diffusion kernel.
1178 */
1179void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1180{
1181    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1182    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize/blockYSize);
1183    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1184    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1185    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1186    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1187    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1188}
1189
1190/**
1191 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a z diffusion kernel.
1192 */
1193void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1194{
1195    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1196    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize);
1197    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1198    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1199    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1200    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1201    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1202}
1203
1204/**
1205 * Gets the launch parameters for launching a reaction diffusion kernel.
1206 */
1207void IntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(unsigned int * gridXSize, dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1208{
1209    *gridXSize = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1210    (*gridSize).x = (*gridXSize)*(latticeYSize/blockYSize);
1211    (*gridSize).y = latticeZSize;
1212    (*gridSize).z = 1;
1213    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1214    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1215    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1216}
1217#endif
1218
1219
1220namespace intmpdrdme_dev {
1221/**
1222 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1223 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1224 */
1225#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1226__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,1) mpd_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1227{
1228    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1229#else
1230__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,1) mpd_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1231{
1232    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1233    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1234#endif
1235
1236    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1237    unsigned int latticeXIndex = (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1238    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (by*latticeXSizeC) + latticeXIndex;
1239    unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1240
1241    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1242    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1243    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1244
1245    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
1246    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1247    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
1248
1249    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1250    copyXWindowFromLattice(bx, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1251    copyXWindowFromSites(bx, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1252    __syncthreads();
1253
1254    ////////////////////////////////////////
1255    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1256    ////////////////////////////////////////
1257
1258    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1259
1260    // Make the choices.
1261    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
1262    __syncthreads();
1263
1264    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1265    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1266    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1267
1268    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1269    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1270}
1271
1272/**
1273 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1274 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1275 */
1276#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1277__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1278{
1279    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1280#else
1281__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) mpd_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1282{
1283    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1284    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1285#endif
1286
1287    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1288    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1289    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1290    unsigned int windowYIndex = threadIdx.y+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1291    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowYIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1292
1293    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1294    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1295    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1296
1297    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1298    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1299    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE];
1300
1301    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1302    copyYWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1303    copyYWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1304    __syncthreads();
1305
1306    ////////////////////////////////////////
1307    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1308    ////////////////////////////////////////
1309
1310    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1311
1312    // Make the choices.
1313    makeYDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex, timestepHash);
1314    __syncthreads();
1315
1316    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1317    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1318    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1319
1320    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1321    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1322}
1323
1324/**
1325 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1326 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1327 */
1328#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1329__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,1) mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1330{
1331    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1332#else
1333__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,1) mpd_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1334{
1335    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1336    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1337#endif
1338
1339    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1340    unsigned int latticeZIndex = (bz*blockDim.z) + threadIdx.z;
1341    unsigned int latticeIndex = (latticeZIndex*latticeXYSizeC) + (by*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1342    unsigned int windowZIndex = threadIdx.z+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1343    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowZIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1344
1345    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1346    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1347    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1348
1349    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1350    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1351    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE];
1352
1353    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1354    copyZWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1355    copyZWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1356    __syncthreads();
1357
1358    ////////////////////////////////////////
1359    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1360    ////////////////////////////////////////
1361
1362    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1363
1364    // Make the choices.
1365    makeZDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, latticeIndex, latticeZIndex, windowIndex, windowZIndex, timestepHash);
1366    __syncthreads();
1367
1368    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1369    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1370    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1371
1372    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1373    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1374}
1375
1376/**
1377 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1378 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1379 */
1380#ifdef MPD_CUDA_3D_GRID_LAUNCH
1381#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1382#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1383__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1384#else
1385__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1386#endif
1387#else
1388__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1389#endif
1390{
1391    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1392#else
1393#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1394#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1395__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1396#else
1397__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1398#endif
1399#else
1400__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int gridXSize, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1401#endif
1402{
1403    __shared__ unsigned int bx, by, bz;
1404    calculateBlockPosition(&bx, &by, &bz, gridXSize);
1405#endif
1406
1407    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1408    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1409    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1410
1411    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1412    // Load the particles and site.          //
1413    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1414
1415    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1416    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1417        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1418    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1419
1420    ////////////////////////////////////////
1421    // Perform the reactions.             //
1422    ////////////////////////////////////////
1423
1424    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1425    float totalReactionPropensity = 0.0f;
1426    for (int i=0; i<numberReactionsC; i++)
1427    {
1428#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1429#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1430        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, particles, i, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1431#else
1432        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, particles, i, RLG);
1433#endif
1434#else
1435        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, particles, i);
1436#endif
1437    }
1438
1439	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1440	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1441		return;
1442
1443    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1444    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1445    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(latticeIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1446
1447    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1448    if (reactionOccurred)
1449    {
1450        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1451#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1452#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1453        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1454#else
1455        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1456#endif
1457#else
1458        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1459#endif
1460
1461        // Construct the new site.
1462#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1463        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1464#else
1465        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1466#endif
1467
1468        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1469        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1470             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1471    }
1472}
1473
1474#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1475__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1476#else
1477__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1478#endif
1479{
1480    unsigned int bx=blockIdx.x, by=blockIdx.y, bz=blockIdx.z;
1481
1482    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1483    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (by*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1484    unsigned int latticeIndex = (bz*latticeXYSizeC) + (latticeYIndex*latticeXSizeC) + (bx*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1485
1486    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1487    // Load the particles and site.          //
1488    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1489
1490    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1491    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1492        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1493    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1494
1495    ////////////////////////////////////////
1496    // Perform the reactions.             //
1497    ////////////////////////////////////////
1498
1499    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1500    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
1501    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
1502	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
1503	{
1504		unsigned int p1=particles[i];
1505		if(p1 > 0)
1506		{
1507			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
1508			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
1509			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
1510			{
1511				unsigned int p2=particles[j];
1512				if(p2 > 0)
1513				{
1514					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
1515					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
1516				}
1517			}
1518		}
1519	}
1520
1521
1522	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1523	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1524		return;
1525
1526    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1527    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1528    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(latticeIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1529
1530    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1531    if (reactionOccurred)
1532    {
1533        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1534#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1535#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1536        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1537#else
1538        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1539#endif
1540#else
1541        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, particles, latticeIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1542#endif
1543
1544        // Construct the new site.
1545#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1546        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1547#else
1548        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1549#endif
1550
1551        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1552        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1553             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1554    }
1555}
1556}
1557
1558}
1559}

MGPUMpdRdmeSolver.h#
