 45#ifndef LM_RDME_MGPUMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 46#define LM_RDME_MGPUMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 47
 48#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
 49#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
 50#include "rdme/RDMESolver.h"
 51#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
 52#include "rdme/GPUMapper/MultiGPUMapper.h"
 53#include "rdme/GPUMapper/SegmentDescriptor.h"
 54
 55#if defined(MACOSX)
 56#include "GPUMapper/osx_barrier.h"
 57#endif
 58
 59#define OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC 0
 60#define OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED 1
 61
 62using lm::main::ResourceAllocator;
 63using lm::rdme::RDMESolver;
 64using lm::rdme::Lattice;
 65
 66namespace lm {
 67
 68namespace io{
 69class Lattice;
 70class SpeciesCounts;
 71}
 72namespace rdme {
 73
 74struct gpu_worker_thread_params;
 75
 76class MGPUMpdRdmeSolver : public RDMESolver
 77{
 78    using CMESolver::hookSimulation;
 79    using RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel;
 80
 81public:
 82    MGPUMpdRdmeSolver();
 83    virtual ~MGPUMpdRdmeSolver();
 84    virtual void initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resources);
 85    virtual bool needsReactionModel() {return true;}
 86    virtual bool needsDiffusionModel()  {return true;}
 87    virtual void buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA, const uint numberReactionsA, const uint * initialSpeciesCountsA, const uint * reactionTypeA, const double * kA, const int * SA, const uint * DA, const uint kCols=1);
 88    virtual void buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA, const double * DFA, const uint * RLA, lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, const uint8_t * latticeData, const uint8_t * latticeSitesData, bool rowMajorData=true);
 89    virtual void generateTrajectory();
 90	virtual void setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate);
 91
 92protected:
 93    virtual void allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing);
 94    virtual void writeLatticeData(double time, ByteLattice * lattice, lm::io::Lattice * latticeDataSet);
 95	virtual void writeLatticeSites(double time, ByteLattice * lattice);
 96    virtual void recordSpeciesCounts(double time, ByteLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet);
 97    virtual void writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet);
 98	virtual void hookCheckSimulation(double time, ByteLattice * lattice);
 99    virtual int run_next_timestep(int gpu, uint32_t timestep);
100    virtual uint64_t getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep);
101	
102	virtual void copyModelsToDevice(int gpu);
103	virtual void initialize_decomposition();
104	virtual void start_threads();
105	virtual void stop_threads();
106	virtual void computePropensities();
107
108	// declare the child thread entry point as a friend function
109	// so that it may call the run_thread method
110	friend void* gpu_worker_thread(void *arg);
111	virtual void* run_thread(int);
112	virtual int handle_all_overflows();
113	virtual int handle_overflows(int gpu, void *hptr, void *dptr, int ts);
114	virtual int hookSimulation(double time, ByteLattice *lattice);
115
116    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
117    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
118    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
119    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
120
121protected:
122    uint32_t seed;
123    double tau;
124
125    uint32_t overflowTimesteps;
126    uint32_t overflowListUses;
127    int      overflow_handling;
128
129	// Stored model parameters for const memory
130	unsigned int* model_reactionOrders;
131	unsigned int* model_reactionSites;
132	float*        model_reactionRates;
133
134	unsigned int* model_D1;
135	unsigned int* model_D2;
136
137	int8_t*  model_S;
138	float*   model_T;
139	uint8_t* model_RL;
140
141	size_t zeroOrderSize, firstOrderSize, secondOrderSize;
142	float *zeroOrder, *firstOrder, *secondOrder;
143
144	pthread_barrier_t start_barrier, stop_barrier, simulation_barrier;
145	pthread_barrier_t overflow_barrier1, overflow_barrier2;
146	MultiGPUMapper *mapper;
147	ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources *resources;
148	gpu_worker_thread_params *threads;
149
150	int timesteps_to_run;
151	uint32_t current_timestep;
152	bool reactionModelModified;
153	double printPerfInterval;
154	
155	bool aggcopy_x_unpack;
156	bool aggcopy_r_pack;
157	bool use_spin_barrier;
158};
159
160struct gpu_worker_thread_params
161{
162    pthread_t thread;
163    //MultiCUDALattice *lattice;
164    MGPUMpdRdmeSolver *runner;
165    MultiGPUMapper *mapper;
166    int gpu;
167    int ngpus;
168    pthread_barrier_t *runner_sync;
169    pthread_barrier_t *worker_sync;
170    int timesteps_to_run;
171    bool lattice_synched;
172    int load_balance_counter;
173
174	// cuda objects
175	unsigned int *dLattice, *dLatticeTmp;
176	uint8_t *dSites;
177	cudaStream_t stream1;
178	cudaEvent_t x_finish, diffusion_finished, rx_finish;
179	unsigned int *h_overflows, *d_overflows;
180
181	// kernel launch params
182	dim3 grid_x, grid_y, grid_z, grid_r;
183	dim3 threads_x, threads_y, threads_z, threads_r;
184
185	// lattice segment geometry provided by the mapper
186    SegmentDescriptor_s *segment;
187
188#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
189	uint8_t *RLG;   // Device global memory pointer for RL matrix
190	int8_t *SG;     // Device global memory pointer for S matrix
191#endif
192#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
193	float *TG;
194#endif
195
196#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
197    float *reactionRatesG;
198    unsigned int *reactionOrdersG;
199    unsigned int *reactionSitesG;
200    unsigned int *D1G;
201    unsigned int *D2G;
202#endif
203
204	float *propZeroOrder, *propFirstOrder, *propSecondOrder;
205	
206
207};
208
209
210
211namespace mgpumpdrdme_dev {
212__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z);
213__device__ inline size_t local_index(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z);
214__global__ void correct_overflows_mgpu(unsigned int* lattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
215
216#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
217#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
218__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrderG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
219#else
220__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
221#endif
222#else
223__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
224#endif
225
226
227#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
228#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
229__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
230#else
231__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
232#endif
233#else
234__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
235#endif
236
237__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel_unpack(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int *buf_bot);
238
239__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
240__global__ void MGPU_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
241__global__ void MGPU_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start);
242#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
243#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
244__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const int8_t* __restrict__ SG, const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
245#else
246__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const int8_t* __restrict__ SG, const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
247#endif
248#else
249__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start);
250#endif
251
252
253}

255}
256}

258#endif

  45#include <map>
  46#include <string>
  47#include <cstdlib>
  48#include "config.h"
  49#include <chrono>
  50#if defined(MACOSX)
  51#include <mach/mach_time.h>
  52#elif defined(LINUX)
  53#include <time.h>
  54#endif
  55#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
  56#include "cuda/ldg.h"
  57#include "core/Math.h"
  58#include "core/Print.h"
  59#include "cme/CMESolver.h"
  60#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
  61#include "Lattice.pb.h"
  62#include "SpeciesCounts.pb.h"
  63#include "core/DataOutputQueue.h"
  64#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
  65#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
  66#include "rdme/MGPUMpdRdmeSolver.h"
  67#include "rng/RandomGenerator.h"
  68#include "lptf/Profile.h"
  69#include "core/Timer.h"
  70
  71#define MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE              (MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY / 4)
  72#define MPD_APRON_SIZE                  1
  73
  74#include "cuda/constant.cuh"
  75namespace lm {
  76namespace rdme {
  77namespace mgpumpdrdme_dev{
  78#include "rdme/dev/xor_random_dev.cu"
  79#include "rdme/dev/lattice_sim_1d_dev.cu"
  80#include "rdme/dev/byte_diffusion_1d_dev.cu"
  81#include "rdme/dev/byte_reaction_dev.cu"
  82}}}
  83
  84#include "rdme/GPUMapper/MultiGPUMapper.h"
  85#include "rdme/GPUMapper/SegmentDescriptor.h"
  86#include "rdme/GPUMapper/ZDivMultiGPUMapper.h"
  87
  88#define L3INDEX(_x,_y,_z, _g) ((_x)+((_y)*(_g.x))+((_z)*(_g.x)*(_g.y)))
  89
  90
  91extern bool globalAbort;
  92
  93
  94using std::map;
  95using lm::io::DiffusionModel;
  96using lm::rdme::Lattice;
  97using lm::rng::RandomGenerator;
  98
  99namespace lm {
 100namespace rdme {
 101
 102
 103volatile unsigned int mclkr_overflow_counter=0;
 104volatile unsigned int mclkr_total_overflows=0;
 105volatile unsigned int mclkr_overflow_reporters=0;
 106unsigned int mclkr_worker_count;
 107pthread_mutex_t mclkr_overflow_mutex=PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
 108pthread_cond_t mclkr_overflow_cond=PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
 109
 110volatile int mclkr_generation = 0;
 111pthread_spinlock_t mclkr_spin;
 112
 113
 114void* gpu_worker_thread(void *arg)
 115{
 116	Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG,"thread %p launched with arg %p",pthread_self(), arg);
 117	gpu_worker_thread_params *params=(gpu_worker_thread_params*)arg;
 118	MGPUMpdRdmeSolver *solver=params->runner;
 119
 120	return solver->run_thread(params->gpu);
 121}
 122
 123inline void mclkr_barrier_spin(int overflows)
 124{
 125	PROF_BEGIN(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 126
 127	int gen = mclkr_generation;
 128	pthread_spin_lock(&mclkr_spin);
 129
 130    // Update shared counters
 131    mclkr_overflow_reporters++;
 132    mclkr_overflow_counter+=overflows;
 133
 134	pthread_spin_unlock(&mclkr_spin);
 135
 136    // simulate barrier
 137    if(mclkr_overflow_reporters == mclkr_worker_count)
 138    {
 139        mclkr_total_overflows=mclkr_overflow_counter;
 140        mclkr_overflow_reporters=0;
 141		mclkr_generation++;
 142    }
 143    else
 144    {
 145		while(mclkr_generation == gen) {} 
 146    }
 147
 148	PROF_END(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 149}
 150
 151inline void mclkr_barrier_cond(int overflows)
 152{
 153	PROF_BEGIN(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 154
 155	pthread_mutex_lock(&mclkr_overflow_mutex);
 156
 157    // Update shared counters
 158    mclkr_overflow_reporters++;
 159    mclkr_overflow_counter+=overflows;
 160
 161    // simulate barrier
 162    if(mclkr_overflow_reporters == mclkr_worker_count)
 163    {
 164        mclkr_total_overflows=mclkr_overflow_counter;
 165        mclkr_overflow_reporters=0;
 166		pthread_cond_broadcast(&mclkr_overflow_cond);
 167    }
 168    else
 169    {
 170		pthread_cond_wait(&mclkr_overflow_cond, &mclkr_overflow_mutex);
 171    }
 172
 173	pthread_mutex_unlock(&mclkr_overflow_mutex);
 174
 175	PROF_END(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 176}
 177
 178	
 179
 180MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::MGPUMpdRdmeSolver()
 181:RDMESolver(lm::rng::RandomGenerator::NONE),
 182 seed(0), tau(0.0), threads(NULL),
 183 overflowTimesteps(0), overflowListUses(0),
 184 model_reactionOrders(NULL), model_reactionSites(NULL), model_reactionRates(NULL),
 185 model_D1(NULL), model_D2(NULL),
 186 model_S(NULL), model_T(NULL), model_RL(NULL),
 187 zeroOrder(NULL), firstOrder(NULL), secondOrder(NULL)
 188{
 189	// set defaults features
 190	aggcopy_x_unpack = true;
 191	aggcopy_r_pack = true;
 192	use_spin_barrier = false;
 193}
 194
 195void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resourcesA)
 196{
 197	pthread_spin_init(&mclkr_spin, 0);
 198
 199	RDMESolver::initialize(replicate, parameters, resourcesA);
 200
 201    // Figure out the random seed.
 202    uint32_t seedTop=(unsigned int)atoi((*parameters)["seed"].c_str());
 203    if (seedTop == 0)
 204    {
 205        #if defined(MACOSX)
 206        seedTop = (uint32_t)mach_absolute_time();
 207        #elif defined(LINUX)
 208        struct timespec seed_timespec;
 209        if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &seed_timespec) != 0) throw lm::Exception("Error getting time to use for random seed.");
 210        seedTop = seed_timespec.tv_nsec;
 211        #endif
 212    }
 213    seed = (seedTop<<16)|(replicate&0x0000FFFF);
 214    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "MPDRDME: Rng seed: top word %u, bottom word %u", (seed>>16)*0xffff, seed&0xFFFF);
 215
 216	resources=resourcesA;
 217
 218	//Verify that core count is at least as large as the gpu count.
 219	//Otherwise, threads compete and speedups are not realized.
 220	int cpu_count = resources->cpuCores.size();
 221	int gpu_count = resources->cudaDevices.size();
 222
 223	if(cpu_count < gpu_count)
 224	{
 225		Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "GPU count (%d) exceeds CPU count (%d)", gpu_count, cpu_count);
 226		throw lm::Exception("Not enough cpu cores to run solver");
 227	}
 228
 229	string &s = (*parameters)["rdme.mpd.overflowhandler"];
 230	if(s == "classic")
 231	{
 232		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 233		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to classic");
 234	}
 235	else if(s == "relaxed")
 236	{
 237		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED;
 238		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to relaxed");
 239	}
 240	else if(s == "")
 241	{
 242		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 243		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to default (classic)");
 244	}
 245	else
 246	{
 247		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 248		Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "Unknown overflow handler requested: '%s'", s.c_str());
 249	}
 250
 251	if((*parameters)["mgpu.x_unpack"] != "")
 252		aggcopy_x_unpack = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.x_unpack"].c_str());
 253
 254	if((*parameters)["mgpu.r_pack"] != "")
 255		aggcopy_r_pack = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.r_pack"].c_str());
 256
 257	if((*parameters)["mgpu.spinlock"] != "")
 258		use_spin_barrier = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.spinlock"].c_str());
 259}
 260
 261void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::initialize_decomposition()
 262{
 263	// Create mapper
 264	int latx, laty, latz;
 265	int apron, overlap;
 266	int gpus = resources->cudaDevices.size();
 267
 268#if defined MPD_BOUNDARY_PERIODIC
 269	bool pz = true;
 270#else
 271	bool pz = false;
 272#endif
 273
 274	apron = 2;
 275	overlap = 0;
 276
 277	latx = lattice->getXSize();
 278	laty = lattice->getYSize();
 279	latz = lattice->getZSize();
 280
 281	int site_size = sizeof(int);
 282	int pagecount = MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE;
 283
 284	mapper = new ZDivMultiGPUMapper(latx, laty, latz,
 285	                                site_size, apron, overlap,
 286								    gpus, resources->cudaDevices.data(), pz, pagecount);
 287
 288    pthread_barrier_init(&start_barrier,      NULL, gpus+1);
 289    pthread_barrier_init(&stop_barrier,       NULL, gpus+1);
 290    pthread_barrier_init(&simulation_barrier, NULL, gpus);
 291    pthread_barrier_init(&overflow_barrier1,  NULL, gpus);
 292    pthread_barrier_init(&overflow_barrier2,  NULL, gpus);
 293
 294	mclkr_worker_count = gpus;
 295}
 296
 297void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::start_threads()
 298{
 299	// TODO FIXME: Think about this.  Perhaps each thread should be assigned a core
 300	// or perhaps we should be reusing the threading infrastructure already provided
 301	// to us via the core.  We also need NUMA awareness, which is another TODO.
 302	// For now, lets just open up our pinning to be over all the cores that we've
 303	// been graciously handed to us.
 304#if defined(LINUX) && !defined(ARM)
 305	cpu_set_t cpuset;
 306	CPU_ZERO(&cpuset);
 307
 308	for(int c=0; c<resources->cpuCores.size(); c++)
 309	{
 310		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Adding CPU %d to our cpuset", resources->cpuCores[c]);
 311		CPU_SET(resources->cpuCores[c], &cpuset);
 312	}
 313	pthread_setaffinity_np(pthread_self(), sizeof(cpu_set_t), &cpuset);
 314#endif
 315
 316	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
 317	threads=new gpu_worker_thread_params[gpus];
 318
 319	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
 320	{
 321        threads[i].runner=this;
 322        //threads[i].lattice=lattice;
 323        threads[i].mapper=mapper;
 324        threads[i].gpu=i;
 325        threads[i].ngpus=gpus;
 326        threads[i].runner_sync=NULL;
 327        threads[i].worker_sync=NULL;
 328        threads[i].timesteps_to_run=0;
 329		threads[i].segment=mapper->getSegmentDescriptor(i);
 330		
 331		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Creating GPU thread %d",i);
 332        pthread_create(&(threads[i].thread), NULL, &gpu_worker_thread,
 333                       (void*)&(threads[i]));
 334	}
 335}
 336
 337void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::stop_threads()
 338{
 339	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
 340	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
 341	{
 342		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Waiting to join GPU thread %d",i);
 343		pthread_join(threads[i].thread, NULL);
 344	}
 345}
 346
 347MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::~MGPUMpdRdmeSolver()
 348{
 349	// Free allocated memory in MGPUMpdRdmeSolver
 350	if (model_reactionOrders) {delete [] model_reactionOrders;}
 351	if (model_reactionSites)  {delete [] model_reactionSites;}
 352	if (model_reactionRates)  {delete [] model_reactionRates;}
 353
 354	if (model_D1) {delete [] model_D1;}
 355	if (model_D2) {delete [] model_D2;}
 356
 357	if (model_S)  {delete [] model_S;}
 358	if (model_T)  {delete [] model_T;}
 359	if (model_RL) {delete [] model_RL;}
 360
 361	if (zeroOrder)   {delete [] zeroOrder;}
 362	if (firstOrder)  {delete [] firstOrder;}
 363	if (secondOrder) {delete [] secondOrder;}
 364
 365	if (threads) {delete [] threads;}
 366}
 367
 368void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing)
 369{
 370	assert(bytes_per_particle == 1);
 371    lattice = (Lattice *)new ByteLattice(latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, latticeSpacing, particlesPerSite);
 372}
 373
 374void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA, const uint numberReactionsA, const uint * initialSpeciesCountsA, const uint * reactionTypesA, const double * KA, const int * SA, const uint * DA, const uint kCols)
 375{
 376    CMESolver::buildModel(numberSpeciesA, numberReactionsA, initialSpeciesCountsA, reactionTypesA, KA, SA, DA, kCols);
 377
 378    // Get the time step.
 379    tau=atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 380    if (tau <= 0.0) throw InvalidArgException("timestep", "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 381
 382    // Make sure we can support the reaction model.
 383    if (numberReactions > MPD_MAX_REACTION_TABLE_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of reaction table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 384#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 385    if (numberSpecies*numberReactions > MPD_MAX_S_MATRIX_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of S matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 386#endif
 387
 388    // Setup the cuda reaction model.
 389    model_reactionOrders = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 390    model_reactionSites = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 391    model_D1 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 392    model_D2 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 393    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 394    {
 395        if(reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE) {
 396        	model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_ZERO_ORDER_REACTION;
 397        	model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 398        	model_D1[i] = 0; 
 399        	model_D2[i] = 0;
 400        }
 401    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 402    	{
 403    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_FIRST_ORDER_REACTION;
 404    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 405    		model_D1[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si+1;
 406    		model_D2[i] = 0;
 407    	}
 408    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 409    	{
 410    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_REACTION;
 411    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 412    		model_D1[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s1i+1;
 413    		model_D2[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s2i+1;
 414    	}
 415    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 416    	{
 417    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_SELF_REACTION;
 418    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 419    		model_D1[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si+1;
 420    		model_D2[i] = 0;
 421    	}
 422    	else
 423    	{
 424    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[i]);
 425    	}
 426    }
 427
 428    // Setup the cuda S matrix.
 429    model_S = new int8_t[numberSpecies*numberReactions];
 430
 431	for(uint rx = 0; rx < numberReactions; rx++)
 432	{
 433		for (uint p=0; p<numberSpecies; p++)
 434		{
 435			//tmpS[numberSpecies*rx + p] = S[numberSpecies*rx + p];
 436			model_S[rx * numberSpecies + p] = S[numberReactions*p + rx];
 437		}
 438	}
 439}
 440
 441void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA, const double * DFA, const uint * RLA, lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, const uint8_t * latticeData, const uint8_t * latticeSitesData, bool rowMajorData)
 442{
 443    RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel(numberSiteTypesA, DFA, RLA, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, particlesPerSite, bytes_per_particle, latticeSpacing, latticeData, latticeSitesData, rowMajorData);
 444
 445    // Get the time step.
 446    tau=atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 447    if (tau <= 0.0) throw InvalidArgException("timestep", "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 448
 449    // Setup the cuda transition matrix.
 450    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes;
 451
 452#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 453    if (DFmatrixSize > MPD_MAX_TRANSITION_TABLE_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of transition table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 454#endif
 455
 456#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 457    if (numberReactions*numberSiteTypes > MPD_MAX_RL_MATRIX_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of RL matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 458#endif
 459
 460    // Calculate the probability from the diffusion coefficient and the lattice properties.
 461    /*
 462     * p0 = probability of staying at the site, q = probability of moving in plus or minus direction
 463     *
 464     * D=(1-p0)*lambda^2/2*tau
 465     * q=(1-p0)/2
 466     * D=2q*lambda^2/2*tau
 467     * q=D*tau/lambda^2
 468     */
 469    model_T = new float[DFmatrixSize];
 470    for (uint i=0; i<DFmatrixSize; i++)
 471    {
 472        float q=(float)(DF[i]*tau/pow(latticeSpacing,2));
 473        if (q > 0.50f) throw InvalidArgException("D", "The specified diffusion coefficient is too high for the diffusion model.");
 474        model_T[i] = q;
 475    }
 476
 477    // Setup the cuda reaction location matrix.
 478    model_RL = new uint8_t[numberReactions*numberSiteTypes];
 479    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions*numberSiteTypes; i++)
 480    {
 481    	model_RL[i] = RL[i];
 482    }
 483
 484    // Set the cuda reaction model rates now that we have the subvolume size.
 485    model_reactionRates = new float[numberReactions];
 486
 487	// Set up pre-configured propensity matrices
 488	zeroOrderSize=numberSiteTypes;
 489	firstOrderSize=numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes;
 490	secondOrderSize=numberSpecies*numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes;
 491	zeroOrder=new float[zeroOrderSize];
 492	firstOrder=new float[firstOrderSize];
 493	secondOrder=new float[secondOrderSize];
 494
 495	computePropensities();
 496	reactionModelModified = false;
 497}
 498
 499void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::computePropensities()
 500{
 501	unsigned int latticeXSize = lattice->getXSize();
 502	unsigned int latticeYSize = lattice->getYSize();
 503	unsigned int latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 504    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 505    {
 506    	if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 507    	{
 508    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau/(latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize);
 509    	}
 510    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 511    	{
 512    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau;
 513    	}
 514    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 515    	{
 516    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau*latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 517    	}
 518    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 519    	{
 520    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau*latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 521    	}
 522    	else
 523    	{
 524    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[i]);
 525    	}
 526    }
 527
 528    float scale=latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 529	for(uint site=0; site<numberSiteTypes; site++)
 530	{
 531		uint o1=site*numberSpecies;
 532		uint o2=site*numberSpecies*numberSpecies;
 533
 534		zeroOrder[site]=0.0f;
 535		for (uint i=0; i<numberSpecies; i++)
 536		{
 537			firstOrder[o1 + i]=0.0f;
 538			for (uint j=0; j<numberSpecies; j++)
 539				secondOrder[o2 + i*numberSpecies + j]=0.0f;	
 540		}
 541
 542		for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 543		{
 544			if(! RL[i*numberSiteTypes + site])
 545				continue;
 546
 547			switch(reactionTypes[i])
 548			{
 549				case ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 550				{
 551					ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 552					zeroOrder[site]+=rx->k*tau/scale;
 553				}   break;
 554
 555				case FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 556				{
 557					FirstOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 558					firstOrder[o1 + rx->si]+=rx->k*tau;
 559				}   break;
 560				
 561				case SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 562				{
 563					SecondOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 564					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s1i) * numberSpecies + (rx->s2i)]=rx->k*tau*scale;
 565					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s2i) * numberSpecies + (rx->s1i)]=rx->k*tau*scale;
 566				}   break; 
 567
 568				case SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 569				{
 570					SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *rx=(SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 571					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->si) * numberSpecies + (rx->si)]+=rx->k*tau*scale*2;
 572				}
 573			}
 574		}
 575	}
 576}
 577
 578void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::copyModelsToDevice(int gpu)
 579{
 580    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes;
 581	const unsigned int latticeXSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.x;
 582	const unsigned int latticeYSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.y;
 583	const unsigned int latticeZSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.z;
 584	
 585	// the lattice{X,XY,XYZ}SizeC refer to sizes of the LOCAL lattice.
 586	// NOTE that since we have 1D diffusion only, the global X and XY sizes are the same.
 587    const unsigned int latticeXYSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize;
 588    const unsigned int latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 589
 590	// gloal_latticeXYZSizeC is the full lattice XYZ size.  
 591    const unsigned int global_latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 592    const unsigned int global_latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize*lattice->getZSize();
 593
 594    // Copy the reaction model and S matrix to constant memory on the GPU.
 595#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 596    // R matrix put in global memory
 597    //cudaMalloc(&numberReactionsG, sizeof(unsigned int));
 598    //cudaMemcpy(numberReactionsG, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 599    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 600    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 601    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG, model_reactionOrders, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 602    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionSitesG), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 603    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionSitesG, model_reactionSites, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 604    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].D1G), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 605    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].D1G, model_D1, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 606    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].D2G), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 607    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].D2G, model_D2, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 608#else
 609    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 610    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionOrdersC, model_reactionOrders, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 611    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionSitesC, model_reactionSites, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 612    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D1C, model_D1, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 613    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D2C, model_D2, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 614#endif
 615
 616#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 617	// If S matrix stored in global memory, allocate space and perform copy
 618	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].SG), numberSpecies*numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 619	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].SG, model_S, numberSpecies*numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 620#else
 621	// S matrix is in constant memory
 622    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(SC, model_S, numberSpecies*numberReactions*sizeof(int8_t)));
 623#endif
 624
 625#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 626	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].TG), DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float)));
 627	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].TG, model_T, DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
 628    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, &(threads[gpu].TG), sizeof(float*)));
 629#else
 630    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, model_T, DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float)));
 631#endif
 632
 633    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSpeciesC, &numberSpecies, sizeof(numberSpeciesC)));
 634    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSiteTypesC, &numberSiteTypes, sizeof(numberSiteTypesC)));
 635    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXSizeC, &latticeXSize, sizeof(latticeYSizeC)));
 636    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeYSizeC, &latticeYSize, sizeof(latticeYSizeC)));
 637    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeZSizeC, &latticeZSize, sizeof(latticeZSizeC)));
 638    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYSizeC, &latticeXYSize, sizeof(latticeXYSizeC)));
 639    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(latticeXYZSizeC)));
 640    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeZSizeC, &global_latticeZSize, sizeof(global_latticeZSizeC)));
 641    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeXYZSizeC, &global_latticeXYZSize, sizeof(global_latticeXYZSizeC)));
 642#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 643	// Store RL in global memory too, since I'm going to assume if S is too big, then RL is too.
 644	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].RLG), numberReactions*numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 645	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].RLG, model_RL, numberReactions*numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 646#else
 647	// RL is stored in constant memory
 648    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(RLC, model_RL, numberReactions*numberSiteTypes*sizeof(uint8_t)));
 649#endif
 650
 651#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 652    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionRatesG), numberReactions*sizeof(float));
 653    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionRatesG, model_reactionRates, numberReactions*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 654#else
 655    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionRatesC, model_reactionRates, numberReactions*sizeof(float)));
 656#endif
 657
 658	// Copy per-GPU global offsets
 659    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeXC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.x), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 660    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeYC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.y), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 661    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeZC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.z), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 662    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetXC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.x), sizeof(int)));
 663    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetYC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.y), sizeof(int)));
 664    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetZC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.z), sizeof(int)));
 665
 666    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(gpuidC, &gpu, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 667
 668	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propZeroOrder), zeroOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 669	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propZeroOrder, zeroOrder, zeroOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 670	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propFirstOrder), firstOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 671	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propFirstOrder, firstOrder, firstOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 672	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propSecondOrder), secondOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 673	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propSecondOrder, secondOrder, secondOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 674	
 675	ZDivMultiGPUMapper *zmap = (ZDivMultiGPUMapper*)mapper;
 676	gpu_info *g = zmap->getinfo(gpu);
 677	unsigned int tmp = g->overlap_send[0].z;
 678	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_send_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 679	tmp = g->overlap_dim.z;
 680	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_dim_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 681	tmp = DIMSIZE(g->overlap_dim);
 682	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_dim_size, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 683
 684	tmp = g->overlap_send[1].z;
 685	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_send_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 686	tmp = g->overlap_dim.z;
 687	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_dim_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 688	tmp = DIMSIZE(g->overlap_dim);
 689	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_dim_size, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 690
 691	tmp = g->overlap_recv[0].z;
 692	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_recv_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 693
 694	tmp = g->overlap_recv[1].z;
 695	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_recv_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 696}
 697
 698void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate)
 699{
 700	if (reactionTypes[rxid] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 701	{
 702		((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 703	}
 704	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 705	{
 706		((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 707	}
 708	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 709	{
 710		((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 711	}
 712	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 713	{
 714		((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 715	}
 716	else
 717    {
 718    	throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[rxid]);
 719    }
 720
 721	// Flag to trigger re-computation of rdme propensities
 722	reactionModelModified = true;
 723}
 724
 725void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::generateTrajectory()
 726{
 727	// Determine how to divide the lattice
 728	initialize_decomposition();
 729
 730	// Start worker threads
 731	start_threads();
 732
 733    // Shadow the lattice member as a cuda lattice.
 734    ByteLattice * lattice = (ByteLattice *)this->lattice;
 735
 736    // Get the interval for writing species counts and lattices.
 737    uint32_t speciesCountsWriteInterval=atol((*parameters)["writeInterval"].c_str());
 738    uint32_t nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime = speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 739    lm::io::SpeciesCounts speciesCountsDataSet;
 740    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 741    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_entries(0);
 742    uint32_t latticeWriteInterval=atol((*parameters)["latticeWriteInterval"].c_str());
 743    uint32_t nextLatticeWriteTime = latticeWriteInterval;
 744    lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 745
 746    // Get the simulation time limit. 
 747    double maxTime=atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str());
 748
 749    Print::printf(Print::INFO,
 750	              "Running mpd rdme simulation with %d species, %d reactions, %d site types for %e s with tau %e. Writing species at %d and lattice at %d intervals",
 751				  numberSpecies, numberReactions, numberSiteTypes,
 752				  maxTime, tau,
 753				  speciesCountsWriteInterval, latticeWriteInterval);
 754    
 755    // Set the initial time.
 756    double time = 0.0;
 757	current_timestep = 0;
 758
 759	bool hookEnabled=false;
 760    uint32_t nextHookTime=0;
 761    uint32_t hookInterval=0;
 762	//timer for record
 763	Timer timer;
 764	timer.tick();
 765	double lastT=0;
 766    int lastSteps=0;
 767	// Find out at what interval to write status messages
 768    double printPerfInterval = 60;   //in sec
 769    if((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"] != "")
 770    {
 771        printPerfInterval=atof((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"].c_str());
 772    }
 773    // Find out at what interval to hook simulations
 774	if((*parameters)["hookInterval"] != "")
 775    {
 776        hookInterval=atol((*parameters)["hookInterval"].c_str());
 777        hookEnabled=true;
 778        nextHookTime=hookInterval;
 779    }
 780
 781	// Find out at what interval to write status messages
 782    printPerfInterval = 60;
 783    if((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"] != "")
 784    {
 785        printPerfInterval=atof((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"].c_str());
 786    }
 787
 788    // Record the initial species counts.
 789    recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 790
 791    // Write the initial lattice.
 792    writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 793
 794	// Perform an initial hook check
 795    hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 796
 797    // Loop until we have finished the simulation.
 798    while (time < maxTime)
 799    {
 800		if(globalAbort)
 801		{
 802			printf("Global abort: terminating solver");
 803			break;
 804		}
 805		// compute number of steps to batch
 806		lastT += timer.tock();
 807		int nSteps = min(nextLatticeWriteTime-current_timestep,
 808			         min(nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime-current_timestep,
 809			         min(nextHookTime-current_timestep,
 810					 ((uint32_t) (ceil(maxTime/tau)-current_timestep)))));
 811
 812		if(nSteps == 0) nSteps=1;
 813		assert(nSteps > 0);
 814		//add timer here
 815		//current_timestep += nSteps;
 816		lastSteps += nSteps;
 817        if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
 818        {
 819            double stepTime = lastT/lastSteps;
 820            double completionTime = stepTime*(maxTime-time)/tau;
 821            std::string units;
 822            if (completionTime > 60*60*24*365) {
 823                units = "weeks";
 824                completionTime /= 60*60*24*365;
 825            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*30) {
 826                units = "months";
 827                completionTime /= 60*60*24*30;
 828            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*7) {
 829                units = "weeks";
 830                completionTime /= 60*60*24*7;
 831            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24) {
 832                units = "days";
 833                completionTime /= 60*60*24;
 834            } else if (completionTime > 60*60) {
 835                units = "hours";
 836                completionTime /= 60*60;
 837            } else if (completionTime > 60) {
 838                units = "minutes";
 839                completionTime /= 60;
 840            } else {
 841                units = "seconds";
 842            }
 843
 844            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
 845                                       1000.0*stepTime, time, maxTime, 100.0*time/maxTime, completionTime, units.c_str());
 846
 847            lastT = 0;
 848            lastSteps = 0;
 849        }
 850		// normal program continue
 851		timesteps_to_run = nSteps;
 852	
 853		// wake up threads
 854		pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
 855		
 856		// ... and wait.
 857		pthread_barrier_wait(&stop_barrier);
 858		
 859		if(globalAbort)
 860		{
 861			printf("Global abort: terminating solver");
 862			break;
 863		}
 864	
 865        // Advance the timestep counter
 866		current_timestep += nSteps;
 867
 868		// Update the time
 869        time = current_timestep*tau;
 870
 871		// No need to sync from gpus first; each gpu thread does a stage_out
 872		// prior to entering the stop barrier
 873		// clear the flag for if reaction model has changed
 874		reactionModelModified = false;
 875		// Also no need to check the return value of the hook as a stage in is always done
 876		// at the beginning of the timestep batch
 877
 878		// Check if we need to execute the hook
 879		if (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime)
 880        {
 881            // lattice->copyFromGPU();
 882            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Hook time is %.14f, in steps is %d", time, nextHookTime);
 883            hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 884            nextHookTime += hookInterval;
 885            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Next hook time is %d", nextHookTime);
 886        }
 887			
 888        // See if we need to write the lattice.
 889        if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime)
 890        {
 891            PROF_BEGIN(PROF_SERIALIZE_LATTICE);
 892            writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 893            nextLatticeWriteTime += latticeWriteInterval;
 894            PROF_END(PROF_SERIALIZE_LATTICE);
 895        }
 896
 897        // See if we need to write the species counts.
 898        if (current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime)
 899        {
 900            PROF_BEGIN(PROF_DETERMINE_COUNTS);
 901            recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 902            nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime += speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 903            PROF_END(PROF_DETERMINE_COUNTS);
 904
 905            // See if we have accumulated enough species counts to send.
 906            if (speciesCountsDataSet.number_entries() >= TUNE_SPECIES_COUNTS_BUFFER_SIZE)
 907            {
 908                PROF_BEGIN(PROF_SERIALIZE_COUNTS);
 909                writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 910                PROF_END(PROF_SERIALIZE_COUNTS);
 911            }
 912        }
 913    }
 914
 915    // Write any remaining species counts.
 916    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 917
 918	// take down threads
 919	timesteps_to_run=-1;
 920	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "all done, tear down");
 921	pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
 922	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "stop all threads");
 923
 924	stop_threads();
 925}
 926
 927void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeData(double time, ByteLattice * lattice, lm::io::Lattice * latticeDataSet)
 928{
 929    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Writing lattice at %e s", time);
 930
 931    // Record the lattice data.
 932    latticeDataSet->Clear();
 933    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 934    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 935    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 936    latticeDataSet->set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 937    latticeDataSet->set_time(time);
 938
 939    // Push it to the output queue.
 940    size_t payloadSize = size_t(lattice->getSize().x)*size_t(lattice->getSize().y)*size_t(lattice->getSize().z)*size_t(lattice->getMaxOccupancy())*sizeof(uint8_t);
 941    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::BYTE_LATTICE, replicate, latticeDataSet, lattice, payloadSize, &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerialize);
 942}
 943
 944void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeSites(double time, ByteLattice * lattice)
 945{
 946    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Writing lattice sites at %e s", time);
 947
 948    lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 949    // Record the lattice data.
 950    latticeDataSet.Clear();
 951    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 952    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 953    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 954    latticeDataSet.set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 955    latticeDataSet.set_time(time);
 956
 957    // Push it to the output queue.
 958    size_t payloadSize = lattice->getSize().x*lattice->getSize().y*lattice->getSize().z*sizeof(uint8_t);
 959    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SITE_LATTICE,
 960	                                                      replicate,
 961														  &latticeDataSet,
 962														  lattice,
 963														  payloadSize,
 964														  &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerializeSites);
 965}
 966
 967void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::recordSpeciesCounts(double time, ByteLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 968{
 969    std::map<particle_t,uint> particleCounts = lattice->getParticleCounts();
 970
 971    speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries()+1);
 972    speciesCountsDataSet->add_time(time);
 973
 974    for (particle_t p=0; p<numberSpeciesToTrack; p++)
 975    {
 976        speciesCountsDataSet->add_species_count((particleCounts.count(p+1)>0)?particleCounts[p+1]:0);
 977    }
 978}
 979
 980void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
 981{
 982    if (speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries() > 0)
 983    {
 984        // Push it to the output queue.
 985        lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SPECIES_COUNTS, replicate, speciesCountsDataSet);
 986
 987        // Reset the data set.
 988        speciesCountsDataSet->Clear();
 989        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 990        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(0);
 991    }
 992}
 993
 994void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::hookCheckSimulation(double time, ByteLattice * lattice)
 995{
 996	switch(hookSimulation(time, lattice))
 997    {
 998        case 0:
 999            break;
1000
1001        case 1:
1002            // lattice->copyToGPU();
1003            break;
1004
1005        case 2:
1006            // lattice->copyToGPU();
1007            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
1008            break;
1009
1010        case 3:
1011            printf("hook return value is 3, force to stop.\n");
1012			writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
1013            return;
1014
1015        default:
1016            throw("Unknown hook return value");
1017    }
1018
1019	if(reactionModelModified)
1020		computePropensities();
1021}
1022
1023uint64_t MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep)
1024{
1025    uint64_t timestepHash = (((((uint64_t)seed)<<30)+timestep)<<2)+substep;
1026    timestepHash = timestepHash * 3202034522624059733ULL + 4354685564936845319ULL;
1027    timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 20; timestepHash ^= timestepHash << 41; timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 5;
1028    timestepHash *= 7664345821815920749ULL;
1029    return timestepHash;
1030}
1031
1032int MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::run_next_timestep(int gpu, uint32_t timestep)
1033{
1034    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1035
1036	int z_start = 0;
1037	unsigned int *dlat        = threads[gpu].dLattice;
1038	unsigned int *dtmp        = threads[gpu].dLatticeTmp;
1039	uint8_t      *sites       = threads[gpu].dSites;
1040	cudaStream_t cudaStream   = threads[gpu].stream1;
1041	unsigned int *d_overflows = threads[gpu].d_overflows;
1042	
1043    dim3 gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_x;
1044	dim3 threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_x;
1045
1046	ZDivMultiGPUMapper* zmap = (ZDivMultiGPUMapper*)mapper;
1047
1048    // Execute the kernel for the x direction.
1049    PROF_CUDA_START(cudaStream);
1050
1051	if (aggcopy_x_unpack)
1052	{
1053		unsigned int* rbuf_top = zmap->getrbuf(gpu, timestep, 0);
1054		unsigned int* rbuf_bot = zmap->getrbuf(gpu, timestep, 1);
1055
1056		PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1057		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1058			mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_x_kernel_unpack<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1059			(dlat, sites, dtmp, z_start,
1060			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 0),
1061			 d_overflows,
1062			 rbuf_top, rbuf_bot)
1063		));
1064		PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1065	}
1066	else
1067	{
1068		mapper->schedule_recv(gpu, dlat, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1069		mapper->schedule_recv(gpu, dlat, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1070
1071		PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1072		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1073			mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_x_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1074			(dlat, sites, dtmp, z_start,
1075			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 0),
1076			 d_overflows)
1077		));
1078		PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1079	}
1080
1081    gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_y;
1082	threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_y;
1083
1084    // Execute the kernel for the y direction.
1085    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1086    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1087		mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_y_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1088		(dtmp, sites, dlat,
1089	     getTimestepSeed(timestep, 1),
1090		 d_overflows)
1091	));
1092    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1093
1094    gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_z;
1095	threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_z;
1096
1097    // Execute the kernel for the z direction.
1098    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1099    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1100		mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_z_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1101		(dlat, sites, dtmp,
1102		 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 2),
1103		 d_overflows,
1104		 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z)
1105	));
1106    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1107
1108    if (numberReactions > 0)
1109    {
1110		gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_r;
1111		threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_r;
1112
1113        // Execute the kernel for the reaction.
1114		// This kernel updates the lattice in-place, so only the src pointer is passed.
1115        PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_REACTION, cudaStream);
1116
1117		unsigned int* buf_top = zmap->gettbuf(gpu, timestep, 0);
1118		unsigned int* buf_bot = zmap->gettbuf(gpu, timestep, 1);
1119
1120	#ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
1121		if (aggcopy_r_pack)
1122		{
1123			CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1124				mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1125				(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1126				 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1127				 d_overflows,
1128				 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1129	            #ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1130				 threads[gpu].SG,
1131				 threads[gpu].RLG,
1132				#endif
1133				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1134				 threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1135				 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1136				 threads[gpu].D1G,
1137				 threads[gpu].D2G,
1138				 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG,
1139				#endif
1140				 threads[gpu].propZeroOrder,
1141				 threads[gpu].propFirstOrder,
1142				 threads[gpu].propSecondOrder,
1143				 buf_top, buf_bot)
1144			));
1145		}
1146		else
1147		{
1148			CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1149				mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1150				(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1151				 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1152				 d_overflows,
1153				 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1154				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1155				 threads[gpu].SG,
1156				 threads[gpu].RLG,
1157				#endif
1158				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1159				 threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1160				 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1161				 threads[gpu].D1G,
1162				 threads[gpu].D2G,
1163				 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG,
1164				#endif
1165				 threads[gpu].propZeroOrder,
1166				 threads[gpu].propFirstOrder,
1167				 threads[gpu].propSecondOrder)
1168			));
1169		}
1170	#else
1171    	CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1172			mgpumpdrdme_dev::MGPU_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1173			(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1174			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1175			 d_overflows,
1176			 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1177			#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1178			 threads[gpu].SG,
1179			 threads[gpu].RLG,
1180			#endif
1181			#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1182             threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1183			 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1184			 threads[gpu].D1G,
1185			 threads[gpu].D2G,
1186			 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG
1187        	#endif
1188		)));
1189	#endif
1190
1191        PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_REACTION, cudaStream);
1192    }
1193
1194    if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1195		mgpumpdrdme_dev::correct_overflows_mgpu<<<dim3(1,1,1),
1196	                                              dim3(TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS,1,1),
1197												  0, cudaStream>>>(dtmp, d_overflows);
1198
1199	// send data
1200	if (aggcopy_r_pack && numberReactions > 0)
1201	{
1202		zmap->send_tbuf(gpu, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1203		zmap->send_tbuf(gpu, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1204	}
1205	else
1206	{
1207		mapper->schedule_send(gpu, dtmp, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1208		mapper->schedule_send(gpu, dtmp, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1209	}
1210	
1211    // Wait for the kernels to complete.
1212    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1213    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamSynchronize(cudaStream));
1214    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1215
1216    if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1217	{
1218		uint unresolved = ((unsigned int*)d_overflows)[0];
1219		if (unresolved > 0)
1220		{
1221            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "[gpu %d] %d unresolved overflows", gpu, unresolved);
1222		}
1223	}
1224
1225	// Save correct pointers for current data
1226	threads[gpu].dLattice    = dtmp;
1227	threads[gpu].dLatticeTmp = dlat;
1228
1229	if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC)
1230	{
1231	#ifndef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
1232		cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].h_overflows, d_overflows, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost);
1233	#endif
1234
1235    	PROF_END(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1236		return threads[gpu].h_overflows[0];
1237	}
1238	
1239	// relaxed overflow mode
1240	return 0;
1241}
1242
1243
1244int MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::handle_overflows(int gpu, void *hptr, void *dptr, int ts)
1245{
1246	// Copy data back from GPUs
1247	mapper->stage_out(gpu, hptr, dptr);
1248	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob1.",gpu);
1249	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier1);
1250
1251	// Resolve overflows
1252	if(gpu == 0)
1253	{
1254		handle_all_overflows();
1255		mclkr_total_overflows = 0;
1256		mclkr_overflow_counter = 0;
1257	}
1258	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob2.",gpu);
1259	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier2);
1260
1261	// Return to GPU
1262	mapper->stage_in(gpu, dptr, hptr);
1263	mapper->publish_state(gpu, dptr, ts);
1264	cudaMemsetAsync(threads[gpu].d_overflows, 0, sizeof(unsigned int));
1265	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob3.",gpu);
1266	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier1);
1267
1268
1269	return 0;
1270}
1271
1272int MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::handle_all_overflows()
1273{
1274    // Handle any particle overflows.
1275    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1276
1277    overflowTimesteps++;
1278    uint32_t overflowList[1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1279    uint numberExceptions = 0;
1280
1281	// LOOP OVER EACH GPU
1282	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
1283	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
1284	{
1285		uint* gpulist=threads[i].h_overflows;
1286		ssize_t min_index = mapper->get_authority_offset(i);
1287		ssize_t max_index = DIMSIZE(mapper->get_global_dim(i))+min_index;
1288		//printf("gpu %d: min %d max %d\n", i, min_index, max_index);
1289
1290		for(int e=0; e<gpulist[0]; e++)
1291		{
1292			// DECODE INDEX
1293            size_t latticeIndex = gpulist[e*2 + 1];
1294            particle_t particle = gpulist[e*2 + 2];
1295			
1296			ssize_t globalIndex = latticeIndex + mapper->get_global_input_offset(i);
1297			//printf("Overflow of particle type %d at local index %d on gpu %d ==> index %d\n", particle, latticeIndex, i, globalIndex);
1298			if(latticeIndex < min_index || latticeIndex > max_index)
1299				continue;
1300
1301			// FILL list
1302            overflowList[(numberExceptions*2)+1] = globalIndex;
1303			overflowList[(numberExceptions*2)+2] = particle;
1304			numberExceptions++;
1305		}
1306	}
1307
1308    if (numberExceptions > 0)
1309    {
1310        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "%d overflows", numberExceptions);
1311        
1312        // Make sure we did not exceed the overflow buffer.
1313        if (numberExceptions > TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS)
1314            throw Exception("Too many particle overflows for the available buffer", numberExceptions);
1315            
1316        // Go through each exception.
1317        for (uint i=0; i<numberExceptions; i++)
1318        {
1319            // Extract the index and particle type.
1320            lattice_size_t latticeIndex = overflowList[(i*2)+1];
1321            particle_t particle = overflowList[(i*2)+2];
1322            
1323            // Get the x, y, and z coordiantes.
1324            lattice_size_t x = latticeIndex%lattice->getXSize();
1325            lattice_size_t y = (latticeIndex/lattice->getXSize())%lattice->getYSize();
1326            lattice_size_t z = latticeIndex/(lattice->getXSize()*lattice->getYSize());
1327            
1328            // Put the particles back into a nearby lattice site.
1329            bool replacedParticle = false;
1330            for (uint searchRadius=0; !replacedParticle && searchRadius <= TUNE_MPD_MAX_OVERFLOW_REPLACEMENT_DIST; searchRadius++)
1331            {
1332                // Get the nearby sites.
1333                std::vector<lattice_coord_t> sites = lattice->getNearbySites(x,y,z,(searchRadius>0)?searchRadius-1:0,searchRadius);
1334                
1335                // TODO: Shuffle the sites.
1336                
1337                // Try to find one that in not fully occupied and of the same type.
1338                for (std::vector<lattice_coord_t>::iterator it=sites.begin(); it<sites.end(); it++)
1339                {
1340                    lattice_coord_t site = *it;
1341                    if (lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z) < lattice->getMaxOccupancy() && lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z) == lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z))
1342                    {
1343                        lattice->addParticle(site.x, site.y, site.z, particle);
1344                        replacedParticle = true;
1345                        Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG, "Handled overflow of particle %d at site %d,%d,%d type=%d occ=%d by placing at site %d,%d,%d type=%d newocc=%d dist=%0.2f", particle, x, y, z, lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z), lattice->getOccupancy(x,y,z), site.x, site.y, site.z, lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z), lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z), sqrt(pow((double)x-(double)site.x,2.0)+pow((double)y-(double)site.y,2.0)+pow((double)z-(double)site.z,2.0)));
1346                        break;
1347                    }
1348                }
1349            }
1350            
1351            // If we were not able to fix the exception, throw an error.
1352            if (!replacedParticle)
1353                throw Exception("Unable to find an available site to handle a particle overflow.");
1354        }
1355        
1356        // Track that we used the overflow list.
1357        overflowListUses++;
1358    }
1359    
1360    // If the overflow lsit is being used too often, print a warning.
1361    if (overflowTimesteps >= 1000)
1362    {
1363        if (overflowListUses > 10)
1364            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "%d uses of the particle overflow list in the last 1000 timesteps, performance may be degraded.", overflowListUses);
1365        overflowTimesteps = 0;
1366        overflowListUses = 0;
1367    }
1368    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1369
1370	return 0;
1371}
1372
1373void* MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::run_thread(int gpu)
1374{
1375	mapper->numa_bind_thread(gpu);
1376	mapper->initialize_gpu(gpu);
1377	pthread_barrier_wait(&simulation_barrier);
1378	mapper->set_affinity(gpu);
1379	
1380	gpu_worker_thread_params *p = &threads[gpu];
1381
1382	// allocate device memory for lattice stuctures
1383	cudaMalloc(&p->dLattice,    mapper->get_local_size(gpu)*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE);
1384	cudaMalloc(&p->dLatticeTmp, mapper->get_local_size(gpu)*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE);
1385	cudaMalloc(&p->dSites,      DIMSIZE(mapper->get_local_dim(gpu)));
1386
1387	// allocate device and host space for overflow lists
1388	if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC)
1389	{
1390	#ifdef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
1391	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaHostAlloc(&p->h_overflows,
1392		                                   MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE,
1393										   cudaHostAllocPortable|cudaHostAllocMapped));
1394		p->d_overflows = p->h_overflows;
1395	#else
1396	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaHostAlloc(&p->h_overflows,
1397		                                   MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE,
1398										   cudaHostAllocPortable));
1399	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&p->d_overflows,
1400		                                MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1401		cudaMemsetAsync(p->d_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1402	#endif
1403
1404		memset(p->h_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1405	}
1406	else
1407	{
1408		p->h_overflows = NULL;
1409	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&p->d_overflows,
1410		                                MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1411		cudaMemsetAsync(p->d_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1412	}
1413
1414    // Create data exchange streams and events
1415    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamCreate(&p->stream1));
1416
1417#ifdef PROF_USE_CUEVENT
1418    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->x_finish));
1419    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->diffusion_finished));
1420    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->rx_finish));
1421#else
1422    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->x_finish,
1423	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1424    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->diffusion_finished,
1425	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1426    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->rx_finish,
1427	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1428#endif
1429
1430	dim3 ldim = mapper->get_local_dim(gpu);
1431	dim3 gdim = mapper->get_global_dim(gpu);
1432
1433	// calculate launch params
1434    calculateXLaunchParameters(&(p->grid_x), &p->threads_x,
1435	                           TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,
1436							   ldim.x, ldim.y, ldim.z);
1437    calculateYLaunchParameters(&p->grid_y, &p->threads_y,
1438	                           TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,
1439							   ldim.x, ldim.y, ldim.z);
1440    calculateZLaunchParameters(&p->grid_z, &p->threads_z,
1441	                           TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,
1442							   ldim.x, ldim.y, gdim.z);
1443	calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&p->grid_r, &p->threads_r,
1444	                                  TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,
1445									  ldim.x, ldim.y, gdim.z);
1446
1447	// Now here, do not copy model every time
1448	copyModelsToDevice(gpu);
1449
1450	// Copy the initialized data into GPU memory
1451	mapper->stage_in(gpu, p->dLattice, ((ByteLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory());
1452	mapper->stage_in_sites(gpu, p->dSites, ((ByteLattice*) lattice)->getSitesMemory());
1453	mapper->publish_state(gpu, p->dLattice, current_timestep+1);
1454	
1455	Timer timer;
1456    double lastT = 0;
1457    int lastSteps = 0;
1458	size_t maxTS = atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str()) / tau;
1459	if (gpu == 0)
1460		timer.tick();
1461
1462	do
1463	{
1464		// wait for master wakeup
1465		pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
1466
1467		int steps = timesteps_to_run;
1468		if (steps < 0)
1469			break;
1470
1471		// Don't copy models in on every step set
1472		// This was to accomodate changing lattice dims from lb changes
1473		// Unless the reaction model has changed
1474		if (reactionModelModified) 
1475		{
1476			copyModelsToDevice(gpu);
1477		}
1478
1479		for (int ts = 0; ts < steps; ts++)
1480		{
1481			if (gpu == 0)
1482			{
1483				lastT += timer.tock();
1484				lastSteps += 1;
1485
1486				if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
1487				{
1488					double stepTime = lastT / lastSteps;
1489					double completionTime = stepTime * (maxTS - current_timestep - ts);
1490					std::string units;
1491					if (completionTime > 60*60*24*365)
1492					{
1493						units = "weeks";
1494						completionTime /= 60*60*24*365;
1495					}
1496					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*30)
1497					{
1498						units = "months";
1499						completionTime /= 60*60*24*30;
1500					}
1501					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*7)
1502					{
1503						units = "weeks";
1504						completionTime /= 60*60*24*7;
1505					}
1506					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24)
1507					{
1508						units = "days";
1509						completionTime /= 60*60*24;
1510					}
1511					else if (completionTime > 60*60)
1512					{
1513						units = "hours";
1514						completionTime /= 60*60;
1515					}
1516					else if (completionTime > 60)
1517					{
1518						units = "minutes";
1519						completionTime /= 60;
1520					}
1521					else
1522					{
1523						units = "seconds";
1524					}
1525
1526					Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
1527								  1000.0*stepTime, (ts+current_timestep)*tau, maxTS*tau, 100.0*(ts+current_timestep)/maxTS, completionTime, units.c_str());
1528
1529					lastT = 0;
1530					lastSteps = 0;
1531				}
1532
1533				timer.tick();
1534			}
1535
1536			int overflows = run_next_timestep(gpu, ts + current_timestep);
1537
1538			switch (overflow_handling)
1539			{
1540				case OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC:
1541					if (use_spin_barrier)
1542						mclkr_barrier_spin(overflows);
1543					else
1544						mclkr_barrier_cond(overflows);
1545
1546					if (mclkr_total_overflows > 0)
1547					{
1548						Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "[GPU Thread %d] encountered %d overflows", gpu, overflows);
1549						handle_overflows(gpu, ((ByteLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory(),
1550						                 p->dLattice, ts + current_timestep);
1551					}
1552					break;
1553
1554				case OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED:
1555					// All overflows are handled by the gpu. No need to communicate.
1556					pthread_barrier_wait(&simulation_barrier);
1557					break;
1558
1559				default:
1560					throw("Unimplemented overflow handler");
1561			}
1562		}
1563
1564		mapper->stage_out(gpu, ((ByteLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory(), p->dLattice);
1565		pthread_barrier_wait(&stop_barrier);
1566
1567	} while(true);
1568
1569	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] leaving.",gpu);
1570
1571	return NULL;
1572}
1573
1574int MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::hookSimulation(double time, ByteLattice *lattice)
1575{
1576	return 0;
1577}
1578
1579void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1580                                                   dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1581												   const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
1582												   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1583												   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1584												   const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1585{
1586    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize, latticeXSize);
1587    unsigned int gridXSize   = latticeXSize / xBlockXSize;
1588	
1589    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1590	{
1591		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1592		unsigned int tryx=32;
1593		while (tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1594		{
1595			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1596				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1597			tryx += 32;
1598		}
1599		gridXSize = latticeXSize / xBlockXSize;
1600	}
1601			
1602    (*gridSize).x = gridXSize;
1603    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1604    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1605    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1606    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1607    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1608}
1609
1610void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1611                                                   dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1612												   const unsigned int blockXSize,
1613												   const unsigned int blockYSize,
1614												   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1615												   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1616												   const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1617{
1618    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1619    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1620    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1621    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1622    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1623    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1624}
1625
1626void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1627                                                   dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1628												   const unsigned int blockXSize,
1629												   const unsigned int blockZSize,
1630												   const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1631												   const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1632												   const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1633{
1634    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1635    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1636    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1637    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1638    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1639    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1640}
1641
1642void MGPUMpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1643                                                          dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1644														  const unsigned int blockXSize,
1645														  const unsigned int blockYSize,
1646														  const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1647														  const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1648														  const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1649{
1650    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1651    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1652    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1653    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1654    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1655    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1656}
1657
1658namespace mgpumpdrdme_dev {
1659/**
1660 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1661 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1662 */
1663__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1664{
1665	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1666	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
1667	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1668	
1669    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1670    const unsigned int latticeXIndex = x;
1671	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1672	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1673	const unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1674
1675    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1676    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1677    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1678
1679    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
1680    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1681    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
1682
1683    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1684    copyXWindowFromLattice(blockIdx.x, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1685    copyXWindowFromSites(blockIdx.x, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1686    __syncthreads();
1687
1688    ////////////////////////////////////////
1689    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1690    ////////////////////////////////////////
1691
1692    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1693
1694    // Make the choices.
1695    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
1696	__syncthreads();
1697
1698    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1699    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1700    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1701
1702    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1703    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1704}
1705
1706
1707/**
1708 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1709 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1710 */
1711__global__ void MGPU_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1712{
1713
1714	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1715	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
1716	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z;
1717
1718    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1719    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (blockIdx.y*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1720    unsigned int windowYIndex = threadIdx.y+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1721    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowYIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1722
1723	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1724	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1725
1726    ///////////////////////////////////////////
