1727    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1728    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1729
1730    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1731    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1732    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE];
1733
1734    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1735    copyYWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1736    copyYWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1737    __syncthreads();
1738
1739    ////////////////////////////////////////
1740    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1741    ////////////////////////////////////////
1742
1743    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1744
1745    // Make the choices.
1746    makeYDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex, timestepHash);
1747	__syncthreads();
1748
1749    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1750    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1751    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1752
1753    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1754    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1755}
1756
1757/**
1758 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1759 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1760 */
1761__global__ void MGPU_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start)
1762{
1763	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1764	const unsigned int y = blockIdx.y;
1765	const unsigned int z = (blockDim.z * blockIdx.z) + threadIdx.z + z_start;
1766
1767    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1768	int global_z = z + goffsetZC;
1769    unsigned int windowZIndex = threadIdx.z+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1770    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowZIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1771
1772	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1773	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1774
1775    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1776    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1777    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1778
1779    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1780    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1781    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE];
1782
1783    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1784    copyZWindowFromLattice_MGPU(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1785    copyZWindowFromSites_MGPU(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1786    __syncthreads();
1787
1788    ////////////////////////////////////////
1789    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1790    ////////////////////////////////////////
1791
1792    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1793
1794    // Make the choices.
1795    makeZDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex, timestepHash);
1796	__syncthreads();
1797
1798    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1799    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1800    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1801
1802    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1803    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1804}
1805
1806/**
1807 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1808 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1809 */
1810#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1811#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1812__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1813#else
1814__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1815#endif
1816#else
1817__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start)
1818#endif
1819{
1820	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
1821	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
1822	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1823
1824    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1825    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1826    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1827
1828    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1829    // Load the particles and site.          //
1830    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1831
1832    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1833    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1834        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1835    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1836
1837    ////////////////////////////////////////
1838    // Perform the reactions.             //
1839    ////////////////////////////////////////
1840
1841    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1842    float totalReactionPropensity = 0.0f;
1843    for (int i=0; i<numberReactionsC; i++)
1844    {
1845#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1846#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1847        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1848#else
1849        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i, RLG);
1850#endif
1851#else
1852        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, i);
1853#endif
1854    }
1855
1856
1857    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1858    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1859    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1860
1861    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1862    if (reactionOccurred)
1863    {
1864        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1865#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1866#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1867        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1868#else
1869        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1870#endif
1871#else
1872        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1873#endif
1874
1875        // Construct the new site.
1876#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1877        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1878#else
1879        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1880#endif
1881
1882        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1883        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1884             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1885    }
1886}
1887
1888#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1889#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1890__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1891#else
1892__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1893#endif
1894#else
1895__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1896#endif
1897{
1898	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
1899	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
1900	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1901
1902    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1903    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1904    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1905
1906    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1907    // Load the particles and site.          //
1908    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1909
1910    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1911    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1912        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1913    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1914
1915    ////////////////////////////////////////
1916    // Perform the reactions.             //
1917    ////////////////////////////////////////
1918
1919    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1920    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
1921    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
1922	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
1923	{
1924		uint8_t p1=((uint8_t*)particles)[i];
1925		if(p1 > 0)
1926		{
1927			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
1928			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
1929			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
1930			{
1931				uint8_t p2=((uint8_t*)particles)[j];
1932				if(p2 > 0)
1933				{
1934					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
1935					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
1936				}
1937			}
1938		}
1939	}
1940
1941
1942	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1943	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1944		return;
1945
1946    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1947    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1948    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1949
1950    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1951    if (reactionOccurred)
1952    {
1953        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1954#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1955#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1956        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1957#else
1958        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1959#endif
1960#else
1961        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1962#endif
1963
1964        // Construct the new site.
1965#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1966        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1967#else
1968        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1969#endif
1970
1971        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1972        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1973             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1974    }
1975}
1976
1977__global__ void correct_overflows_mgpu(unsigned int* lattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1978{
1979	// Remember: #define MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE       1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS*sizeof(uint32_t)
1980	// Requirement: one block with TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS threads
1981	
1982	const unsigned int i = threadIdx.x;
1983	const unsigned int total = siteOverflowList[0];
1984
1985	__shared__ unsigned int indexes[TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1986	__shared__ unsigned int maxround;
1987
1988	// Do I have an overflow to look at?
1989	if(i >= total)
1990		return;
1991
1992	// Abort if overflows have overflown
1993	if(threadIdx.x == 0) assert(total < TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS);
1994
1995	// load our index
1996	lattice_size_t latticeIndex = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+1];
1997	particle_t particle = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+2];
1998
1999	indexes[i] = latticeIndex;
2000
2001	// zero out list
2002	maxround=0;
2003	__syncthreads();
2004	siteOverflowList[0]=0;
2005
2006	// Discover which round I should go in.  To prevent situations where two threads
2007	// will try and add a particle to the same site at the same time, and thus
2008	// negating the others, each thread determines what round it is allowed to make
2009	// edits in, by determining how many previous overflows are occuring at the 
2010	// same index.
2011	int round=0;
2012	for(int j=0; j < i; j++)
2013	{
2014		if(indexes[j] == latticeIndex)
2015			round++;
2016	}
2017	atomicMax(&maxround, round);
2018	__syncthreads();
2019
2020	for(int r=0; r <= maxround; r++)
2021	{
2022		if(round == r)
2023		{
2024			unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2025			for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2026				particles[w] = lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
2027			
2028			uint8_t *p=(uint8_t*)particles;
2029			int ok=0;
2030			for(int pi=0; pi<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; pi++)
2031			{
2032				if(p[pi] == 0)
2033				{
2034					p[pi]=particle;
2035					ok=1;
2036					//printf("(round %d) Corrected overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
2037					break;
2038				}
2039			}
2040
2041			if(ok)
2042			{
2043				// Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
2044				for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2045				     lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
2046			}
2047			else
2048			{
2049				int exceptionIndex = atomicAdd(siteOverflowList, 1);
2050				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+1]=latticeIndex;
2051				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+2]=particle;
2052				//printf("(round %d) Failed to correct overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
2053			}
2054		}
2055		__syncthreads();
2056	}
2057
2058	//if(i  == 0)
2059		//printf("%d) in: %d overflows, out: %d\n", gpuidC, total, siteOverflowList[0]);
2060
2061}
2062
2063#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2064#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
2065__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2066#else
2067__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2068#endif
2069#else
2070__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start,  const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2071#endif
2072{
2073	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2074	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
2075	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
2076
2077    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
2078    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
2079    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
2080
2081    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2082    // Load the particles and site.          //
2083    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2084
2085    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2086    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2087        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
2088    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
2089
2090    ////////////////////////////////////////
2091    // Perform the reactions.             //
2092    ////////////////////////////////////////
2093
2094    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
2095    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
2096    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
2097	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
2098	{
2099		uint8_t p1=((uint8_t*)particles)[i];
2100		if(p1 > 0)
2101		{
2102			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
2103			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
2104			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
2105			{
2106				uint8_t p2=((uint8_t*)particles)[j];
2107				if(p2 > 0)
2108				{
2109					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
2110					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
2111				}
2112			}
2113		}
2114	}
2115
2116	float reactionProbability;
2117	unsigned int reactionOccurred;
2118
2119	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
2120	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
2121		goto letspackitup;
2122
2123    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
2124    reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
2125    reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
2126
2127    // If there was a reaction, process it.
2128    if (reactionOccurred)
2129    {
2130        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
2131#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2132#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
2133        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
2134#else
2135        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
2136#endif
2137#else
2138        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
2139#endif
2140
2141        // Construct the new site.
2142#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2143        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
2144#else
2145        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint8_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
2146#endif
2147
2148        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
2149        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2150             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
2151    }
2152
2153letspackitup:
2154
2155	bool in_top_send = (z < (top_send_z + top_dim_z));
2156	bool in_bot_send = (z >= bot_send_z);
2157
2158/*
2159	if(x == 0 && y == 0 && in_top_send)
2160		printf("%d, %d, %d in top send send z =%d, dim z = %d, sz=%d\n", x, y, z, top_send_z, top_dim_z, top_dim_size);
2161	if(x == 0 && y == 0 && in_bot_send)
2162		printf("%d, %d, %d in bot send send z =%d, dim z = %d, sz=%d\n", x, y, z, bot_send_z, bot_dim_z, bot_dim_size);
2163*/
2164
2165	if(in_top_send && buf_top != NULL)
2166	{
2167		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-top_send_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2168        for (uint w=0, packOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, packOffset+=top_dim_size)
2169             buf_top[packidx+packOffset] = particles[w];
2170	}
2171
2172	if(in_bot_send && buf_bot != NULL)
2173	{
2174		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-bot_send_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2175        for (uint w=0, packOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, packOffset+=bot_dim_size)
2176             buf_bot[packidx+packOffset] = particles[w];
2177	}
2178}
2179
2180__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel_unpack(const unsigned int* inLattice,
2181                                     const uint8_t * inSites,
2182									 unsigned int* outLattice,
2183									 const unsigned int z_start,
2184									 const unsigned long long timestepHash,
2185									 unsigned int* siteOverflowList,
2186									 unsigned int* buf_top,
2187									 unsigned int *buf_bot)
2188{
2189	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
2190	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
2191	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
2192	
2193    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
2194    const unsigned int latticeXIndex = x;
2195	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
2196	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
2197	const unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
2198
2199	// Check if I need to read from buffer and not lattice
2200	bool in_top_recv = (z < (top_recv_z + top_dim_z));
2201	bool in_bot_recv = (z >= bot_recv_z);
2202
2203    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2204    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
2205    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2206
2207    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
2208    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2209    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
2210
2211	if(in_top_recv && buf_top != NULL)
2212	{
2213		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-top_recv_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2214		copyXWindowFromBuffer(blockIdx.x, buf_top, window, packidx, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, top_dim_size);
2215	}
2216	else if(in_bot_recv && buf_bot != NULL)
2217	{
2218		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-bot_recv_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2219		copyXWindowFromBuffer(blockIdx.x, buf_bot, window, packidx, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, bot_dim_size);
2220	}
2221	else
2222	{
2223		// Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
2224		copyXWindowFromLattice(blockIdx.x, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
2225	}
2226
2227    copyXWindowFromSites(blockIdx.x, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
2228    __syncthreads();
2229
2230    ////////////////////////////////////////
2231    // Make the choice for each particle. //
2232    ////////////////////////////////////////
2233
2234    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2235
2236    // Make the choices.
2237    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
2238	__syncthreads();
2239
2240    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2241    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
2242    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2243
2244    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
2245    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
2246}
2247
2248// For periodic lattices with a potentially negative offset
2249__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2250{
2251    ssize_t ix=(int)x+goffsetXC;
2252    ix += ((int)y+goffsetYC)*(int)latticeXSizeC;
2253    ix += ((int)z+goffsetZC)*(int)latticeXYSizeC;
2254    size_t max_index = global_latticeXYZSizeC;
2255    if(ix < 0)
2256        return ix+max_index;
2257    else if(ix >= max_index)
2258        return ix-max_index;
2259    else
2260        return ix;
2261}
2262/*
2263// For non-periodic lattices with a strictly positive offset
2264__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2265{
2266    size_t ix=x+goffsetXC;
2267    ix += (y+goffsetYC)*latticeXSizeC;
2268    ix += (z+goffsetZC)*latticeXYSizeC;
2269	return ix;
2270}
2271*/
2272
2273__device__ inline size_t local_index(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2274{
2275	return x + y*latticeXSizeC + z*latticeXYSizeC;
2276}
2277
2278}
2279}
2280}

MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver.h#

 45#ifndef LM_RDME_MGPUINTMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 46#define LM_RDME_MGPUINTMPDRDMESOLVER_H_
 47
 48#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
 49#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
 50#include "rdme/RDMESolver.h"
 51#include "rdme/CudaIntLattice.h"
 52#include "rdme/GPUMapper/MultiGPUMapper.h"
 53#include "rdme/GPUMapper/SegmentDescriptor.h"
 54
 55#if defined(MACOSX)
 56#include "GPUMapper/osx_barrier.h"
 57#endif
 58
 59#define OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC 0
 60#define OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED 1
 61
 62using lm::main::ResourceAllocator;
 63using lm::rdme::RDMESolver;
 64using lm::rdme::Lattice;
 65
 66namespace lm {
 67
 68namespace io{
 69class Lattice;
 70class SpeciesCounts;
 71}
 72namespace rdme {
 73
 74struct gpu_worker_thread_int_params;
 75
 76class MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver : public RDMESolver
 77{
 78    using CMESolver::hookSimulation;
 79    using RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel;
 80
 81public:
 82    MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver();
 83    virtual ~MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver();
 84    virtual void initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resources);
 85    virtual bool needsReactionModel() {return true;}
 86    virtual bool needsDiffusionModel()  {return true;}
 87    virtual void buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA, const uint numberReactionsA, const uint * initialSpeciesCountsA, const uint * reactionTypeA, const double * kA, const int * SA, const uint * DA, const uint kCols=1);
 88    virtual void buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA, const double * DFA, const uint * RLA, lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing, const uint8_t * latticeData, const uint8_t * latticeSitesData, bool rowMajorData=true);
 89    virtual void generateTrajectory();
 90	virtual void setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate);
 91
 92protected:
 93    virtual void allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize, lattice_size_t latticeYSize, lattice_size_t latticeZSize, site_size_t particlesPerSite, const unsigned int bytes_per_particle, si_dist_t latticeSpacing);
 94    virtual void writeLatticeData(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice, lm::io::Lattice * latticeDataSet);
 95    virtual void writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice);
 96    virtual void recordSpeciesCounts(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet);
 97    virtual void writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet);
 98	virtual void hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice);
 99    virtual int run_next_timestep(int gpu, uint32_t timestep);
100    virtual uint64_t getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep);
101    virtual void setLatticeData(const uint8_t* latticeData);
102    
103    virtual void copyModelsToDevice(int gpu);
104	virtual void initialize_decomposition();
105	virtual void start_threads();
106	virtual void stop_threads();
107	virtual void computePropensities();
108
109	// declare the child thread entry point as a friend function
110	// so that it may call the run_thread method
111	friend void* gpu_worker_thread_int(void *arg);
112	virtual void* run_thread(int);
113	virtual int handle_all_overflows();
114	virtual int handle_overflows(int gpu, void *hptr, void *dptr, int ts);
115	virtual int hookSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice *lattice);
116
117    virtual void calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int maxXBlockSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
118    virtual void calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
119    virtual void calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockZSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
120    virtual void calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize, dim3 * threadBlockSize, const unsigned int blockXSize, const unsigned int blockYSize, const unsigned int latticeXSize, const unsigned int latticeYSize, const unsigned int latticeZSize);
121
122protected:
123    uint32_t seed;
124    double tau;
125
126    uint32_t overflowTimesteps;
127    uint32_t overflowListUses;
128    int      overflow_handling;
129
130	// Stored model parameters for const memory
131	unsigned int* model_reactionOrders;
132	unsigned int* model_reactionSites;
133	float*        model_reactionRates;
134
135	unsigned int* model_D1;
136	unsigned int* model_D2;
137
138	int8_t*  model_S;
139	float*   model_T;
140	uint8_t* model_RL;
141
142	size_t zeroOrderSize, firstOrderSize, secondOrderSize;
143	float *zeroOrder, *firstOrder, *secondOrder;
144
145	pthread_barrier_t start_barrier, stop_barrier, simulation_barrier;
146	pthread_barrier_t overflow_barrier1, overflow_barrier2;
147	MultiGPUMapper *mapper;
148	ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources *resources;
149	gpu_worker_thread_int_params *threads;
150
151	int timesteps_to_run;
152	uint32_t current_timestep;
153	bool reactionModelModified;
154	double printPerfInterval;
155	
156	bool aggcopy_x_unpack;
157	bool aggcopy_r_pack;
158	bool use_spin_barrier;
159};
160
161struct gpu_worker_thread_int_params
162{
163    pthread_t thread;
164    //MultiCUDALattice *lattice;
165    MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver *runner;
166    MultiGPUMapper *mapper;
167    int gpu;
168    int ngpus;
169    pthread_barrier_t *runner_sync;
170    pthread_barrier_t *worker_sync;
171    int timesteps_to_run;
172    bool lattice_synched;
173    int load_balance_counter;
174
175	// cuda objects
176	unsigned int *dLattice, *dLatticeTmp;
177	uint8_t *dSites;
178	cudaStream_t stream1;
179	cudaEvent_t x_finish, diffusion_finished, rx_finish;
180	unsigned int *h_overflows, *d_overflows;
181
182	// kernel launch params
183	dim3 grid_x, grid_y, grid_z, grid_r;
184	dim3 threads_x, threads_y, threads_z, threads_r;
185
186	// lattice segment geometry provided by the mapper
187    SegmentDescriptor_s *segment;
188
189#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
190	uint8_t *RLG;   // Device global memory pointer for RL matrix
191	int8_t *SG;     // Device global memory pointer for S matrix
192#endif
193#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
194	float *TG;
195#endif
196
197#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
198    float *reactionRatesG;
199    unsigned int *reactionOrdersG;
200    unsigned int *reactionSitesG;
201    unsigned int *D1G;
202    unsigned int *D2G;
203#endif
204
205	float *propZeroOrder, *propFirstOrder, *propSecondOrder;
206	
207
208};
209
210
211
212namespace mgpuintmpdrdme_dev {
213__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z);
214__device__ inline size_t local_index(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z);
215__global__ void correct_overflows_mgpu(unsigned int* lattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
216
217#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
218#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
219__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrderG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
220#else
221__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
222#endif
223#else
224__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2);
225#endif
226
227
228#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
229#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
230__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
231#else
232__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
233#endif
234#else
235__global__ void MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot);
236#endif
237
238__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel_unpack(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int *buf_bot);
239
240__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
241__global__ void MGPU_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList);
242__global__ void MGPU_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start);
243#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
244#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
245__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const int8_t* __restrict__ SG, const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG);
246#else
247__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const int8_t* __restrict__ SG, const uint8_t* __restrict__ RLG);
248#endif
249#else
250__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start);
251#endif
252
253
254}
255
256}
257}

259#endif

  45#include <map>
  46#include <string>
  47#include <cstdlib>
  48#include "config.h"
  49#if defined(MACOSX)
  50#include <mach/mach_time.h>
  51#elif defined(LINUX)
  52#include <time.h>
  53#endif
  54#include "cuda/lm_cuda.h"
  55#include "cuda/ldg.h"
  56#include "core/Math.h"
  57#include "core/Print.h"
  58#include "cme/CMESolver.h"
  59#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
  60#include "Lattice.pb.h"
  61#include "SpeciesCounts.pb.h"
  62#include "core/DataOutputQueue.h"
  63#include "core/ResourceAllocator.h"
  64#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
  65#include "rdme/IntLattice.h"
  66#include "rdme/CudaIntLattice.h"
  67#include "rdme/MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver.h"
  68#include "rng/RandomGenerator.h"
  69#include "lptf/Profile.h"
  70#include "core/Timer.h"
  71
  72#define MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE              (MPD_LATTICE_MAX_OCCUPANCY) // 4
  73#define MPD_APRON_SIZE                  1
  74
  75#include "cuda/constant.cuh"
  76namespace lm {
  77namespace rdme {
  78namespace mgpuintmpdrdme_dev{
  79#include "rdme/dev/xor_random_dev.cu"
  80#include "rdme/dev/lattice_sim_1d_dev.cu"
  81#include "rdme/dev/word_diffusion_1d_dev.cu"
  82#include "rdme/dev/word_reaction_dev.cu"
  83}}}
  84
  85#include "rdme/GPUMapper/MultiGPUMapper.h"
  86#include "rdme/GPUMapper/SegmentDescriptor.h"
  87#include "rdme/GPUMapper/ZDivMultiGPUMapper.h"
  88
  89#define L3INDEX(_x,_y,_z, _g) ((_x)+((_y)*(_g.x))+((_z)*(_g.x)*(_g.y)))
  90
  91
  92extern bool globalAbort;
  93
  94
  95using std::map;
  96using lm::io::DiffusionModel;
  97using lm::rdme::Lattice;
  98using lm::rng::RandomGenerator;
  99
 100namespace lm {
 101namespace rdme {
 102
 103
 104volatile unsigned int mclkr_int_overflow_counter=0;
 105volatile unsigned int mclkr_int_total_overflows=0;
 106volatile unsigned int mclkr_int_overflow_reporters=0;
 107unsigned int mclkr_int_worker_count;
 108pthread_mutex_t mclkr_int_overflow_mutex=PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
 109pthread_cond_t mclkr_int_overflow_cond=PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
 110
 111volatile int mclkr_int_generation = 0;
 112pthread_spinlock_t mclkr_int_spin;
 113
 114
 115void* gpu_worker_thread_int(void *arg)
 116{
 117	Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG,"thread %p launched with arg %p",pthread_self(), arg);
 118	gpu_worker_thread_int_params *params=(gpu_worker_thread_int_params*)arg;
 119	MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver *solver=params->runner;
 120
 121	return solver->run_thread(params->gpu);
 122}
 123
 124inline void mclkr_int_barrier_spin(int overflows)
 125{
 126	PROF_BEGIN(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 127
 128	int gen = mclkr_int_generation;
 129	pthread_spin_lock(&mclkr_int_spin);
 130
 131    // Update shared counters
 132    mclkr_int_overflow_reporters++;
 133    mclkr_int_overflow_counter+=overflows;
 134
 135	pthread_spin_unlock(&mclkr_int_spin);
 136
 137    // simulate barrier
 138    if(mclkr_int_overflow_reporters == mclkr_int_worker_count)
 139    {
 140        mclkr_int_total_overflows=mclkr_int_overflow_counter;
 141        mclkr_int_overflow_reporters=0;
 142		mclkr_int_generation++;
 143    }
 144    else
 145    {
 146		while(mclkr_int_generation == gen) {} 
 147    }
 148
 149	PROF_END(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 150}
 151
 152inline void mclkr_int_barrier_cond(int overflows)
 153{
 154	PROF_BEGIN(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 155
 156	pthread_mutex_lock(&mclkr_int_overflow_mutex);
 157
 158    // Update shared counters
 159    mclkr_int_overflow_reporters++;
 160    mclkr_int_overflow_counter+=overflows;
 161
 162    // simulate barrier
 163    if(mclkr_int_overflow_reporters == mclkr_int_worker_count)
 164    {
 165        mclkr_int_total_overflows=mclkr_int_overflow_counter;
 166        mclkr_int_overflow_reporters=0;
 167		pthread_cond_broadcast(&mclkr_int_overflow_cond);
 168    }
 169    else
 170    {
 171		pthread_cond_wait(&mclkr_int_overflow_cond, &mclkr_int_overflow_mutex);
 172    }
 173
 174	pthread_mutex_unlock(&mclkr_int_overflow_mutex);
 175
 176	PROF_END(MPD_MCLKR_BARRIER);
 177}
 178
 179	
 180
 181MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver()
 182:RDMESolver(lm::rng::RandomGenerator::NONE),
 183 seed(0), tau(0.0), threads(NULL),
 184 overflowTimesteps(0), overflowListUses(0),
 185 model_reactionOrders(NULL), model_reactionSites(NULL), model_reactionRates(NULL),
 186 model_D1(NULL), model_D2(NULL),
 187 model_S(NULL), model_T(NULL), model_RL(NULL),
 188 zeroOrder(NULL), firstOrder(NULL), secondOrder(NULL)
 189{
 190	// set defaults features
 191	aggcopy_x_unpack = true;
 192	aggcopy_r_pack = true;
 193	use_spin_barrier = false;
 194}
 195
 196void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::initialize(unsigned int replicate, map<string,string> * parameters, ResourceAllocator::ComputeResources * resourcesA)
 197{
 198	pthread_spin_init(&mclkr_int_spin, 0);
 199
 200	RDMESolver::initialize(replicate, parameters, resourcesA);
 201
 202    // Figure out the random seed.
 203    uint32_t seedTop=(unsigned int)atoi((*parameters)["seed"].c_str());
 204    if (seedTop == 0)
 205    {
 206        #if defined(MACOSX)
 207        seedTop = (uint32_t)mach_absolute_time();
 208        #elif defined(LINUX)
 209        struct timespec seed_timespec;
 210        if (clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &seed_timespec) != 0) throw lm::Exception("Error getting time to use for random seed.");
 211        seedTop = seed_timespec.tv_nsec;
 212        #endif
 213    }
 214    seed = (seedTop<<16)|(replicate&0x0000FFFF);
 215    Print::printf(Print::INFO, "MPDRDME: Rng seed: top word %u, bottom word %u", (seed>>16)*0xffff, seed&0xFFFF);
 216
 217	resources=resourcesA;
 218
 219	//Verify that core count is at least as large as the gpu count.
 220	//Otherwise, threads compete and speedups are not realized.
 221	int cpu_count = resources->cpuCores.size();
 222	int gpu_count = resources->cudaDevices.size();
 223
 224	if(cpu_count < gpu_count)
 225	{
 226		Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "GPU count (%d) exceeds CPU count (%d)", gpu_count, cpu_count);
 227		throw lm::Exception("Not enough cpu cores to run solver");
 228	}
 229
 230	string &s = (*parameters)["rdme.mpd.overflowhandler"];
 231	if(s == "classic")
 232	{
 233		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 234		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to classic");
 235	}
 236	else if(s == "relaxed")
 237	{
 238		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED;
 239		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to relaxed");
 240	}
 241	else if(s == "")
 242	{
 243		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 244		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Overflow handler set to default (classic)");
 245	}
 246	else
 247	{
 248		overflow_handling = OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC;
 249		Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "Unknown overflow handler requested: '%s'", s.c_str());
 250	}
 251
 252	if((*parameters)["mgpu.x_unpack"] != "")
 253		aggcopy_x_unpack = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.x_unpack"].c_str());
 254
 255	if((*parameters)["mgpu.r_pack"] != "")
 256		aggcopy_r_pack = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.r_pack"].c_str());
 257
 258	if((*parameters)["mgpu.spinlock"] != "")
 259		use_spin_barrier = atoi((*parameters)["mgpu.spinlock"].c_str());
 260}
 261
 262void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::initialize_decomposition()
 263{
 264	// Create mapper
 265	int latx, laty, latz;
 266	int apron, overlap;
 267	int gpus = resources->cudaDevices.size();
 268
 269#if defined MPD_BOUNDARY_PERIODIC
 270	bool pz = true;
 271#else
 272	bool pz = false;
 273#endif
 274
 275	apron = 2;
 276	overlap = 0;
 277
 278	latx = lattice->getXSize();
 279	laty = lattice->getYSize();
 280	latz = lattice->getZSize();
 281
 282	int site_size = sizeof(int);
 283	int pagecount = MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE;
 284
 285	mapper = new ZDivMultiGPUMapper(latx, laty, latz,
 286	                                site_size, apron, overlap,
 287									gpus, resources->cudaDevices.data(), pz, pagecount);
 288
 289    pthread_barrier_init(&start_barrier,      NULL, gpus+1);
 290    pthread_barrier_init(&stop_barrier,       NULL, gpus+1);
 291    pthread_barrier_init(&simulation_barrier, NULL, gpus);
 292    pthread_barrier_init(&overflow_barrier1,  NULL, gpus);
 293    pthread_barrier_init(&overflow_barrier2,  NULL, gpus);
 294
 295	mclkr_int_worker_count = gpus;
 296}
 297
 298void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::start_threads()
 299{
 300	// TODO FIXME: Think about this.  Perhaps each thread should be assigned a core
 301	// or perhaps we should be reusing the threading infrastructure already provided
 302	// to us via the core.  We also need NUMA awareness, which is another TODO.
 303	// For now, lets just open up our pinning to be over all the cores that we've
 304	// been graciously handed to us.
 305#if defined(LINUX) && !defined(ARM)
 306	cpu_set_t cpuset;
 307	CPU_ZERO(&cpuset);
 308
 309	for(int c=0; c<resources->cpuCores.size(); c++)
 310	{
 311		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Adding CPU %d to our cpuset", resources->cpuCores[c]);
 312		CPU_SET(resources->cpuCores[c], &cpuset);
 313	}
 314	pthread_setaffinity_np(pthread_self(), sizeof(cpu_set_t), &cpuset);
 315#endif
 316
 317	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
 318	threads=new gpu_worker_thread_int_params[gpus];
 319
 320	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
 321	{
 322        threads[i].runner=this;
 323        //threads[i].lattice=lattice;
 324        threads[i].mapper=mapper;
 325        threads[i].gpu=i;
 326        threads[i].ngpus=gpus;
 327        threads[i].runner_sync=NULL;
 328        threads[i].worker_sync=NULL;
 329        threads[i].timesteps_to_run=0;
 330		threads[i].segment=mapper->getSegmentDescriptor(i);
 331		
 332		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Creating GPU thread %d",i);
 333        pthread_create(&(threads[i].thread), NULL, &gpu_worker_thread_int,
 334                       (void*)&(threads[i]));
 335	}
 336}
 337
 338void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::stop_threads()
 339{
 340	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
 341	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
 342	{
 343		Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"Waiting to join GPU thread %d",i);
 344		pthread_join(threads[i].thread, NULL);
 345	}
 346}
 347
 348MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::~MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver()
 349{
 350	// Free allocated memory in MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver
 351	if (model_reactionOrders) {delete [] model_reactionOrders;}
 352	if (model_reactionSites)  {delete [] model_reactionSites;}
 353	if (model_reactionRates)  {delete [] model_reactionRates;}
 354
 355	if (model_D1) {delete [] model_D1;}
 356	if (model_D2) {delete [] model_D2;}
 357
 358	if (model_S)  {delete [] model_S;}
 359	if (model_T)  {delete [] model_T;}
 360	if (model_RL) {delete [] model_RL;}
 361
 362	if (zeroOrder)   {delete [] zeroOrder;}
 363	if (firstOrder)  {delete [] firstOrder;}
 364	if (secondOrder) {delete [] secondOrder;}
 365
 366	if (threads) {delete [] threads;}
 367}
 368
 369void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::allocateLattice(lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 370                                           lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 371										   lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
 372										   site_size_t particlesPerSite,
 373										   const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
 374										   si_dist_t latticeSpacing)
 375{
 376    if(bytes_per_particle != 4)
 377    {
 378        Print::printf(Print::ERROR, "IntMpdRdmeSolver works only with lattices of 4 bytes per particle, not %d", bytes_per_particle);
 379        throw Exception("incorrect lattice data type");
 380    }
 381
 382    lattice = (Lattice *)new CudaIntLattice(latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, latticeSpacing, particlesPerSite);
 383}
 384
 385void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::buildModel(const uint numberSpeciesA,
 386                                      const uint numberReactionsA,
 387									  const uint * initialSpeciesCountsA,
 388									  const uint * reactionTypesA,
 389									  const double * KA,
 390									  const int * SA,
 391									  const uint * DA,
 392									  const uint kCols)
 393{
 394    CMESolver::buildModel(numberSpeciesA, numberReactionsA, initialSpeciesCountsA, reactionTypesA, KA, SA, DA, kCols);
 395
 396    // Get the time step.
 397    tau=atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 398    if (tau <= 0.0) throw InvalidArgException("timestep", "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 399
 400    // Make sure we can support the reaction model.
 401    if (numberReactions > MPD_MAX_REACTION_TABLE_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of reaction table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 402#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 403    if (numberSpecies*numberReactions > MPD_MAX_S_MATRIX_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of S matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 404#endif
 405
 406    // Setup the cuda reaction model.
 407    model_reactionOrders = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 408    model_reactionSites = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 409    model_D1 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 410    model_D2 = new unsigned int[numberReactions];
 411    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 412    {
 413        if(reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE) {
 414        	model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_ZERO_ORDER_REACTION;
 415        	model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 416        	model_D1[i] = 0; 
 417        	model_D2[i] = 0;
 418        }
 419    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 420    	{
 421    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_FIRST_ORDER_REACTION;
 422    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 423    		model_D1[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si+1;
 424    		model_D2[i] = 0;
 425    	}
 426    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 427    	{
 428    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_REACTION;
 429    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 430    		model_D1[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s1i+1;
 431    		model_D2[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->s2i+1;
 432    	}
 433    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 434    	{
 435    		model_reactionOrders[i] = MPD_SECOND_ORDER_SELF_REACTION;
 436    		model_reactionSites[i] = 0;
 437    		model_D1[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->si+1;
 438    		model_D2[i] = 0;
 439    	}
 440    	else
 441    	{
 442    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[i]);
 443    	}
 444    }
 445
 446    // Setup the cuda S matrix.
 447    model_S = new int8_t[numberSpecies*numberReactions];
 448
 449	for(uint rx = 0; rx < numberReactions; rx++)
 450	{
 451		for (uint p=0; p<numberSpecies; p++)
 452		{
 453			//tmpS[numberSpecies*rx + p] = S[numberSpecies*rx + p];
 454			model_S[rx * numberSpecies + p] = S[numberReactions*p + rx];
 455		}
 456	}
 457}
 458
 459void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::buildDiffusionModel(const uint numberSiteTypesA,
 460                                               const double * DFA,
 461											   const uint * RLA,
 462											   lattice_size_t latticeXSize,
 463											   lattice_size_t latticeYSize,
 464											   lattice_size_t latticeZSize,
 465											   site_size_t particlesPerSite,
 466											   const unsigned int bytes_per_particle,
 467											   si_dist_t latticeSpacing,
 468											   const uint8_t * latticeData,
 469											   const uint8_t * latticeSitesData,
 470											   bool rowMajorData)
 471{
 472    RDMESolver::buildDiffusionModel(numberSiteTypesA, DFA, RLA, latticeXSize,
 473	                                latticeYSize, latticeZSize, particlesPerSite,
 474									bytes_per_particle, latticeSpacing, latticeData,
 475									latticeSitesData, rowMajorData);
 476
 477    // Get the time step.
 478    tau=atof((*parameters)["timestep"].c_str());
 479    if (tau <= 0.0) throw InvalidArgException("timestep", "A positive timestep must be specified for the solver.");
 480
 481    // Setup the cuda transition matrix.
 482    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes;
 483
 484#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 485    if (DFmatrixSize > MPD_MAX_TRANSITION_TABLE_ENTRIES) throw Exception("The number of transition table entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 486#endif
 487
 488#ifndef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 489    if (numberReactions*numberSiteTypes > MPD_MAX_RL_MATRIX_ENTRIES)
 490	{
 491		throw Exception("The number of RL matrix entries exceeds the maximum supported by the solver.");
 492	}
 493#endif
 494
 495    // Calculate the probability from the diffusion coefficient and the lattice properties.
 496    /*
 497     * p0 = probability of staying at the site, q = probability of moving in plus or minus direction
 498     *
 499     * D=(1-p0)*lambda^2/2*tau
 500     * q=(1-p0)/2
 501     * D=2q*lambda^2/2*tau
 502     * q=D*tau/lambda^2
 503     */
 504    model_T = new float[DFmatrixSize];
 505    for (uint i=0; i<DFmatrixSize; i++)
 506    {
 507        float q=(float)(DF[i]*tau/pow(latticeSpacing,2));
 508        if (q > 0.50f) throw InvalidArgException("D", "The specified diffusion coefficient is too high for the diffusion model.");
 509        model_T[i] = q;
 510    }
 511
 512    // Setup the cuda reaction location matrix.
 513    model_RL = new uint8_t[numberReactions*numberSiteTypes];
 514    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions*numberSiteTypes; i++)
 515    {
 516    	model_RL[i] = RL[i];
 517    }
 518
 519    // Set the cuda reaction model rates now that we have the subvolume size.
 520    model_reactionRates = new float[numberReactions];
 521
 522	// Set up pre-configured propensity matrices
 523	zeroOrderSize=numberSiteTypes;
 524	firstOrderSize=numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes;
 525	secondOrderSize=numberSpecies*numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes;
 526	zeroOrder=new float[zeroOrderSize];
 527	firstOrder=new float[firstOrderSize];
 528	secondOrder=new float[secondOrderSize];
 529
 530	computePropensities();
 531	reactionModelModified = false;
 532}
 533
 534void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::setLatticeData(const uint8_t* latticeData)
 535{
 536    lattice_coord_t s = lattice->getSize();
 537    site_size_t p = lattice->getMaxOccupancy();
 538
 539    // reinterpret the input as a 32-bit array
 540    uint32_t *data = (uint32_t*)latticeData;
 541
 542	Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Reinterpreting Lattice Data");
 543
 544    // Set the lattice data.
 545    for (uint i=0, index=0; i<s.x; i++)
 546    {
 547        for (uint j=0; j<s.y; j++)
 548        {
 549            for (uint k=0; k<s.z; k++)
 550            {
 551                for (uint l=0; l<p; l++, index++)
 552                {
 553                    if (data[index] != 0)
 554                    {
 555                        if (data[index] > numberSpecies) throw InvalidArgException("latticeData", "an invalid species was found",data[index]);
 556                        lattice->addParticle(i,j,k,data[index]);
 557                    }
 558                }
 559            }
 560        }
 561    }
 562}
 563
 564void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::computePropensities()
 565{
 566	unsigned int latticeXSize = lattice->getXSize();
 567	unsigned int latticeYSize = lattice->getYSize();
 568	unsigned int latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 569    for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 570    {
 571    	if (reactionTypes[i] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 572    	{
 573    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau/(latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize);
 574    	}
 575    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 576    	{
 577    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau;
 578    	}
 579    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 580    	{
 581    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau*latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 582    	}
 583    	else if (reactionTypes[i] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 584    	{
 585    		model_reactionRates[i] = ((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i])->k*tau*latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 586    	}
 587    	else
 588    	{
 589    		throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[i]);
 590    	}
 591    }
 592
 593    float scale=latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 594	for(uint site=0; site<numberSiteTypes; site++)
 595	{
 596		uint o1=site*numberSpecies;
 597		uint o2=site*numberSpecies*numberSpecies;
 598
 599		zeroOrder[site]=0.0f;
 600		for (uint i=0; i<numberSpecies; i++)
 601		{
 602			firstOrder[o1 + i]=0.0f;
 603			for (uint j=0; j<numberSpecies; j++)
 604				secondOrder[o2 + i*numberSpecies + j]=0.0f;	
 605		}
 606
 607		for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 608		{
 609			if(! RL[i*numberSiteTypes + site])
 610				continue;
 611
 612			switch(reactionTypes[i])
 613			{
 614				case ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 615				{
 616					ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 617					zeroOrder[site]+=rx->k*tau/scale;
 618				}   break;
 619
 620				case FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 621				{
 622					FirstOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 623					firstOrder[o1 + rx->si]+=rx->k*tau;
 624				}   break;
 625				
 626				case SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 627				{
 628					SecondOrderPropensityArgs *rx=(SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 629					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s1i) * numberSpecies + (rx->s2i)]=rx->k*tau*scale;
 630					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->s2i) * numberSpecies + (rx->s1i)]=rx->k*tau*scale;
 631				}   break; 
 632
 633				case SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE:
 634				{
 635					SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *rx=(SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[i];
 636					secondOrder[o2 + (rx->si) * numberSpecies + (rx->si)]+=rx->k*tau*scale*2;
 637				}
 638			}
 639		}
 640	}
 641}
 642
 643void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::copyModelsToDevice(int gpu)
 644{
 645    const size_t DFmatrixSize = numberSpecies*numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes;
 646	const unsigned int latticeXSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.x;
 647	const unsigned int latticeYSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.y;
 648	const unsigned int latticeZSize=threads[gpu].segment->local_dimensions.z;
 649	
 650	// the lattice{X,XY,XYZ}SizeC refer to sizes of the LOCAL lattice.
 651	// NOTE that since we have 1D diffusion only, the global X and XY sizes are the same.
 652    const unsigned int latticeXYSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize;
 653    const unsigned int latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize*latticeZSize;
 654
 655	// gloal_latticeXYZSizeC is the full lattice XYZ size.  
 656    const unsigned int global_latticeZSize = lattice->getZSize();
 657    const unsigned int global_latticeXYZSize = latticeXSize*latticeYSize*lattice->getZSize();
 658
 659    // Copy the reaction model and S matrix to constant memory on the GPU.
 660#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 661    // R matrix put in global memory
 662    //cudaMalloc(&numberReactionsG, sizeof(unsigned int));
 663    //cudaMemcpy(numberReactionsG, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 664    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 665    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 666    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG, model_reactionOrders, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 667    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionSitesG), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 668    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionSitesG, model_reactionSites, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 669    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].D1G), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 670    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].D1G, model_D1, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 671    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].D2G), numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int));
 672    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].D2G, model_D2, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 673#else
 674    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberReactionsC, &numberReactions, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 675    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionOrdersC, model_reactionOrders, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 676    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionSitesC, model_reactionSites, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 677    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D1C, model_D1, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 678    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(D2C, model_D2, numberReactions*sizeof(unsigned int)));
 679#endif
 680
 681#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 682	// If S matrix stored in global memory, allocate space and perform copy
 683	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].SG), numberSpecies*numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t));
 684	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].SG, model_S, numberSpecies*numberReactions * sizeof(int8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 685#else
 686	// S matrix is in constant memory
 687    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(SC, model_S, numberSpecies*numberReactions*sizeof(int8_t)));
 688#endif
 689
 690#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_T_MATRIX
 691	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].TG), DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float)));
 692	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].TG, model_T, DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice));
 693    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, &(threads[gpu].TG), sizeof(float*)));
 694#else
 695    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(TC, model_T, DFmatrixSize*sizeof(float)));
 696#endif
 697
 698    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSpeciesC, &numberSpecies, sizeof(numberSpeciesC)));
 699    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(numberSiteTypesC, &numberSiteTypes, sizeof(numberSiteTypesC)));
 700    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXSizeC, &latticeXSize, sizeof(latticeYSizeC)));
 701    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeYSizeC, &latticeYSize, sizeof(latticeYSizeC)));
 702    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeZSizeC, &latticeZSize, sizeof(latticeZSizeC)));
 703    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYSizeC, &latticeXYSize, sizeof(latticeXYSizeC)));
 704    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(latticeXYZSizeC, &latticeXYZSize, sizeof(latticeXYZSizeC)));
 705    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeZSizeC, &global_latticeZSize, sizeof(global_latticeZSizeC)));
 706    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(global_latticeXYZSizeC, &global_latticeXYZSize, sizeof(global_latticeXYZSizeC)));
 707#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
 708	// Store RL in global memory too, since I'm going to assume if S is too big, then RL is too.
 709	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].RLG), numberReactions*numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t));
 710	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].RLG, model_RL, numberReactions*numberSiteTypes * sizeof(uint8_t), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 711#else
 712	// RL is stored in constant memory
 713    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(RLC, model_RL, numberReactions*numberSiteTypes*sizeof(uint8_t)));
 714#endif
 715
 716#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
 717    cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].reactionRatesG), numberReactions*sizeof(float));
 718    cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].reactionRatesG, model_reactionRates, numberReactions*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 719#else
 720    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(reactionRatesC, model_reactionRates, numberReactions*sizeof(float)));
 721#endif
 722
 723	// Copy per-GPU global offsets
 724    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeXC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.x), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 725    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeYC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.y), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 726    //CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(lsizeZC, &(threads[gpu].local_dimensions.z), sizeof(unsigned int)));
 727    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetXC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.x), sizeof(int)));
 728    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetYC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.y), sizeof(int)));
 729    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(goffsetZC, &(threads[gpu].segment->global_offset.z), sizeof(int)));
 730
 731    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(gpuidC, &gpu, sizeof(unsigned int)));
 732
 733	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propZeroOrder), zeroOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 734	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propZeroOrder, zeroOrder, zeroOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 735	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propFirstOrder), firstOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 736	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propFirstOrder, firstOrder, firstOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 737	cudaMalloc(&(threads[gpu].propSecondOrder), secondOrderSize*sizeof(float));
 738	cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].propSecondOrder, secondOrder, secondOrderSize*sizeof(float), cudaMemcpyHostToDevice);
 739	
 740	ZDivMultiGPUMapper *zmap = (ZDivMultiGPUMapper*)mapper;
 741	gpu_info *g = zmap->getinfo(gpu);
 742	unsigned int tmp = g->overlap_send[0].z;
 743	// this is where give out the problem
 744	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_send_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 745	tmp = g->overlap_dim.z;
 746	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_dim_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 747	tmp = DIMSIZE(g->overlap_dim);
 748	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_dim_size, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 749
 750	tmp = g->overlap_send[1].z;
 751	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_send_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 752	tmp = g->overlap_dim.z;
 753	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_dim_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 754	tmp = DIMSIZE(g->overlap_dim);
 755	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_dim_size, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 756
 757	tmp = g->overlap_recv[0].z;
 758	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(top_recv_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 759
 760	tmp = g->overlap_recv[1].z;
 761	CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMemcpyToSymbol(bot_recv_z, &tmp, sizeof(int)));
 762}
 763
 764void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::setReactionRate(unsigned int rxid, float rate)
 765{
 766	if (reactionTypes[rxid] == ZerothOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 767	{
 768		((ZerothOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 769	}
 770	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == FirstOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 771	{
 772		((FirstOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 773	}
 774	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 775	{
 776		((SecondOrderPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 777	}
 778	else if (reactionTypes[rxid] == SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs::REACTION_TYPE)
 779	{
 780		((SecondOrderSelfPropensityArgs *)propensityFunctionArgs[rxid])->k = rate;
 781	}
 782	else
 783    {
 784    	throw InvalidArgException("reactionTypeA", "the reaction type was not supported by the solver", reactionTypes[rxid]);
 785    }
 786
 787	// Flag to trigger re-computation of rdme propensities
 788	reactionModelModified = true;
 789}
 790
 791
 792void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::generateTrajectory()
 793{
 794	// Determine how to divide the lattice
 795	initialize_decomposition();
 796
 797	// Start worker threads
 798	start_threads();
 799
 800    // Shadow the lattice member as a cuda lattice.
 801    CudaIntLattice * lattice = (CudaIntLattice *)this->lattice;
 802
 803    // Get the interval for writing species counts and lattices.
 804    uint32_t speciesCountsWriteInterval=atol((*parameters)["writeInterval"].c_str());
 805    uint32_t nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime = speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 806    lm::io::SpeciesCounts speciesCountsDataSet;
 807    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
 808    speciesCountsDataSet.set_number_entries(0);
 809    uint32_t latticeWriteInterval=atol((*parameters)["latticeWriteInterval"].c_str());
 810    uint32_t nextLatticeWriteTime = latticeWriteInterval;
 811    lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
 812
 813    // Get the simulation time limit.
 814    double maxTime=atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str());
 815	
 816    Print::printf(Print::INFO,
 817	              "Running mpd rdme simulation with %d species, %d reactions, %d site types for %e s with tau %e. Writing species at %d and lattice at %d intervals",
 818				  numberSpecies, numberReactions, numberSiteTypes,
 819				  maxTime, tau,
 820				  speciesCountsWriteInterval, latticeWriteInterval);
 821
 822    // Set the initial time.
 823    double time = 0.0;
 824	current_timestep = 0;
 825
 826	bool hookEnabled=false;
 827    uint32_t nextHookTime=0;
 828    uint32_t hookInterval=0;
 829
 830	// Find out at what interval to hook simulations
 831    if((*parameters)["hookInterval"] != "")
 832    {
 833        hookInterval=atol((*parameters)["hookInterval"].c_str());
 834        hookEnabled=true;
 835        nextHookTime=hookInterval;
 836    }
 837	//timer for record
 838	Timer timer;
 839	timer.tick();
 840	double lastT=0;
 841    int lastSteps=0;
 842	// Find out at what interval to write status messages
 843    printPerfInterval = 60;
 844    if((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"] != "")
 845    {
 846        printPerfInterval=atof((*parameters)["perfPrintInterval"].c_str());
 847    }
 848
 849    // Record the initial species counts.
 850    recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 851
 852    // Write the initial lattice.
 853    writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 854
 855	// Perform an initial hook check
 856    hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 857
 858    // Loop until we have finished the simulation.
 859    while (time < maxTime)
 860    {
 861		// compute number of steps to batch
 862		int nSteps = min(nextLatticeWriteTime-current_timestep,
 863			         min(nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime-current_timestep,
 864			         min(nextHookTime-current_timestep,
 865					 ((uint32_t) (ceil(maxTime/tau)-current_timestep)))));
 866
 867		if(nSteps == 0) nSteps=1;
 868		assert(nSteps > 0);
 869		//add timer here
 870		//current_timestep += nSteps;
 871		lastSteps += nSteps;
 872        if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
 873        {
 874            double stepTime = lastT/lastSteps;
 875            double completionTime = stepTime*(maxTime-time)/tau;
 876            std::string units;
 877            if (completionTime > 60*60*24*365) {
 878                units = "weeks";
 879                completionTime /= 60*60*24*365;
 880            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*30) {
 881                units = "months";
 882                completionTime /= 60*60*24*30;
 883            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*7) {
 884                units = "weeks";
 885                completionTime /= 60*60*24*7;
 886            } else if (completionTime > 60*60*24) {
 887                units = "days";
 888                completionTime /= 60*60*24;
 889            } else if (completionTime > 60*60) {
 890                units = "hours";
 891                completionTime /= 60*60;
 892            } else if (completionTime > 60) {
 893                units = "minutes";
 894                completionTime /= 60;
 895            } else {
 896                units = "seconds";
 897            }
 898
 899            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
 900                                       1000.0*stepTime, time, maxTime, 100.0*time/maxTime, completionTime, units.c_str());
 901
 902            lastT = 0;
 903            lastSteps = 0;
 904        }
 905		// normal program continue
 906		timesteps_to_run = nSteps;
 907
 908		// wake up threads
 909		pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
 910
 911		// ... and wait.
 912		pthread_barrier_wait(&stop_barrier);
 913		
 914		if(globalAbort)
 915		{
 916			printf("Global abort: terminating solver");
 917			break;
 918		}
 919
 920        // Advance the timestep counter
 921		current_timestep += nSteps;
 922
 923		// Update the time
 924        time = current_timestep*tau;
 925
 926		// No need to sync from gpus first; each gpu thread does a stage_out
 927		// prior to entering the stop barrier
 928		// clear the flag for if reaction model has changed
 929		reactionModelModified = false;
 930		// Also no need to check the return value of the hook as a stage in is always done
 931		// at the beginning of the timestep batch
 932
 933	    // Check if we need to execute the hook
 934        if (hookEnabled && current_timestep >= nextHookTime)
 935        {
 936            // lattice->copyFromGPU();
 937            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Hook time is %.14f, in steps is %d", time, nextHookTime);
 938            hookCheckSimulation(time, lattice);
 939            nextHookTime += hookInterval;
 940            Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Next hook time is %d", nextHookTime);
 941        }
 942
 943        // See if we need to write the lattice.
 944        if (current_timestep >= nextLatticeWriteTime)
 945        {
 946            PROF_BEGIN(PROF_SERIALIZE_LATTICE);
 947            writeLatticeData(time, lattice, &latticeDataSet);
 948            nextLatticeWriteTime += latticeWriteInterval;
 949            PROF_END(PROF_SERIALIZE_LATTICE);
 950        }
 951
 952        // See if we need to write the species counts.
 953        if (current_timestep >= nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime)
 954        {
 955            PROF_BEGIN(PROF_DETERMINE_COUNTS);
 956            recordSpeciesCounts(time, lattice, &speciesCountsDataSet);
 957            nextSpeciesCountsWriteTime += speciesCountsWriteInterval;
 958            PROF_END(PROF_DETERMINE_COUNTS);
 959
 960            // See if we have accumulated enough species counts to send.
 961            if (speciesCountsDataSet.number_entries() >= TUNE_SPECIES_COUNTS_BUFFER_SIZE)
 962            {
 963                PROF_BEGIN(PROF_SERIALIZE_COUNTS);
 964                writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 965                PROF_END(PROF_SERIALIZE_COUNTS);
 966            }
 967        }
 968    }
 969
 970    // Write any remaining species counts.
 971    writeSpeciesCounts(&speciesCountsDataSet);
 972
 973	// take down threads
 974	timesteps_to_run=-1;
 975	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "all done, tear down");
 976	pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
 977	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "stop all threads");
 978	
 979	stop_threads();
 980}
 981
 982void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeData(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice, lm::io::Lattice * latticeDataSet)
 983{
 984    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Writing lattice at %e s", time);
 985
 986    // Record the lattice data.
 987    latticeDataSet->Clear();
 988    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
 989    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
 990    latticeDataSet->set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
 991    latticeDataSet->set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
 992    latticeDataSet->set_time(time);
 993
 994    // Push it to the output queue.
 995    size_t payloadSize = size_t(lattice->getSize().x)*size_t(lattice->getSize().y)*size_t(lattice->getSize().z)*size_t(lattice->getMaxOccupancy())*sizeof(uint32_t);
 996
 997    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::INT_LATTICE, replicate, latticeDataSet, lattice, payloadSize, &lm::rdme::IntLattice::nativeSerialize);
 998}
 999
1000void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::writeLatticeSites(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice)
1001{
1002    Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Writing lattice sites at %e s", time);
1003
1004    lm::io::Lattice latticeDataSet;
1005    // Record the lattice data.
1006    latticeDataSet.Clear();
1007    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_x_size(lattice->getSize().x);
1008    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_y_size(lattice->getSize().y);
1009    latticeDataSet.set_lattice_z_size(lattice->getSize().z);
1010    latticeDataSet.set_particles_per_site(lattice->getMaxOccupancy());
1011    latticeDataSet.set_time(time);
1012
1013    // Push it to the output queue.
