1014    size_t payloadSize = lattice->getSize().x*lattice->getSize().y*lattice->getSize().z*sizeof(uint8_t);
1015    lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SITE_LATTICE,
1016	                                                      replicate,
1017														  &latticeDataSet,
1018														  lattice,
1019														  payloadSize,
1020														  &lm::rdme::ByteLattice::nativeSerializeSites);
1021}
1022
1023void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::recordSpeciesCounts(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
1024{
1025    std::map<particle_t,uint> particleCounts = lattice->getParticleCounts();
1026
1027    speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries()+1);
1028    speciesCountsDataSet->add_time(time);
1029    for (particle_t p=0; p<numberSpeciesToTrack; p++)
1030    {
1031        speciesCountsDataSet->add_species_count((particleCounts.count(p+1)>0)?particleCounts[p+1]:0);
1032    }
1033}
1034
1035void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::writeSpeciesCounts(lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCountsDataSet)
1036{
1037    if (speciesCountsDataSet->number_entries() > 0)
1038    {
1039        // Push it to the output queue.
1040        lm::main::DataOutputQueue::getInstance()->pushDataSet(lm::main::DataOutputQueue::SPECIES_COUNTS, replicate, speciesCountsDataSet);
1041
1042        // Reset the data set.
1043        speciesCountsDataSet->Clear();
1044        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_species(numberSpeciesToTrack);
1045        speciesCountsDataSet->set_number_entries(0);
1046    }
1047}
1048
1049void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::hookCheckSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice * lattice)
1050{
1051    switch(hookSimulation(time, lattice))
1052    {
1053        case 0:
1054            break;
1055
1056        case 1:
1057            // lattice->copyToGPU();
1058            break;
1059
1060        case 2:
1061            // lattice->copyToGPU();
1062            writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
1063            break;
1064
1065		case 3:
1066            printf("hook return value is 3, force to stop.\n");
1067			writeLatticeSites(time, lattice);
1068            return;
1069
1070        default:
1071            throw("Unknown hook return value");
1072    }
1073
1074	if(reactionModelModified)
1075		computePropensities();
1076}
1077
1078uint64_t MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::getTimestepSeed(uint32_t timestep, uint32_t substep)
1079{
1080    uint64_t timestepHash = (((((uint64_t)seed)<<30)+timestep)<<2)+substep;
1081    timestepHash = timestepHash * 3202034522624059733ULL + 4354685564936845319ULL;
1082    timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 20; timestepHash ^= timestepHash << 41; timestepHash ^= timestepHash >> 5;
1083    timestepHash *= 7664345821815920749ULL;
1084    return timestepHash;
1085}
1086
1087int MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::run_next_timestep(int gpu, uint32_t timestep)
1088{
1089    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1090
1091	int z_start = 0;
1092	unsigned int *dlat        = threads[gpu].dLattice;
1093	unsigned int *dtmp        = threads[gpu].dLatticeTmp;
1094	uint8_t *sites            = threads[gpu].dSites;
1095	cudaStream_t cudaStream   = threads[gpu].stream1;
1096	unsigned int *d_overflows = threads[gpu].d_overflows;
1097	
1098    dim3 gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_x;
1099	dim3 threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_x;
1100
1101	ZDivMultiGPUMapper* zmap = (ZDivMultiGPUMapper*)mapper;
1102
1103    // Execute the kernel for the x direction.
1104    PROF_CUDA_START(cudaStream);
1105
1106	if (aggcopy_x_unpack)
1107	{
1108		unsigned int* rbuf_top = zmap->getrbuf(gpu, timestep, 0);
1109		unsigned int* rbuf_bot = zmap->getrbuf(gpu, timestep, 1);
1110
1111		PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1112		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1113			mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_x_kernel_unpack<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1114			(dlat, sites, dtmp, z_start,
1115			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 0),
1116			 d_overflows,
1117			 rbuf_top, rbuf_bot)
1118		));
1119		PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1120	}
1121	else
1122	{
1123		mapper->schedule_recv(gpu, dlat, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1124		mapper->schedule_recv(gpu, dlat, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1125
1126		PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION,cudaStream);
1127		CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1128			mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_x_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1129			(dlat, sites, dtmp, z_start,
1130			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 0),
1131			 d_overflows)
1132		));
1133		PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_X_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1134	}
1135
1136    gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_y;
1137	threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_y;
1138
1139    // Execute the kernel for the y direction.
1140    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1141    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1142		mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_y_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1143		(dtmp, sites, dlat,
1144		 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 1),
1145		 d_overflows)
1146	));
1147    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Y_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1148
1149    gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_z;
1150	threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_z;
1151
1152    // Execute the kernel for the z direction.
1153    PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1154    CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1155		mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_z_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1156		(dlat, sites, dtmp,
1157		 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 2),
1158		 d_overflows,
1159		 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z)
1160	));
1161    PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_Z_DIFFUSION, cudaStream);
1162
1163    if (numberReactions > 0)
1164    {
1165		gridSize        = threads[gpu].grid_r;
1166		threadBlockSize = threads[gpu].threads_r;
1167
1168        // Execute the kernel for the reaction.
1169		// This kernel updates the lattice in-place, so only the src pointer is passed.
1170        PROF_CUDA_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_REACTION, cudaStream);
1171
1172		unsigned int* buf_top = zmap->gettbuf(gpu, timestep, 0);
1173		unsigned int* buf_bot = zmap->gettbuf(gpu, timestep, 1);		
1174
1175	#ifdef MPD_FREAKYFAST
1176		if (aggcopy_r_pack)
1177		{
1178			CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1179				mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1180				(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1181				 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1182				 d_overflows,
1183				 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1184				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1185				 threads[gpu].SG,
1186				 threads[gpu].RLG,
1187				#endif
1188				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1189				 threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1190				 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1191				 threads[gpu].D1G,
1192				 threads[gpu].D2G,
1193				 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG,
1194				#endif
1195				 threads[gpu].propZeroOrder,
1196				 threads[gpu].propFirstOrder,
1197				 threads[gpu].propSecondOrder,
1198				 buf_top, buf_bot)
1199			));
1200		}
1201		else
1202		{
1203			CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1204				mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1205				(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1206				 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1207				 d_overflows,
1208				 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1209				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1210				 threads[gpu].SG,
1211				 threads[gpu].RLG,
1212				#endif
1213				#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1214				 threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1215				 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1216				 threads[gpu].D1G,
1217				 threads[gpu].D2G,
1218				 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG,
1219				#endif
1220				 threads[gpu].propZeroOrder,
1221				 threads[gpu].propFirstOrder,
1222				 threads[gpu].propSecondOrder)
1223			));
1224		}
1225	#else
1226    	CUDA_EXCEPTION_EXECUTE((
1227			mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::MGPU_reaction_kernel<<<gridSize, threadBlockSize, 0, cudaStream>>>
1228			(dtmp, sites, dtmp,
1229			 getTimestepSeed(timestep, 3),
1230			 d_overflows,
1231			 threads[gpu].segment->active_offset.z,
1232			#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1233			 threads[gpu].SG,
1234			 threads[gpu].RLG,
1235			#endif
1236			#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1237			 threads[gpu].reactionOrdersG,
1238			 threads[gpu].reactionSitesG,
1239			 threads[gpu].D1G,
1240			 threads[gpu].D2G,
1241			 threads[gpu].reactionRatesG
1242			#endif
1243		)));
1244	#endif
1245
1246        PROF_CUDA_END(PROF_MPD_REACTION, cudaStream);
1247    }
1248
1249    if(overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1250		mgpuintmpdrdme_dev::correct_overflows_mgpu<<<dim3(1,1,1),
1251	                                                 dim3(TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS,1,1),
1252													 0, cudaStream>>>(dtmp, d_overflows);
1253
1254	// send data
1255	if (aggcopy_r_pack && numberReactions > 0)
1256	{
1257		zmap->send_tbuf(gpu, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1258		zmap->send_tbuf(gpu, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1259	}
1260	else
1261	{
1262		mapper->schedule_send(gpu, dtmp, timestep, 0, cudaStream);
1263		mapper->schedule_send(gpu, dtmp, timestep, 1, cudaStream);
1264	}
1265	
1266    // Wait for the kernels to complete.
1267    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1268    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamSynchronize(cudaStream));
1269    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_SYNCHRONIZE);
1270
1271    if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED)
1272	{
1273		uint unresolved = ((unsigned int*)d_overflows)[0];
1274		if (unresolved > 0)
1275		{
1276            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "[gpu %d] %d unresolved overflows", gpu, unresolved);
1277		}
1278	}
1279
1280	// Save correct pointers for current data
1281	threads[gpu].dLattice    = dtmp;
1282	threads[gpu].dLatticeTmp = dlat;
1283
1284	if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC)
1285	{
1286	#ifndef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
1287		cudaMemcpy(threads[gpu].h_overflows, d_overflows, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE, cudaMemcpyDeviceToHost);
1288	#endif
1289
1290		PROF_END(PROF_MPD_TIMESTEP);
1291		return threads[gpu].h_overflows[0];
1292	}
1293	
1294	// relaxed overflow mode
1295	return 0;
1296}
1297
1298
1299int MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::handle_overflows(int gpu, void *hptr, void *dptr, int ts)
1300{
1301	// Copy data back from GPUs
1302	mapper->stage_out(gpu, hptr, dptr);
1303	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob1.",gpu);
1304	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier1);
1305
1306	// Resolve overflows
1307	if(gpu == 0)
1308	{
1309		handle_all_overflows();
1310		mclkr_int_total_overflows = 0;
1311		mclkr_int_overflow_counter = 0;
1312	}
1313	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob2.",gpu);
1314	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier2);
1315
1316	// Return to GPU
1317	mapper->stage_in(gpu, dptr, hptr);
1318	mapper->publish_state(gpu, dptr, ts);
1319	cudaMemsetAsync(threads[gpu].d_overflows, 0, sizeof(unsigned int));
1320	//	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] entering ob3.",gpu);
1321	pthread_barrier_wait(&overflow_barrier1);
1322
1323
1324	return 0;
1325}
1326
1327int MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::handle_all_overflows()
1328{
1329    // Handle any particle overflows.
1330    PROF_BEGIN(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1331
1332    overflowTimesteps++;
1333    uint32_t overflowList[1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
1334    uint numberExceptions = 0;
1335
1336	// LOOP OVER EACH GPU
1337	int gpus=resources->cudaDevices.size();
1338	for(int i=0; i<gpus; i++)
1339	{
1340		uint* gpulist=threads[i].h_overflows;
1341		ssize_t min_index = mapper->get_authority_offset(i);
1342		ssize_t max_index = DIMSIZE(mapper->get_global_dim(i))+min_index;
1343		//printf("gpu %d: min %d max %d\n", i, min_index, max_index);
1344
1345		for(int e=0; e<gpulist[0]; e++)
1346		{
1347			// DECODE INDEX
1348            size_t latticeIndex = gpulist[e*2 + 1];
1349            particle_t particle = gpulist[e*2 + 2];
1350			
1351			ssize_t globalIndex = latticeIndex + mapper->get_global_input_offset(i);
1352			//printf("Overflow of particle type %d at local index %d on gpu %d ==> index %d\n", particle, latticeIndex, i, globalIndex);
1353			if(latticeIndex < min_index || latticeIndex > max_index)
1354				continue;
1355
1356			// FILL list
1357            overflowList[(numberExceptions*2)+1] = globalIndex;
1358			overflowList[(numberExceptions*2)+2] = particle;
1359			numberExceptions++;
1360		}
1361	}
1362
1363    if (numberExceptions > 0)
1364    {
1365        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "%d overflows", numberExceptions);
1366        
1367        // Make sure we did not exceed the overflow buffer.
1368        if (numberExceptions > TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS)
1369            throw Exception("Too many particle overflows for the available buffer", numberExceptions);
1370            
1371        // Go through each exception.
1372        for (uint i=0; i<numberExceptions; i++)
1373        {
1374            // Extract the index and particle type.
1375            lattice_size_t latticeIndex = overflowList[(i*2)+1];
1376            particle_t particle = overflowList[(i*2)+2];
1377            
1378            // Get the x, y, and z coordiantes.
1379            lattice_size_t x = latticeIndex%lattice->getXSize();
1380            lattice_size_t y = (latticeIndex/lattice->getXSize())%lattice->getYSize();
1381            lattice_size_t z = latticeIndex/(lattice->getXSize()*lattice->getYSize());
1382            
1383            // Put the particles back into a nearby lattice site.
1384            bool replacedParticle = false;
1385            for (uint searchRadius=0; !replacedParticle && searchRadius <= TUNE_MPD_MAX_OVERFLOW_REPLACEMENT_DIST; searchRadius++)
1386            {
1387                // Get the nearby sites.
1388                std::vector<lattice_coord_t> sites = lattice->getNearbySites(x,y,z,(searchRadius>0)?searchRadius-1:0,searchRadius);
1389                
1390                // TODO: Shuffle the sites.
1391                
1392                // Try to find one that in not fully occupied and of the same type.
1393                for (std::vector<lattice_coord_t>::iterator it=sites.begin(); it<sites.end(); it++)
1394                {
1395                    lattice_coord_t site = *it;
1396                    if (lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z) < lattice->getMaxOccupancy() && lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z) == lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z))
1397                    {
1398                        lattice->addParticle(site.x, site.y, site.z, particle);
1399                        replacedParticle = true;
1400                        Print::printf(Print::VERBOSE_DEBUG, "Handled overflow of particle %d at site %d,%d,%d type=%d occ=%d by placing at site %d,%d,%d type=%d newocc=%d dist=%0.2f", particle, x, y, z, lattice->getSiteType(x,y,z), lattice->getOccupancy(x,y,z), site.x, site.y, site.z, lattice->getSiteType(site.x,site.y,site.z), lattice->getOccupancy(site.x,site.y,site.z), sqrt(pow((double)x-(double)site.x,2.0)+pow((double)y-(double)site.y,2.0)+pow((double)z-(double)site.z,2.0)));
1401                        break;
1402                    }
1403                }
1404            }
1405            
1406            // If we were not able to fix the exception, throw an error.
1407            if (!replacedParticle)
1408                throw Exception("Unable to find an available site to handle a particle overflow.");
1409        }
1410        
1411        // Track that we used the overflow list.
1412        overflowListUses++;
1413    }
1414    
1415    // If the overflow lsit is being used too often, print a warning.
1416    if (overflowTimesteps >= 1000)
1417    {
1418        if (overflowListUses > 10)
1419            Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "%d uses of the particle overflow list in the last 1000 timesteps, performance may be degraded.", overflowListUses);
1420        overflowTimesteps = 0;
1421        overflowListUses = 0;
1422    }
1423    PROF_END(PROF_MPD_OVERFLOW);
1424
1425	return 0;
1426}
1427
1428void* MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::run_thread(int gpu)
1429{
1430	mapper->numa_bind_thread(gpu);
1431	mapper->initialize_gpu(gpu);
1432	pthread_barrier_wait(&simulation_barrier);
1433	mapper->set_affinity(gpu);
1434	
1435	gpu_worker_thread_int_params *p = &threads[gpu];
1436
1437	// allocate device memory for lattice stuctures
1438	cudaMalloc(&p->dLattice,    mapper->get_local_size(gpu)*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE);
1439	cudaMalloc(&p->dLatticeTmp, mapper->get_local_size(gpu)*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE);
1440	cudaMalloc(&p->dSites,      DIMSIZE(mapper->get_local_dim(gpu)));
1441
1442	// allocate device and host space for overflow lists
1443	if (overflow_handling == OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC)
1444	{
1445	#ifdef MPD_MAPPED_OVERFLOWS
1446		CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaHostAlloc(&p->h_overflows,
1447		                                   MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE,
1448										   cudaHostAllocPortable|cudaHostAllocMapped));
1449		p->d_overflows = p->h_overflows;
1450	#else
1451	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaHostAlloc(&p->h_overflows,
1452		                                   MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE,
1453										   cudaHostAllocPortable));
1454	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&p->d_overflows,
1455		                                MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1456		cudaMemsetAsync(p->d_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1457	#endif
1458	
1459		memset(p->h_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1460	}
1461	else
1462	{
1463		p->h_overflows = NULL;
1464	    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaMalloc(&p->d_overflows,
1465		                                MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE));
1466		cudaMemsetAsync(p->d_overflows, 0, MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE);
1467	}
1468
1469    // Create data exchange streams and events
1470    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaStreamCreate(&p->stream1));
1471
1472#ifdef PROF_USE_CUEVENT
1473    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->x_finish));
1474    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->diffusion_finished));
1475    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreate(&p->rx_finish));
1476#else
1477    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->x_finish,
1478	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1479    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->diffusion_finished,
1480	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1481    CUDA_EXCEPTION_CHECK(cudaEventCreateWithFlags(&p->rx_finish,
1482	                                              cudaEventDisableTiming));
1483#endif
1484
1485	dim3 ldim = mapper->get_local_dim(gpu);
1486	dim3 gdim = mapper->get_global_dim(gpu);
1487	
1488	// calculate launch params
1489    calculateXLaunchParameters(&(p->grid_x), &p->threads_x,
1490	                           TUNE_MPD_X_BLOCK_MAX_X_SIZE,
1491							   ldim.x, ldim.y, ldim.z);
1492    calculateYLaunchParameters(&p->grid_y, &p->threads_y,
1493	                           TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,
1494							   ldim.x, ldim.y, ldim.z);
1495    calculateZLaunchParameters(&p->grid_z, &p->threads_z,
1496	                           TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_Z_SIZE,
1497							   ldim.x, ldim.y, gdim.z);
1498	calculateReactionLaunchParameters(&p->grid_r, &p->threads_r,
1499	                                  TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE, TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,
1500									  ldim.x, ldim.y, gdim.z);
1501
1502	// Now here, do not copy model every time
1503	copyModelsToDevice(gpu);
1504
1505	// Copy the initialized data into GPU memory
1506	mapper->stage_in(gpu, p->dLattice, ((CudaIntLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory());
1507	mapper->stage_in_sites(gpu, p->dSites, ((CudaIntLattice*) lattice)->getSitesMemory());
1508	mapper->publish_state(gpu, p->dLattice, current_timestep+1);
1509	
1510	Timer timer;
1511    double lastT = 0;
1512    int lastSteps = 0;
1513	size_t maxTS = atof((*parameters)["maxTime"].c_str()) / tau;
1514	if (gpu == 0)
1515		timer.tick();
1516
1517	do
1518	{
1519		// wait for master wakeup
1520		pthread_barrier_wait(&start_barrier);
1521
1522		int steps = timesteps_to_run;
1523		if (steps < 0)
1524			break;
1525
1526		// Don't copy models in on every step set
1527		// This was to accomodate changing lattice dims from lb changes
1528		// Unless the reaction model has changed
1529		if (reactionModelModified) 
1530		{
1531			copyModelsToDevice(gpu);
1532		}
1533
1534		for (int ts = 0; ts < steps; ts++)
1535		{
1536			if (gpu == 0)
1537			{
1538				lastT += timer.tock();
1539				lastSteps += 1;
1540
1541				if (lastT >= printPerfInterval)
1542				{
1543					double stepTime = lastT / lastSteps;
1544					double completionTime = stepTime * (maxTS - current_timestep - ts);
1545					std::string units;
1546					if (completionTime > 60*60*24*365)
1547					{
1548						units = "weeks";
1549						completionTime /= 60*60*24*365;
1550					}
1551					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*30)
1552					{
1553						units = "months";
1554						completionTime /= 60*60*24*30;
1555					}
1556					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24*7)
1557					{
1558						units = "weeks";
1559						completionTime /= 60*60*24*7;
1560					}
1561					else if (completionTime > 60*60*24)
1562					{
1563						units = "days";
1564						completionTime /= 60*60*24;
1565					}
1566					else if (completionTime > 60*60)
1567					{
1568						units = "hours";
1569						completionTime /= 60*60;
1570					}
1571					else if (completionTime > 60)
1572					{
1573						units = "minutes";
1574						completionTime /= 60;
1575					}
1576					else
1577					{
1578						units = "seconds";
1579					}
1580
1581					Print::printf(Print::INFO, "Average walltime per timestep: %.2f ms. Progress: %.4fs/%.4fs (% .3g%% done / %.2g %s walltime remaining)",
1582								  1000.0*stepTime, (ts+current_timestep)*tau, maxTS*tau, 100.0*(ts+current_timestep)/maxTS, completionTime, units.c_str());
1583
1584					lastT = 0;
1585					lastSteps = 0;
1586				}
1587
1588				timer.tick();
1589			}
1590
1591			int overflows = run_next_timestep(gpu, ts + current_timestep);
1592			
1593			switch(overflow_handling)
1594			{
1595				case OVERFLOW_MODE_CLASSIC:
1596					if (use_spin_barrier)
1597						mclkr_int_barrier_spin(overflows);
1598					else
1599						mclkr_int_barrier_cond(overflows);
1600
1601					if (mclkr_int_total_overflows > 0)
1602					{
1603						Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "[GPU Thread %d] encountered %d overflows", gpu, overflows);
1604						handle_overflows(gpu, ((CudaIntLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory(),
1605						                 p->dLattice, ts + current_timestep);
1606					}
1607					break;
1608
1609				case OVERFLOW_MODE_RELAXED:
1610					// All overflows are handled by the gpu.  No need to communicate.
1611					pthread_barrier_wait(&simulation_barrier);
1612					break;
1613
1614				default:
1615					throw("Unimplemented overflow handler");
1616			}
1617		}
1618
1619		mapper->stage_out(gpu, ((CudaIntLattice*) lattice)->getParticlesMemory(), p->dLattice);
1620		pthread_barrier_wait(&stop_barrier);
1621
1622	} while(true);
1623
1624	Print::printf(Print::DEBUG,"[GPU Thread %d] leaving.",gpu);
1625
1626	return NULL;
1627}
1628
1629int MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::hookSimulation(double time, CudaIntLattice *lattice)
1630{
1631	return 0;
1632}
1633
1634void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateXLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1635                                                      dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1636													  const unsigned int maxXBlockSize,
1637													  const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1638													  const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1639													  const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1640{
1641    unsigned int xBlockXSize = min(maxXBlockSize, latticeXSize);
1642    unsigned int gridXSize   = latticeXSize / xBlockXSize;
1643
1644    if (gridXSize*xBlockXSize != latticeXSize)
1645	{
1646		// Find the largest number of warps that is divisible
1647		unsigned int tryx=32;
1648		while (tryx < maxXBlockSize)
1649		{
1650			if (latticeXSize % tryx == 0)
1651				xBlockXSize = tryx;
1652			tryx += 32;
1653		}
1654		gridXSize = latticeXSize / xBlockXSize;
1655	}
1656			
1657    (*gridSize).x = gridXSize;
1658    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1659    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1660    (*threadBlockSize).x = xBlockXSize;
1661    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1662    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1663}
1664
1665void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateYLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1666                                                      dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1667													  const unsigned int blockXSize,
1668													  const unsigned int blockYSize,
1669													  const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1670													  const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1671													  const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1672{
1673    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1674    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1675    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1676    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1677    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1678    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1679}
1680
1681void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateZLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1682                                                      dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1683													  const unsigned int blockXSize,
1684													  const unsigned int blockZSize,
1685													  const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1686													  const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1687													  const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1688{
1689    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1690    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize;
1691    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize/blockZSize;
1692    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1693    (*threadBlockSize).y = 1;
1694    (*threadBlockSize).z = blockZSize;
1695}
1696
1697void MGPUIntMpdRdmeSolver::calculateReactionLaunchParameters(dim3 * gridSize,
1698                                                             dim3 * threadBlockSize,
1699															 const unsigned int blockXSize,
1700															 const unsigned int blockYSize,
1701															 const unsigned int latticeXSize,
1702															 const unsigned int latticeYSize,
1703															 const unsigned int latticeZSize)
1704{
1705    (*gridSize).x = latticeXSize/blockXSize;
1706    (*gridSize).y = latticeYSize/blockYSize;
1707    (*gridSize).z = latticeZSize;
1708    (*threadBlockSize).x = blockXSize;
1709    (*threadBlockSize).y = blockYSize;
1710    (*threadBlockSize).z = 1;
1711}
1712
1713namespace mgpuintmpdrdme_dev {
1714/**
1715 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1716 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1717 */
1718__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1719{
1720	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1721	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
1722	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1723	
1724    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1725    const unsigned int latticeXIndex = x;
1726	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1727	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1728	const unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1729
1730    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1731    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1732    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1733
1734    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
1735    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1736    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
1737
1738    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1739    copyXWindowFromLattice(blockIdx.x, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1740    copyXWindowFromSites(blockIdx.x, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
1741    __syncthreads();
1742
1743    ////////////////////////////////////////
1744    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1745    ////////////////////////////////////////
1746
1747    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1748
1749    // Make the choices.
1750    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
1751	__syncthreads();
1752
1753    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1754    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1755    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1756
1757    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1758    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1759}
1760
1761
1762/**
1763 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1764 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1765 */
1766__global__ void MGPU_y_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
1767{
1768
1769	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1770	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
1771	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z;
1772
1773    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1774    unsigned int latticeYIndex = (blockIdx.y*blockDim.y) + threadIdx.y;
1775    unsigned int windowYIndex = threadIdx.y+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1776    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowYIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1777
1778	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1779	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1780
1781    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1782    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1783    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1784
1785    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1786    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1787    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE];
1788
1789    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1790    copyYWindowFromLattice(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1791    copyYWindowFromSites(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex);
1792    __syncthreads();
1793
1794    ////////////////////////////////////////
1795    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1796    ////////////////////////////////////////
1797
1798    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1799
1800    // Make the choices.
1801    makeYDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeYIndex, windowIndex, windowYIndex, timestepHash);
1802	__syncthreads();
1803
1804    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1805    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1806    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1807
1808    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1809    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Y_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Y_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1810}
1811
1812/**
1813 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1814 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1815 */
1816__global__ void MGPU_z_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start)
1817{
1818	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
1819	const unsigned int y = blockIdx.y;
1820	const unsigned int z = (blockDim.z * blockIdx.z) + threadIdx.z + z_start;
1821
1822    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1823	int global_z = z + goffsetZC;
1824    unsigned int windowZIndex = threadIdx.z+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
1825    unsigned int windowIndex = (windowZIndex*blockDim.x) + threadIdx.x;
1826
1827	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1828	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1829
1830    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1831    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
1832    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1833
1834    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment. Each lattice site has four particles, eight bits for each particle.
1835    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1836    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE];
1837
1838    // Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
1839    copyZWindowFromLattice_MGPU(inLattice, window, latticeIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1840    copyZWindowFromSites_MGPU(inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex);
1841    __syncthreads();
1842
1843    ////////////////////////////////////////
1844    // Make the choice for each particle. //
1845    ////////////////////////////////////////
1846
1847    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1848
1849    // Make the choices.
1850    makeZDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, global_z, windowIndex, windowZIndex, timestepHash);
1851	__syncthreads();
1852
1853    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1854    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
1855    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
1856
1857    // Progate the choices to the new lattice segment.
1858    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, windowIndex, windowIndex+TUNE_MPD_Z_BLOCK_X_SIZE, MPD_Z_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
1859}
1860
1861/**
1862 * Multiparticle diffusion performed by copying the lattice section to shared memory, making a choice for each lattice
1863 * site, storing the new lattice into shared memory, and then updating the global lattice.
1864 */
1865#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1866#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1867__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG)
1868#else
1869__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start,   const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG)
1870#endif
1871#else
1872__global__ void MGPU_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, const unsigned int z_start)
1873#endif
1874{
1875	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
1876	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
1877	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1878
1879    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1880    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1881    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1882
1883    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1884    // Load the particles and site.          //
1885    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1886
1887    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1888    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1889        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1890    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1891
1892    ////////////////////////////////////////
1893    // Perform the reactions.             //
1894    ////////////////////////////////////////
1895
1896    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1897    float totalReactionPropensity = 0.0f;
1898    for (int i=0; i<numberReactionsC; i++)
1899    {
1900#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1901#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1902        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, i, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1903#else
1904        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, i, RLG);
1905#endif
1906#else
1907        totalReactionPropensity += calculateReactionPropensity(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, i);
1908#endif
1909    }
1910
1911
1912    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
1913    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
1914    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
1915
1916    // If there was a reaction, process it.
1917    if (reactionOccurred)
1918    {
1919        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
1920#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1921#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1922        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
1923#else
1924        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
1925#endif
1926#else
1927        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
1928#endif
1929
1930        // Construct the new site.
1931#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1932        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
1933#else
1934        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
1935#endif
1936
1937        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
1938        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1939             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
1940    }
1941}
1942
1943#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
1944#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
1945__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1946#else
1947__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1948#endif
1949#else
1950__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2)
1951#endif
1952{
1953	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
1954	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
1955	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
1956
1957    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
1958    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
1959    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
1960
1961    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1962    // Load the particles and site.          //
1963    ///////////////////////////////////////////
1964
1965    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
1966    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
1967        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
1968    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
1969
1970    ////////////////////////////////////////
1971    // Perform the reactions.             //
1972    ////////////////////////////////////////
1973
1974    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
1975    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
1976    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
1977	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
1978	{
1979		uint32_t p1=((uint32_t*)particles)[i];
1980		if(p1 > 0)
1981		{
1982			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
1983			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
1984			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
1985			{
1986				uint32_t p2=((uint32_t*)particles)[j];
1987				if(p2 > 0)
1988				{
1989					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
1990					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
1991				}
1992			}
1993		}
1994	}
1995
1996
1997	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
1998	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
1999		return;
2000
2001    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
2002    float reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
2003    unsigned int reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
2004
2005    // If there was a reaction, process it.
2006    if (reactionOccurred)
2007    {
2008        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
2009#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2010#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
2011        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
2012#else
2013        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
2014#endif
2015#else
2016        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
2017#endif
2018
2019        // Construct the new site.
2020#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2021        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
2022#else
2023        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
2024#endif
2025
2026        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
2027        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2028             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
2029    }
2030}
2031
2032__global__ void correct_overflows_mgpu(unsigned int* lattice, unsigned int* siteOverflowList)
2033{
2034	// Remember: #define MPD_OVERFLOW_LIST_SIZE       1+2*TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS*sizeof(uint32_t)
2035	// Requirement: one block with TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS threads
2036	
2037	const unsigned int i = threadIdx.x;
2038	const unsigned int total = siteOverflowList[0];
2039
2040	__shared__ unsigned int indexes[TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS];
2041	__shared__ unsigned int maxround;
2042
2043	// Do I have an overflow to look at?
2044	if(i >= total)
2045		return;
2046
2047	// Abort if overflows have overflown
2048	if(threadIdx.x == 0) assert(total < TUNE_MPD_MAX_PARTICLE_OVERFLOWS);
2049
2050	// load our index
2051	lattice_size_t latticeIndex = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+1];
2052	particle_t particle = siteOverflowList[(i*2)+2];
2053
2054	indexes[i] = latticeIndex;
2055
2056	// zero out list
2057	maxround=0;
2058	__syncthreads();
2059	siteOverflowList[0]=0;
2060
2061	// Discover which round I should go in.  To prevent situations where two threads
2062	// will try and add a particle to the same site at the same time, and thus
2063	// negating the others, each thread determines what round it is allowed to make
2064	// edits in, by determining how many previous overflows are occuring at the 
2065	// same index.
2066	int round=0;
2067	for(int j=0; j < i; j++)
2068	{
2069		if(indexes[j] == latticeIndex)
2070			round++;
2071	}
2072	atomicMax(&maxround, round);
2073	__syncthreads();
2074
2075	for(int r=0; r <= maxround; r++)
2076	{
2077		if(round == r)
2078		{
2079			unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2080			for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2081				particles[w] = lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
2082			
2083			uint32_t *p=(uint32_t*)particles;
2084			int ok=0;
2085			for(int pi=0; pi<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; pi++)
2086			{
2087				if(p[pi] == 0)
2088				{
2089					p[pi]=particle;
2090					ok=1;
2091					//printf("(round %d) Corrected overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
2092					break;
2093				}
2094			}
2095
2096			if(ok)
2097			{
2098				// Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
2099				for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2100				     lattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
2101			}
2102			else
2103			{
2104				int exceptionIndex = atomicAdd(siteOverflowList, 1);
2105				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+1]=latticeIndex;
2106				siteOverflowList[(exceptionIndex*2)+2]=particle;
2107				//printf("(round %d) Failed to correct overflow of particle %d at index %d\n", r, particle, latticeIndex);
2108			}
2109		}
2110		__syncthreads();
2111	}
2112
2113	//if(i  == 0)
2114		//printf("%d) in: %d overflows, out: %d\n", gpuidC, total, siteOverflowList[0]);
2115
2116}
2117
2118#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2119#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
2120__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionOrdersG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ reactionSitesG, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D1G, const unsigned int* __restrict__ D2G, const float* __restrict__ reactionRatesG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2121#else
2122__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start, const __restrict__ int8_t *SG, const __restrict__ uint8_t *RLG, const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2123#endif
2124#else
2125__global__ void __launch_bounds__(TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_X_SIZE*TUNE_MPD_REACTION_BLOCK_Y_SIZE,1) MGPU_precomp_reaction_kernel_packing(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, int z_start,  const float* __restrict__ qp0, const float* __restrict__ qp1, const float* __restrict__ qp2, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int* buf_bot)
2126#endif
2127{
2128	const unsigned int x = blockDim.x * blockIdx.x + threadIdx.x;
2129	const unsigned int y = blockDim.y * blockIdx.y + threadIdx.y;
2130	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
2131
2132    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
2133    unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
2134    unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
2135
2136    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2137    // Load the particles and site.          //
2138    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2139
2140    unsigned int particles[MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2141    for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2142        particles[w] = inLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset];
2143    uint8_t siteType = inSites[latticeIndex];
2144
2145    ////////////////////////////////////////
2146    // Perform the reactions.             //
2147    ////////////////////////////////////////
2148
2149    // Calculate the kinetic rate for each reaction at this site.
2150    float totalReactionPropensity = read_element(qp0,siteType);
2151    //float totalReactionPropensity = qp0[siteType];
2152	for(uint i=0; i<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; i++)
2153	{
2154		uint32_t p1=((uint32_t*)particles)[i];
2155		if(p1 > 0)
2156		{
2157			totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp1,(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)));
2158			//totalReactionPropensity += qp1[(siteType * numberSpeciesC + (p1-1))];
2159			for(uint j=i+1; j<MPD_PARTICLES_PER_SITE; j++)
2160			{
2161				uint32_t p2=((uint32_t*)particles)[j];
2162				if(p2 > 0)
2163				{
2164					totalReactionPropensity += read_element(qp2,siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1));
2165					//totalReactionPropensity += qp2[siteType*numberSpeciesC*numberSpeciesC + (p1-1)*numberSpeciesC + (p2-1)];
2166				}
2167			}
2168		}
2169	}
2170
2171	float reactionProbability;
2172	unsigned int reactionOccurred;
2173
2174	// If propensity is zero, no reaction can occur.
2175	if(totalReactionPropensity == 0.0f)
2176		goto letspackitup;
2177
2178    // See if a reaction occurred at the site.
2179    reactionProbability = calculateReactionProbability(totalReactionPropensity);
2180    reactionOccurred = checkForReaction(globalIndex, reactionProbability, timestepHash);
2181
2182    // If there was a reaction, process it.
2183    if (reactionOccurred)
2184    {
2185        // Figure out which reaction occurred.
2186#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2187#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_R_MATRIX
2188        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG, reactionOrdersG, reactionSitesG, D1G, D2G, reactionRatesG);
2189#else
2190        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash, RLG);
2191#endif
2192#else
2193        unsigned int reactionIndex = determineReactionIndex(siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, globalIndex, totalReactionPropensity, timestepHash);
2194#endif
2195
2196        // Construct the new site.
2197#ifdef MPD_GLOBAL_S_MATRIX
2198        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList, SG);
2199#else
2200        evaluateReaction(latticeIndex, siteType, (uint32_t*)particles, reactionIndex, siteOverflowList);
2201#endif
2202
2203        // Copy the new particles back into the lattice.
2204        for (uint w=0, latticeOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, latticeOffset+=latticeXYZSizeC)
2205             outLattice[latticeIndex+latticeOffset] = particles[w];
2206    }
2207
2208letspackitup:
2209
2210	bool in_top_send = (z < (top_send_z + top_dim_z));
2211	bool in_bot_send = (z >= bot_send_z);
2212
2213/*
2214	if(x == 0 && y == 0 && in_top_send)
2215		printf("%d, %d, %d in top send send z =%d, dim z = %d, sz=%d\n", x, y, z, top_send_z, top_dim_z, top_dim_size);
2216	if(x == 0 && y == 0 && in_bot_send)
2217		printf("%d, %d, %d in bot send send z =%d, dim z = %d, sz=%d\n", x, y, z, bot_send_z, bot_dim_z, bot_dim_size);
2218*/
2219
2220	if(in_top_send && buf_top != NULL)
2221	{
2222		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-top_send_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2223        for (uint w=0, packOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, packOffset+=top_dim_size)
2224             buf_top[packidx+packOffset] = particles[w];
2225	}
2226
2227	if(in_bot_send && buf_bot != NULL)
2228	{
2229		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-bot_send_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2230        for (uint w=0, packOffset=0; w<MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE; w++, packOffset+=bot_dim_size)
2231             buf_bot[packidx+packOffset] = particles[w];
2232	}
2233}
2234
2235__global__ void MGPU_x_kernel_unpack(const unsigned int* inLattice, const uint8_t * inSites, unsigned int* outLattice, const unsigned int z_start, const unsigned long long timestepHash, unsigned int* siteOverflowList, unsigned int* buf_top, unsigned int *buf_bot)
2236{
2237	const unsigned int x = (blockDim.x * blockIdx.x) + threadIdx.x;
2238	const unsigned int y = (blockDim.y * blockIdx.y) + threadIdx.y;
2239	const unsigned int z = blockIdx.z+z_start;
2240	
2241    // Figure out the offset of this thread in the lattice and the lattice segment.
2242    const unsigned int latticeXIndex = x;
2243	unsigned int latticeIndex = local_index(x, y, z);
2244	unsigned int globalIndex = local_to_global(x, y, z); // Use the global lattice index for RNG
2245	const unsigned int windowIndex = threadIdx.x+MPD_APRON_SIZE;
2246
2247	// Check if I need to read from buffer and not lattice
2248	bool in_top_recv = (z < (top_recv_z + top_dim_z));
2249	bool in_bot_recv = (z >= bot_recv_z);
2250
2251    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2252    // Load the lattice into shared memory. //
2253    ///////////////////////////////////////////
2254
2255    // Shared memory to store the lattice segment.
2256    __shared__ unsigned int window[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2257    __shared__ uint8_t sitesWindow[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE];
2258
2259	if(in_top_recv && buf_top != NULL)
2260	{
2261		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-top_recv_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2262		copyXWindowFromBuffer(blockIdx.x, buf_top, window, packidx, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, top_dim_size);
2263	}
2264	else if(in_bot_recv && buf_bot != NULL)
2265	{
2266		unsigned int packidx = x + y*latticeXSizeC + (z-bot_recv_z)*latticeXYSizeC;
2267		copyXWindowFromBuffer(blockIdx.x, buf_bot, window, packidx, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, bot_dim_size);
2268	}
2269	else
2270	{
2271		// Copy the x window from device memory into shared memory.
2272		copyXWindowFromLattice(blockIdx.x, inLattice, window, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
2273	}
2274
2275    copyXWindowFromSites(blockIdx.x, inSites, sitesWindow, latticeIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex);
2276    __syncthreads();
2277
2278    ////////////////////////////////////////
2279    // Make the choice for each particle. //
2280    ////////////////////////////////////////
2281
2282    __shared__ unsigned int choices[MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE*MPD_WORDS_PER_SITE];
2283
2284    // Make the choices.
2285    makeXDiffusionChoices(window, sitesWindow, choices, globalIndex, latticeXIndex, windowIndex, blockDim.x, timestepHash);
2286	__syncthreads();
2287
2288    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2289    // Create version of the lattice at the next time step. //
2290    //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
2291
2292    // Propagate the choices to the new lattice segment.
2293    performPropagation(outLattice, window, choices, latticeIndex, windowIndex-1, windowIndex, windowIndex+1, MPD_X_WINDOW_SIZE, siteOverflowList);
2294}
2295
2296// For periodic lattices with a potentially negative offset
2297__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2298{
2299    ssize_t ix=(int)x+goffsetXC;
2300    ix += ((int)y+goffsetYC)*(int)latticeXSizeC;
2301    ix += ((int)z+goffsetZC)*(int)latticeXYSizeC;
2302    size_t max_index = global_latticeXYZSizeC;
2303    if(ix < 0)
2304        return ix+max_index;
2305    else if(ix >= max_index)
2306        return ix-max_index;
2307    else
2308        return ix;
2309}
2310/*
2311// For non-periodic lattices with a strictly positive offset
2312__device__ inline size_t local_to_global(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2313{
2314    size_t ix=x+goffsetXC;
2315    ix += (y+goffsetYC)*latticeXSizeC;
2316    ix += (z+goffsetZC)*latticeXYSizeC;
2317	return ix;
2318}
2319*/
2320
2321__device__ inline size_t local_index(unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
2322{
2323	return x + y*latticeXSizeC + z*latticeXYSizeC;
2324}
2325
2326}
2327}
2328}

Shape Classes#

Shape.h#

  1/*

  8 *               http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten

 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 *
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice,
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 *
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice,
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 *
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 *

 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE,
