288    virtual void loadParameters();
289    virtual void loadModel();
290    virtual ReplicateHandles * openReplicateHandles(unsigned int replicate);
291    virtual ReplicateHandles * createReplicateHandles(string replicateString);
292    virtual void closeReplicateHandles(ReplicateHandles * handles);
293	
294protected:
295    string          filename;       // HDF5 file name
296    hid_t           file;           // file handle
297    unsigned int    version;        // HDF5 file version
298
299    // Main group handles.
300    hid_t           parametersGroup, modelGroup, simulationsGroup;
301
302    // The parameters.
303    map<string,string> parameterMap;
304
305    // The model.
306    bool            modelLoaded;
307    unsigned int    numberSpecies;
308
309    // Handles for each replicate that is open.
310    map<unsigned int,ReplicateHandles *> openReplicates;
311
312};
313
314}
315}
316}
317
318#endif

SimulationFile.cpp#

   1/*
   2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
   3 * Copyright 2010-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
   4 * All rights reserved.
   5 * 
   6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
   7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
   8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
   9 * 
  10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
  11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
  12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
  13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
  14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
  15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
  16 * 
  17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
  18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
  19 * 
  20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
  21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
  22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
  23 * 
  24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
  25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
  26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
  27 * permission.
  28 * 
  29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
  30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
  31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
  32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
  33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
  34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
  35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
  36 *
  37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
  38 */
  39
  40#include <cstdio>
  41#include <cstring>
  42#include <string>
  43#include <sstream>
  44#include <map>
  45#include <list>
  46#include <vector>
  47#include <sys/stat.h>
  48#include "config.h"
  49#include "core/Exceptions.h"
  50#include "core/Math.h"
  51#include "core/Print.h"
  52#include "io/ArbitraryH5.h"
  53#include "DiffusionModel.pb.h"
  54#include "FirstPassageTimes.pb.h"
  55#include "Lattice.pb.h"
  56#include "ParameterValues.pb.h"
  57#include "ReactionModel.pb.h"
  58#include "SpatialModel.pb.h"
  59#include "SpeciesCounts.pb.h"
  60#include "io/lm_hdf5.h"
  61#include "io/SimulationFile.h"
  62#include "rdme/Lattice.h"
  63#include "rdme/ByteLattice.h"
  64#include "rdme/IntLattice.h"
  65
  66using std::list;
  67using std::map;
  68using std::string;
  69using std::vector;
  70using lm::IOException;
  71
  72namespace lm {
  73namespace io {
  74namespace hdf5 {
  75
  76const uint SimulationFile::MIN_VERSION                   = 2;
  77const uint SimulationFile::CURRENT_VERSION               = 4;
  78const uint SimulationFile::MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS   = 10;
  79const uint SimulationFile::MAX_SHAPE_PARAMETERS		     = 10;
  80
  81
  82SimulationFile::SimulationFile(const string filename)
  83:filename(filename),file(H5I_INVALID_HID),version(0),parametersGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),modelGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),simulationsGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),modelLoaded(false),numberSpecies(0)
  84{
  85	open();
  86}
  87
  88SimulationFile::SimulationFile(const char* filename)
  89:filename(filename),file(H5I_INVALID_HID),version(0),parametersGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),modelGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),simulationsGroup(H5I_INVALID_HID),modelLoaded(false),numberSpecies(0)
  90{
  91	open();
  92}
  93
  94void SimulationFile::open()
  95{
  96    // Make sure gzip is supported.
  97    unsigned int filter_info;
  98    if (!H5Zfilter_avail(H5Z_FILTER_DEFLATE)) throw lm::Exception("The HDF5 library does not support gzip compression.");
  99    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Zget_filter_info (H5Z_FILTER_DEFLATE, &filter_info));
 100    if (!(filter_info & H5Z_FILTER_CONFIG_ENCODE_ENABLED) || !(filter_info & H5Z_FILTER_CONFIG_DECODE_ENABLED)) throw lm::Exception("The HDF5 library does not support gzip filtering for both encoding and decoding.");
 101
 102    // Turn of error printing.
 103    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Eset_auto2(H5E_DEFAULT, NULL, NULL));
 104
 105    // Make sure the file exists.
 106    struct stat fileStats;
 107    if (stat(filename.c_str(), &fileStats) != 0) throw lm::IOException("the specified file did not exist", filename.c_str());
 108
 109    // Make sure it is a regular file.
 110    if (!S_ISREG(fileStats.st_mode)) throw lm::IOException("the specified file was not a regular file", filename.c_str());
 111
 112    // Make sure the file has the correct magic and hdf headers.
 113    if (!isValidFile(filename)) throw lm::IOException("the specified file was not of the correct format", filename.c_str());
 114
 115    // Open the file.
 116    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(file,H5Fopen(filename.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDWR, H5P_DEFAULT));
 117
 118    // Get the size of the user block.
 119    hid_t creationProperties;
 120    hsize_t userblockSize;
 121    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(creationProperties,H5Fget_create_plist(file));
 122    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pget_userblock(creationProperties, &userblockSize));
 123    if (userblockSize < 4) throw lm::IOException("the specified file did not have the correct user block size", userblockSize);
 124
 125    // Make sure the version is supported.
 126    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/", "formatVersion", &version));
 127    if (version < MIN_VERSION || version > CURRENT_VERSION) throw lm::IOException("the specified file format version is not supported", version);
 128
 129    // Open the groups.
 130    openGroups();
 131
 132    // Loaded the parameters.
 133    loadParameters();
 134}
 135
 136void SimulationFile::openGroups()
 137{
 138    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(parametersGroup,H5Gopen2(file, "/Parameters", H5P_DEFAULT));
 139    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(modelGroup,H5Gopen2(file, "/Model", H5P_DEFAULT));
 140    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(simulationsGroup,H5Gopen2(file, "/Simulations", H5P_DEFAULT));
 141}
 142
 143SimulationFile::~SimulationFile()
 144{
 145	//Close the file, if it is still open.
 146	close();
 147}
 148
 149void SimulationFile::flush()
 150{
 151    if (file != H5I_INVALID_HID)
 152    {
 153        lm::Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Flushing file %s.", filename.c_str());
 154        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Fflush(file, H5F_SCOPE_GLOBAL));
 155    }
 156}
 157
 158string SimulationFile::checkpoint()
 159{
 160    // Close the file.
 161    close();
 162
 163    // Copy the file to a checkpoint file.
 164    string checkpointFilename(filename+".chk");
 165    FILE * out=NULL, * in=NULL;
 166    in=fopen(filename.c_str(), "rb");
 167    if (in == NULL) throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint input file could not be opened", filename.c_str());
 168    out=fopen(checkpointFilename.c_str(), "wb");
 169    if (out == NULL) throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint output file could not be opened", checkpointFilename.c_str());
 170    size_t bufferSize = 1024*1024;
 171    char * buffer = new char[bufferSize];
 172    while (!feof(in))
 173    {
 174        size_t bytesRead = fread(buffer, sizeof(char), bufferSize, in);
 175        if (bytesRead != bufferSize && ferror(in)) throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint input file could not be read", filename.c_str());
 176        size_t bytesWritten = fwrite(buffer, sizeof(char), bytesRead, out);
 177        if (bytesWritten != bytesRead) throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint input file could not be read", checkpointFilename.c_str());
 178    }
 179    if (fclose(in) != 0)  throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint input file could not be closed", filename.c_str());
 180    if (fclose(out) != 0)  throw lm::IOException("the checkpoint output file could not be closed", checkpointFilename.c_str());
 181    delete[] buffer;
 182
 183    // Open the file again.
 184    open();
 185
 186    return checkpointFilename;
 187}
 188
 189void SimulationFile::close()
 190{
 191    // Close any open replicate groups.
 192    closeAllReplicates();
 193
 194    // Close any open groups.
 195    if (parametersGroup != H5I_INVALID_HID)
 196    {
 197        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(parametersGroup));
 198        parametersGroup = H5I_INVALID_HID;
 199    }
 200    if (modelGroup != H5I_INVALID_HID)
 201    {
 202        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(modelGroup));
 203        modelGroup = H5I_INVALID_HID;
 204    }
 205    if (simulationsGroup != H5I_INVALID_HID)
 206    {
 207        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(simulationsGroup));
 208        simulationsGroup = H5I_INVALID_HID;
 209    }
 210
 211    // Close the file.
 212    if (file != H5I_INVALID_HID)
 213    {
 214        lm::Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Closing file %s, %d open objects remaining.", filename.c_str(), H5Fget_obj_count(file, H5F_OBJ_ALL)-1);
 215        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Fclose(file));
 216        file = H5I_INVALID_HID;
 217    }
 218}
 219
 220bool SimulationFile::isValidFile(const char * filename)
 221{
 222    return isValidFile(string(filename));
 223}
 224
 225bool SimulationFile::isValidFile(const string filename)
 226{
 227    // Make sure the file has the right magic.
 228    FILE * fp = NULL;
 229    fp=fopen(filename.c_str(), "r");
 230    if (fp == NULL) throw lm::IOException("the specified file could not be opened", filename.c_str());
 231    char magic[5];
 232    magic[4] = '\0';
 233    for (int i=0; i<4; i++)
 234    {
 235        magic[i] = fgetc(fp);
 236        if (magic[i] == EOF)
 237        {
 238            magic[i] = '\0';
 239            break;
 240        }
 241    }
 242    if (fclose(fp) != 0)  throw lm::IOException("the specified file could not be closed", filename.c_str());
 243    if (strncmp(magic, "LMH5", 4) != 0) return false;
 244
 245    // Make sure it is an hdf5 file.
 246    int isHdf5 = false;
 247    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(isHdf5,H5Fis_hdf5(filename.c_str()));
 248    if (!isHdf5) return false;
 249
 250    return true;
 251
 252}
 253
 254void SimulationFile::loadParameters()
 255{
 256    hsize_t n=0;
 257    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aiterate2(parametersGroup, H5_INDEX_CRT_ORDER, H5_ITER_NATIVE, &n, &SimulationFile::parseParameter, this));
 258}
 259
 260herr_t SimulationFile::parseParameter(hid_t location_id, const char *attr_name, const H5A_info_t *ainfo, void *op_data)
 261{
 262    SimulationFile * file = reinterpret_cast<SimulationFile *>(op_data);
 263
 264    // Open the attribute.
 265    hid_t attr, type;
 266    H5T_class_t typeClass;
 267    hsize_t size;
 268    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(attr,H5Aopen(location_id, attr_name, H5P_DEFAULT));
 269    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(type,H5Aget_type(attr));
 270    typeClass=H5Tget_class(type);
 271    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(size,H5Aget_storage_size(attr));
 272    if (file->version == 2 && typeClass==H5T_FLOAT && size == sizeof(double))
 273    {
 274        double value;
 275        char buffer[33];
 276        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aread(attr, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, &value));
 277        snprintf(buffer, sizeof(buffer), "%g", value);
 278        file->parameterMap[attr_name] = buffer;
 279    }
 280    else if (file->version >= 3 && typeClass==H5T_STRING)
 281    {
 282        // Get the dataspace.
 283        hid_t space;
 284        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(space,H5Aget_space(attr));
 285
 286        // Create the memory datatype.
 287        hid_t memtype;
 288        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memtype,H5Tcopy(H5T_C_S1));
 289        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Tset_size(memtype, size));
 290
 291        // Read the data.
 292        char * value = new char[size];
 293        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aread(attr, memtype, value));
 294
 295        // Add the parameter to the map.
 296        file->parameterMap[attr_name] = value;
 297
 298        // Reclaim the memory.
 299        delete [] value;
 300        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(space));
 301        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Tclose(memtype));
 302    }
 303    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Tclose(type));
 304    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aclose(attr));
 305    return 0;
 306}
 307
 308map<string,string> SimulationFile::getParameters()
 309{
 310    return parameterMap;
 311}
 312
 313string SimulationFile::getParameter(string key, string defaultValue)
 314{
 315    // If we didn't find the key, return the default value.
 316    map<string,string>::iterator it = parameterMap.find(key);
 317    if (it == parameterMap.end()) return defaultValue;
 318
 319    return it->second;
 320}
 321
 322void SimulationFile::setParameter(string key, string value)
 323{
 324    // Set the parameter in the map.
 325    parameterMap[key] = value;
 326
 327    // Save the parameter in the file.
 328    if (version <= 2)
 329    {
 330        double dvalue = atof(value.c_str());
 331        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_double(file, "/Parameters", key.c_str(), &dvalue, 1));
 332    }
 333    else
 334    {
 335        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_string(file, "/Parameters", key.c_str(), value.c_str()));
 336    }
 337}
 338
 339void SimulationFile::loadModel()
 340{
 341    if (!modelLoaded)
 342    {
 343        if (version <= 3)
 344        {
 345            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies));
 346            modelLoaded = true;
 347        }
 348        else
 349        {
 350            if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Reaction", H5P_DEFAULT) > 0)
 351            {
 352                HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies));
 353                modelLoaded = true;
 354            }
 355            else
 356            {
 357                throw Exception("No model has been defined.");
 358            }
 359        }
 360    }
 361}
 362
 363void SimulationFile::getReactionModel(lm::io::ReactionModel * reactionModel)
 364{
 365    // Make sure the model is not null and then clear it.
 366    if (reactionModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel", "cannot be null");
 367    reactionModel->Clear();
 368
 369    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Reaction", H5P_DEFAULT))
 370    {
 371        // Read at least the numbers of species.
 372        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies));
 373        reactionModel->set_number_species(numberSpecies);
 374        reactionModel->set_number_reactions(0);
 375
 376        // If we have the number of reactions, we must have a full model so read it.
 377        if (H5Aexists_by_name(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberReactions", H5P_DEFAULT) > 0)
 378        {
 379            hsize_t dims[2];
 380            H5T_class_t type;
 381            size_t size;
 382
 383            // Read the initial species counts.
 384            H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/InitialSpeciesCounts", dims, &type, &size);
 385            if (dims[0] != numberSpecies || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/InitialSpeciesCounts");
 386
 387	    // Read the initial species counts.
 388	    int * sbuf = new int[numberSpecies];
 389	    H5LTread_dataset_int(file, "/Model/Reaction/InitialSpeciesCounts", sbuf);
 390	    for (uint i=0; i<numberSpecies; i++) reactionModel->add_initial_species_count((uint)sbuf[i]);
 391	    delete [] sbuf;
 392
 393            // Read the number of reactions.
 394            uint numberReactions;
 395            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberReactions", &numberReactions));
 396            reactionModel->set_number_reactions(numberReactions);
 397
 398            // Read the reaction tables.
 399            if (numberReactions > 0)
 400            {
 401                // Make sure all of the data sets are the correct size.
 402                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionTypes", dims, &type, &size);
 403                if (dims[0] != numberReactions || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/ReactionTypes");
 404                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateConstants", dims, &type, &size);
 405                if (dims[0] != numberReactions || dims[1] != MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS || size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateConstants");
 406                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/StoichiometricMatrix", dims, &type, &size);
 407                if (dims[0] != numberSpecies || dims[1] != numberReactions || size != sizeof(int)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/StoichiometricMatrix");
 408                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/DependencyMatrix", dims, &type, &size);
 409                if (dims[0] != numberSpecies || dims[1] != numberReactions || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/DependencyMatrix");
 410
 411                // If we have rate noise terms, make sure they are the correct size.
 412                const uint NUMBER_NOISE_COLS = 2;
 413                bool hasNoiseTable = false;
 414                if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateNoise", H5P_DEFAULT))
 415                {
 416                    hasNoiseTable = true;
 417                    H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateNoise", dims, &type, &size);
 418                    if (dims[0] != numberReactions || dims[1] != NUMBER_NOISE_COLS || size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateNoise");
 419                }
 420
 421                // Allocate some buffers for reading the data.
 422                int * intBuffer = new int[numberSpecies*numberReactions];
 423                double * doubleBuffer = new double[numberReactions*MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS];
 424                double * noiseBuffer = new double[numberReactions*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS];
 425
 426                // Read the reaction info.
 427                H5LTread_dataset_int(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionTypes", intBuffer);
 428                H5LTread_dataset_double(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateConstants", doubleBuffer);
 429                if (hasNoiseTable) H5LTread_dataset_double(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateNoise", noiseBuffer);
 430                for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 431                {
 432                    reactionModel->add_reaction();
 433                    reactionModel->mutable_reaction(i)->set_type((uint)intBuffer[i]);
 434                    for (uint j=0; j<MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS; j++)
 435                    {
 436                        double k = doubleBuffer[i*MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS+j];
 437                        if (!std::isnan(k))
 438                            reactionModel->mutable_reaction(i)->add_rate_constant(k);
 439                        else
 440                            break;
 441                    }
 442
 443                    // If we have noise terms, set them.
 444                    if (hasNoiseTable)
 445                    {
 446                        double nvar = noiseBuffer[i*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS];
 447                        double ntau = noiseBuffer[i*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS+1];
 448                        if (nvar > 0.0 && ntau > 0.0 && !std::isnan(nvar) && !std::isnan(ntau))
 449                        {
 450                            reactionModel->mutable_reaction(i)->set_rate_has_noise(true);
 451                            reactionModel->mutable_reaction(i)->set_rate_noise_variance(nvar);
 452                            reactionModel->mutable_reaction(i)->set_rate_noise_tau(ntau);
 453                        }
 454                    }
 455                }
 456
 457                // Read the matrices.
 458                H5LTread_dataset_int(file, "/Model/Reaction/StoichiometricMatrix", intBuffer);
 459                for (uint i=0; i<numberSpecies*numberReactions; i++) reactionModel->add_stoichiometric_matrix(intBuffer[i]);
 460                H5LTread_dataset_int(file, "/Model/Reaction/DependencyMatrix", intBuffer);
 461                for (uint i=0; i<numberSpecies*numberReactions; i++) reactionModel->add_dependency_matrix((uint)intBuffer[i]);
 462
 463                // Free the buffers.
 464                delete [] noiseBuffer;
 465                delete [] doubleBuffer;
 466                delete [] intBuffer;
 467            }
 468        }
 469    }
 470}
 471
 472void SimulationFile::setReactionModel(lm::io::ReactionModel * reactionModel)
 473{
 474    // Validate that the model is consistent.
 475    if (reactionModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel", "cannot be NULL");
 476    if (reactionModel->number_species() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel.number_species", "cannot be zero");
 477    if (reactionModel->initial_species_count_size() != (int)reactionModel->number_species()) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel.initial_species_count", "inconsistent size");
 478    if (reactionModel->reaction_size() != (int)reactionModel->number_reactions()) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel.reaction", "inconsistent size");
 479    if (reactionModel->stoichiometric_matrix_size() != (int)(reactionModel->number_species()*reactionModel->number_reactions())) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel.stoichiometric_matrix", "inconsistent size");
 480    if (reactionModel->dependency_matrix_size() != (int)(reactionModel->number_species()*reactionModel->number_reactions())) throw InvalidArgException("reactionModel.dependency_matrix", "inconsistent size");
 481
 482    // If a reaction model already exists, delete it.
 483    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Reaction", H5P_DEFAULT))
 484    {
 485        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Ldelete(file, "/Model/Reaction", H5P_DEFAULT));
 486    }
 487
 488    // Create the group for the reaction model.
 489    hid_t group;
 490    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(group,H5Gcreate2(file, "/Model/Reaction", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
 491    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(group));
 492
 493    // Write the numbers of species and reactions.
 494    numberSpecies = reactionModel->number_species();
 495    uint numberReactions = reactionModel->number_reactions();
 496    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies, 1));
 497    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Reaction", "numberReactions", &numberReactions, 1));
 498
 499    hsize_t dims[2];
 500
 501    // Write the initial species counts.
 502    dims[0] = numberSpecies;
 503    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/InitialSpeciesCounts", 1, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, reactionModel->initial_species_count().data()));
 504
 505    // If we have any reactions, write out the reaction tables.
 506    if (reactionModel->number_reactions())
 507    {
 508        // Write the reaction tables.
 509        uint * types = new uint[numberReactions];
 510        double * constants = new double[numberReactions*MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS];
 511        bool hasNoiseTable = false;
 512        const uint NUMBER_NOISE_COLS = 2;
 513        double * noiseTerms = new double[numberReactions*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS];
 514        for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS; i++) noiseTerms[i] = 0.0;
 515        for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions; i++)
 516        {
 517            types[i] = reactionModel->reaction(i).type();
 518            uint j=0;
 519            for (; j<(uint)(reactionModel->reaction(i).rate_constant_size()) && j<MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS; j++)
 520                constants[i*MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS+j] = reactionModel->reaction(i).rate_constant(j);
 521            for (; j<MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS; j++)
 522                constants[i*MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS+j] = NAN;
 523
 524            // If we have noise terms, fill them in and mark that we need to create the noise table.
 525            if (reactionModel->reaction(i).rate_has_noise())
 526            {
 527                hasNoiseTable = true;
 528                noiseTerms[i*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS] = reactionModel->reaction(i).rate_noise_variance();
 529                noiseTerms[i*NUMBER_NOISE_COLS+1] = reactionModel->reaction(i).rate_noise_tau();
 530            }
 531        }
 532        dims[0] = numberReactions;
 533        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionTypes", 1, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, types));
 534        dims[0] = numberReactions;
 535        dims[1] = MAX_REACTION_RATE_CONSTANTS;
 536        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateConstants", 2, dims, H5T_IEEE_F64LE, constants));
 537
 538        // If necessary, create the noise table.
 539        if (hasNoiseTable)
 540        {
 541            dims[0] = numberReactions;
 542            dims[1] = NUMBER_NOISE_COLS;
 543            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/ReactionRateNoise", 2, dims, H5T_IEEE_F64LE, noiseTerms));
 544        }
 545        delete [] noiseTerms;
 546        delete [] constants;
 547        delete [] types;
 548
 549        // Write the matrices.
 550        dims[0] = numberSpecies;
 551        dims[1] = numberReactions;
 552        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/StoichiometricMatrix", 2, dims, H5T_STD_I32LE, reactionModel->stoichiometric_matrix().data()));
 553        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Reaction/DependencyMatrix", 2, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, reactionModel->dependency_matrix().data()));
 554    }
 555}
 556
 557void SimulationFile::getDiffusionModel(lm::io::DiffusionModel * diffusionModel)
 558{
 559    // Make sure the model is not null and then clear it.
 560    if (diffusionModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel", "cannot be null");
 561    diffusionModel->Clear();
 562
 563    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Diffusion", H5P_DEFAULT))
 564    {
 565        // Read the diffusion model attributes.
 566        uint numberSpecies, numberReactions, numberSiteTypes, latticeXSize, latticeYSize, latticeZSize, particlesPerSite;
 567        double latticeSpacing;
 568		uint bytes_per_particle;
 569        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies));
 570        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberReactions", &numberReactions));
 571        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberSiteTypes", &numberSiteTypes));
 572        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_double(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeSpacing", &latticeSpacing));
 573        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeXSize", &latticeXSize));
 574        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeYSize", &latticeYSize));
 575        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeZSize", &latticeZSize));
 576        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "particlesPerSite", &particlesPerSite));
 577		if(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "bytes_per_particle", &bytes_per_particle) < 0)
 578		{
 579			// Must not have existed, assume byte lattice
 580			bytes_per_particle=1;
 581		}
 582
 583        // Fill in the model.
 584        diffusionModel->set_number_species(numberSpecies);
 585        diffusionModel->set_number_reactions(numberReactions);
 586        diffusionModel->set_number_site_types(numberSiteTypes);
 587        diffusionModel->set_lattice_spacing(latticeSpacing);
 588        diffusionModel->set_lattice_x_size(latticeXSize);
 589        diffusionModel->set_lattice_y_size(latticeYSize);
 590        diffusionModel->set_lattice_z_size(latticeZSize);
 591        diffusionModel->set_particles_per_site(particlesPerSite);
 592        diffusionModel->set_bytes_per_particle(bytes_per_particle);
 593
 594        hsize_t dims[3];
 595        H5T_class_t type;
 596        size_t size;
 597
 598        // Read the diffusion matrix.
 599        H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/DiffusionMatrix", dims, &type, &size);
 600        if (dims[0] != numberSiteTypes || dims[1] != numberSiteTypes || dims[2] != numberSpecies || size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/DiffusionMatrix");
 601        double * D = new double[numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes*numberSpecies];
 602        H5LTread_dataset_double(file, "/Model/Diffusion/DiffusionMatrix", D);
 603        for (uint i=0; i<numberSiteTypes*numberSiteTypes*numberSpecies; i++) diffusionModel->add_diffusion_matrix(D[i]);
 604        delete [] D;
 605
 606        // If we have reactions, read the reaction location matrix.
 607        if (numberReactions > 0)
 608        {
 609            H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/ReactionLocationMatrix", dims, &type, &size);
 610            if (dims[0] != numberReactions || dims[1] != numberSiteTypes || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/ReactionLocationMatrix");
 611            uint * RL = new uint[numberReactions*numberSiteTypes];
 612			H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/ReactionLocationMatrix", H5T_STD_U32LE, RL);
 613			for (uint i=0; i<numberReactions*numberSiteTypes; i++) diffusionModel->add_reaction_location_matrix(RL[i]);
 614	        delete [] RL;
 615        }
 616    }
 617}
 618
 619void SimulationFile::getDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, uint8_t * lattice, size_t latticeSize, uint8_t * latticeSites, size_t latticeSitesSize)
 620{
 621    int ndims;
 622    hsize_t dims[4];
 623    H5T_class_t type;
 624    size_t size;
 625
 626    // Read the lattice.
 627    if (lattice != NULL)
 628    {
 629		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", &ndims));
 630		if (ndims != 4) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
 631		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice",dims, &type, &size));
 632		switch(m->bytes_per_particle())
 633		{
 634			case 1:
 635				if (m->lattice_x_size() != dims[0] || m->lattice_y_size() != dims[1] || m->lattice_z_size() != dims[2] || m->particles_per_site() != dims[3] || size != sizeof(uint8_t)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
 636				if (dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3] != latticeSize) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "incorrect lattice size");
 637				HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, lattice));
 638				break;
 639			case 4:
 640				if (m->lattice_x_size() != dims[0] || m->lattice_y_size() != dims[1] || m->lattice_z_size() != dims[2] || m->particles_per_site() != dims[3] || size != sizeof(uint32_t)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
 641				if (dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3]*size != latticeSize) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "incorrect lattice size");
 642				HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, lattice));
 643				break;
 644			default:
 645				throw Exception("Unknown bytes per particle", m->bytes_per_particle());
 646		}
 647    }
 648
 649    // Read the lattice sites.
 650    if (latticeSites != NULL)
 651    {
 652		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", &ndims));
 653		if (ndims != 3) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites");
 654		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites",dims, &type, &size));
 655		if (m->lattice_x_size() != dims[0] || m->lattice_y_size() != dims[1] || m->lattice_z_size() != dims[2] || size != sizeof(uint8_t)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites");
 656		if (dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2] != latticeSitesSize) throw InvalidArgException("latticeSites", "insufficient size");
 657		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, latticeSites));
 658    }
 659}
 660
 661void SimulationFile::getDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, lm::rdme::Lattice * lattice)
 662{
 663	if (lattice->getXSize() != m->lattice_x_size() || lattice->getYSize() != m->lattice_y_size() || lattice->getZSize() != m->lattice_z_size() || lattice->getMaxOccupancy() != m->particles_per_site()) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "lattice size not consistent with the diffusion model");
 664
 665	int ndims;
 666    hsize_t dims[4];
 667    H5T_class_t type;
 668    size_t size;
 669
 670    if (lattice != NULL)
 671    {
 672        // Read the lattice.
 673		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", &ndims));
 674		if (ndims != 4) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
 675		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice",dims, &type, &size));
 676		if (m->lattice_x_size() != dims[0] || m->lattice_y_size() != dims[1] || m->lattice_z_size() != dims[2] || m->particles_per_site() != dims[3] || size != sizeof(uint8_t)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
 677	    size_t latticeDataSize = dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3];
 678	    uint8_t * latticeData = new uint8_t[latticeDataSize];
 679		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, latticeData));
 680		lattice->setFromRowMajorByteData(latticeData, latticeDataSize);
 681		delete [] latticeData;
 682
 683		// Read the lattice sites.
 684		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", &ndims));
 685		if (ndims != 3) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites");
 686		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites",dims, &type, &size));
 687		if (m->lattice_x_size() != dims[0] || m->lattice_y_size() != dims[1] || m->lattice_z_size() != dims[2] || size != sizeof(uint8_t)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites");
 688	    size_t latticeSitesSize = dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2];
 689	    uint8_t * latticeSites = new uint8_t[latticeSitesSize];
 690		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, latticeSites));
 691		lattice->setSitesFromRowMajorByteData(latticeSites, latticeSitesSize);
 692		delete [] latticeSites;
 693    }
 694}
 695
 696void SimulationFile::setDiffusionModel(lm::io::DiffusionModel * diffusionModel)
 697{
 698    // Validate that the model is consistent.
 699    if (diffusionModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel", "cannot be NULL");
 700    if (diffusionModel->number_species() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.number_species", "cannot be zero");
 701    if (diffusionModel->number_site_types() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.number_site_types", "cannot be zero");
 702    if (diffusionModel->diffusion_matrix_size() != (int)(diffusionModel->number_site_types()*diffusionModel->number_site_types()*diffusionModel->number_species())) throw InvalidArgException("diffusion.diffusion_matrix", "inconsistent size");
 703    if (diffusionModel->reaction_location_matrix_size() != (int)(diffusionModel->number_reactions()*diffusionModel->number_site_types())) throw InvalidArgException("diffusion.reaction_location_matrix", "inconsistent size");
 704    if (diffusionModel->lattice_spacing() <= 0.0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.lattice_spacing", "must be greater than zero");
 705    if (diffusionModel->lattice_x_size() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.lattice_x_size", "cannot be zero");
 706    if (diffusionModel->lattice_y_size() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.lattice_y_size", "cannot be zero");
 707    if (diffusionModel->lattice_z_size() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.lattice_z_size", "cannot be zero");
 708    if (diffusionModel->particles_per_site() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.particles_per_site", "cannot be zero");
 709    if (diffusionModel->bytes_per_particle() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("diffusionModel.bytes_per_particle", "cannot be zero");
 710
 711    // If a diffusion model already exists, delete it.
 712    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Diffusion", H5P_DEFAULT))
 713    {
 714        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Ldelete(file, "/Model/Diffusion", H5P_DEFAULT));
 715    }
 716
 717    // Create the group for the reaction model.
 718    hid_t group;
 719    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(group,H5Gcreate2(file, "/Model/Diffusion", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
 720    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(group));
 721
 722    // Write the attributes.
 723    numberSpecies = diffusionModel->number_species();
 724    uint numberReactions = diffusionModel->number_reactions();
 725    uint numberSiteTypes = diffusionModel->number_site_types();
 726    double latticeSpacing = diffusionModel->lattice_spacing();
 727    uint latticeXSize = diffusionModel->lattice_x_size();
 728    uint latticeYSize = diffusionModel->lattice_y_size();
 729    uint latticeZSize = diffusionModel->lattice_z_size();
 730    uint particlesPerSite = diffusionModel->particles_per_site();
 731    uint bytes_per_particle = diffusionModel->bytes_per_particle();
 732    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberSpecies", &numberSpecies, 1));
 733    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberReactions", &numberReactions, 1));
 734    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "numberSiteTypes", &numberSiteTypes, 1));
 735    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_double(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeSpacing", &latticeSpacing, 1));
 736    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeXSize", &latticeXSize, 1));
 737    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeYSize", &latticeYSize, 1));
 738    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "latticeZSize", &latticeZSize, 1));
 739    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "particlesPerSite", &particlesPerSite, 1));
 740    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Diffusion", "bytes_per_particle", &bytes_per_particle, 1));
 741
 742    // Write the diffusion matrix.
 743    {
 744		const unsigned int RANK=3;
 745		hsize_t dims[RANK];
 746		dims[0] = numberSiteTypes;
 747		dims[1] = numberSiteTypes;
 748		dims[2] = numberSpecies;
 749		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/DiffusionMatrix", RANK, dims, H5T_IEEE_F64LE, diffusionModel->diffusion_matrix().data()));
 750	}
 751
 752    // Write the reaction location matrix.
 753    if (numberReactions > 0)
 754    {
 755		const unsigned int RANK=2;
 756		hsize_t dims[RANK];
 757		dims[0] = numberReactions;
 758		dims[1] = numberSiteTypes;
 759		HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Diffusion/ReactionLocationMatrix", RANK, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, diffusionModel->reaction_location_matrix().data()));
 760    }
 761}
 762
 763void SimulationFile::writeParticleLattice_U8LE(const char* path,  uint8_t *data, unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z, unsigned int w)
 764{
 765	unsigned int RANK=4;
 766	hsize_t dims[RANK], chunk[RANK];
 767	dims[0] = x;
 768	dims[1] = y;
 769	dims[2] = z;
 770	dims[3] = w;
 771	chunk[0] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,x);
 772	chunk[1] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,y);
 773	chunk[2] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,z);
 774	chunk[3] = w;
 775	hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
 776	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, NULL));
 777	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
 778	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
 779	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, RANK, chunk));
 780	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(file, path, H5T_STD_U8LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
 781	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
 782	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
 783	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
 784	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
 785}
 786
 787void SimulationFile::writeParticleLattice_U32LE(hid_t handle, const char* path,  unsigned int *data, unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z, unsigned int w)
 788{
 789	unsigned int RANK=4;
 790	hsize_t dims[RANK], chunk[RANK];
 791	dims[0] = x;
 792	dims[1] = y;
 793	dims[2] = z;
 794	dims[3] = w;
 795	chunk[0] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,x);
 796	chunk[1] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,y);
 797	chunk[2] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,z);
 798	chunk[3] = w;
 799	hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
 800	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, NULL));
 801	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
 802	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
 803	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, RANK, chunk));
 804	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(handle, path, H5T_STD_U32LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
 805	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
 806	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
 807	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
 808	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
 809}
 810
 811void SimulationFile::write3DLattice_U8LE(const char* path,  uint8_t *data, unsigned int x, unsigned int y, unsigned int z)
 812{
 813	unsigned int RANK=3;
 814	hsize_t dims[RANK], chunk[RANK];
 815	dims[0] = x;
 816	dims[1] = y;
 817	dims[2] = z;
 818	chunk[0] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,x);
 819	chunk[1] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,y);
 820	chunk[2] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,z);
 821	hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
 822	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, NULL));
 823	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
 824	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
 825	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, RANK, chunk));
 826	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(file, path, H5T_STD_U8LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
 827	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
 828	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
 829	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
 830	HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
 831}
 832
 833void SimulationFile::setDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, uint8_t * lattice, uint8_t * latticeSites)
 834{
 835	writeParticleLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", lattice, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size(), m->particles_per_site());
 836	write3DLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", latticeSites, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size());
 837}
 838
 839void SimulationFile::setDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, uint32_t * lattice, uint8_t * latticeSites)
 840{
 841	writeParticleLattice_U32LE(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", lattice, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size(), m->particles_per_site());
 842	write3DLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", latticeSites, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size());
 843}
 844
 845void SimulationFile::setDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, lm::rdme::ByteLattice * lattice)
 846{
 847	size_t latticeDataSize = m->lattice_x_size()*m->lattice_y_size()*m->lattice_z_size()*m->particles_per_site();
 848	byte * latticeData =  new byte[latticeDataSize];
 849	lm::rdme::Lattice::rowMajorByteSerialize(latticeData, lattice, latticeDataSize);
 850	writeParticleLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", latticeData, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size(), m->particles_per_site());
 851	delete [] latticeData;
 852
 853	size_t latticeSitesDataSize = m->lattice_x_size()*m->lattice_y_size()*m->lattice_z_size();
 854	byte * latticeSitesData =  new byte[latticeSitesDataSize];
 855	lm::rdme::Lattice::rowMajorByteSerializeSites(latticeSitesData, lattice, latticeSitesDataSize);
 856	write3DLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", latticeSitesData, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size());
 857	delete [] latticeSitesData;
 858}
 859
 860void SimulationFile::setDiffusionModelLattice(lm::io::DiffusionModel * m, lm::rdme::IntLattice * lattice)
 861{
 862	size_t latticeDataSize = m->lattice_x_size()*m->lattice_y_size()*m->lattice_z_size()*m->particles_per_site();
 863	uint32_t * latticeData =  new uint32_t[latticeDataSize];
 864	lm::rdme::Lattice::rowMajorIntSerialize(latticeData, lattice, latticeDataSize);
 865	writeParticleLattice_U32LE(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", latticeData, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size(), m->particles_per_site());
 866	delete [] latticeData;
 867			
 868	size_t latticeSitesDataSize = m->lattice_x_size()*m->lattice_y_size()*m->lattice_z_size();
 869	byte * latticeSitesData =  new byte[latticeSitesDataSize];
 870	lm::rdme::Lattice::rowMajorByteSerializeSites(latticeSitesData, lattice, latticeSitesDataSize);
 871	write3DLattice_U8LE("/Model/Diffusion/LatticeSites", latticeSitesData, m->lattice_x_size(), m->lattice_y_size(), m->lattice_z_size());
 872	delete [] latticeSitesData;
 873}
 874
 875void SimulationFile::getSpatialModel(lm::io::SpatialModel * spatialModel)
 876{
 877    // Make sure the model is not null and then clear it.
 878    if (spatialModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("spatialModel", "cannot be null");
 879    spatialModel->Clear();
 880
 881    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT))
 882    {
 883        // Read the diffusion model attributes.
 884        uint numberRegions, numberObstacles;
 885        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions", "numberRegions", &numberRegions));
 886        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles", "numberObstacles", &numberObstacles));
 887
 888        hsize_t dims[2];
 889        H5T_class_t type;
 890        size_t size;
 891
 892        if (numberRegions > 0)
 893        {
 894            // Read the region types table.
 895            {
 896                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/Types", dims, &type, &size);
 897                if (dims[0] != numberRegions || dims[1] != 2 || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Spatial/Regions/Types");
 898                uint * types = new uint[dims[0]*dims[1]];
 899                H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/Types", H5T_STD_U32LE, types);
 900                for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
 901                {
 902                    spatialModel->add_region();
 903                    spatialModel->mutable_region(i)->set_shape(types[i*dims[1]]);
 904                    spatialModel->mutable_region(i)->set_site_type(types[i*dims[1]+1]);
 905                }
 906                delete [] types;
 907            }
 908
 909            // Read the shape parameters table.
 910            {
 911                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/ShapeParameters", dims, &type, &size);
 912                if (dims[0] != numberRegions || dims[1] != MAX_SHAPE_PARAMETERS || size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Spatial/Regions/ShapeParameters");
 913                double * shapeParams = new double[dims[0]*dims[1]];
 914                H5LTread_dataset_double(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/ShapeParameters", shapeParams);
 915                for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
 916                {
 917                    for (uint j=0; j<dims[1]; j++)
 918                    {
 919                        double shapeParam = shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j];
 920                        if (!std::isnan(shapeParam))
 921                            spatialModel->mutable_region(i)->add_shape_parameter(shapeParam);
 922                        else
 923                            break;
 924                    }
 925                }
 926                delete [] shapeParams;
 927            }
 928        }
 929
 930        if (numberObstacles > 0)
 931        {
 932            // Read the obstacle types table.
 933            {
 934                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/Types", dims, &type, &size);
 935                if (dims[0] != numberObstacles || dims[1] != 2 || size != sizeof(uint)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/Types");
 936                uint * types = new uint[dims[0]*dims[1]];
 937                H5LTread_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/Types", H5T_STD_U32LE, types);
 938                for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
 939                {
 940                    spatialModel->add_obstacle();
 941                    spatialModel->mutable_obstacle(i)->set_shape(types[i*dims[1]]);
 942                    spatialModel->mutable_obstacle(i)->set_site_type(types[i*dims[1]+1]);
 943                }
 944                delete [] types;
 945            }
 946
 947            // Read the obstacle parameters table.
 948            {
 949                H5LTget_dataset_info(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/ShapeParameters", dims, &type, &size);
 950                if (dims[0] != numberObstacles || dims[1] != MAX_SHAPE_PARAMETERS || size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/ShapeParameters");
 951                double * shapeParams = new double[dims[0]*dims[1]];
 952                H5LTread_dataset_double(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/ShapeParameters", shapeParams);
 953                for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
 954                {
 955                    for (uint j=0; j<dims[1]; j++)
 956                    {
 957                        double shapeParam = shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j];
 958                        if (!std::isnan(shapeParam))
 959                            spatialModel->mutable_obstacle(i)->add_shape_parameter(shapeParam);
 960                        else
 961                            break;
 962                    }
 963                }
 964                delete [] shapeParams;
 965            }
 966        }
 967    }
 968}
 969
 970void SimulationFile::setSpatialModel(lm::io::SpatialModel * spatialModel)
 971{
 972    // Validate that the model is consistent.
 973    if (spatialModel == NULL) throw InvalidArgException("spatialModel", "cannot be NULL");
 974
 975    // If a diffusion model already exists, delete it.
 976    if (H5Lexists(file, "/Model/Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT))
 977    {
 978        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Ldelete(file, "/Model/Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT));
 979    }
 980
 981    // Create the group for the spatial model.
 982    hid_t group;
 983    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(group,H5Gcreate2(file, "/Model/Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
 984    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(group));
 985    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(group,H5Gcreate2(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
 986    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(group));
 987    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(group,H5Gcreate2(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
 988    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(group));
 989
 990    // Write the attributes.
 991    uint numberRegions = spatialModel->region_size();
 992    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions", "numberRegions", &numberRegions, 1));
 993    uint numberObstacles = spatialModel->obstacle_size();
 994    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTset_attribute_uint(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles", "numberObstacles", &numberObstacles, 1));
 995
 996    if (numberRegions > 0)
 997    {
 998        // Write the region types table.
 999        {
1000            const unsigned int RANK=2;
1001            hsize_t dims[RANK];
1002            dims[0] = numberRegions;
1003            dims[1] = 2;
1004            uint * types = new uint[dims[0]*dims[1]];
1005            for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1006            {
1007                types[i*dims[1]] = spatialModel->region(i).shape();
1008                types[i*dims[1]+1] = spatialModel->region(i).site_type();
1009            }
1010            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/Types", RANK, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, types));
1011            delete [] types;
1012        }
1013
1014        // Write the shape parameters table.
1015        {
1016            const unsigned int RANK=2;
1017            hsize_t dims[RANK];
1018            dims[0] = numberRegions;
1019            dims[1] = MAX_SHAPE_PARAMETERS;
1020            double * shapeParams = new double[dims[0]*dims[1]];
1021            for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1022            {
1023                for (uint j=0; j<dims[1]; j++)
1024                {
1025                    if (j < (uint)spatialModel->region(i).shape_parameter_size())
1026                        shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j] = spatialModel->region(i).shape_parameter(j);
1027                    else
1028                        shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j] = NAN;
1029                }
1030            }
1031            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Regions/ShapeParameters", RANK, dims, H5T_IEEE_F64LE, shapeParams));
1032            delete [] shapeParams;
1033        }
1034    }
1035
1036    if (numberObstacles > 0)
1037    {
1038        // Write the obstacle types table.
1039        {
1040            const unsigned int RANK=2;
1041            hsize_t dims[RANK];
1042            dims[0] = numberObstacles;
1043            dims[1] = 2;
1044            uint * types = new uint[dims[0]*dims[1]];
1045            for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1046            {
1047                types[i*dims[1]] = spatialModel->obstacle(i).shape();
1048                types[i*dims[1]+1] = spatialModel->obstacle(i).site_type();
1049            }
1050            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/Types", RANK, dims, H5T_STD_U32LE, types));
1051            delete [] types;
1052        }
1053
1054        // Write the shape parameters table.
1055        {
1056            const unsigned int RANK=2;
1057            hsize_t dims[RANK];
1058            dims[0] = numberObstacles;
1059            dims[1] = MAX_SHAPE_PARAMETERS;
1060            double * shapeParams = new double[dims[0]*dims[1]];
1061            for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1062            {
1063                for (uint j=0; j<dims[1]; j++)
1064                {
1065                    if (j < (uint)spatialModel->obstacle(i).shape_parameter_size())
1066                        shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j] = spatialModel->obstacle(i).shape_parameter(j);
1067                    else
1068                        shapeParams[i*dims[1]+j] = NAN;
1069                }
1070            }
1071            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTmake_dataset(file, "/Model/Spatial/Obstacles/ShapeParameters", RANK, dims, H5T_IEEE_F64LE, shapeParams));
1072            delete [] shapeParams;
1073        }
1074    }
1075}
1076
1077bool SimulationFile::replicateExists(unsigned int replicate)
1078{
1079    char replicateName[8];
1080    snprintf(replicateName, sizeof(replicateName), "%07d", replicate);
1081    if (H5Lexists(simulationsGroup, replicateName, H5P_DEFAULT) > 0) return true;
1082    return false;
1083}
1084
1085void SimulationFile::openReplicate(unsigned int replicate)
1086{
1087    openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1088}
1089
1090void SimulationFile::appendSpeciesCounts(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::SpeciesCounts * speciesCounts)
1091{
1092    ReplicateHandles * handles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1093
1094    // Update the species counts dataset.
1095    {
1096        // Get the current size of the dataset.
1097        unsigned int RANK=2;
1098        hsize_t dims[RANK];
1099        hid_t dataspace_id;
1100        int result;
1101        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(handles->speciesCountsDataset));
1102        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace_id, dims, NULL));
1103        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1104
1105        // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1106        dims[0] += speciesCounts->number_entries();
1107        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(handles->speciesCountsDataset, dims));
1108
1109        // Create the memory dataset.
1110        hid_t memspace_id;
1111        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1112        memDims[0] = speciesCounts->number_entries();
1113        memDims[1] = speciesCounts->number_species();
1114        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1115
1116        // Write the new data.
1117        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(handles->speciesCountsDataset));
1118        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1119        start[0] = dims[0]-speciesCounts->number_entries();
1120        start[1] = 0;
1121        count[0] = memDims[0];
1122        count[1] = memDims[1];
1123        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1124        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(handles->speciesCountsDataset, H5T_NATIVE_INT32, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, speciesCounts->species_count().data()));
1125
1126        // Cleanup some resources.
1127        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1128        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1129    }
1130
1131    // Update the species count times dataset.
1132    {
1133        // Get the current size of the dataset.
1134        unsigned int RANK=1;
1135        hsize_t dims[RANK];
1136        hid_t dataspace_id;
1137        int result;
1138        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset));
1139        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace_id, dims, NULL));
1140        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1141
1142        // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1143        dims[0] += speciesCounts->number_entries();
1144        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset, dims));
1145
1146        // Create the memory dataset.
1147        hid_t memspace_id;
1148        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1149        memDims[0] = speciesCounts->number_entries();
1150        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1151
1152        // Write the new data.
1153        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset));
1154        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1155        start[0] = dims[0]-speciesCounts->number_entries();
1156        count[0] = memDims[0];
1157        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1158        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, speciesCounts->time().data()));
1159
1160        // Cleanup some resources.
1161        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1162        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1163    }
1164}
1165
1166void SimulationFile::appendLattice(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::Lattice * lattice, uint8_t * latticeData, size_t latticeDataSize)
1167{
1168    if (size_t(lattice->lattice_x_size())*size_t(lattice->lattice_y_size())*size_t(lattice->lattice_z_size())*size_t(lattice->particles_per_site())*sizeof(uint8_t) != latticeDataSize) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "incorrect lattice size");
1169
1170    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1171
1172    // Open or create the lattice group.
1173    hid_t latticeGroupHandle, latticeTimesDatasetHandle;
1174    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT) > 0)
1175    {
1176        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeGroupHandle,H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT));
1177        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", H5P_DEFAULT));
1178    }
1179    else
1180    {
1181        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1182
1183        // Create the lattice times dataset.
1184        const unsigned int RANK=1;
1185        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1186        dims[0] = 0;
1187        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1188        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1189        hid_t dataspaceHandle, propsHandle;
1190        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1191        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(propsHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1192        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(propsHandle, RANK, chunkDims));
1193        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, propsHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
1194        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(propsHandle));
1195        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1196    }
1197
1198    // Append the time to the times data set.
1199    uint latticeIndex;
1200    {
1201        // Get the current size of the dataset.
1202        unsigned int RANK=1;
1203        hsize_t dims[RANK];
1204        hid_t dataspaceHandle;
1205        int result;
1206        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1207        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
1208        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1209
1210        // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1211        dims[0] += 1;
1212        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, dims));
1213
1214        // Create the memory dataset.
1215        hid_t memspaceHandle;
1216        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1217        memDims[0] = 1;
1218        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1219
1220        // Write the new data.
1221        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1222        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1223        start[0] = dims[0]-1;
1224        latticeIndex=start[0];
1225        count[0] = memDims[0];
1226        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1227        double time = lattice->time();
1228        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspaceHandle, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, &time));
1229
1230        // Cleanup some resources.
1231        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1232        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspaceHandle));
1233    }
1234
1235    // Create the lattice data set.
1236    {
1237        char latticeDatasetName[11];
1238        snprintf(latticeDatasetName, sizeof(latticeDatasetName), "%010d", latticeIndex);
1239        const unsigned int RANK=4;
1240        hsize_t dims[RANK], chunk[RANK];
1241        dims[0] = lattice->lattice_x_size();
1242        dims[1] = lattice->lattice_y_size();
1243        dims[2] = lattice->lattice_z_size();
1244        dims[3] = lattice->particles_per_site();
1245        chunk[0] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_x_size());
1246        chunk[1] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_y_size());
1247        chunk[2] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_z_size());
1248        chunk[3] = lattice->particles_per_site();
1249        hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
1250        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, NULL));
1251        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1252        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
1253        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, RANK, chunk));
1254        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(latticeGroupHandle, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U8LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
1255        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, latticeData));
1256        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
1257        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
1258        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1259    }
1260
1261    // Cleanup some resources.
1262    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1263    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(latticeGroupHandle));
1264
1265}
1266
1267void SimulationFile::appendLattice_U32LE(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::Lattice * lattice, uint32_t * latticeData, size_t latticeDataSize)
1268{
1269    if (lattice->lattice_x_size()*lattice->lattice_y_size()*lattice->lattice_z_size()*lattice->particles_per_site()*sizeof(uint32_t) != latticeDataSize) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "incorrect lattice size");
1270
1271    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1272
1273    // Open or create the lattice group.
1274    hid_t latticeGroupHandle, latticeTimesDatasetHandle;
1275    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT) > 0)
1276    {
1277        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeGroupHandle,H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT));
1278        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", H5P_DEFAULT));
1279    }
1280    else
1281    {
1282        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1283
1284        // Create the lattice times dataset.
1285        const unsigned int RANK=1;
1286        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1287        dims[0] = 0;
1288        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1289        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1290        hid_t dataspaceHandle, propsHandle;
1291        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1292        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(propsHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1293        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(propsHandle, RANK, chunkDims));
1294        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, propsHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
1295        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(propsHandle));
1296        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1297    }
1298
1299    // Append the time to the times data set.
1300    uint latticeIndex;
1301    {
1302        // Get the current size of the dataset.
1303        unsigned int RANK=1;
1304        hsize_t dims[RANK];
1305        hid_t dataspaceHandle;
1306        int result;
1307        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1308        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
1309        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1310
1311        // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1312        dims[0] += 1;
1313        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, dims));
1314
1315        // Create the memory dataset.
1316        hid_t memspaceHandle;
1317        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1318        memDims[0] = 1;
1319        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1320
1321        // Write the new data.
1322        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1323        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1324        start[0] = dims[0]-1;
1325        latticeIndex=start[0];
1326        count[0] = memDims[0];
1327        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1328        double time = lattice->time();
1329        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspaceHandle, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, &time));
1330
1331        // Cleanup some resources.
1332        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1333        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspaceHandle));
1334    }
1335
1336	char latticeDatasetName[11];
1337	snprintf(latticeDatasetName, sizeof(latticeDatasetName), "%010d", latticeIndex);
1338	writeParticleLattice_U32LE(latticeGroupHandle, latticeDatasetName, latticeData, lattice->lattice_x_size(),lattice->lattice_y_size(),lattice->lattice_z_size(),lattice->particles_per_site());
1339	
1340
1341    // Cleanup some resources.
1342    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1343    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(latticeGroupHandle));
1344
1345}
1346
1347void SimulationFile::appendSites(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::Lattice * lattice, uint8_t * siteData, size_t siteDataSize)
1348{
1349    if (lattice->lattice_x_size()*lattice->lattice_y_size()*lattice->lattice_z_size()*sizeof(uint8_t) != siteDataSize) throw InvalidArgException("siteData", "incorrect lattice size");
1350
1351    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1352
1353    // Open or create the sites group
1354    hid_t siteGroupHandle, latticeTimesDatasetHandle;
1355    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandles->group, "Sites", H5P_DEFAULT) > 0)
1356    {
1357        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(siteGroupHandle,H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "Sites", H5P_DEFAULT));
1358        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(replicateHandles->group, "SiteTimes", H5P_DEFAULT));
1359    }
1360    else
1361    {
1362        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(siteGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "Sites", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1363
1364        // Create the SiteTimes dataset.
1365        const unsigned int RANK=1;
1366        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1367        dims[0] = 0;
1368        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1369        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1370        hid_t dataspaceHandle, propsHandle;
1371        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1372        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(propsHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1373        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(propsHandle, RANK, chunkDims));
1374        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(latticeTimesDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "SiteTimes", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, propsHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
1375        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(propsHandle));
1376        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1377    }
1378
1379    // Append the time to the times data set.
1380    uint latticeIndex;
1381    {
1382        // Get the current size of the dataset.
1383        unsigned int RANK=1;
1384        hsize_t dims[RANK];
1385        hid_t dataspaceHandle;
1386        int result;
1387        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1388        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
1389        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1390
1391        // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1392        dims[0] += 1;
1393        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, dims));
1394
1395        // Create the memory dataset.
1396        hid_t memspaceHandle;
1397        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1398        memDims[0] = 1;
1399        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1400
1401        // Write the new data.
1402        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1403        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1404        start[0] = dims[0]-1;
1405        latticeIndex=start[0];
1406        count[0] = memDims[0];
1407        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1408        double time = lattice->time();
1409        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(latticeTimesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspaceHandle, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, &time));
1410
1411        // Cleanup some resources.
1412        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1413        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspaceHandle));
1414    }
1415
1416    // Create the lattice data set.
1417    {
1418        char latticeDatasetName[11];
1419        snprintf(latticeDatasetName, sizeof(latticeDatasetName), "%010d", latticeIndex);
1420        const unsigned int RANK=3;
1421        hsize_t dims[RANK], chunk[RANK];
1422        dims[0] = lattice->lattice_x_size();
1423        dims[1] = lattice->lattice_y_size();
1424        dims[2] = lattice->lattice_z_size();
1425        chunk[0] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_x_size());
1426        chunk[1] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_y_size());
1427        chunk[2] = min((uint)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,lattice->lattice_z_size());
1428        hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
1429        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, NULL));
1430        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1431        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
1432        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, RANK, chunk));
1433        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(siteGroupHandle, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U8LE, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
1434        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, siteData));
1435        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
1436        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
1437        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
1438    }
1439
1440    // Cleanup some resources.
1441    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(latticeTimesDatasetHandle));
1442    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(siteGroupHandle));
1443
1444}
1445
1446void SimulationFile::appendParameterValues(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::ParameterValues * parameterValues)
1447{
1448    if (parameterValues->value_size() != parameterValues->time_size()) throw InvalidArgException("parameterValues", "inconsistent number of entries");
1449
1450    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1451
1452    // Open or create the parameter values group.
1453    hid_t pvGroupHandle;
1454    if ((pvGroupHandle=H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "ParameterValues", H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1455    {
1456        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(pvGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "ParameterValues", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1457    }
1458
1459    // Open or create the parameter values dataset.
1460    hid_t pvDatasetHandle;
1461    if ((pvDatasetHandle=H5Dopen2(pvGroupHandle, parameterValues->parameter().c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1462    {
1463        // Create the datasets.
1464        uint RANK=2;
1465        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1466        dims[0] = 0;
1467        dims[1] = 2;
1468        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1469        maxDims[1] = 2;
1470        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1471        chunkDims[1] = 2;
1472        hid_t dataspace_id, dcpl_id;
1473        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1474        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcpl_id,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1475        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcpl_id, RANK, chunkDims));
1476        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(pvDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(pvGroupHandle, parameterValues->parameter().c_str(), H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
1477        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcpl_id));
1478        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1479    }
1480
1481    // Get the current size of the dataset.
1482    unsigned int RANK=2;
1483    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1484    hid_t dataspace_id;
1485    int result;
1486    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(pvDatasetHandle));
1487    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace_id, dims, NULL));
1488    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1489
1490    // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1491    dims[0] += parameterValues->value_size();
1492    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(pvDatasetHandle, dims));
1493
1494    // Create the memory dataset.
1495    hid_t memspace_id;
1496    hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1497    memDims[0] = parameterValues->value_size();
1498    memDims[1] = 1;
1499    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1500
1501    // Write the new times.
1502    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(pvDatasetHandle));
1503    hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1504    start[0] = dims[0]-parameterValues->value_size();
1505    count[0] = parameterValues->value_size();
1506    start[1] = 0;
1507    count[1] = 1;
1508    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1509    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(pvDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, parameterValues->time().data()));
1510    start[1] = 1;
1511    count[1] = 1;
1512    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1513    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(pvDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, parameterValues->value().data()));
1514
1515    // Cleanup some resources.
1516    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1517    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1518    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(pvDatasetHandle));
