1519    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(pvGroupHandle));
1520}
1521
1522
1523void SimulationFile::setFirstPassageTimes(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::FirstPassageTimes * firstPassageTimes)
1524{
1525    // Make sure the data is consistent.
1526    if (firstPassageTimes->species_count_size() == 0) throw InvalidArgException("firstPassageTimes", "no entries to save");
1527    if (firstPassageTimes->species_count_size() != firstPassageTimes->first_passage_time_size()) throw InvalidArgException("firstPassageTimes", "inconsistent number of first passage time entries");
1528
1529    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1530
1531    // Open the first passage time group.
1532    hid_t fptGroupHandle;
1533    if ((fptGroupHandle=H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "FirstPassageTimes", H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1534    {
1535        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(fptGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "FirstPassageTimes", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1536    }
1537
1538    // Construct a string representation of the species name.
1539    std::stringstream ss;
1540    ss.fill('0');
1541    ss.width(2);
1542    ss << firstPassageTimes->species();
1543    string speciesString = ss.str();
1544
1545    // Open the species group.
1546    hid_t speciesGroupHandle, countsDatasetHandle, timesDatasetHandle;
1547    if ((speciesGroupHandle=H5Gopen2(fptGroupHandle, speciesString.c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT)) >= 0)
1548    {
1549        // Open the data sets.
1550        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(countsDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(speciesGroupHandle, "Counts", H5P_DEFAULT));
1551        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(timesDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(speciesGroupHandle, "Times", H5P_DEFAULT));
1552    }
1553    else
1554    {
1555        // Create the group.
1556        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(speciesGroupHandle,H5Gcreate2(fptGroupHandle, speciesString.c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1557
1558        // Create the datasets.
1559        uint RANK=1;
1560        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1561        dims[0] = 0;
1562        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1563        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1564        hid_t dataspace_id, dcpl_id;
1565        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1566        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcpl_id,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1567        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcpl_id, RANK, chunkDims));
1568        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(countsDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(speciesGroupHandle, "Counts", H5T_STD_U32LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
1569        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(timesDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(speciesGroupHandle, "Times", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
1570        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcpl_id));
1571        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1572    }
1573
1574    // Read the lowest and highest first passage times in the file.
1575    uint RANK=1;
1576    int result;
1577    hid_t countsDataspace;
1578    hsize_t countsDims[RANK];
1579    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(countsDataspace,H5Dget_space(countsDatasetHandle));
1580    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(countsDataspace, countsDims, NULL));
1581    uint minCount=0, maxCount=0;
1582    if (countsDims[0] == 1)
1583    {
1584        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_INT32, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &minCount));
1585        maxCount = minCount;
1586    }
1587    else if (countsDims[0] > 1)
1588    {
1589        // Create the memory dataspace.
1590        hid_t memDataspaceHandle;
1591        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1592        memDims[0] = 1;
1593        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memDataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1594
1595        hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1596        count[0] = 1;
1597        start[0] = 0;
1598        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(countsDataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1599        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, memDataspaceHandle, countsDataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, &minCount));
1600        start[0] = countsDims[0]-1;
1601        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(countsDataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1602        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, memDataspaceHandle, countsDataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, &maxCount));
1603        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memDataspaceHandle));
1604    }
1605    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(countsDataspace));
1606
1607    // Figure out the min and the max from the new counts.
1608    uint32_t minNewCount=firstPassageTimes->species_count(0), maxNewCount=firstPassageTimes->species_count(0);
1609    for (int i=1; i<firstPassageTimes->species_count_size(); i++)
1610    {
1611        if (firstPassageTimes->species_count(i) < minNewCount)
1612            minNewCount = firstPassageTimes->species_count(i);
1613        else if (firstPassageTimes->species_count(i) > maxNewCount)
1614            maxNewCount = firstPassageTimes->species_count(i);
1615    }
1616
1617    // If there are no existing records, just insert one large block.
1618    if (countsDims[0] == 0)
1619    {
1620        // Allocate the block.
1621        countsDims[0] = maxNewCount-minNewCount+1;
1622        uint32_t * counts = new uint32_t[countsDims[0]];
1623        double * times = new double[countsDims[0]];
1624        for (uint i=0; i<countsDims[0]; i++)
1625        {
1626            counts[i] = 0;
1627            times[i] = -1.0;
1628        }
1629
1630        // Fill in the block.
1631        for (int i=0; i<firstPassageTimes->species_count_size(); i++)
1632        {
1633            uint32_t count = firstPassageTimes->species_count(i);
1634            counts[count-minNewCount] = count;
1635            times[count-minNewCount] = firstPassageTimes->first_passage_time(i);
1636        }
1637
1638        // Extend the datasets and write the block.
1639        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(countsDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1640        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, counts));
1641        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(timesDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1642        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(timesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, times));
1643
1644        // Free the buffers.
1645        delete [] counts;
1646        delete [] times;
1647    }
1648
1649    // Otherwise if there are only new records to append to the end, just add them
1650    else if (maxNewCount > maxCount && minNewCount > maxCount)
1651    {
1652        // Allocate the new buffer.
1653        hsize_t endingStart[RANK], endingCount[RANK];
1654        endingCount[0] = maxNewCount-maxCount;
1655        uint32_t * newEndingCounts = new uint32_t[endingCount[0]];
1656        double * newEndingTimes = new double[endingCount[0]];
1657        for (uint i=0; i<endingCount[0]; i++)
1658        {
1659            newEndingCounts[i] = 0;
1660            newEndingTimes[i] = -1.0;
1661        }
1662
1663        // Fill in the buffer.
1664        for (int i=0; i<firstPassageTimes->species_count_size(); i++)
1665        {
1666            uint32_t count = firstPassageTimes->species_count(i);
1667            newEndingCounts[count-maxCount-1] = count;
1668            newEndingTimes[count-maxCount-1] = firstPassageTimes->first_passage_time(i);
1669        }
1670
1671        // Create the memory dataspace.
1672        hid_t memDataspaceHandle;
1673        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1674        memDims[0] = endingCount[0];
1675        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memDataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1676
1677        // Append the records.
1678        hid_t countsDataspaceHandle, timesDataspaceHandle;
1679        endingStart[0] = countsDims[0];
1680        countsDims[0] += endingCount[0];
1681        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(countsDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1682        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(countsDataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(countsDatasetHandle));
1683        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(countsDataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, endingStart, NULL, endingCount, NULL));
1684        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, memDataspaceHandle, countsDataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, newEndingCounts));
1685        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(countsDataspaceHandle));
1686        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(timesDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1687        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(timesDataspaceHandle,H5Dget_space(timesDatasetHandle));
1688        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(timesDataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, endingStart, NULL, endingCount, NULL));
1689        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(timesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memDataspaceHandle, timesDataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, newEndingTimes));
1690        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(timesDataspaceHandle));
1691        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memDataspaceHandle));
1692
1693        // Free the buffers.
1694        if (newEndingCounts != NULL) delete [] newEndingCounts;
1695        if (newEndingTimes != NULL) delete [] newEndingTimes;
1696    }
1697
1698    // Otherwise, we need to insert some records before and/or after the existing block so we have to copy the old data and rebuild.
1699    else
1700    {
1701        // Declare the new buffer.
1702        uint32_t combinedMinCount = min(minCount,minNewCount);
1703        uint32_t combinedMaxCount = max(maxCount,maxNewCount);
1704        size_t newSize = combinedMaxCount-combinedMinCount+1;
1705        uint32_t * newCounts = new uint32_t[newSize];
1706        double * newTimes = new double[newSize];
1707        for (uint i=0; i<newSize; i++)
1708        {
1709            newCounts[i] = 0;
1710            newTimes[i] = -1.0;
1711        }
1712
1713        // Copy the old data into the buffer.
1714        hid_t memDataspaceHandle;
1715        hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1716        memDims[0] = maxCount-minCount+1;
1717        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memDataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1718        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, memDataspaceHandle, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &newCounts[minCount-combinedMinCount]));
1719        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(timesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memDataspaceHandle, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, &newTimes[minCount-combinedMinCount]));
1720        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memDataspaceHandle));
1721
1722        // Fill in the buffer with the new data.
1723        for (int i=0; i<firstPassageTimes->species_count_size(); i++)
1724        {
1725            uint32_t count = firstPassageTimes->species_count(i);
1726            if (count < minCount || count > maxCount)
1727            {
1728                newCounts[count-combinedMinCount] = count;
1729                newTimes[count-combinedMinCount] = firstPassageTimes->first_passage_time(i);
1730            }
1731            else
1732            {
1733                throw InvalidArgException("firstPassageTimes", "contained duplicates of existing counts", count);
1734            }
1735        }
1736
1737        // Update the dataset with the combined data.
1738        memDims[0] = newSize;
1739        countsDims[0] = newSize;
1740        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memDataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1741        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(countsDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1742        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(countsDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_UINT32, memDataspaceHandle, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, newCounts));
1743        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(timesDatasetHandle, countsDims));
1744        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(timesDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memDataspaceHandle, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, newTimes));
1745        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memDataspaceHandle));
1746
1747        // Free the buffers.
1748        if (newCounts != NULL) delete [] newCounts;
1749        if (newTimes != NULL) delete [] newTimes;
1750    }
1751
1752    // Close any resources.
1753    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(countsDatasetHandle));
1754    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(timesDatasetHandle));
1755    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(speciesGroupHandle));
1756    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(fptGroupHandle));
1757}
1758
1759/*void SimulationFile::appendSpatialModelObjects(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::SpatialModel * model)
1760{
1761    if (model->sphere_xc_size() != model->sphere_type_size()) throw InvalidArgException("model", "inconsistent number of sphere entries");
1762    if (model->sphere_yc_size() != model->sphere_type_size()) throw InvalidArgException("model", "inconsistent number of sphere entries");
1763    if (model->sphere_zc_size() != model->sphere_type_size()) throw InvalidArgException("model", "inconsistent number of sphere entries");
1764    if (model->sphere_radius_size() != model->sphere_type_size()) throw InvalidArgException("model", "inconsistent number of sphere entries");
1765
1766    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1767
1768    // Open or create the group.
1769    hid_t modelHandle, spatialHandle;
1770    if ((modelHandle=H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "Model", H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1771    {
1772        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(modelHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandles->group, "Model", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1773    }
1774    if ((spatialHandle=H5Gopen2(modelHandle, "Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1775    {
1776        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(spatialHandle,H5Gcreate2(modelHandle, "Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
1777    }
1778
1779    // Open or create the datasets.
1780    hid_t spheresDatasetHandle;
1781    if ((spheresDatasetHandle=H5Dopen2(spatialHandle, "Spheres", H5P_DEFAULT)) < 0)
1782    {
1783        // Create the datasets.
1784        uint RANK=2;
1785        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
1786        dims[0] = 0;
1787        dims[1] = 5;
1788        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
1789        maxDims[1] = 5;
1790        chunkDims[0] = 100;
1791        chunkDims[1] = 5;
1792        hid_t dataspace_id, dcpl_id;
1793        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
1794        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcpl_id,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
1795        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcpl_id, RANK, chunkDims));
1796        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(spheresDatasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(spatialHandle, "Spheres", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
1797        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcpl_id));
1798        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1799    }
1800
1801    // Get the current size of the dataset.
1802    unsigned int RANK=2;
1803    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1804    hid_t dataspace_id;
1805    int result;
1806    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(spheresDatasetHandle));
1807    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace_id, dims, NULL));
1808    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1809
1810    // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
1811    dims[0] += model->sphere_type_size();
1812    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(spheresDatasetHandle, dims));
1813
1814    // Create the memory dataset.
1815    hid_t memspace_id;
1816    hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1817    memDims[0] = model->sphere_type_size();
1818    memDims[1] = 1;
1819    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1820
1821    // Write the values.
1822    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(spheresDatasetHandle));
1823    hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1824    start[0] = dims[0]-model->sphere_type_size();
1825    count[0] = model->sphere_type_size();
1826    start[1] = 0;
1827    count[1] = 1;
1828    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1829    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, model->sphere_xc().data()));
1830    start[1] = 1;
1831    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1832    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, model->sphere_yc().data()));
1833    start[1] = 2;
1834    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1835    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, model->sphere_zc().data()));
1836    start[1] = 3;
1837    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1838    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, model->sphere_radius().data()));
1839    start[1] = 4;
1840    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1841    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, model->sphere_type().data()));
1842
1843    // Cleanup some resources.
1844    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1845    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1846    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(spheresDatasetHandle));
1847    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(modelHandle));
1848    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(spatialHandle));
1849}
1850
1851void SimulationFile::getSpatialModelObjects(unsigned int replicate, lm::io::SpatialModel * model)
1852{
1853    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1854
1855    // Open the group.
1856    hid_t modelHandle, spatialHandle;
1857    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(modelHandle,H5Gopen2(replicateHandles->group, "Model", H5P_DEFAULT));
1858    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(spatialHandle,H5Gopen2(modelHandle, "Spatial", H5P_DEFAULT));
1859
1860    // Open the datasets.
1861    hid_t spheresDatasetHandle;
1862    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(spheresDatasetHandle,H5Dopen2(spatialHandle, "Spheres", H5P_DEFAULT));
1863
1864    // Get the current size of the dataset.
1865    const uint RANK=2;
1866    const uint NUM_COLS=5;
1867    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1868    hid_t dataspace_id;
1869    int result;
1870    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Dget_space(spheresDatasetHandle));
1871    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(result,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace_id, dims, NULL));
1872
1873    // Create the memory dataset.
1874    hid_t memspace_id;
1875    hsize_t memDims[RANK];
1876    memDims[0] = TUNE_SPATIAL_MODEL_OBJECT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE;
1877    memDims[1] = NUM_COLS;
1878    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1879    double * memData = new double[TUNE_SPATIAL_MODEL_OBJECT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE*NUM_COLS];
1880
1881    // Loop over the data and read it in one section at a time.
1882    hsize_t start[RANK], count[RANK];
1883    start[0] = 0;
1884    start[1] = 0;
1885    count[0] = TUNE_SPATIAL_MODEL_OBJECT_READ_BUFFER_SIZE;
1886    count[1] = NUM_COLS;
1887    while (start[0] < dims[0])
1888    {
1889        // Figure out how many rows to read.
1890        if (start[0]+count[0] > dims[0])
1891        {
1892            // This is the last read, so modify its size.
1893            count[0] = dims[0]-start[0];
1894
1895            // Modify the memory dataspace as well.
1896            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1897            memDims[0] = count[0];
1898            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, memDims, NULL));
1899        }
1900
1901        // Read the rows.
1902        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace_id, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
1903        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(spheresDatasetHandle, H5T_NATIVE_DOUBLE, memspace_id, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, (void *)memData));
1904
1905        // Add them to the model.
1906        for (uint index=0; index<count[0]*NUM_COLS; )
1907        {
1908            model->add_sphere_xc(memData[index++]);
1909            model->add_sphere_yc(memData[index++]);
1910            model->add_sphere_zc(memData[index++]);
1911            model->add_sphere_radius(memData[index++]);
1912            model->add_sphere_type(memData[index++]);
1913        }
1914
1915        // Move to the next section.
1916        start[0] += count[0];
1917    }
1918
1919    // Cleanup some resources.
1920    if (memData != NULL) delete []  memData; memData = NULL;
1921    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
1922    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace_id));
1923    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(spheresDatasetHandle));
1924    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(modelHandle));
1925    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(spatialHandle));
1926}*/
1927
1928
1929vector<double> SimulationFile::getLatticeTimes(unsigned int replicate)
1930{
1931    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1932
1933    // Read the initial species counts.
1934    int RANK=1, rank;
1935    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1936    H5T_class_t type;
1937    size_t size;
1938    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", &rank));
1939    if (rank != RANK) throw Exception("Invalid dataset rank", filename.c_str(), "LatticeTimes");
1940    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", dims, &type, &size));
1941    if (size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset type", filename.c_str(), "LatticeTimes");
1942    double * timesBuffer = new double[dims[0]];
1943    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset_double(replicateHandles->group, "LatticeTimes", timesBuffer));
1944    vector<double> times;
1945    for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1946        times.push_back(timesBuffer[i]);
1947    delete [] timesBuffer;
1948    return times;
1949}
1950
1951vector<double> SimulationFile::getSpeciesCountTimes(unsigned int replicate)
1952{
1953    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1954
1955    // Read the initial species counts.
1956    int RANK=1, rank;
1957    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1958    H5T_class_t type;
1959    size_t size;
1960    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCountTimes", &rank));
1961    if (rank != RANK) throw Exception("Invalid dataset rank", filename.c_str(), "SpeciesCountTimes");
1962    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCountTimes", dims, &type, &size));
1963    if (size != sizeof(double)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset type", filename.c_str(), "SpeciesCountTimes");
1964    double * timesBuffer = new double[dims[0]];
1965    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset_double(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCountTimes", timesBuffer));
1966    vector<double> times;
1967    for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1968        times.push_back(timesBuffer[i]);
1969    delete [] timesBuffer;
1970    return times;
1971}
1972
1973std::map<double, vector<int> > SimulationFile::getSpeciesCounts(unsigned int replicate)
1974{
1975    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
1976	std::map<double, vector<int> > particles;
1977
1978    // Read the initial species counts.
1979    int RANK=2, rank;
1980    hsize_t dims[RANK];
1981    H5T_class_t type;
1982    size_t size;
1983    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCounts", &rank));
1984    if (rank != RANK) throw Exception("Invalid dataset rank", filename.c_str(), "SpeciesCounts");
1985    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCounts", dims, &type, &size));
1986    if (size != sizeof(int)) throw Exception("Invalid dataset type", filename.c_str(), "SpeciesCounts");
1987    int *counts = new int[dims[0]*dims[1]];
1988    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset_int(replicateHandles->group, "SpeciesCounts", counts));
1989
1990    vector<double> times=getSpeciesCountTimes(replicate);
1991
1992    for (uint i=0; i<dims[0]; i++)
1993	{
1994		//printf("counts at time %g (frame %d):\n", times[i], i);
1995		vector<int> p(dims[1]+1);
1996		for (uint j=0; j<dims[1]; j++)
1997		{
1998			//printf("%d ", counts[i*dims[1] + j]);
1999			// expecting 1-based vector of particles
2000			p[j+1]=counts[i*dims[1] + j];
2001		}
2002
2003		particles[times[i]]=p;
2004	}
2005
2006    delete [] counts;
2007    return particles;
2008}
2009
2010void SimulationFile::getLattice(unsigned int replicate, unsigned int latticeIndex, lm::rdme::Lattice * lattice)
2011{
2012    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
2013
2014    // Read the lattice data.
2015    char latticeDatasetName[19];
2016    snprintf(latticeDatasetName, sizeof(latticeDatasetName), "Lattice/%010d", latticeIndex);
2017    int RANK=4, rank;
2018    hsize_t dims[RANK];
2019    H5T_class_t type;
2020    size_t size;
2021    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, &rank));
2022    if (rank != RANK) throw Exception("Invalid dataset rank", filename.c_str(), latticeDatasetName);
2023    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, dims, &type, &size));
2024    if (lattice->getSize().x != dims[0] || lattice->getSize().y != dims[1] || lattice->getSize().z != dims[2] || lattice->getMaxOccupancy() != dims[3]) throw Exception("Invalid lattice dimensions", filename.c_str());
2025    size_t particlesBufferSize = dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3];
2026
2027	switch(size)
2028	{
2029		case sizeof(uint8_t):
2030		{
2031			uint8_t * particlesBuffer = new uint8_t[particlesBufferSize];
2032			HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U8LE, particlesBuffer));
2033			lattice->setFromRowMajorByteData(particlesBuffer, particlesBufferSize);
2034			delete [] particlesBuffer;
2035			break;
2036		}
2037		case sizeof(int):
2038		{
2039			unsigned int *particlesBuffer = new unsigned int[particlesBufferSize];
2040			HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U32LE, particlesBuffer));
2041			lm::rdme::IntLattice *intlattice = (lm::rdme::IntLattice*)lattice;
2042			intlattice->setFromRowMajorData(particlesBuffer, particlesBufferSize);
2043			delete [] particlesBuffer;
2044			break;
2045		}
2046		default:
2047			throw Exception("Unsupported dataset size",size);
2048	}
2049}
2050
2051// Get particle counts without actually copying to a lattice
2052std::map<uint32_t, uint> SimulationFile::getParticleCounts(unsigned int replicate, unsigned int latticeIndex)
2053{
2054    ReplicateHandles * replicateHandles = openReplicateHandles(replicate);
2055
2056    // Read the lattice data.
2057    char latticeDatasetName[19];
2058    snprintf(latticeDatasetName, sizeof(latticeDatasetName), "Lattice/%010d", latticeIndex);
2059    int RANK=4, rank;
2060    hsize_t dims[RANK];
2061    H5T_class_t type;
2062    size_t size;
2063    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_ndims(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, &rank));
2064    if (rank != RANK) throw Exception("Invalid dataset rank", filename.c_str(), latticeDatasetName);
2065    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTget_dataset_info(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, dims, &type, &size));
2066    size_t particlesBufferSize = dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3];
2067
2068	std::map<uint32_t, uint> particles;
2069	switch(size)
2070	{
2071		case sizeof(uint8_t):
2072		{
2073			uint8_t * particlesBuffer = new uint8_t[particlesBufferSize];
2074			HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U8LE, particlesBuffer));
2075			for(size_t i=0; i<particlesBufferSize; i++)
2076			{
2077				const particle_t p=particlesBuffer[i];
2078				if(p > 0)
2079				{
2080					if(particles.count(p) == 0)
2081						particles[p]=1;
2082					else
2083						particles[p]++;
2084				}
2085			}
2086			delete [] particlesBuffer;
2087			break;
2088		}
2089		case sizeof(int):
2090		{
2091			unsigned int *particlesBuffer = new unsigned int[particlesBufferSize];
2092			HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5LTread_dataset(replicateHandles->group, latticeDatasetName, H5T_STD_U32LE, particlesBuffer));
2093			for(size_t i=0; i<particlesBufferSize; i++)
2094			{
2095				const particle_t p=particlesBuffer[i];
2096				if(p > 0)
2097				{
2098					if(particles.count(p) == 0)
2099						particles[p]=1;
2100					else
2101						particles[p]++;
2102				}
2103			}
2104			delete [] particlesBuffer;
2105			break;
2106		}
2107		default:
2108			throw Exception("Unsupported dataset size",size);
2109	}
2110
2111	return particles;
2112}
2113
2114void SimulationFile::closeReplicate(unsigned int replicate)
2115{
2116    map<unsigned int,ReplicateHandles *>::iterator it = openReplicates.find(replicate);
2117    if (it != openReplicates.end())
2118    {
2119        ReplicateHandles * handles = it->second;
2120        closeReplicateHandles(handles);
2121        delete handles;
2122        openReplicates.erase(it);
2123    }
2124}
2125
2126void SimulationFile::closeAllReplicates()
2127{
2128    for (map<unsigned int,ReplicateHandles *>::iterator it=openReplicates.begin(); it != openReplicates.end(); it++)
2129    {
2130        ReplicateHandles * handles = it->second;
2131        closeReplicateHandles(handles);
2132        delete handles;
2133    }
2134    openReplicates.clear();
2135}
2136
2137
2138SimulationFile::ReplicateHandles * SimulationFile::openReplicateHandles(unsigned int replicate)
2139{
2140    // See if the replicate is already open.
2141    map<unsigned int,ReplicateHandles *>::iterator it = openReplicates.find(replicate);
2142    if (it == openReplicates.end())
2143    {
2144        ReplicateHandles * handles;
2145
2146        // Construct a string representation of the replicate name.
2147        std::stringstream ss;
2148        ss.fill('0');
2149        ss.width(7);
2150        ss << replicate;
2151        string replicateString = ss.str();
2152
2153        // Turn off exception handling again to work around odd behavior in hdf5 1.8.4.
2154        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Eset_auto2(H5E_DEFAULT, NULL, NULL));
2155
2156        // Open the replicate group.
2157        hid_t groupHandle;
2158        if ((groupHandle=H5Gopen2(simulationsGroup, replicateString.c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT)) >= 0)
2159        {
2160            // Open the rest of the handles.
2161            handles = new ReplicateHandles();
2162            handles->group = groupHandle;
2163            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(handles->speciesCountsDataset,H5Dopen2(handles->group, "SpeciesCounts", H5P_DEFAULT));
2164            HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset,H5Dopen2(handles->group, "SpeciesCountTimes", H5P_DEFAULT));
2165        }
2166        else
2167        {
2168            // If we couldn't open it, try to create a new one.
2169            handles = createReplicateHandles(replicateString);
2170        }
2171
2172        // Add it to the map.
2173        openReplicates[replicate] = handles;
2174        return handles;
2175    }
2176    else
2177    {
2178        // Use the already open replicate.
2179        return it->second;
2180    }
2181
2182}
2183
2184SimulationFile::ReplicateHandles * SimulationFile::createReplicateHandles(string replicateString)
2185{
2186    // Make sure the model is loaded, since need the number of species.
2187    loadModel();
2188
2189    ReplicateHandles * handles = new ReplicateHandles();
2190
2191    // Create the group.
2192    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(handles->group,H5Gcreate2(simulationsGroup, replicateString.c_str(), H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
2193
2194    // Create the species counts dataset
2195    {
2196        unsigned int RANK=2;
2197        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
2198        dims[0] = 0;
2199        dims[1] = numberSpecies;
2200        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
2201        maxDims[1] = numberSpecies;
2202        chunkDims[0] = 100;
2203        chunkDims[1] = numberSpecies;
2204        hid_t dataspace_id, dcpl_id;
2205        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
2206        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcpl_id,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
2207        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcpl_id, RANK, chunkDims));
2208        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(handles->speciesCountsDataset,H5Dcreate2(handles->group, "SpeciesCounts", H5T_STD_I32LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
2209        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcpl_id));
2210        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
2211    }
2212
2213    // Create the species count times dataset
2214    {
2215        unsigned int RANK=1;
2216        hsize_t dims[RANK], maxDims[RANK], chunkDims[RANK];
2217        dims[0] = 0;
2218        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
2219        chunkDims[0] = 100;
2220        hid_t dataspace_id, dcpl_id;
2221        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace_id,H5Screate_simple(RANK, dims, maxDims));
2222        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcpl_id,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
2223        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcpl_id, RANK, chunkDims));
2224        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset,H5Dcreate2(handles->group, "SpeciesCountTimes", H5T_IEEE_F64LE, dataspace_id, H5P_DEFAULT, dcpl_id, H5P_DEFAULT));
2225        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcpl_id));
2226        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace_id));
2227    }
2228
2229    return handles;
2230}
2231
2232void SimulationFile::closeReplicateHandles(ReplicateHandles * handles)
2233{
2234    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(handles->group));
2235    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(handles->speciesCountsDataset));
2236    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(handles->speciesCountTimesDataset));
2237    handles->group = H5I_INVALID_HID;
2238    handles->speciesCountsDataset = H5I_INVALID_HID;
2239    handles->speciesCountTimesDataset = H5I_INVALID_HID;
2240}
2241
2242std::map<uint, string> SimulationFile::getSpeciesNames()
2243{
2244	std::map<uint, string> names;
2245	string namelist=getParameter("speciesNames", "");
2246	if(namelist.length()==0)
2247		return names;
2248
2249	size_t pos=0,nextpos=0;
2250	uint particle=1;
2251	while((nextpos=namelist.find(",", pos)) != string::npos)
2252	{
2253		names[particle]=namelist.substr(pos, nextpos-pos);	
2254	//	printf("name %d %s\n", particle, names[particle].c_str());
2255		particle++;
2256		pos=nextpos+1;
2257	}
2258
2259	names[particle]=namelist.substr(pos);
2260
2261	return names;
2262}
2263
2264std::map<uint, string> SimulationFile::getSiteTypeNames()
2265{
2266	std::map<uint, string> names;
2267	string namelist=getParameter("siteTypeNames", "");
2268	if(namelist.length()==0)
2269		return names;
2270
2271	size_t pos=0,nextpos=0;
2272	uint siteid=0;
2273	while((nextpos=namelist.find(",", pos)) != string::npos)
2274	{
2275		names[siteid]=namelist.substr(pos, nextpos-pos);	
2276	//	printf("name %d %s\n", particle, names[particle].c_str());
2277		siteid++;
2278		pos=nextpos+1;
2279	}
2280
2281	names[siteid]=namelist.substr(pos);
2282
2283	return names;
2284}
2285
2286void
2287SimulationFile::arbitraryH5(byte *ptr) {
2288    H5MetaData* header = reinterpret_cast<H5MetaData*>(ptr);
2289    byte* data = ptr+sizeof(H5MetaData);
2290    switch (header->mode) {
2291        case H5MetaData::APPEND_TO_GROUP:
2292            appendDsToGroup(header, data);
2293            break;
2294        case H5MetaData::APPEND_TO_DATASET:
2295            appendToDataset(header, data);
2296            break;
2297        case H5MetaData::NEW_DATASET:
2298            makeNewDataset(header, data);
2299            break;
2300        default:
2301            throw InvalidArgException("H5MetaData::mode", "Write mode invalid");
2302    }
2303}
2304
2305
2306void
2307SimulationFile::appendToDataset(H5MetaData *header, byte *data) {
2308    hid_t replicateHandle = openReplicateHandles(header->replicate)->group;
2309
2310    hsize_t dims[H5S_MAX_RANK], chunk[H5S_MAX_RANK], maxDims[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2311    hsize_t memDims[H5S_MAX_RANK], start[H5S_MAX_RANK], count[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2312    hid_t datasetHandle;
2313    hid_t dataspaceHandle;
2314
2315    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandle, header->name, H5P_DEFAULT) > 0) {
2316        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle, H5Dopen2(replicateHandle,  header->name, H5P_DEFAULT));
2317    } else {
2318        for (int i=1; i <= header->ndim; i++) {
2319            dims[i] = header->shape[i-1];
2320            chunk[i] = min((size_t)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,header->shape[i-1]);
2321            maxDims[i] = header->shape[i-1];
2322        }
2323
2324        dims[0] = 0;
2325        maxDims[0] = H5S_UNLIMITED;
2326        chunk[0] = 100;
2327
2328        hid_t propsHandle;
2329        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(header->ndim+1, dims, maxDims));
2330        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(propsHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
2331        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(propsHandle, header->ndim+1, chunk));
2332        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle, H5Dcreate2(replicateHandle, header->name, header->h5type, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, propsHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
2333        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(propsHandle));
2334        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2335    }
2336
2337    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle, H5Dget_space(datasetHandle));
2338    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
2339    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2340
2341    // Extend the dataset by the number of rows in the data set.
2342    dims[0] += 1;
2343    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dset_extent(datasetHandle, dims));
2344
2345    // Create the memory dataset.
2346    hid_t memspaceHandle;
2347    memcpy(memDims, dims, sizeof(dims));
2348    memDims[0] = 1;
2349    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspaceHandle, H5Screate_simple(header->ndim+1, memDims, NULL));
2350
2351    // Write the new data.
2352    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle, H5Dget_space(datasetHandle));
2353
2354    memset(start, 0, sizeof(start));
2355    start[0] = dims[0]-1;
2356    memcpy(count, memDims, sizeof(memDims));
2357
2358    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspaceHandle, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
2359    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, header->h5type, memspaceHandle, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
2360
2361    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2362    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspaceHandle));
2363    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
2364}
2365
2366
2367void
2368SimulationFile::makeNewDataset(H5MetaData *header, byte *data) {
2369    hid_t replicateHandle = openReplicateHandles(header->replicate)->group;
2370
2371    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandle, header->name, H5P_DEFAULT) > 0) {
2372        throw Exception("Dataset already exists");
2373    }
2374
2375    hsize_t dims[H5S_MAX_RANK], chunk[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2376
2377    for (int i=0; i < header->ndim; i++) {
2378        dims[i] = header->shape[i];
2379        chunk[i] = min((size_t)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,header->shape[i]);
2380    }
2381
2382    hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
2383    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle, H5Screate_simple(header->ndim, dims, NULL));
2384    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle, H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
2385    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate(dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
2386    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, header->ndim, chunk));
2387    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle, H5Dcreate2(replicateHandle, header->name, header->h5type, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
2388    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, header->h5type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
2389
2390    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
2391    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
2392    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2393}
2394
2395void
2396SimulationFile::appendDsToGroup(H5MetaData *header, byte *data) {
2397    hid_t replicateHandle = openReplicateHandles(header->replicate)->group;
2398
2399    hid_t groupHandle;
2400    if (H5Lexists(replicateHandle, header->name, H5P_DEFAULT) > 0) {
2401        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(groupHandle, H5Gopen2(replicateHandle, header->name, H5P_DEFAULT));
2402    } else {
2403        HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(groupHandle,H5Gcreate2(replicateHandle, header->name, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
2404    }
2405
2406    hsize_t nds;
2407    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gget_num_objs(groupHandle, &nds));
2408
2409    char dsName[11];
2410    snprintf(dsName, sizeof(dsName), "%010zd", nds);
2411
2412    hsize_t dims[H5S_MAX_RANK], chunk[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2413
2414    for (int i=0; i < header->ndim; i++) {
2415        dims[i] = header->shape[i];
2416        chunk[i] = min((size_t)TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_CHUNK_SIZE,header->shape[i]);
2417    }
2418
2419    hid_t dataspaceHandle, dcplHandle, datasetHandle;
2420    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle,H5Screate_simple(header->ndim, dims, NULL));
2421    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dcplHandle,H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE));
2422    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_deflate (dcplHandle, TUNE_LATTICE_GZIP_COMPRESSION_LEVEL));
2423    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pset_chunk(dcplHandle, header->ndim, chunk));
2424    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle,H5Dcreate2(groupHandle, dsName, header->h5type, dataspaceHandle, H5P_DEFAULT, dcplHandle, H5P_DEFAULT));
2425    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dwrite(datasetHandle, header->h5type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, data));
2426
2427    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
2428    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Pclose(dcplHandle));
2429    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2430    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Gclose(groupHandle));
2431}
2432
2433void
2434SimulationFile::arbitraryH5Lookup(byte *req, byte *&data, size_t &sz) {
2435    H5Lookup* header = reinterpret_cast<H5Lookup*>(req);
2436    switch (header->mode) {
2437        case H5Lookup::DATASET:
2438            readDataset(header, data, sz);
2439            break;
2440        case H5Lookup::ATTR:
2441            readAttr(header, data, sz);
2442            break;
2443        default:
2444            throw InvalidArgException("H5Lookup::mode", "H5 data mode invalid");
2445    }
2446}
2447
2448void 
2449SimulationFile::readAttr(H5Lookup *req, byte *&buf, size_t &sz) {
2450    H5MetaData md;
2451    md.replicate = req->replicate;
2452    hsize_t dims[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2453    hsize_t elemSz;
2454
2455    hid_t attrHandle, typeHandle, dataspaceHandle;
2456    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(attrHandle, H5Aopen_by_name(file, req->path, req->attr, H5P_DEFAULT, H5P_DEFAULT));
2457    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle, H5Aget_space(attrHandle));
2458    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
2459    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(md.ndim, H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims(dataspaceHandle));
2460    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(typeHandle, H5Aget_type(attrHandle));
2461    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(md.h5type, H5Tget_native_type(typeHandle, H5T_DIR_ASCEND));
2462    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(elemSz, H5Tget_size(md.h5type));
2463
2464    for (int i=0; i < md.ndim; i++) {
2465        md.shape[i] = dims[i];
2466    }
2467
2468    md.payloadSize = elemSz*std::accumulate(md.shape, md.shape + md.ndim, 1, std::multiplies<size_t>());
2469
2470    sz = sizeof(md)+md.payloadSize;
2471    buf = new unsigned char[sz];
2472    H5MetaData *hdr = reinterpret_cast<H5MetaData*>(buf);
2473    unsigned char *payload = buf + sizeof(md);
2474    *hdr = md;
2475
2476    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aread(attrHandle, md.h5type, (void *)payload));
2477
2478    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Tclose(typeHandle));
2479    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2480    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Aclose(attrHandle));
2481
2482    if (H5Tequal(req->h5type, md.h5type) <= 0) {
2483        throw Exception("Requested and HDF5 data types do not match");
2484    }
2485}
2486
2487
2488void
2489SimulationFile::readDataset(H5Lookup *req, byte *&buf, size_t &sz) {
2490    H5MetaData md;
2491    md.replicate = req->replicate;
2492
2493    hid_t datasetHandle, dataspaceHandle, typeHandle;
2494    H5T_class_t typeClass;
2495    hsize_t dims[H5S_MAX_RANK];
2496    hsize_t elemSz;
2497
2498    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(datasetHandle, H5Dopen2(file, req->path, H5P_DEFAULT));
2499    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspaceHandle, H5Dget_space(datasetHandle));
2500    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspaceHandle, dims, NULL));
2501    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(md.ndim, H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims(dataspaceHandle));
2502    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(typeHandle, H5Dget_type(datasetHandle));
2503    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(md.h5type, H5Tget_native_type(typeHandle, H5T_DIR_ASCEND));
2504    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(elemSz, H5Tget_size(md.h5type));
2505
2506    for (int i=0; i < md.ndim; i++) {
2507        md.shape[i] = dims[i];
2508    }
2509
2510    md.payloadSize = elemSz*std::accumulate(md.shape, md.shape + md.ndim, 1, std::multiplies<size_t>());
2511
2512    sz = sizeof(md)+md.payloadSize;
2513    buf = new unsigned char[sz];
2514    H5MetaData *hdr = reinterpret_cast<H5MetaData*>(buf);
2515    unsigned char *payload = buf + sizeof(md);
2516    *hdr = md;
2517
2518    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(datasetHandle, md.h5type, H5S_ALL, H5S_ALL, H5P_DEFAULT, (void *)payload));
2519    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Tclose(typeHandle));
2520    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(datasetHandle));
2521    HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspaceHandle));
2522
2523    if (H5Tequal(req->h5type, md.h5type) <= 0) {
2524        throw Exception("Requested and HDF5 data types do not match");
2525    }
2526}
2527
2528
2529}
2530}
2531}
2532
2533/* Generic code to read a dataset with a hyperslab.
2534 * int ndims;
2535hsize_t dims[4];
2536hsize_t memdims[1];
2537hsize_t start[4], count[4];
2538hid_t dataset, dataspace, memspace;
2539HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataset,H5Dopen2(file, "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice", H5P_DEFAULT));
2540HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(dataspace,H5Dget_space(dataset));
2541ndims=H5Sget_simple_extent_ndims(dataspace);
2542if (ndims != 4) throw Exception("Invalid dataset dimensions", filename.c_str(), "/Model/Diffusion/Lattice");
2543HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(ndims,H5Sget_simple_extent_dims(dataspace, dims, NULL));
2544if (dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3] != latticeSize) throw InvalidArgException("lattice", "incorrect lattice size");
2545start[0] = 0;
2546start[1] = 0;
2547start[2] = 0;
2548start[3] = 0;
2549count[0] = dims[0];
2550count[1] = dims[1];
2551count[2] = dims[2];
2552count[3] = dims[3];
2553HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sselect_hyperslab(dataspace, H5S_SELECT_SET, start, NULL, count, NULL));
2554memdims[0] = dims[0]*dims[1]*dims[2]*dims[3];
2555HDF5_EXCEPTION_CALL(memspace,H5Screate_simple(1, memdims, NULL));
2556HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dread(dataset, H5T_NATIVE_UINT8, memspace, dataspace, H5P_DEFAULT, (void *)lattice));
2557HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(memspace));
2558HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Sclose(dataspace));
2559HDF5_EXCEPTION_CHECK(H5Dclose(dataset));
2560*/

Timer.h#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
  3 * Copyright 2016-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
  4 * All rights reserved.
  5 * 
  6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
  7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
  8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  9 * 
 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 * 
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 * 
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 * 
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 * 
 29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 36 *
 37 * Author(s): Tyler M. Earnest
 38 */
 39
 40#ifndef TIMER_HH_
 41#define TIMER_HH_
 42
 43#ifdef LINUX
 44#include <ctime>
 45
 46#ifdef __MACH__
 47#include <mach/clock.h>
 48#include <mach/mach.h>
 49#endif
 50
 51class Timer {
 52    timespec now,then;
 53    void get_time(timespec* t) { 
 54#ifdef __MACH__
 55      clock_serv_t cclock;
 56      mach_timespec_t mts;
 57      host_get_clock_service(mach_host_self(), CALENDAR_CLOCK, &cclock);
 58      clock_get_time(cclock, &mts);
 59      mach_port_deallocate(mach_task_self(), cclock);
 60      t->tv_sec  = mts.tv_sec;
 61      t->tv_nsec = mts.tv_nsec;
 62#else
 63      clock_gettime(CLOCK_MONOTONIC, t); 
 64#endif
 65    }
 66
 67public:
 68
 69    double
 70    tock()
 71    {
 72      long long int sec,nsec;
 73
 74      get_time(&now);
 75
 76      if ((now.tv_nsec-then.tv_nsec)<0) 
 77        {
 78          sec = now.tv_sec-then.tv_sec-1;
 79          nsec = 1000000000L+now.tv_nsec-then.tv_nsec;
 80        } 
 81      else 
 82        {
 83          sec = now.tv_sec-then.tv_sec;
 84          nsec = now.tv_nsec-then.tv_nsec;
 85        }
 86      return sec + nsec*1e-9;
 87    }
 88
 89    void tick() { get_time(&then); }
 90
 91    Timer() { tick(); }
 92};
 93#endif /* LINUX */
 94
 95#ifdef MACOSX
 96/* https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/qa/qa1398/_index.html */
 97#include <mach/mach_time.h>
 98
 99class Timer {
100	uint64_t now,then;
101	mach_timebase_info_data_t base;
102    void get_time(uint64_t* t) { *t=mach_absolute_time(); } 
103
104public:
105
106	Timer()
107	{
108		mach_timebase_info(&base);
109		tick();
110	}
111
112    double
113    tock()
114    {
115      long long int nsec;
116
117      get_time(&now);
118		nsec = (now - then) * base.numer / base.denom;
119      return nsec*1e-9;
120    }
121
122    void tick() { get_time(&then); }
123};
124#endif /* MACOSX */
125
126#endif /* TIMER_HH_ */

Timer.cpp#

SignalHandler.h#

 1/*
 2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
 3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
 4 * All rights reserved.
 5 * 
 6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
 7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
 8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
 9 * 
10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
16 * 
17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
19 * 
20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
23 * 
24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
27 * permission.
28 * 
29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
36 *
37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
38 */
39
40#ifndef LM_MAIN_SIGNALHANDLER
41#define LM_MAIN_SIGNALHANDLER
42
43#include <list>
44#include <csignal>
45#include "thread/Thread.h"
46#include "thread/Worker.h"
47#include "thread/WorkerManager.h"
48
49using std::list;
50using lm::thread::PthreadException;
51using lm::thread::Worker;
52
53
54namespace lm {
55namespace main {
56
57class LocalDataOutputWorker;
58
59/// @class SignalHandler
60/// @brief A thread safe Worker thread type that captures SIG* type signals over the various threads
61class SignalHandler : public Worker
62{
63public:
64    /// @brief Create a SignalHandler
65    SignalHandler();
66    virtual ~SignalHandler();
67    
68    /// @brief Wake a sleeping Signalhandler
69    virtual void wake();
70
71private:
72    sigset_t signalMask;
73
74protected:
75    /// @brief Run the SignalHandler thread so that it can catch signals
76    /// @return 0 on success, -1 on failure
77    virtual int run();
78};
79
80}
81}
82
83
84#endif

SignalHandler.cpp#

  1/*
  2 * University of Illinois Open Source License
  3 * Copyright 2008-2018 Luthey-Schulten Group,
  4 * All rights reserved.
  5 * 
  6 * Developed by: Luthey-Schulten Group
  7 * 			     University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
  8 * 			     http://www.scs.uiuc.edu/~schulten
  9 * 
 10 * Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy of
 11 * this software and associated documentation files (the Software), to deal with 
 12 * the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights to 
 13 * use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell copies 
 14 * of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is furnished to 
 15 * do so, subject to the following conditions:
 16 * 
 17 * - Redistributions of source code must retain the above copyright notice, 
 18 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers.
 19 * 
 20 * - Redistributions in binary form must reproduce the above copyright notice, 
 21 * this list of conditions and the following disclaimers in the documentation 
 22 * and/or other materials provided with the distribution.
 23 * 
 24 * - Neither the names of the Luthey-Schulten Group, University of Illinois at
 25 * Urbana-Champaign, nor the names of its contributors may be used to endorse or
 26 * promote products derived from this Software without specific prior written
 27 * permission.
 28 * 
 29 * THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR 
 30 * IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, 
 31 * FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT.  IN NO EVENT SHALL 
 32 * THE CONTRIBUTORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR 
 33 * OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, 
 34 * ARISING FROM, OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR 
 35 * OTHER DEALINGS WITH THE SOFTWARE.
 36 *
 37 * Author(s): Elijah Roberts
 38 */
 39
 40#include <csignal>
 41#include "config.h"
 42#include "core/Print.h"
 43#include "core/LocalDataOutputWorker.h"
 44#include "core/Globals.h"
 45#include "core/SignalHandler.h"
 46#include "thread/Thread.h"
 47#include "thread/WorkerManager.h"
 48
 49using lm::thread::PthreadException;
 50using lm::thread::WorkerManager;
 51
 52namespace lm {
 53namespace main {
 54
 55
 56SignalHandler::SignalHandler()
 57{
 58    // Block signals from interrupting the calling thread.
 59    sigemptyset(&signalMask);
 60    sigaddset(&signalMask, SIGINT);
 61    sigaddset(&signalMask, SIGTERM);
 62    sigaddset(&signalMask, SIGUSR1);
 63    sigaddset(&signalMask, SIGUSR2);
 64    PTHREAD_EXCEPTION_CHECK(pthread_sigmask(SIG_BLOCK, &signalMask, NULL));
 65}
 66
 67SignalHandler::~SignalHandler()
 68{
 69}
 70
 71void SignalHandler::wake()
 72{
 73    PTHREAD_EXCEPTION_CHECK(pthread_kill(threadId, SIGUSR1));
 74}
 75
 76int SignalHandler::run()
 77{
 78    try
 79    {
 80        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Signal handler thread running.");
 81
 82        bool looping = true;
 83        while (looping)
 84        {
 85            // Wait for a signal.
 86            int signalCaught;
 87            if (sigwait(&signalMask, &signalCaught) != 0) throw lm::Exception("Error waiting for signal.");
 88
 89            Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Received signal %d, control signal is %d.", signalCaught,SIGUSR1);
 90
 91            // If this was our control signal, check for control changes.
 92            if (signalCaught == SIGUSR1)
 93            {
 94                //// BEGIN CRITICAL SECTION: controlMutex
 95                PTHREAD_EXCEPTION_CHECK(pthread_mutex_lock(&controlMutex));
 96
 97                // If we should abort, stop looping.
 98                if (aborted || !running) looping=false;
 99
100                PTHREAD_EXCEPTION_CHECK(pthread_mutex_unlock(&controlMutex));
101                //// END CRITICAL SECTION: controlMutex
102            }
103
104            // Otherwise, see what we need to do.
105            if ((signalCaught == SIGUSR1 && looping == true) || signalCaught == SIGUSR2 || signalCaught == SIGINT || signalCaught == SIGTERM)
106            {
107                // Set the global abort flag.
108                Print::printf(Print::WARNING, "Global abort signaled.");
109                globalAbort = true;
110            }
111        }
112        Print::printf(Print::DEBUG, "Signal handler thread finished.");
113        return 0;
114    }
115    catch (lm::thread::PthreadException e)
116    {
117        Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "Pthread exception during execution: %s (%s:%d)", e.what(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
118    }
119    catch (lm::Exception e)
120    {
121        Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "Exception during execution: %s (%s:%d)", e.what(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
122    }
123    catch (std::exception& e)
124    {
125        Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "Exception during execution: %s (%s:%d)", e.what(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
126    }
127    catch (...)
128    {
129        Print::printf(Print::FATAL, "Unknown Exception during execution (%s:%d)", __FILE__, __LINE__);
130    }
131
132    return -1;
133}
134
135}
136}

  • Core Functions
    • runSimulation.h
    • runSimulation.cpp
  • Lattice Classes
    • Lattice.h
